info.name: Pro Filt’r Instant Retouch Longwear Liquid Concealer
info.description: What it is: A creamy, long-wear, crease-proof liquid concealer with light-as-air, medium-to-full coverage that brightens under-eyes and conceals blemishes and redness.Coverage: Full Finish: Matte Formulation: Liquid Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. This product is cruelty-free.What Else You Need to Know: This is the full-coverage cure to living life to the fullest. This sweat-resistant formula comes in a groundbreaking range of 50 easy-to-shop, soft-matte shades, each designed to pair with your Pro Filt’r foundation (sold separately) shade. Start with your Pro Filt’r foundation shade and adjust from there.

review_distribution.statistics_type: I received this product as a free sample

reviews.review_text: I love the way this product sits on the skin. It does not crease and looks soooo natural! I do use powder on top of it but overall blends well and looks fabulous.
After using this concealer I realized that it’s WAYYY to expensive for how bad it is. It honestly is so dry on my skin even after moisturizing and priming.
I have very oily skin and fenty never adds more oil into it nor does it dry up my skin as other brands do
very cakey and sticks to my dry patches so bad. not blendable at all either. I love everything else from fenty but this was not it! not for dry skin at all.
don’t use if you have dry skin,dry patches, eczema on your face. It looks bad (coverage is good just not for dry skin)
Clung to my dry patches, didn't help cover my blemishes or brighten my under eye, didn't blend very easily, and for the price it's just not worth it. If you want something Fenty, try a gloss instead.
I’ve been using this product faithfully for a few years and I love it. It’s buildable and blends well with other products. The color match is spectacular and gently never disappoints.
Doesn’t cover under eyes or blemish so upset with the product
Blends right in with my skin tone perfectly and lasts all day. I love it!

I have combination skin, on my oily chin it blended okay and i didn’t have too many issues. On my nose it was horrible, made my skin look like crackle nail polish, creased under my eyes after only 4 hours too. super super disappointed

Love this concealer! I have a lot of scarring on my chin and forever hunting for coverage that I can use without applying globs. This one covers in one application and blends in with my face and IMO flawless!
reviews.review_title: My go to from now on!

reviews.review_text: this is the worst concealer I’ve ever used. it’s so thick & hard to blend. it blends patchy, settles into fine lines, and literally cracks on your face. also the shades run so ashy and neutral. It has that 2016 era vibe to it & not in a good way

honestly, this concealer is incredible. It literally disappears once on my skin, taking away any minor imperfections. You seriously cannot tell once you blend it in that you are using concealer. it blends like butter, and it doesn't feel heavy or greasy. it goes on Matte and doesn't clump or crease all day long. my new go-to!

**in the pic, only HALF of my hand has concealer  on it. but it blends so well. It's like it becomes my one with my skin, but makes it better, lol**
Honestly, really don’t like this product. Super patchy and does not look good on my skin. I was disappointed.

Really good coverage (medium), it definitely needs powder to go with it, but once you set it it’ll last all day. it smells a little strange right out of the bottle, but I really love the way it looks.
ahhh i loveee it i cant say enough about how much i love it. feels light. it's gorg. it's everything u need it to be
I have combination skin, but it was really dry on my skin. It also did not blend very well for me.
Smooth, great medium coverage, does not pill, and is long lasting even in the hot/humid Florida weather.

I tried this out and my first impression was wow, this is so lightweight and thin, yet still provided me with a nice brightening affect. I used a tiny amount, and then lightly stippled it out with a brush. very buildable and mattifying. I have combo skin. I also appreciate this being in an olive color.
If you want to visit crease city, get this. I hate this so much it gave me a bad impression on Fenty Beauty
I use this product everyday under my eyes but it’s still so thick and heavy. A little goes a long ways. You will have this product for years fyi.

I use 310 Warm and I love the coverage. But I dislike that it creases so it makes it look like I have lots of fine lines. This is a good concealer overall for coverage just not under the eyes. I’m glad she has came out with a hydrating concealer so I’ll be trying that one next.
J'aime ce cache cerne. Il cache bien les boutons comme les cernes!!

This concealer has an amazing shade range, which I always appreciate. It also really sticks once you apply it - if you have acne or spots you really need to hide all day this is a fantastic concealer. It only gets 4 stars from me because sadly it emphasizes my dry patches too much, so I can't use it on larger areas or under my eyes.
reviews.review_title: Amazing spot concealer, but too dry for under eyes

reviews.review_text: I love this product it matches my skin tone perfectly. It does not cake and has a natural light-weight finish that lasts all-day.

I have always had issues with concealer slightly creasing under the eyes so was hopeful to try this Fenty concealer as the description claimed it is crease-proof.. nope, this product has given me the worst creasing yet!!! 

I thought maybe I was using too much product under the eyes but even with the tiniest amount of product, I will still end up with creased under eyes no matter what setting powder I use.

For the creasing alone, this product gets a 2-star review and I will not repurchase nor recommend!
This might be the worst concealer I have ever used. Its creases in lines I never even knew I had. DO NOT GET IT.‼️🚫 I don’t mean to be a hater I love rihanna and her music but not this concealer.
This product has such good coverage and doesn’t crease or clump.

So far, I love this concealer. I received it in 290W. I love the shade as it matched my skin tone perfectly. It is not much hydrating sadly but I have extra oily soin so it worked for me. And for those delicate eye areas, I pit it up with good eye cream and it works great. It covers my dark acne spots as well. Its lightweight and very blendable. Gives pretty good coverage.
Was recommended by a sephora employee and it’s terrible, does not set right on skin at all and seems to dry it out.
Pleasantly surprised with how much I like this! I anticipated that it would be good but so much better, I like it more than shape tape! Not 5 stars because it got weird by the end of the day
Love this concealer. Have used it for 2 years now and have consistently repurchased. The formula blends amazing and is isn’t cakey. Definitely recommend.
Sephora Employee recommended saying it was super natural looking. Did not blend into my skin, super drying, brought out ALL my texture. Returned
It look good for an hour but later started separating and started looking patchy. I wouldn’t recommend to buy if you have dry skin. ￼
I LOVEEE, Best concealer ever. Reasonable price and great formula!!

I mean it does her job, has a good coverage but it has a matte finish and I prefer a natural radiant finish.
reviews.review_title: Not a big fan of it

reviews.review_text: It is an overall good product. Sometimes it feels a bit sticky on my skin, even with a light amount. But I still enjoy the product a lot.

Creases and I noticed after wearing for a few weeks my eye area has been extremely dry and irritated…like peeling and burning bad. Found out from a TikTok user that she was having the same issues from this product. Imm

The amount of times my under eyes creased is ridiculous!

This is my first concealer ever. I purchased it because it was easy to shade match, since I already use 440 in the foundation. I found this concealer was good! For the times when I just want spot coverage, I also set it with Laura Mercier's translucent setting powder and sprayed a bit of Charlotte Tilbury's setting spray. Looked nice.

this is one of the only concealers that actually matches my shade!! i love the formula, super creamy and blends nicely.
however… it always creases immediately. it gives my lines under my eyes i didn’t know existed.

Super patchy, will not blend properly. Waste of money.
Got patchy when applied over the fenty skin tint :(

10/10. doesnt crease like a lot of other concealers ive tried. the foundation + concealer duo is everything to me. i have it in 2 shades one to match foundation for spots and a highlighting one. ive considered doing a darker one for contour as well its just fab
Awesome product! It blends well and matches my skin color.

This is my 3rd purchase of the #185 concealer... and I am totally pleased with the coverage, wearability, and finish. Although my skin  leans to the cool tones, the very slight warmer tone in this shade brightens my undereye area, lessening fine lines and flaws... and works to give a great finish!

I have two of these concealers thinking it was gonna be a good purchase, at the beginning it was really good but over the months the extrude has been really bad, makes my skin patchy and oily, wouldn’t rec

None
This product was okay. The coverage was good and the texture was nice too, but it was super super hard for me to find a shade that matched me. This one says cool undertones but was so orange on me!

I like how thick this concealer is! I find that it doesn’t dry out too fast and is quite easy to blend. It’s very comfortable on the skin and I haven’t noticed any creasing on my eyelids. It is a little pricey but I’m pleased with the product

I’m 50 w dry skin and serious dark circles. I used this over a primer, and it stayed solid from 9am to 9pm. Excellent coverage, blended in great, and I am not good with makeup. Did not change color, did not fade, did not crease, did not transfer. Best color match I’ve found in a concealer and best results.

Bought this product few months ago, at the very beginning of couple weeks using this product It was quite good but after couple of months using it, this product sucks and I didn't like the outcome of it. It's too watery and this product is a waste!

I was having issues with my makeup transferring badly onto my bf, and I finally realized this concealer was the culprit. 

Switched back to mac pro longwear and no longer had the problem.

I was really impressed by this concealer! For my no makeup days, I love to get up and go after just blending this over my blemishes and setting with powder. Thanks FENTY, for looking out for the olive baddies
reviews.review_title: Shade 290 for the olive skinned beauties

reviews.review_text: Great coverage without feeling caky. I love that it matches with my eaze drop and Fenty foundation easily.
I love the color!  This concealer gives great coverage without feeling heavy!

WOW RIRI!!! You’ve out don’t yourself!!! I LOVE this! It’s truly a matte concealer, full coverage, and perfect to cover imperfections and acne! It’s the BEST I’ve tried for covering acne marks and I’ve tried it ALL (Nars, MUFE, Estée Lauder, Laurier Mercier) you name it! Also a little goes a LONG way! It’s for the oily folks, I think it would be too drying for someone with dry skin. I think it’s too full coverage/drying for around the eye but I also don’t like a lot of concealer around the eye, gets cakey.
reviews.review_title: BEST I’ve tried to cover acne!!!

reviews.review_text: Very nice concealer. Good smoothness and texture.  I like the coverage overall. I’m impressed with consistency
I love it! And you don’t need to use a lot! It’s perfect
my favorite non-drugstore concealer. it doesn’t make my under eyes looks dry and helps brighten them. definitely build for more coverage!

I never write reviews but since I've had such bad eye/skin irritation from this that I wanted to share my experience. I've worn Fenty foundation for several years and it's not bothered me. I typically have worn Benefit concealer but decided to try this to get a closer match to my foundation. My under-eyes immediately became red and patchy. I had just started a new mascara too so I wasn't certain what did it. I phased out both and then tried to implement this back in and it is definitely the culprit. I think it's one of these four ingredients that are in teh concealer but not the foundation: Alcohol, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Hydroxyacetophenone, Combretum Fruticosum Flower Nectar.
It patches and creases. Looks good from afar, but close 🤢. I was really excited to get this but once I put it on it was bad.
After using this product for the past weeks I can say that I really like it! It is a good concealer! Must try

I've used a lot of concealers, and this one is the absolute best. A little goes a long way. It will definitely make you look like you've slept for 8 hours, have dranked gallons of water, and you've no stress in the world. Flawless.

Highly regret buying this, and my biggest regret is not returning it for my money back when I could. This concealer sits on your face so DRY, cracky and creasey. It just emphasizes your issues even more because it sits so badly over them—it’s clear from the moon you’re wearing bad concealer. I love the Fenty Skin Tint, but this concealer and their foundation are terrible in my opinion. I keep trying to find ways to avoid throwing them away (like mixing it with a creamier/more watery product to make them less dry), but no matter what they look bad.
I love this so much, this was my first brand concealer. When I got I was able to get my perfect shade; it blends really well and doesn’t smudge or nothing I highly recommend
it has a lot of coverage and can cover anything but always make sure your skin is very moisturized because it can sometimes make your skin dry and dont recommend using it on dry skin

You do have to blend it quick unless it dries but i don't mind, what else do you have to do except blend it lol?

la verdad es que utilizaba mi Concealer de nars pero dicicidi probar el de fenty ya que uso la base, entre a oficina, y casi no tomo sol, por lo tanto actualmente mi base me queda oscura y mi conceder es mi tono, lo uso en marchitas u otras partes como ojeras, pero verdaderamente es bueno, y fácil para mi de difuminar, amo acerolo con una beauty blender, uso, la de real techniques, y verdaderamente es muy fácil de difuminar y repartir, sello con polvo suelto de Laura y listo le doy un 9/10, ante el calor que hace en mi país (Republica Dominicana) se comporto muy bien, no se movió para nada
This product used to cling onto my dry spots under my eyes, but i used it again recently and it looked nice.. i didnt wear it for a long time tho, a few hours.

it's alright. Theres way better concealers out there.
(born this way by two faced.)
it's cool though, doesn't have the best blend ability though. wont buy again

I highly recommend this product!

I’ve bounced back and for concealer to concealer for years now but this is the best one I have tried yet. It doesn’t look or feel heavy or greasy on my combination skin and looks grate in stage lights. lights.

At the begging, I was kind of exceptional into buying the concealer because of the mixed reviews.

As soon as I apply it in my face every time it dries REALLY fast and leaves the streakiness of the first application. I prepare my skin previously with a lot of moisturizing creams, and double prime my face with my hydrating primer. As I wear it during the day it lasts a lot and leaves a really matte finish so I give it points for that, but it points out a little my eye lines. 
I'm going to try to buy another hydrating primer, because it was really expensive for what I got.

for all the oily skin girlies out there, shad match is incredible, and just a fantastic concealer, make sure to skin prep well and this will do this you so much good.

Unseen sunscreen as an under eye primer and set with the One/size setting spray. So far this has been a great combo! Definitely recommend!

After trying to cover it with other products thankfully the brand Sephora concealer worked in my favor. Think about who you’re giving all your money too.

I have gotten more into makeup and purchased many concealers but this concealer will always be my go to.

Love it application is easy and smooth and feels light

I bought this concealer on a whim because I ran out of my concealer while on vacation in Europe, and when I went to the sephora in the country I was in, I decided to try this one out. I was in awe over how much I loved it and for the price of it. I am VERY picky when it comes to concealers. I have genetically dark under circles, that make it very difficult for concealers to hide. I also love a nice creamy brightening concealer. Let me tell you, this did not disappoint, I was so happy with it. My face looked instantly lifted, and my under eyes were creamily concealed. I would highly recommend this concealer! It is very slept on! It is great for the price.

this is an excellent concealer but it didn't work for the the formula is too thick that it looks patchy on my skin I tried everything to fix it I used sponge, brush and my fingers to blend it it still couldn't look smooth I wish it worked for me

Probably the best concealer I have tried in the history of the world. For my skin, it's not dry and it doesn't show my fine lines. I've had issues with other conearlers in the past, but I think I found the magic. This is the only concealer that I will buy from now on.
reviews.review_title: Probably the best concealer I have tried.

reviews.review_text: quick drying and oxidizes when not fully blended out yet. doesnt give u time to blend evenly and will often cake up or settle into my lines under my eyes. i use this w her matte fb primer
THE BEST CONCEALER I HAVE EVER USED!!!!! Looks so light and natural on the skin, doesn’t cake or dry throughout the day, and doesn’t budge!!!!!
I actually use the shade 370 and 380. I have dark circles, sunken eyes and dry under eyes. Concealer has a horrible colour range, creases, looses coverage in seconds.
Super dry and oxidized. Product settled into my fine lines and coverage disappeared.

As others have mentioned, this settled into all of the fine lines under my eyes and made them way more noticeable. It also highlighted dry patches of skin that I couldn’t even see before I put it on. I’m so disappointed because this was the best color match I’ve found for my skin tone in a concealer (fair/neutral), but the formula did not work for me at all.
At first, it seemed good, but after wearing it for a longer period of time, it started to get cakey and I could see the fine lines under my eyes. Too bad, because I love Rihanna!

You know a concealer is great when it lasts all day WITH OUT foundation !! I use this daily with no foundation and it dries instantly so be sure to blend this product quickly . The pros are that because it dries quickly you do not need to set this with a powder and it is creaseless !! It’s full coverage and lasts for about 10 hours max. It also has a natural finish. I am the color 290 FYI (Ginger in Nars concealer for reference). Btw this has a way better coverage and finish than Nars plus it lasts all day
reviews.review_title: Amazing for a quick or full glam

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love it but i didn’t. It dried down super fast and was hard to blend. It was also super streaky and drying. It did have very full coverage though.

I had a GREAT survice EVER today!!! Visiting from Vegas for family vaca met Andrea at the Universal City Walk in LA. She is SUPER sweet, so helpful, great customer survice also I felt her passion of her work. I used to been in the beauty industry for long time and the way she suggested item was so professional also make sense. Great sale rep never being pushy or scare customer at all. I’m already wants to see her again and this is my new favorite concealer! When I have dry skin will blend some gentle moisturizing cream would be working. Before I forget have to write what Andrea suggested. When I apply this 190 concealer will be brighten up around eyes also T-zones. My original color is 210 but it will melting my skin tone and more visible my dark spot more. Using lighter color will help keep covering wherever you want keep invisible. That’s what Andrea says :) She is the BEST!!!

The color match for me is good.  It can be hard to find my shade because I’m very pale with a lot of redness but this one works nicely.  My problem with it is how quickly it dries.  It is VERY drying and once it’s on, I have to blend so quickly or else it sets and won’t budge.  Usually I’ll conceal my whole face at once but that’s just not possible with this product.  Its so hard to blend once it’s been applied, even if sits just for a minute.  I prefer to have a concealer that’s easy to blend and won’t set until I set it so for that reason this is just not the product for me.
reviews.review_title: sets quickly and hard to blend

reviews.review_text: ended up returning this just because it wasn’t anything special for me. i have tons more concealers that i like and would use more so i just returned
Love this concealer, gives amazing coverage and doesn’t crease under my eyes. Blends seamlessly and holds up all day.

For me this is the perfect concealer! I usually have a hard time finding a concealer that's light enough for me with the right undertones, they're normally too yellow or just a bit too dark... It stays on all day, doesn't crease (but I do set it - it creases when it's not set) & has a good medium coverage which is what i want!!

With the wide variety of shades, finding my perfect shade wasn’t hard at all, this color fits my skin so well that it’s not noticeable, and the coverage for it is very nice. I use this to cover up spots on my face, for that use it’s really nice and does a good job at making the redness fade and blending the spot back into my skin, I don’t use this for under eye concealer so I can’t review that part, but for spots it works so well and it matches my skin tone better than any other concealer i’ve tried
Love this concealer thick didn’t dry down quick and full coverage

It’s a beautiful shade and glides on well but creases horribly no matter how much I set or what method I use. Never had this issue with makeup products before. Fenty needs to change the formula of their liquid products so it’s not cakey.

I really like this concealer. I don't need to use very much at all to get the coverage I want. I have acne scars, and this stuff does the trick at hiding them. It doesn't feel heavy on my face, and it's also humidity and sweat- proof for me. It's a necessary staple in my makeup routine.
The  make up consultant used her device and picked out a colour for me. This colour is too orange for my skin tone and doesn't match.After 3-5 hours the product gets cakey on my skin. Wasted $$
Long lasting. Not great on its own, but works well with Fenty Foundation. Good for my dry skin
Beautiful color and matches my skin perfectly!! Love the formula.
I despise this formula. For younger skin, this may be great but because I have older, dryer, creasier skin under my eyes, this was so terrible.
perfect concealer for dry skin! Doesn’t crease too much as compared to creamy concealers. And works with my dry under eyes! Not too thick or too drying either!

Does this brighten my under eyes? Yes. Does it also sink into my eye wrinkles and smudge at the end of the day even when I’ve set it? Also yes. I absolutely love the Fenty matte foundation and was disappointed with this concealer.
I love Fenty, but this concealer just wasn’t it. It burned a little when I applied it to my lids to prime. I also used it under my eyes and it was ok. It didn’t beat my Colourpop concealer.
goes on smooth.   covers dark circles.  would purchase again.  want to try other products from the line,
It’s meant to be a lightweight concealer, so if you’re wanting something heavy then this is not for you. I notice a difference but it’s not drastic, it looks very natural.
Easy to use and blended wonderfully. I've always love Fenty products.

This is my first concealer ever and I am in love with it. I have always wanted to try a concealer but worried that I may end up not being able to use it as an amateur at using technique. With this concealer I have been using my fingers and it gives very good finish and I love it.
Works well as a concealer for overall face but does not look good under the eyes. It creased before I had a chance to even set it.
reviews.review_title: creased before I could set it

reviews.review_text: This is so bad, makes my skin look really dry and so white, I’ve tried 3 different shades either too white (and I’m white white) or too dark I don’t like how it looks on my combination skin. I don’t recommend for anyone with dry skin at all…
Love this formula. The shade range is phenomenal and it blends very well. It makes my skin look soft.

I overall really liked this concealer, it does live up to its description of being a filter like instant retouch product, though it is a little bit more on the dry side than I prefer my concealers to be.
Doesn’t work for my dry skin. It looks cakey when applying it & i have to blend it fast or it dries out. Could just be my skin type but not won’t be purchasing again.

i see a lot of reviews saying this is a great concealer for oily skin. i definitely have dry skin, and i will be returning mine. it feels nice and smooth going on, but it dries/cakes so quickly that i don’t have time to blend it. either with my fingers or a sponge blender, it gets almost chalky and after 2 dabs i’m taking off more product than i’m spreading out. i don’t even have severely dry skin, but if you err on the dry side, this is not the concealer for you.
I love this concealer. I’ve been using it for years. It really enhances my overall makeup look, reduces the under eye lines.
Idk about this one. I don’t really understand the hype. I think it’s a little drying and it kinda cracks after a couple hours.
it's very full coverage but too dry and cakey. did not work at all done me.

Yall need to get this if you have oily skin!!!! Usually when I wear any makeup my nose area gets oily super fast but this concealer I wore this to the gym and I was sweating it was still on my face and my nose was not oily at all

See this concealer has fantastic coverage, way better than the Elf camo concealer BUT no matter what powder I use or setting spray technique or primer/foundation it just does not want to stay in place. Maybe if I got the Fenty setting powder it’ll work but I’m not about to spend more money for extra powders just for my eyes.

It’s not really dry as everyone is saying in my opinion and I do have dry skin, it’s very creamy and fun to play with when I first set it down and a little goes a long way but I notice I lose a significant amount of coverage through the day. It makes me look like my mascara ran down when I know that’s not the case. The darkness under my eyes begin to peek within 2 hours of wearing it and I love everything except for the fact that it just cannot set whatsoever. And god forbid I need to wipe off a spec of eyeshadow under my eye or I want to pat down my eyes, well then product will definitely swipe onto my fingers. 

It also creases as soon as I finish blending it in - where as my elf and rare beauty concealer don’t crease until later on in the day which is reasonable considering how my undereye area already naturally has a folded crease. The color was also perfect, 185 looks amazing on olive skin tones. I will finish the bottle since I can’t return but I wouldn’t  buy it again, was worth a try.
This concealer was too dark and I had to return it to get my correct shade but the coverage on this is good !! It’s not matte or hydrating, it gives you a nice natural finish.
Really dry concealer and a bit hard to blend. I find it looks terrible under the eyes and creases maybe a bit better for blemishes instead. Will not repurchase.
Not the best for under eye concealer. It gave me wrinkles I don’t have. It is super thick. It’s ok for a highlight contour type. Nothing special. Not sure what the hype is about

I use this concealer with the Fenty setting powder and liquid soft matte foundation every single day. 
I find that no matter what I try, it always creases and moves on me. 
Not too much, but just enough to be annoying. 
But other than that, i like the coverage it gives and how easy it blends.

Been using daily for a few weeks. Not as creamy as I hoped and is patchy on my face by the end of day no matter how I try to set it. Wanted to love it because I’ve been using the pro filter foundation for years but wouldn’t repurchase. There are better cheaper options on the market

Wanted to like it but it’s just subpar. Blends okay, but almost immediately starts to break apart after only an hour of wear. After a few hours it looks cakey and gross. Had a few small pimples that it could not cover at all, even made them look worse. Thought maybe it was just my skin being too oily or something, but when I went back to my NARS concealer that worked perfectly. :(
reviews.review_title: Wanted to like it, but it’s just not good :(

reviews.review_text: The concealer is amazing I work out and it stayed on the whole time! Just wish it came with more product for the price
It’s ok but pretty good but I would recommend Nars
This concealer is so sticky, it dries in patches and it creases so bad, I’ll just stick to my tarte concealer.
I liked the packaging and the amount of product that the brush component held, but the formula was SO drying.  I had to return it after my first use.
good coverage and is very brightening just a bit small

As a nars creamy radiant (or radiant creamy?) stan, i wanted to try this as it ends up cheaper, the color was beautiful and it smells kind of nice but the performance???? it transfers easily, the coverage is not all that buildable and definitely wears off faster than other products that i use. its a no from me.
I love it, it’s not too thin or too thick. I love how there’s enough concealer. I just bought this recently and it’s really good
My favorite concealer of all time! Covers up any blemishes and dark circles and makes me look fresh. 10/10 recommend

I tried this as a sample for a few days and for Fenty, I honestly expected more! I figured for $28 this concealer should at least COVER, but no matter how I tried to blend (fingers, damp beauty blender and concealer brush) the coverage just melts away.

If you don't have major spots or darkness to cover it would probably be fine but the more you try to blend, the less coverage you get (at least in my experience). I wouldn't recommend for people with major redness or acne.

The formula is creamy and easy to apply for sure! No strong smell. Probably would be great for a more sheer, glowy under eye concealer but not for covering major blemishes. It also made my acne break out where I applied it, but my skin is REALLY sensitive!

Sincerely, Sensitive/Acne-Prone/Red/Very Fair-Skinned Liv
Just disappointed that the 110 of concealer is darker than the 110 foundation but it does work well

I really like this concealer when I need it. The formula sets on its own but not entirely. I generally have to mix it with something more radiant to help with the finish; it tends to crease and separate around my nose and under my brows. I love the shade range and packaging too but I’d recommend this perhaps for someone looking for this specific formula type.
blends nicely, full coverage, last a couple hours.
I love this concealer paired with the FENTY foundation. It’s smooth and blend-able.

Every time I try to make this product work it separates my makeup badly. I love the foundation but this concealer just does not work with it. Also I wear 130 which is a light olive yet the concealer is an almost neon white with very pink undertones and looks insanely too light even using for the under eye area.
reviews.review_title: separates makeup, colors don’t line up

reviews.review_text: I love this concealer! it’s full coverage, blend-able and has a beautiful natural finish. the ONLY reason I’m not giving this 5 stars is because the shades don’t directly translate to FENTY foundations. It took me a few tries to find my correct shade. I should have taken more time in store to match, regardless of what shades I use in other products. Although now that I know my shade, I’ll be sure to buy again and again.
SO GOOD! I wear it everyday and it never fails to cover up any blemishes. It stays on all day and it looks so natural

After searching for a good foundation that matches my skin tone I finally found this gem. I love the way it looks on my skin, it’s blendable and looks natural. I’m somewhat oily on my tzone and this does not get oily.

My go to. It works so well. It’s a full coverage concealer and it does it’s job well. It is thick which I personally love. It is TRULY the best concealer I’ve ever used. I highly recommend it. It doesn’t dry or cake and it looks flawless every time.
Love this concealer! Sets well and isn’t dry at all. One of my favorite concealers

I normally really love Fenty products but I absolutely hate this concealer. The texture is like really think paint and I don’t think it actually covers anything well. It also smells really strong. Sadly I don’t recommend this.

I had such high hopes for this product but I have honestly never disliked a concealer more. It basically smeared in patches as you tried to blend it. It clung to dry patches and creased instantly. I tried it with a primer underneath and blended with my brush and the beauty blender and each way it still gave the same results. So upset I didn’t like it :( Honestly, the only positive I can give it is that it was the perfect shade for my skin, so for that I gave it 2 stars rather than 1.

It’s been so hard to try and find a concealer that perfectly matched my skin tone. They were always either too light, too dark or too red but this one is beautiful! The colour matches perfectly and not to mention how great the formula is! I wore it for a night out with friends and it held up very well :)
I love this item. My granddaughter introduced me to it
I don’t love this concealer. The texture is nice upon application, but it doesn’t last all day - it breaks apart and looks cakey at the end of the day (and I have dry skin).
Fits exactly with my skin colour and long lasting!
A little goes a long way. It blends out very nicely and is long lasting.
besides it having talc it’s amazing and has lasted forever
Great coverage. Dries down smooth. Does not crease! Will purchase more shades. Want to use this for color correction also.

One of my favorite concealers so far it has lasted me throughout the whole day especially I work for 6 hrs in sweat and under a mask it has a really good finish love the shade range one thing is that I wish it contained a lil more product it.

I wanted to love this. I’ve been using it consistently for the past 3 months. I got a great shade match and it does usually last all day on my oily skin. However, the main reason I wear concealer is to cover up blemishes, specifically hormonal acne. I’ve found that it actually accentuates my blemishes and makes them look dry instead of making them disappear. You can see in my photo that the two major blemishes on my forehead are “covered” color-wise (they’re red pimples) but you can still clearly find them on my face because of the dry flakes around them that only show up when I wear this concealer. It’s a fine product for under eye bags and other flat discoloration, and it very well may work perfectly on others. But sadly when it comes to acne, this just doesn’t stand up to Nars RCC for me.
reviews.review_title: Great shade range, but not great for blemishes

reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way and stays on all day. It doesn’t settle in fine lines and looks stunning all day. Certainly the best concealer on the market. I prefer to apply it with my fingers and it brights the under eye instantly
Feel like I had an natural look like l didn’t have anything on my face
I thought I would be hydrating but after the first fifteen minutes the concealer just looked dry and accentuated the fine lines under my eyes would not purchase again.
I bought it to highlight and somewhat conceal some spots and it works fine! Creases a little tho
This is awesome, cover everything and don’t leve my face oily

I used it as a base for sparkly or light eye shadows. It worked well. However, I didn't test other products, so I don't know how it compares to what's else on the market. The package is big, it will last for a long time.
AMAZING! very long lasting. 10/10 would recommend.

Really wanted to like this, but it’s quite drying. I have oily skin so I thought I would love this, but this concealer creases pretty badly under my eyes and maximizes my texture, making my skin look pretty dry and flakey. It dries down super fast too so it’s a bit hard to blend out. 2 stars for the great color range and full coverage!
I only wear fenty beauty products and the never let me down. This concealer last me all day and covers completely set with fenty powder for a flawless look
So good!! I don't really wear foundation too often so this concealer is perfect because of how full coverage it is, my acne scars were barely visible after I put a little bit on.
I love most Fenty products but this did not work for me. It did not blend well and was too drying for my under eye area. I ended up returning it and purchasing the Tarte hydro concealer.
I love this concealer. Good coverage that stays put for my 12 hour day.
I got this concealer because all of the hype I’ve heard about it, so I tried it and it drys up way too fast. I suggest y’all try the Merit concealer.
Goes on well and blends nicely. It’s my go-to concealer!

I'm glad I paid Black Friday prices. It's a good product, but online, it's so difficult to match shades. I'm afraid this is just too fair, even for my ivory fair skin. I'd go to a store to pick concealer, to be certain.
reviews.review_title: Good product, but too light for me

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, as it is my first Fenty Beauty product but I found that the formula dries so fast that you cannot even blend it.  Secondly, it caused me a  breakout, even though it isn't scented.  However, what I really like is the shade range that is HUGE and everyone can find their own shade without seeming too light or too dark.
Ive repurchased this concealer 3 times. It always plays nicely with my other products doesn't feel dry and has been a good base for my eyeshadows.
i love the consistency of this concealer! it’s a little on the thick side but blends like a dream!!
reviews.review_title: great concealer for the full coverage girlies

reviews.review_text: This foundation goes on perfectly with a sponge and I was able to match it exactly  to my complexion. ❤️
My favourite concealer. Perfect natural finish that lasts for hours

The perfect color match but It doesn’t go on top of my YSL foundation well - once I found the magic touch (lightly dabbing hoping to not create splotches), the concealer caked up after a few hours and flaked almost resembling dead skin - quite embarrassing and very disappointed
Unfortunately this product creases badly around my eyes, even with a primer. I don’t like the coverage on my skin or the way it sets.

was really excited to buy this product but sadly it wasn’t that good. Didn’t blend well at all, fell apart, and didn’t look right. I used it for my brows instead and it looked okay but still fell apart.

This is my second purchase, I used this mostly to cover up my dark circle and it does the job. However, it can get really dry and flaky after a few hours so I would recommend applying an eye cream or moisturiser before applying this concealer.
Can’t go anywhere without my Fenty concealer. The best shade yet for a brown skin girl like myself.
wanted to love this so bad but it’s very sticky feeling and splotchy :(
Not one of my favorite concealers. I will stick with Mac & Nars.

This concealer was good at covering up blemishes but that's about it. It creased horribly under my eyes. It also just seemed very cakey to me. I found that it did not settle well over my foundation and wasn't seamless. I can understand why people like this product but it did not work well for me.
LOVE this concealer! Re purchased it after not using it for a few years and re fell in love! it blends so seamlessly, feels lightweight, and looks so airbrush smooth! 10/10
One of my favorite fenty products other than the lip gloss and blushes. I wear this with the pro hydrating foundation and it gives a very skin like finish.
Solid concealer option, it looks smooth on, has good coverage, and rarely creased upon setting.
This formula feels soooo smooth. However, it doesn’t blend well and makes the under eye area dry and flaky. I wanted to love this so much but couldn’t
Love Thai concealer from fenty gives me full converge with the perfect shade to match my medium complexion

I like my Fenty Pro Filt'r Instant Retouch Longwear Liquid Concealer. I'm currently using this concealer with my Fenty Pro Filt'r Hydration Foundation and the products work great! I also use the Fenty Setting Powder with this product and everything oxidizes well.

I sometimes think that the shade 410 is actually lighter as a concealer but it isn't. It's very creamy and easy to use. It does cover my acne scars really well too. The scent is the same across all the cream products and it's a very light feminine smell. Overall, I would purchase this again. It does what it claims it will and is undetectable once it dries.
i just tried it today and it is beautiful! it is very good at covering imperfections and it stays on really well!

I would recommend this for my acne having folks as it is very high coverage and can easily cover up spots (as long as you let it dry down a bit)! I don’t like it so much for under the eyes since it is a bit thick.
Favorite concealer. I have to layer it quite a bit to get enough coverage. But it stays all day, doesn’t crease, and doesn’t transfer.
My favourite concealer!  Doesn't get cakey. Super easy to select the right shade. Great coverage.

I was excited to try this, granted, I haven’t tried a ton of concealers where I buy and go through the entire bottle…. So when I ran out of my shape tape, which I was actually very pleased with, I just wanted to try this one because maybe the *perfect* concealer does exist? Big mistake and now I cant return it.

The worst part is how horribly it creases. Im talking like, if I just applied it and then squint a little to put on my eyeliner next, it’s extremely noticeable in the tiniest lines or facial expressions you make. Maybe it’s unrealistic to expect a liquid substance to not settle into creases eventually, but then again, they’re the ones making these claims to sell their product. And I've definitely tried better.. I'm so glad we have reviews now to call them out on it. Secondary issues are: It just looks really fake and paint like, I cant explain why it just does. The concealer is supposed to be coordinated with the foundation but I find it way too bright in comparison. Maybe its the white cast others were mentioning. It really exaggerates the slightest texture just like the foundation which I sadly purchased at the same time. It moves around and breaks up, hardly lasting more than a few hours, even though I always set it with powder. I have oily skin but not right under my eyes, more like the T-zone area which of course doesn’t stand a chance with this stuff. And I’ve never had dry spots which this makes it look like I do.

I'm bummed I fell for the hype and thinking that since Rihanna seems to have some integrity and generally exudes quality, maybe her makeup line would reflect that. But I think I'll stick with real cosmetics companies from now on, who have been in the game way longer, and their entire reputation depends on their products, not the other way around. Save your money because this is worth $5 on a good day.
I absolutely love it, it’s very light on my face so it’s even better
Brightens which is great bc I have circles from not sleeping ... also it stays all day!!!

Best concealer I’ve used to date, looks great for any makeup technique whether you lean more towards being light handed and natural with minimal product or more towards a full glam insta face beat, coverage and finish looks gorgeous, this concealer is a everyday must for me I don’t leave my house without have some of this on wether it be to cover something up or just brighten my face to make me look more awake
reviews.review_title: Best concealer I’ve used to date

reviews.review_text: This is the best concealer I’ve ever used. It doesn’t cake, it doesn’t sit in creases and it blends extremely well. I don’t need to look for another concealer. I’m sold on Fenty Beauty.

I’ve bought 3 of these before writing this review… just to be sure. This is honestly the worst packaging ever. It will shortly leak every time you use it. The color is great but I get serious creasing.
its a good concealer! but the only downside is that it gets in my undereye lines :,)
Not my cup of tea It doesn’t melt into the skin it slides on your face especially if you wear glasses.

I wanted to love this, but sadly cannot. It’s pretty bad. Does not blend evenly even with a damp beauty blender. Does not wear well, the pigment seems to clump on the skin within a few hours. The description describes it as creamy…it is not. Pretty dry, takes a clean, primed canvas and makes it look like you’ve been sweating at the club for 6 hours. Only giving points for the color.

I do love this concealer my only complaint is the lightest shade still has a slight yellow undertone and I need a lighter shade with a pink undertone like snow by jouer: also this is as full coverage as I want, but this concealer does not crease at all and it lasts a long time.

I love this concealer because it 1) is my perfect shade, 2) blends out so well. It is medium coverage for sure but if needed you can build it up. I always use a damp beauty sponge when applying and it never becomes too thin or gets soaked up by the sponge. The ONLY problem I have with it though is that it creases a bit on my under eyes, but that's about it.

Definitely not what I expected at all. I’m color matched to this foundation but I think the concealer is too warm for me? Besides that the formula is awful.. it’s too heavy and doesn’t blend well. It looks cakey. I Used a beauty blender, I don’t know if it’s just because it doesn’t go well with the poreFessional primer or what but, I’m not a fan. Extra star for packaging..

I got shade matched in store and was looking to cover dark circles and brighten my under eyes. It is bright, but it just sat on my skin and clung to my fine lines and texture. It looks horrible! Blending with fingertips looked slightly smoother than sponge or brush, but it still never blended with my skin properly. I have the same issue with the Eaze Drop Skin Tint. Not sure if there's an ingredient that's not agreeing with my skin (or my skincare--tried different moisturizer/serum combos and got the same result). Returning both and will stick with my staple Nars Radiant Creamy Concealer and Huda Beauty Overachiever Concealer which both have excellent coverage and sink into my skin flawlessly.

I had high hopes when purchasing this concealer and sadly I am not impressed. 

1) color matching--for some reason I had a HUGH issue with trying to find the right color. I purchased in stores and tested over 10 colors before I decided 210 was as close as I was going to get. I don't like the shade.  I think the shade options were limited as they only differed ever so slightly or a big drastic shade jump to the next tone.
2) it's SUPER cake-y. I was expecting a smooth and moisturizing concealer and I feel I got the quality of a crappy, thick, not very blend-able drugstore concealer. 

I will not be repurchasing this concealer. An unless you love thick, cake-y concealer I advise against purchasing it.

great coverage and easy to blend , does dry down quite matte so oily girls will love this , being combo to oily i quite like it but i still prefer the laura mercier flawless fusion to the fenty. Good concealer tho , will most likely pick it up again:)

I really love this concealer and it’s my absolute go to for covering under eye circles. I use it as a combo with an under eye brightener underneath. Sometimes creases but rarely and has great coverage. I really appreciate the color variety. For once I am not the absolute lightest color but I will say that makes it important to get color matched in store!
Great Coverage and can be worn alone no foundation needed just a powder finish and go
my favorite concealer by far. love the texture and coverage. quite thick. actually matches my skintone.
Fenty products work well with my skin. This concealer goes well with the foundation.
The concealer didn't do much more than the foundation for me.  It's good, but not for me.

I am prone to fungal acne and have very sensitive skin, this product doesn’t break me out so that is why I like it. The colour is decent, texture and coverage is smooth and buildable.. it doesn’t last as long but maybe that’s why it doesn’t irritate my skin. I would recommend for someone with sensitive skin, would also repurchase. I used to use nudestix concealer which I give 5/5 but I am allergic to it now and had to discontinue it. This is a close second.

Okay so Ive been using this concealer for the past 3 years and its literally the best thing ever!!! Ive used the shades 210,220,230 for different parts of my face lol but its super buildable and not cakey. At first when I started using it I used to find it rlly cakey but if thats the case with you, just know a little goes a long way!! Again, best concealer evaaaa <3

I also use the Fenty Pro Filt'r foundation in the same shade, and both products are great to use together. I mainly use this concealer under my eyes, as this shade in particular is pretty brightening, so a benefit to my dark circles. I love the consistency of this concealer, as it's creamy and not runny, and easy to blend seamlessly into your foundation. I'm on my third tube of this!
My new favorite concealer, a little goes a long way and it’s very creamy.
This stuff is so good, I’ve always been a die hard tarte shape tape fan and this really changed my makeup game. It looks so good and natural. It’s amazing.
I rlly like this concealer it rlly good like it just isn’t so cakey or anything it isn’t so white or anything I love how it just looks and everything
Amazing coverage without being heavy. Very matchable shades. Great concealer. Blends well.
This is definitely light coverage to medium I have dark circles that stand out & this made them look kinda grey. I like the feel I can barely tell I’m wearing it.

I was very disappointed in this. i was looking for a concealer similiar to too faced born this way concealer or tarte's shape tape. maybe you would like this if you're going for a lighter coverage, but i felt like it blended out to almost nothing. I will be returning.

This works extremely well for me as a very pale-skinned person. It should be noted that the colour you pick runs a little on the pale side, so just be mindful of that! It has a very creamy consistency which matches perfectly with the Fenty Beauty foundation, and I highly recommend it!

I found this concealer to be super thick when I first applied it, which I already didn't like.  This concealer was super hard to blend and wouldn't budge when I tried to blend it.  I tried using a brush and sponge but neither worked.  I tested it with both my Givenchy and Laura Mercier setting powders and the concealer came off and became patchy immediately.

The only pro was that the color worked well with my NARS Gobi foundation.

Unfortunately had to return it.
Was very iffy with this at first but it is pretty good on coverage and looks really nice on textured skin. Very beautiful and wears well
Partnered with the foundation... and WOW!! I feel beautiful! Love this concealer! :)
Great product, unfortunately not the right color but I believe easily fixed in store! Fenty Beauty really makes a wide variety of shades,Thank You!

This is an ok concealer. The coverage is very nice and I personally find that is lasts all day, however I find that it does crease and becomes dry/clumpy throughout the day. I generally have combination skin and use moisturizer, so I’m not too sure why it is drying me out so bad. Sometimes when I wear it heavy it also causes me to break out. I probably wouldn’t buy again. I’m down to try the Fenty hydrating eye tint though, as I am a huge Fenty fan.

I could never find a product that could cover up my dark circles perfectly, however, this concealer blew my mind with how well it covered my dark circles! I would definitely recommend others this concealer. I bought the same shade as my foundation. Now I will only do a natural makeup routine now that I found something to make me more confident in myself.

I have to say- I am a die hard shape tape fan. I am oily combo so it’s hard to find a concealer that stays in place and doesn’t crease. I have to give this 5 stars because despite my oily skin issues- this literally stayed in place without smudge after I cried my eyes out from finding out my ex husband is getting remarried. I am an ugly crier btw. When I looked in the mirror and saw my concealer still in tact my heart was sold on this product basically for life lol. Also- I am a “neutral” person and expected 190 to be way too warm/dark for me. It looks scary when it comes out the tube. But it blends into my skins beautifully and really matches my face well. I’m shocked by this product.
reviews.review_title: Stayed in Place After Crying Sesh

reviews.review_text: I've been using this for years. I always use a SMALL amount and buff this out with a fluffy concealer brush rather than a sponge. I think that's where the reviews saying this is patchy and doesn't blend well are coming from. This concealer is thick and a sponge just doesn't blend this out the way it needs to be. I work in a warehouse. Temps in the summertime are over 100 degrees most days and this, set with the fenty loose powder, does not budge for me whatsoever.
Love the coverage. This is one of the best concealers and product lines I have found.
Great formula! Does not crease and covers dark circles well. The formula also works well on it’s own without foundation, though I prefer to use it on “full beat” days.

It won’t be a repurchase for me. For how thick this is,  expected better coverage. I do use an eye cream before my makeup so my Under eye area is hydrated but it kind of just sits on top of the skin. When I set this concealer with powder ( loose or pressed) it looks super patchy
I really liked this concealer I just wish it didnt crease it dosent crease a lot but I feel thats to be expected with most concealers overall i like it!

I honestly love this concealer I have used it a couple times now and I got to say that I think I found the best one yet. I struggle with large pores and this is so easy to blend and very creamy it doesn't feel cakey or does it get patchy. It also holds up well in the summer. I absolutely fell in love with this!
reviews.review_title: Light weight & is perfect for summer weather!

reviews.review_text: Weirdly light for the foundation color number it corresponds to.
It cover nicely the only thing is it a bit thick but you can even out beautifully

Same with the foundation, I wanted to love it but just couldn’t. Won’t blend and actually removes foundation when you do try to blend, really patchy, and doesn’t cover without many layers. What’s the point? Also the foundation and the concealer do not match despite being the same color code.
reviews.review_title: it’s a miss for me, just like the foundation

reviews.review_text: On my light days all I need is Pro Filt'r, mascara and lip stain. Done and perfect! Love love this

Love all Fenty products, this concealer and matching foundation are SO SWEAT PROOF even under masks! Its amazing!!!! No touch ups needed after hours in the heat :) very buildable, can dry out skin if your prone to dry skin and wear it daily!
Best concealer I’ve ever purchased. Looks very natural under my eyes. Not heavy. Great consistency. Looks great in photos too!
Perfect for concealing those darker areas on my face! Blends well! Love it!

I use this with eaze drop for places I want a bit more coverage. With a buffer brush it is amazing. Covers without feeling heavy or looking cakey. I never have to dip twice because a little goes a long way. I also like the shape of the wand, being a bit flatter rather than doe foot allows for less product to be wasted.
i really like the formula but it creases super easily :(

This is so creamy doesn’t crease. Goes on so smooth and blends so effortlessly. Omg totally my favorite concealer! It looks like skin while still giving me coverage. I’ve never had makeup that works so great! I’ve used nars for years trying to find my right match and formula but this fenti is the best! I honestly don’t think it can get better than this. I’ll try a lighter color next time to highlight but other than that this product gives me a hydrated, natural look.!
If you have normal to dry skin this concealer is NOT for you. I immediately get fine lines right after applying it. It never lasts the day and it becomes cakey and crummy after a few hours.
Not drying, not cakey, and there’s absolutely no creasing.
Amazing. I have really oily skin ( t-zone) and dry under eyes and it helped with all of it.
It’s dries instantly making it difficult to apply and blend on the skin. I would not recommend.
I got foundation and concealer in shade 150. Foundation is amazing match while concealer way way too lighter then on original photo! Looks just like white cast under eye area. Going to return.
this concealer is creamy, but I find it hard to blend and it's too dry on my skin.

I keep buying the wrong tone online. Apart from my own fault, this concealer is very thin and doesn’t have good coverage. I have to layer it on many time. I have combination skin type and it’s too dry for my skin.

I have dark circles and I’ve been trying to find a concealer that’s not either too much or too little to cover and it’s perfect, it has worked for me so much, I’ve tried some of Rihanna’s products and they have never failed

I was so excited to use this concealer but this is the absolute worst concealer I’ve ever tried. Usually fenty products work very well on my skin but this one wasn’t cooperating at all. I use fenty primer and it becomes very sticky and turns into clumpy bumps when I apply eyeshadow right away. When I tired it in person that did not happen at all. But it was a different story when I brought it home. I was very disappointed.

Regret my purchase. Too dry, can’t blend. Dries after 2 seconds and is not fluid. I have spots on my face that refuses to blend. If you have dry skin with uneaven skin tone, it is a challenging product to work with. I bought shade 345: strong tones of yellow
It really does give you full coverage and a glow, buying it again because I completely run out since I don't wear foundation but rather stick to concealer.
A great concealer for blemishes and covering dark circles it’s not too matte and I have dry skin so that’s a plus

One of the worst concealers you can buy if you have oily skin.
Not compatible with many products, gathers up until my eyes.. also creases really badly.
The coverage is really poor as well and it doesn’t blend well. Really disappointed. You’re better off getting the too faced concealer or even the Sephora collection gel concealer. Both are much better and in a similar price range
I’ve been using this pro’ concealer every look I do! The best!

It’s a very thick consistency concealer, so very full coverage. Love the coverage but it always clogs up my pores & it creases but overall it’s okay I don’t hate it nor do I love it either it’s just okay.
I LOVE this concealer. Never switching this product. I've used it since it came out and its definitely full coverage without the cakey-ness. Thanks Riri!!
i love this concealer except i got the wrong shade! it blends nicely and it’s easy to remove.

I’m in the shade 385 and I love it for the fact that it is my skin tone in a bottle. Spot on. I typically use the concealer around my eyebrows as it is a bit too thick for use in my under eye area. It is ultra full coverage but unfortunately tends to accentuate those flaws you want hidden. Texture, creasing, pores, the whole nine. My pores are big and when I was using on my under eye, the concealer would just settle in and seemed to make them more noticeable. Was not a fan. In all, I know its limitations and use accordingly. Would I recommend this? No. Most people want their concealers to do it all and for $26, rightfully so. This concealer is not that. It may be great if you have skin with less flaws but for those with them, please be mindful before purchasing.

Attention golden olive babes! This is my HG concealer now because no other brand has this unique shade for golden olive skintons. I have searched forever and thank god they expanded the line. IT APPEARS YELLOW BUT IT'S PERFECTLY ACCURATE WHEN YOU BLEND IT OUT. GIVE IT A SHOT! <3 So impressed. Don't overlook this one!
reviews.review_title: For rare golden olive skintones - 1 of a kind!

reviews.review_text: Covers my bags and any blemishes very well.  It has a smooth application with a beauty sponge.   It’s pretty full coverage.

This is seen as a true full coverage concealer. It does that and it doesn’t stop at any obstacle. It’ll be exactly the one thing that completes your look. It can also be your nude face glowing with just a touch of color. With this concealer, you can do no wrong. You are your most glossy, vibrant version of your most beautiful self, unironically, without limits. That feeling, packaged in a small tube to fit in your jacket pocket.
Pretty good. Along the same lines are the nars. I still like too faced the best.

I wanted to like this so much. The shade I picked was a perfect match for me, but the biggest problem was that it didn't last all day. It simply melted off my face by the end of my shift at work, which was about 9 hours. My dark circles were exposed again and it wasn't a pretty look.

I was trying to find a cheaper concealer than the concealer I had previously been using, and I regret trying this one. I have used drugstore concealers with a better formula. it oxidized quickly, dried before it could blend and created breakouts it couldn’t cover. This concealer probably kept my skin looking ideal for about 3 hours maximum. I returned my for the original concealer I was using. Not worth the price.
reviews.review_title: I have used better drugstore concealer

reviews.review_text: I was recommended this product by a BA as a long lasting concealer and was excited to try it! However, I primarily wear concealer to spot cover blemishes and this was not it. I felt like over time the product broke apart letting my blemishes peek through. I don’t mind it as a brightening concealer though so I will use it for under eye but this is not good for concealing blemishes.

I have very dry skin on my face (similar to eczema), and it’s very flakey so I’m unable to wear most make up. This concealer is IT. Didn’t even remember I used it, and actually helped keep my skin hydrated and not flakey!! It’s been 9 hours and I still can’t tell I have it on! My official go-to!
This color matches my skin to a T! RihRih wasn’t playing with y’all!
I like this concealer, it does crease under my eyes if I don’t set with powder. Looks natural

Ok, so I’ve bought this concealer before in a different shade and had no issues with it at all. However when I decided to repurchase with this shade and used it in the same way I used the other, I started getting a lot of patchiness and it was falling into all my fine lines. Honestly, I wouldn’t recommend this concealer in this shade. Even with primer and moisturiser this concealer does not work :/

This is a nice full coverage concealer.  I have combo acne prone skin with dry eyes.  It can gather under my eyes and highlight lines when applied fully so I find less is more with this. In the winter I do not set it heavily as it can be too much.  This concealer is also great for spot correcting.  Overall it is a nice product, not amazing for me but worth the price.  I also love that it is a perfect match to the foundation.  Fenty has done an amazing job not only with shade selection (of course) but with the consistency of products and their function with one another.  For this alone I would recommend as it is seamless to go from foundation to concealer.

I really wanted to love this because of all of the hype surrounding it, but unfortunately it just did not work very well for me. It didn’t offer very much coverage for my dark under eye circles and it also managed to not blend out very easily either. It felt really strange on my skin and dried out the areas I used it on. It also left my under eyes looking wrinkled which is very weird. I just would not recommend this concealer to anyone because it causes more problems than it solves.

I use this instead of foundation and it is amazing. the coverage is great and doesn’t crease under my eyelids. i would say though that this isn’t my shade anymore as i’ve gotten significantly lighter.
It creased quite a bit for me and oxidized badly for me throughout the day.

I really wanted to love this concealer since I like the foundation and know what shade am. Unfortunately, it didn't work for me. It creased under my eyes and did not cover my dark circles well. It also made my pores stand out which is unusual for me. It did match my skin well though.
I’ve been using this concealer now for a couple years I honestly really love it only thing I don’t like is if you plan on using on eyelids it does crease super bad

I loved the way this concealer feels on the skin. It blends easily. I'm a neutral undertone but have really dark circles. It helped with covering them up, but only on the eye area. I tried to highlight with this shade, and as it's a warmer undertone is made me orange! (That was my mistake). If you want to highlight with this concealer make sure it's your undertone to avoid the oxidation.

I'm starting to get dark circles around my eyes and I looked for a concealer to help.  I got one a few years ago and found the shade too light and it creased.
I went last week to Sephora to get a concealer from Fenty Beauty.  This is fabulous! The shade was perfect, it blends well, lasts all day and doesn't look like i have concealer on.
This concealer is so creamy and smooth. It goes on like butter. Full coverage but not cakey. Lasts all day. It is definitely my go to concealer now and I used to use shape tape.

I was done with foundations until I brought Fenty Beauty’s foundation. 
My problem is that I easily get red due to my sensitive skin and I react to a lot of products. This foundation cover my redness, it’s light and one bottle last literally forever! 

And not to mention how amazing it is that there are SO MANY colours.
Super patchy and heavily creases if you put it under your eyes. Good coverage so I’d only recommend to use on your cheeks/forehead for blemishes.

Awful product! Drying, creases and not full coverage. I love Fenty powder foundation and many other products from the line, but this is a hard pass. Returning! My shade is 130 and at least that is spot on, which is the only good thing I can say about this.
Love the shade range but the formula is bad - it gets patchy and breaks up on the skin within an hour or two so it looks good when you leave and come back home and look terrible

This concealer breaks me out after each time I use it! I know it’s this concealer because I highlight the bridge of my nose with it and every other concealer doesn’t make me get a pimple after I use it, but this one does! 

I think it looks beautiful and I wish it didn’t cause me to break out because the foundation doesn’t do that. I actually LOVE the way the other products look, but this one just does me dirty too much for me to bother! I keep it on my makeup counter as my last resort because I know I will need salicylic acid for a week after!

It’s hard to order a quality vegan concealer especially when choosing the correct shade to match an ever changing skin tone with hyperpigmentation. The price is reasonable for this concealer as a little goes a long way. The main issue I had with the concealer is the packaging. I dropped it the day after receiving it and the top broke right off. I’m still able to use it but have to buy another one to travel with.
reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way but fragile container

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this concealer. I normally use Nars creamy radiant, but my Sephora had been out for weeks so I decided to get this instead. I loved the applicator, and it only takes a little bit, especially compared to Nars. But the formula is so powdery when it dries that it just sits on your skin, looking like the powder foundation old women wear. And I have normal/oily skin. After an hour or two, this concealer would pick up on the oil in my skin and start to get streaky and clump together, so much so that I’d have to go into the bathroom and try to smear it back into place with my hands. I’ll use it because of the price I paid for it, but I won’t be buying it again.

I usually have a difficult time finding concealer shades to match my shade and undertone, but Rihanna has come through again, as she always does. I have combo skin & noticed that after a work day it would separate and create/cling to dry patches that I didn’t have when it was applied in the morning. Took 2-3 coats to get good coverage on breakouts. It was a good concealer if I needed to be out of the house for less than 4 hours. Did wear well under eyes, just not over breakouts.
At first this concealer worked really well, but after about 2 hours it began to crease, separated and oxidize.
reviews.review_title: dont wear for long periods of time

reviews.review_text: I started using this two years ago and I haven't looked back. My skin can sometimes be a mixed bag sometimes it is oily, sometimes dry, sometimes I have blemishes and sometimes it's flawless. This concealer does its job no matter the kind of day my skin is having.

I love this product. This is admittedly my first time "splurging" on concealer, and I've heard so many good things about Fenty Beauty that I thought it would be a good first.  And it is!  The texture is creamy and blends well. It feels light enough that I don't feel cakey, but covers my redness very well.

I wanted to love this SO badly, as I have been obsessed with the fenty liquid foundation for years, but it just didn’t deliver for me. It applies and blends well at first, but it creased and separated within half an hour of putting it on. I have oily/congested skin so it’s possible this just doesn’t work for my skin type, but I’ve tried various different ways of applying it and different primers underneath and always have an issue with creasing and dehydrating.

Hands down my favorite concealer. Perfect coverage for blemishes and undereyes- without getting cake if applied well. I also liked that it didn't make blemishes worse/ clog my pores! and long lasting! if applied in the morning I really wouldn't have to touch up all day.

The concealer is thick and settles into pores making them more visible. It doesn’t sit nicely onto my oily skin. 
I’ve even tried it with the oily skin primer and powder foundation. Coverage is okay.

LIKES: Applies like a dream, very light on the skin, completely covers pretty awful acne scarring while still looking like skin. It lasts. I love the shade range. 
DISLIKES: The smell, thins out/runs out quickly, a bit too yellow for me and the other closest shade is too red.
This is amazing it will look good on your skin good full coverage I recommend you to buy this:)
The best concealer I've ever used. Its super creamy and blends out beautifully while keeping coverage. It layers really nicely too. When I run out, I will definitetly repurchase.

This product makes my undereyes appear as though they belong to a dehydrated 90 year old. So dry and crepey. No matter what product I use underneath or what powder I use (in the most miniscule amount) the result is the same. Used elsewhere on the face it is horribly patchy. I wish I had returned this right after I bought it instead of trying to make it work
A Thick and creamy concealer which lasts all day. Good if you're looking for a full coverage concealer

I was skeptical at first due to the texture. But man alive I love this concealer! A little goes a long way and it has a very natural finish. I bought this because I heard it was fungal acne safe and my other products where making me break out and itch. This does not and it just looks perfect all day. I will be a forever fan of this product.

This is the worst concealer that I have used in my life! It is dry, splotchy and it faded on me within an hour. I have been using it different ways such as letting it dry a little, blended as I applied it, mixed in a product and it’s just a huge no for me. I wish I wouldn’t have threw the box in the trash or it would be going back to Sephora. I will try it to clean up my brows or I’ll just toss it.
This concealer has great coverage! It needs to be set with powder ASAP after putting it on. It is a little thicker. Not the most natural looking concealer.
I really wanted to love it but I couldn’t. Poor coverage and creases no matter what you do. One of the worst concealers I’ve used.
Way too shiny looking  and no coverage for my under eyes
I haven’t really tried other concealers so I wouldn’t be able to give a comparison. I do like this product. Easy to use applicator and it looks great too.
really wanted to love this mascara but it leaves my undereyes looks very cakey and cracked. Wouldn’t recommend for dry skin
This concealer is really good. It covers acne scars and red spots good.
Love love love this concealer, the best one yet in the market
One of best concealer I tried goes so well with my skin

Received this as a gift from a friend and was super excited to try! I only use concealer to brighten up the eyes, and this product did not work for me. I applied over foundation, and it clumped with the foundation and did not brighten as I expected. The Sephora branded liquid concealer is way better!
reviews.review_title: Too Thick And Clumps Over Foundation

reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the same revlon concealer for 10 years only because I haven’t found anything else I can use. This is a great medium coverage. I’m a busy mom so I usually only wear this and maybe some eyebrow pencil/mascara. What I love most is that this matches well and it doesn’t break me out which is huge. (It is a fungal acne safe product!)
Great medium coverage concealer. Melts into my skin.

I don't know why it took me so long to purchase this concealer, but I'm glad I ultimately did. The shade range is great and the concealer corresponded flawlessly to my shade in the foundation. It's amazing as a spot concealer and blended seamlessly under the eyes.
One of the best concealers I've used. Most times, I wear it alone and it gives the most natural look to my face.

This is a nice concealer, very long lasting, smoothing and a true matte finish. I like to use this concealer for cut creases or on blemishes because its very smoothing and long lasting however my skin is a bit too dry for it to be used under my eye. I imagine its beautiful on an oily skin type!

nice and strong but wish it was bigger or had a larger version also wish it would take shorter time to oxidize cause it takes much longer than the foundation to oxidize and sometimes has me lookin like a ghost lol
perfect match and covers up my blemish so well and perfect for my under eyes to cover up the dark circles
works super well for a light coverage concealer! finest crease up or look cakey. i’m in love! It’s amazing to know that her shades go as dark as me!
I liked how matte it was and lightweight but the oxidation and struggle finding the right match made me turn back to NARS.
Speechless! I used the app to find my shade and was shocked that it was actually right. The formula lives up to expectations. It’s creamy and doesn’t crease. No issues used with oily skin.
Best concealer I’ve ever purchased. It’s so easy to find your shade if you do also wear their foundation! Amazing quality
Disappointed in this product. It makes the corner of my eyes look dry and cracked.

I like that this concealer isn’t cakey and applies like liquid foundation. The coverage isn’t really heavy, which could be good or bad depending on your preference. For me, I needed to do 2-3 applications over pimple or acne scars to get full coverage so be prepared to layer. The color match is perfect which was a nice surprise, it blends seamlessly too so much so that I may need to order a paler color to brighten up my undereye area.
I use this to shape my eyebrows and good at blending and I also use this for light makeup
My go to concealer. I love the fact that I can literally use it as a spot cover up with a little powder and my skin looks flawless.

Light weight product that melts into my skin. If you have watery eyes maybe not for you. I love this for quick touch ups. Plus you can’t beat the shade range. This is my 3rd time buying this product !
My second time trying this concealer. Love ❤️ it! Lasts long.
Not bad. It gets the job done under the eyes and with spot correction. Very thick, but not the greatest coverage. It isn’t worth the price for what you get in my opinion.
I actually like this concealer better than shape tape! It’s very creamy and brightening! Lasts long and doesn’t crease easily. Only thing would be the packaging sometimes leaks at the top
Love it so much, works perfectly to conceal the dark circles under my eyes
It’s an average. Definitely not light enough to go under eyes and not thick enough to cover pimples.
my new favorite concealer. blends perfectly into my skin and/or foundation

this concealer is so creamy and i'm so happy it matches my skin exactly! rih wasn't kidding when she said it would cover up all ur bad decisions lol. the packaging is cute too, overall it's very high quality and the best concealer i've ever used. :)
Rih Rih definetly did her thing!! this is the best concealer i’ve ever worn. it blends perfectly and makes drastic differences. 10/10 ❤️❤️❤️❤️
I’ve tried a lot of concealers but this one I love the most! It applies seamlessly and with little to no creasing. For a perfected look, set with setting or brightening powder.

Loved the color match! Very hard for me to find the right color being a light olive gal. It creased/migrated badly despite setting and it burned my sensitive skin. I ended up returning this, and am still on the hunt for my perfect concealer!

I purchased the lightest shade available. While it does cover blemishes, it’s mediocre, it can clump. The formula is not the best for long usage.
