I just keep being disappointed by the overall quality and lack of pigment in Fenty products. This makes me sad because I really wanted to like the brand.

I use this to carve out my eyebrows and clean up lipstick smudges around my lips. I like the doe foot applicator and its creamy. I haven't experienced cakeyness and blends out well for what I use it for.
Perfect match lasts all day not cakey at all! Plus it covers all my redness I have!

I am in my 40’s with combination oily skin. The only time this smudges is during a heavy workout. No creasing and medium coverage which is my preference. If you want full coverage you may want something else!
Truly a great concealer.  It blends perfectly into the foundation with no bleeding or streaks.  A little goes a long way.  Will forever be my go to.
Not bad. Good coverage will continue to use but will not buy again.

I love Fenty.... but this was a no for me. It became patchy as soon as I tried to set it with any powder, and I tried multiple. It emphasizes lines and doesn’t sink into the skin, it unfortunately just sits on top and looks patchy.

This product is okay but I don’t use concealer often so it does the job. The recommended shade was a little too light and this is the first Fenty product I’ve gotten, so wasn’t sure how it would look. Would recommend going in store to make sure you get the right color. It goes on well but honestly not sure it’s worth the price. I can find something similar for a lower price.
favourite concealer of all times for me. i have actually used up two tubes and had just recently bought another one i definitely recommend. for reference i have combination skin!

I really wanted to like this product, as a loyal Fenty customer I am truly disappointed with this concealer. My beef with this product is that is does not settle nicely on the skin, I have fine lines under my eyes and the concealer accentuated those lines. To add, it creases! I hadn't even set my concealer with my Laura Mercier powder and I already noticed the concealer creasing even though I had primed my skin prior. Also, I have oily skin and the concealer gives you a matte finish so throughout the day my skin was oily but my under eyes were matte and it just made my entire face of makeup look off. I had tried the matchstix and that was even worse so when this new concealer came in I was pretty excited to try it, I returned it immediately. I guess some positives are that the formula is very rich so you can get good coverage and also, a little goes a long way. Overall, I would not recommend this concealer I think the NARS radiant concealer is a better option and it's what I chose instead.
i am shade 420 foundation and 385 is the perfect subtle highlight for my no makeup-makeup look. super flexible and buildable and looks so smooth under her powder.
I have tried so many concealers over time, this became one of my favorites.
Dries on your face before I can put down the tube and makes your skin dry. I like the Nars much better. This is all hype because it’s Rihanna.
I got my brows microbladed but felt like they were a little too long, so i got this concealer to cover the ends. Worked great!
Too drying and creates lines. Did not blend well and looks caked.

I have been trying to find a good concealer that has enough coverage to cover blemishes and acne scars, but still has a natural finish. this was not it. at first I blended it with a sponge, but the concealer would never stick to textured areas on my face, such as where there was scarring or indents. next I tried a brush, but the formula was too sticky and patchy to move with the brush. the coverage was not all that great either. the more I built it up, the worse it seemed to get. for those of you with smooth skin without dark spots or acne, this could be a great product. but if you are specifically looking for a concealer to cover blemishes like I was, keep looking.
reviews.review_title: had high expectations for this one...

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product... I have used mayballine in the past and wanted to upgrade to better products. I tried this multiple times and it was so unbelievably cakey on my skin. It looked horrible. I even used an expensive primer first each time. Sadly I have to return this product because it creates a terrible base for my makeup.
Medium coverage but thick formula. While I dont dislike it I do find myself reaching for other concealers more (the tarte shape tape has more coverage and is creamier). Nice packaging though

This concealer doesn’t seem to conceal my dark circles at all, 150 is the shade matching the foundation(that foundation oxidizes by the way). So I thought maybe it’s too light, and bought one shade darker, 185, but it still doesn’t cover anything. It does brightens the under eye a bit, but more like a white veil. The only use I can think of is to use it on my eyelid as my skin around my eyes are slightly darker, but I could just put one more layer of foundation on that area.
The formula is not as good as the foundation, it’s thick and drying so it’s not easy to blend.

I hoped it would work good on my oily skin but that wasn’t the case . As soon as I was done with blending the concealer in . It became very patchy and I tried fixing it but it never went away . But it creased very badly. I started seeing the creases after only thirty mins of applying it and no powder or concealer fixed that . I don’t recommend it I had high hopes

This is my favorite concealer ever. It's been perfect to use around my mask and when I only need a little coverage, and also good to use more of when I want heavier coverage. Plus, I'm very pale, so red marks are very obvious on me.

I wanted to love this as I am a fan of the foundations. So, at first I really did. Similarly to the face powders, this contains Talc. While it is very low on the ingredient list, if you are like me and acne prone, with skin that flares/breakouts with nearly anything known to be comedogenic, Talc is one of the worst for your skin. I liked the coverage of this and the color, and also it lasted. But after I could just tell my skin was worse as the day went on. I am shade 310 in the foundation but a 330 for this.  I would recommend to those who don’t have sensitive or acne prone skin only.
reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it, but the Talc!

reviews.review_text: It's not creamy at all. It's super thick and drying. Gives a great coverage as I want with very little product but it oxidizes so much. Just in a couple of hours, I can see my under eye area turning grey. This formula is super thick, drying and highly oxidizing. As much as I love their foundation, this just didn't work for me. Wanted to love it as much as the foundation but clearly it wasn't possible. Very disappointed.

Bought this in the shade 430. If you wear 440-450 foundation and you’re looking for a good highlighter that brightens your under eye , go for the shade 430 . It won’t make you look ashy or gray , it’s perfect . You can also go for the concealer the actual shade of your foundation but it’ll just look more subtle and natural . I find this concealer closely resembles the shade Toffee in LA pro girl concealers .
I have light, veeerrrryyy olive skin and have never been able to find a concealer or foundation to match it. This one does, perfectly. It also sits on the skin beautifully and wears very well.

Honestly a great foundation. I struggled to find a reliable foundation that didn’t leave my skin feeling greasy leave a cake-y look. This is light and I usually add face powder over to give it a dewy look. Definitely Recommend!!
Easy to put on, colour was perfect and is not oily on the skin! I tried without putting powder on top and it did not crease!

FENTY BEAUTY has done it again! This concealer is a great addition to my makeup collection. It has a creamy consistency that blends fairly easily and masks under eye discolouration/dark circles along with brightening up your face. The concealer is also buildable to provide you with the coverage that you desire or want to achieve. One small concern that I have is that it comes in such as small quantity (8 mL) for a hefty price ($35.00 CAD). Apart from that, this is my new holy grail concealer!
reviews.review_title: Creamy consistency with awesome buildable coverage

reviews.review_text: Loved the texture of this concealer, went on super smooth and blends easily. However, it didn't cover up my dark under eyes as well as other concealers do. It may work better for highlighting and contouring or covering up spots on your face but the coverage was not enough for my under eyes.

This is the only concealer I use. Some days I only where this and some MAC powder and my eye bags are hidden aswell as any unwelcome guests of the zit variety. I use it with the Fenty foundation and also with other foundations and it always works great.

omg! this and the matchstixx are soon good! ppl are sayings too dry but i hope she never changes the formulas to both. i always get complimented on my base and i never used to!!! i used beauty bakery baking oil under with benefit primer and its flawless!!!!!

I bought this product along with the Fenty Beauty foundation and I'm so disappointed with this concealer. This is one of the only concealers that perfectly fit my shade, but the formula is terrible. After applying a primer and setting the concealer with a powder across my eyelid and underneath my eye, the product still left chalky lines. When applied to any red pimples, the redness still showed through a considerable amount, even when applying a color corrector and foundation.
reviews.review_title: The Worst Concealer I've Ever Purchased

reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to love this product, as I love so many other Fenty products, but it was honestly waayyy too drying and cakey for me.  My skin is definitely on the dry side, so this just isn't going to work :( this would probably be better for someone with a more normal/oily skin.  I really appreciated all the options for finding my shade, though!

I absolutely love this concealer! A tiny amount goes a long way. I used to use the Nars Creamy Radiant, and this is very comparable. The Fenty has more product than the Nars, which I like. I also love the packaging. This color is comparable to the Vanilla shade in Nars, and I will continue to buy Fenty over Nars in the future. Super happy with the coverage, blendability, and wear throughout the day!

Concealer cakes a lot, and if you have dark circles , FORGET about coverage. I also doesn’t blend very well and under your eyes with crease reallt really bad through out the day. Save your money!! Definitely the biggest waste of money on concealer I’ve ever spent.
reviews.review_title: Creases, Doesn’t cover dark circles at all.

reviews.review_text: I loved it. It’s lasted me so long and i like the coverage. It’s so easy for me to blend it or use it as base for my eyeshadow.
I’m really dark so this shade is perfect for my contour
LOVE this product! I am slowly switching over to Fenty for all my makeup. It doesn't make my skin feel cakey and it looks clean and fresh all day long!
I have been using this for over 3 years! I will never use another concealer. I use the too faced concealer as a foundation and it works great with fenty concealer under the eyes and highlight
Color stays true, minimal oxidation.  It's also matte enough to cover blemishes without adding powder.
I am loving the formula of this concealer...it’s not too matte (like Tarte Shape Tape) & looks beautiful on the skin...especially under the eyes.
It’s lighter than I expected but it works well, great coverage !
I love it. It’s enough coverage, lasts long enough. Matches my skin. What more could I ask for?

I wanted to love this product so badly because everyone raves about Fenty quality. This is the first higher end concealer I ever bought and it's one of the only purchases I truly regret. This concealer just isn't right for me. It made my under eyes look terribly cakey, crepey, and above all else super DRY. I mean, like a desert. It's unusable as a concealer for me, so I try to use it as a primer to get my moneys worth out of it. Not bad as a primer, since my eyelids are a little more oily than my under eyes. My takeaway is if you have drier under eyes this product might not be for you.
whenever i breakout, I use this concealer and it makes my face look clear, no cakiness

This concealer is AMAZING. I originally use too faced born this way concealer but recently switched to this and I don’t regret it at all, it is full coverage and blends out beautifully. I pair it with my Fenty hydrating foundation (shade 260) and it’s a perfect combo. I highly recommend this!
Good concealer for under eyes, eyelids, chin, forehead, or spot treatment. Nice coverage too
It’s okay but it can be cakay and sometimes not cover dark circles

I have the shades 385 and 410. 385 is my highlight shade and 410 is not as bright. When I first used the conceal, it was so drying and it creased within an hour. I really wanted this concealer to work so I tried doing one eye at time and it works amazing. The reason I didn’t give it 5 starts is because this concealer does not give you a lot of time to be able to blend it out.
This shade color matches my skin SO NICELY but it’s drying and creased really badly under my eyes.

This concealer is so drying! I have already dry under eyes but this isn’t hydrating at all which makes it hard to blend and shows a lot of texture. The reason I gave it two stars is for the coverage; it has very good coverage which is why I wanted to love this so much! But I had to return it

Love the colour range but unfortunately way too drying.  I have dark under eyes and this has a great brightening effect on my skin but I just can’t figure out the best way to make it work.  I have used creamier concealers all over the face when in a pinch but this would never work for this concealer.  Disappointed because I really wanted this to be my holy grail.
Perfect coverage And it has great texture. Color match is excellent
Goes on smooth, very little transfer, does crease a little around my eyes though
lightweight and hydrating. also full coverage by you wont be able to feel it at all
Love this product. Best concealer ever! This is a must have product.

I wanted to love this so much. however it is DRY. I have oily skin but it dried my under eyes out and was hard to blend. It creases so bad and is splotchy no matter how I apply it (beauty blender wet or dry, fingers, brush, etc). It is also full coverage and very pigmented, which was not what i was looking for.

The formula for this concealer is like butter, I’m obsessed with it. I get full coverage and barely any creases all day! 
Like all Fenty products you can expect a high quality product with an affordable price. 

I’m wearing #FentyRetouchConcealer with the #FentySkinStick for my contour - #LoveCraftBeautyBronzer #LoveCraftBeautyLipstick #MacMascara #MacEyeliner #BenifetEyebrowPencil #AnastasiaEyeShadowPalette and others I can’t remember the names of right now. Lol
This concealer disappointed me I have very oily skin and this concealer was too creamy and creased a lot was not a fan of the coverage either

Great for a warm contour, blends nicely and lasts all day without disappearing 
I have a problem with my under eyes and it helps with a mixture of colour correcting. It’s a nice creamy consistency that blends out generously and does a good job concealing 
; in comparison to my Ben nye foundation palette it lasts longer than the foundation 
I’m looking to try the fenty foundation next

I know this is supposed to be the dark skin holy grail, but it was a miss for me. Finish is very weird and hard to blend out on bare skin. I was able to make it work near the end of its life. Still Love Miss Fenty, everything can’t be a smash hit.
reviews.review_title: weird finish, went bad in 7M not 12

reviews.review_text: Really nice coverage that looks natural enough to wear without other makeup as long as you blend out the edges. I can definitely see how this could be patchy/dry on the under eyes for some people but I use eye creme every night and apply & blend side at a time and haven’t had an issue
reviews.review_title: Eye cream improves this a lot

reviews.review_text: Best concealer I’ve used, works well with other foundations too - especially Estee Lauder double wear.
I use 430 foundation and use concealer in 400. The coverage is absolutely amazing. It’s definitely a must
the smell is not the best kind of like playdoe but love the product anyway

Great concealer! My favorite thing about this is the brush tip. It’s really good for application. A little does go a long way with this concealer. It covers up most things but with redness a tad bit more layers needed. My only problem was I did notice  creasing.. other than that this is my 3rd favorite concealers
I love this concealer would recommend fenty to anyone she does not disappoint!!

Replaced my Tarte Shape Tape without me even noticing it. Creamy, glides on easily, blends perfectly, doesn't have any smell to it, never creases, and stays put ALL DAY LONG! I will literally use this concealer until God herself makes one to replace this one.
Covers my stubborn little pimples like a charm! It’s not too drying, especially if you moisturize a lot. The color selection is so good, I ordered mine online and it was a pretty close match!
A little goes a long way. The product is not thick. I think it does a good job of coverage. I think the concealer does a good job of blending in with the foundation which I love.
Great coverage, a little goes a long way. Works well with oily skin
I didn’t really like it but I think it had to die with the fact that it’s too light for me. It would be better is I had my shade.
Love this concealer it’s soo natural can’t even tell I have concealer on !!
Perfect for my skin and it looked super natural. Very impressive.

Good quality/coverage. Decent price. The biggest advantage of this product is that it matches my skin perfectly which is very hard for me to find as I am very fair with pink undertones. I use shade 110.

So bad. Instantly creases on me even when used along with the pro filt’r loose powder. Almost as if it just sits on the skin rather than melt into the skin even though I use a patting motion with a beauty sponge.
The concealer separates & I have to remove it & then re apply it multiple times before I set it with powder. Do not recommend, too many issues!
This is my saving grace! I have dark under eye circles, so I love a thick concealer. It was very easy to blend out and it brightened my eyes immediately. A little goes a very long way!
Horrible concealer. It is so blotchy and doesn’t stay on all day.

I wanted to like this, but it dries way too fast, and looks dry and cakey under the eye, creasing in fine lines even when set or not. The color was more peachy than warm (yellow), so I used as a color corrector for hyperpigmentation on my jawline.
Once I put it on my face, it starts to dry a little bit & only works with a damp sponge.
the best concealer i’ve ever used under the eyes!!

gave my concealer to my sister but im missing it so much!!
very light and smooth and natural.

Goes on smoothly, is easy to blend with a sponge. I havent used a brush for it so i cant vouch for that. It had no smell to my knowledge and i guessed my color and it worked out nicely for me! It set well and didnt seep into fine lines or crease. I used it on my lids aswell to see how it’d hold up and it stayed put and didnt crease up my eyeshadow! I love it.
Solid medium- full coverage great texture and coverage! I love this foundation for hiding blemishes and under eye I will most definitely repurchase!!

Great medium to full coverage concealer. It ends well with makeup. I wish it were just a bit more coverage - once I blend, my purple circles do show through. But I love the texture and otherwise, it blends well! Have bought over and over
This instantly brightens up my eyes. Lasts all day and night. Easy to apply, doesn’t crack or dry out my skin. I love this concealer. I recommend it.

Love this product! It honestly stays on without primer and makes my under eyes look so much better! Only flaw is it is heavy. If you blend it well and put a little Becca powder on it, it doesn’t look cakey.
I'm really disappointed that Fenty would put out such a terrible product. It separated on my skin and settled into my fine lines. I spoke two 2 people since that had the same experience.
Love it. It is super nice and blends in really nice.

This was not full coverage and it was light. Not really buildable as it did not have staying power. It does take some getting used to and playing with primers and foundations regarding chemistry of products. The amount you get for the price is good and so is the applicator. However, I feel it is lacking in staying powet and if you have dry, sensitive skin it will probably not work for you. It did settle in fine lines.
I can literally just dab this under my eyes with a little primer highlight and be set. Light weight formula easy to blend and no creases

I like this concealer. It's full coverage so it's not for of you just want to do your under eye area and head out the door, there's a big difference for me between this concealer and natural skin. If you'll be wearing the foundation with it, it makes a difference to hide any blemishes and dark circles and look polished.
reviews.review_title: Hides everything, but can't wear alone

reviews.review_text:
BEST CONCEALER FOR THINNER UNDEREYE AREA. This is a forever purchase. 
quick tip : a little goes a long way.
Matches my skin tone perfectly. I have uneven skin tone around my eyes and I can't even see it after applying the concealer.

I've always settled for drugstore concealers & i finally grew tired of that. i went ahead & bought this with the fenty foundation. The two really do come together. i have very oily skin & this held up well. Went on nice & smoothly with a nice milky feel. No creasing for me. Definitely recommend for oily skin types. Do not forget to set with some setting powder.
I hate wearing makeup so I sometimes just use this concealer around my eyes to cover the dark circles. It blends well and does the trick!

Got this as my first ever concealer and it has great coverage, however it is not crease proof. Even tried setting it and still creased so much!! But anyways God bless
 y’all

Totally full coverage and a great finish. This is my new favourite concealer!

They run a bit light so if you're looking for something closer to you're foundation shade then go a number up! (ex. I'm 130 in foundation and use 145 in the concealer).

Perfect concealer. Very easy to work with, is buildable, has a beautiful finsh, covers dark under eye bags, hyperpigmentation, redness, scarring, acne and texture smoothly. Works well by itself or on top of a foundation/tinted moisturizer. Doesn’t fade or move around either.
Love love love this concealer! This has the best match for my skin ton and actually covers my dark/red spots. It does dry a little fast but overall one of my favourite concealers!
too matte . not full coverage . NOT FOR DRYSKIN . soooo creasy especially if you set it but you have to set it bc IT CREASES . hate it wish i could return .

If you don’t buy anything from Fenty this concealer Is a must have . It’s small but you don’t need a lot to achieve your look. Coverage is great. I would say use on top of foundation for a better look.
This Concealer Works Like Magic, No Kinding. This Wil My Go To Comcealer.
i’ve been using this foundation for almost two years now and it has never disappointed! i’ve tried several other brands but this one always made my skin feel so amazing!
The range of shades is really impressive and allows me to use two different colors for under-eye concealing. It is worth the price (for a high end product). Would purchase again!

This product is pretty good. I do think that there are drugstore alternatives just as good that are cheaper. This is very creamy, easily blendable, and high coverage. It creases a bit, but if you set it with a good powder you should be fine. Good for a full beat but not something I would go to for a very natural look.
My go to concealer! I love this concealer, the shade matches my skin very well and I love the application. The blending is really nice as well and it has such a nice coverage.

I really like this concealer; it is the best I have tried so far. I was recommended to use this to match the Matte Fenty Foundation. I was advised to use the same color as my foundation, and it matches/blends well. I have really dark acne scars and use this to help cover them. I would say this covers them up pretty well, but since my scars are dark because of my medium-tan skin tone, I do have to apply 1-2 layers. Overall, I would recommend to give this concealer a try.
Only concealer I will buy I love it so much it’s full coverage and covers everything !!! Sometimes I’ll even use it as a foundation if I’m not going anywhere important

I don't use this on my face... I use it on my body. Whenever I get a small zit on my chest, this concealer makes it practically invisible. It's super pigmented, and the concealer lasts all day. It's the secret weapon I stash in my purse!
reviews.review_title: Trust me... use it for body acne!

reviews.review_text: I purchased this product because I love Fenty. It does work and has decent coverage but if you have dry skin (or are planning on using it on skin that tends to be drier like your under eyes), it doesn't look super great. It is very drying which tends to look creasy.
The color was great but this product is hard to blend. It dried too quickly and made me look cakey. I returned this.
This product is just ok. It does cover any blemishes or dark under eye circles but it creases VERY easily, regardless of what primer you use.

Not a fan of this concealer. I love Fenty but this product just didn't do it for me. it went on thick and began to get cakey after a few hours.i had used the Fenty match stick trio previously and loved the "Linen" shade, i was hoping the consistency would be similar.
Love this concealer for highlighting. It's very creamy, a little goes a long way and I love it, it's also amazing for a cut crease eye look. Keep serving us "face" Fenty! I love it!
Goes on flawlessly and leaves a nice matte finish. A little goes a long way with this! After concealing my under eyes I still had enough product to cover a couple blemishes!
this concealer is amazinggg! Such good coverage & it blends so nicely!
I love this concealer, if gives the perfect amount of brightness and it does a great job at covering up imperfections. It is smooth and long wearing!
This is my favorite concealer! I pair it with the sephora collection 10 HR wear foundation and it looks and feels great. I would definitely recommend it to family and friends.
drys out your skin, if you are purchasing go a shade lighter than your actually skin tone

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this product. Trying out concealers for the first time made me a little apprehensive from buying a huge celebrity line but I love it. It blends in very nicely on top of my foundation and covers up my dark circles around my eyes, my Cupid’s bow and my chin!

This product has amazing coverage, but it destroyed my face.  I've never had cystic acne in my life, but after using this, the Fenty powder and the Fenty foundation, I had the worst Cystic acne of my life. It was so bad and caused such deep scaring I'll have to get laser treatments to correct my skin.  I used this product for a while and thought I was having dietary problems (my moms a celiac so I thought it was something hereditary, it also didn't happen over night so that's why I didn't suspect this being the culprit).  I changed my entire diet and no improvements.  I read into other people having the same issues with Fenty, so I stopped using it immediately, and haven't had a new pimple since and my face has started to clear dramatically (Besides the deep scarring it caused)  I wish this product worked for me, the formula was beautiful on and the coverage was amazing, but It wasn't worth ruining my face over unfortunately..
its the best for redness and its very wearable it also is very good at covering up blemishes.

I would actual rate it around 2.5 stars instead of 2 if I really had to think about it. Honestly, isn’t the worst concealer I’ve ever tried but isn’t the best. I’ve had the same problem with the fenty foundation, cakey & oxidizes but does have overall coverage the first couple hours into my today wearing it. Might just be my skin is my is not compatible with the formula but I wouldn’t recommend considering I’ve given the foundation and concealer a several different tries.
AMAZING!! hides my dark circles so well. rihanna knows best:))

I love this concealer so much. I have it in three different shades so I can use it all year long. I prefer blending it out with a brush than a sponge; I find that it looks far more natural that way. It works well on its own, with tinted moisturizer, and with foundation. You can’t lose if you try this!

Love at first swipe! This goes on flawlessly even without under eye cream! The set is stable and not too blotchy or cakey to deal with. If needed, easy to cover up with the pro-filter foundation for a fresh start or leveling of concealer layers!

I waited about a year to write this review to give this concealer a fair shot and I don’t think it meets the mark for what I like to do with makeup not my body chemistry. I have a natural fold under one of my eyes and this concealer always clumps up no matter how much I pat it out. It also has a tendency to collect and latch on to drier areas even with proper skin prep and moisturizing. It’s pretty thick which I wouldn’t mind if it wouldn’t collect in odd areas. Experienced this with and without foundation. I’d be interested to see a more sheer or hydrating concealer in the future!
This is that matte without drying concealer! I hate having my entire face being matte or with a glow and this is that happy medium. It’s takes on powder really well.

I love all Fenty products but this one is a no for me just because I prefer lightweight concealers and I wasn't expecting the heavy consistency on this one but for those who like that type of look I would recommend.
reviews.review_title: Not a fan of full converage concealers

reviews.review_text: I actually like this product a lot because it has very good coverage! However my only concern is, is that since it has a good coverage it dries down pretty fast so if you don’t act quick it’s pretty hard to blend out. Other than that I love it!

Works amazing. This blends really well as completely covers my sun spots and freckles. You don’t need a lot to cover so it will last a while. Definitely worth the purchase. Rihanna wins again!!!!! Will be buying this again. I wear it everyday and I am certain you will too.

This concealer was very full coverage and dried matte. I liked it although if you have dry skin this is not for you as I also have dry skin and it only made it more obvious. I used it underneath my eyes and even with a primer and after exfoliating, it still pulled up dead skin. If you have oily or combination skin, you will probably really like this product.

Hands down the worst concealer I've ever used. I had high hopes for it because I love the foundation but the concealer is horribly patchy. I'm very oily, not a dry spot on my face especially under my eyes. I've tried applying this with a wet and dry sponge, a foundation brush, a concealer brush, and my fingers on top of the matte fenty foundation. I've tried using it straight outta the tube, mixed with a color corrector, mixed with a primer, mixed with an oil and nothing helps. Not only is it patchy but it removes the Fenty foundation beneath and leaves my under eyes looking dry. I've used the Fenty concealer brush and that doesn't help and I've used the Fenty primer along with Milk hydrogrip and neither improve this foundation. Returning immediately.
it's just ok. not full coverage and has a satin finish. I had a hard time finding a concealer in my shade with a red undertone. you may like this if you prefer light to medium coverage
Light with great coverage. Gives a nice glowy effect.

I love this concealer! It reminds me a lot of the Too Faced Born This Way concealer, in that it’s very brightening, great coverage, and feels lightweight on the skin. I wouldn’t say it’s the fullest coverage concealer I’ve ever tried, but still really smooth and bright and probably could be layered to build more coverage. Also love the applicator.
I’ve tried 3 different shades in the 300 section and they’re all too warm for my skin tone. Kinda sucks cause I really wanted to support this brand.

I wanted to love this because I love Rihanna! But I didn’t like this product, I don’t think it’s meant for dry skin. The formulation is creamy and it looks super patchy and flaky on my skin. My pores show and it’s not full coverage.
Terrible terrible terrible. Its too orange. Does not blend in, will be returning.
reviews.review_title: If you want to look like trump this is for you.

reviews.review_text: Terrible concealer. Was very patchy and very orange for a neutral shade

Haven't tried it yet but just received it in the mail! I bought it during quarantine, and should have paid attention to the size but even for a foundation it's tiny!!!!!! Definitely not worth $35+tax! Very disappointed.

i do like this concealer although sometimes it gets cakey under my eyes, although i have dry skin and i have yet to find a concealer that does not get a little bit cakey on me. it is buildable and easily blendable. i love the applicator and i love the color match. overall great product
reviews.review_title: gives me what i want in a concealer!

reviews.review_text: Way too thick and does not blend well! Hoping she comes out with something more liquidy! Definitely had to return!
I wanted to love this concealer as much as I loved the foundation but I don’t. I have oily/dry skin so when I use this it just makes my skin look super flaky/cakey.

This, by far, is one of my favorites. I used Tarte Shape Tape but it would start to crease under my eyes no matter how much powder I used. It blends nicely with and without my foundation and sets very well.
Love this product! I don’t use much foundation so this perfect covers my dark circles while blends in with my natural skin tone.

I bought two different colors and wear them together. A little bit and I do mean a little bit, goes a long way and looks beautiful- it even covers “allergy” dark circles! Works best when applied with a medium sized for liquids brush. I would highly recommend this. I have dry skin but prep it well prior to putting any kind of makeup on. I am also 59 years old.
This is one of my all-time favorite concealers. It blends really nice and doesn't crease during the day. I have combination/oily skin, and I find that this works great for my skin type.

I wear concealer every day for dark circles and breakouts, and I've tried many brands and techniques. I can't make this work. I can't get it to go on evenly or blend well. I bought the Fenty concealer brush which helped but still not great. The color match is good but the consistency is weird. It creases even when set which is annoying, but it also settles into the tiniest pores, fine lines, or dryness. The pigment is pretty buildable so the settling make any texture issues really stand out. I've been using this during the lockdown instead of wasting my good stuff on family ;) but every time I put this on I regret it and think I should warn people in the review.
light coverage, if you want heavy coverage it layers fairly well, blends really good and leaves my skin with a soft look.

I had high hopes for this concealer, but it wasn't as great as I expected. I did finish the product and got used to how it performed, but its not my favourite. I found it thick, cakey-looking and it would always crease after a few hours of wear no matter how well I set it. The coverage was okay, but there are better concealers out there at this price point!

I bought a couple of these and so did my friend. I have oily skin and she has dry.. this was the verdict 

My friends Dry skin: it’s caked, creased and patched off any dry areas in my friend in 1 minute... it just couldn’t stick to her dry under eyes and the creasing was so bad. She said it’s the worst concealer she ever tried

My oily skin: it stuck to my skin well but it creased and NEVER DRIED DOWN NO MATTER HOW MUCH I BAKED.. THE CONCEALER WAS WET. It has NOOO dry time at all because it DOES NOT SET WHATSOEVER. It would look really good on me but I had to do so much for it to look good because the coverage was medium no matter how much I built it up. I would need to powder constantly because the dewy formula would eat up the powder because it never set

 It’s a dewy concealer but NOT hydrating ..  the most useless concealer . What’s the point of being dewy if you aren’t going to stick and act well on dehydrated skin? 

I have been reading reviews of people saying it dried down too fast.. it doesn’t dry down, it just sticks to the skin and is Hard to blend... that’s what they are most likely experiencing. 
I give it 2 stars because it seems like people with Normal skin like it but if you are oily and dry.. stay away. This doesn’t blur texture or pores... way better concealers at Sephora
reviews.review_title: NOPE.. for Oily and Especially dry

reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite concealers I have. It is dewy and doesnt get to dry but it does sometimes stick to certain patches of skin or crease more then my other concealers I use.

I wear 370 in the foundation and this is a really good concealer for spot correction like the chin forehead or side of the face. I’ve been using this for a while now and wonder why my makeup never looks well blended or cakes and textured under my eyes despite have a meticulous skincare routine. With this concealer on by the time I’m done and set it’s too late. I look better bare face it’s that bad. Horrible to blend, dries down very quickly. Not good for highlighting. It’s like a white cast underneath no matter what colour you get

The shades are hard to match so I suggest trying in store. I'm shade 235 in the foundation but 310 works best for me as a concealer. For reference, the other concealer I use is Nars Soft Matte and Nars Radiant Concealer in the shade Custard.
I actually got this concealer because I needed something heavier to cover hickies at work (lol) and this works great. The coverage and shade match is the best I've ever seen and it's amazing for covering hyperpigmentation. I have to say though, the formula is a bit drying so I can see why people who are using it for eyes are giving it a low rating.
A lot of pigment, but pulls off the Fenty foundation underneath and creases horribly. Also never seemed to dry.

not as good as the hype implies . the texture is nice and it does last, however if ur skin is dry in ANY areas it will REALLY draw attention to it bc it only goes on well if your skin is moisturized to oily. it also will go in the cracks of ur skin like where ur mouth and eyelids are. does have good buildable coverage but the way it sits on your skin sometimes is not cute! i’d honestly say buy the foundation before the concealer and use it on certain spots bc (1) it’s better and (2) concealer is a bad deal for the amount comparatively .

This is the best concealer I've used by far. Most shades that are recommended are always off but this was is perfect! It's very natural looking which I love. Im not looking for that extra super bright highlight tht most of these girls are wearing. I'm not into the ghost look lol. It's super dreamy and thick. A little goes a long way. Ever since I purchased it, I have abandoned all my other concealers. It blends like a dream. I may get one more shade just to give me a lift whenever I want to brighten for a particular look and event. I love that it doesn't have the chemical smell like other products. Also I love that it doesn't dry down instantaneously. I better stock up soon.
Just received this, and it’s the SMALLEST bottle ever. I haven’t tried it yet. Which is why I’m giving it 3 stars. It’s kinda expensive for how little product you actually get.

Definitely the best concealer for the "natural, no makeup makeup look." I'd say if you want something more light to medium coverage then this is the concealer for you. If you are expecting something full coverage I would not go with this. It definitely does not fully cover any dark circle or blemishes but I personally don't mind that because I tend to go for the more natural look. Great on oily skin too, typically hard to find a natural concealer with oily skin since it usually will be too slippery on my face, but this is perfect. Definitely my favorite concealer so far!! (And I have tried NARS, shape tape and the naked concealer, this is totally better)

I use this primarily to conceal my under eyes, and it does a nice job of that. I don’t find that it creases much at all, but the formula for me is just too hydrating. It wears all day and it’s very easy to blend, and I love how much product you get for this price. I use it to prime my eyelids as well and it actually does a great job at that. I wouldn’t use it to cover up blemishes all over the face because as the day goes on your face will end up looking really dewy.
Great coverage but very drying under the eyes and it settled into the lines And wrinkles. This product is great for persons with oily skin. Stay away if you have dry skin.
I really like this concealer as a cover up, not necessarily for under my eyes. It blends in with my skin really well, but my one wish is that it would last longer.
Amazing I’m shade 385 in the foundation and I used 330 to hi light and it was amazing it’s not too light ! It’s The perfect color

Thumbs down! It sets into every pore I have! Even with setting it with powder. I’m so frustrated. The formula is creamy and it goes a long way but once it’s on it just settles in. It also doesn’t last as long as I hoped. Lastly it’s so thick that it shows if you don’t wear a foundation. I was hoping this would be my new go to but I will hopefully be returning this once the quarantine is lifted.
LOVEEEE. I always get compliments when I wear Fenty, I’ve been looking for the right shade my whole LIFE! Finally , Rihanna did her thangggg.
I love the coverage of gently beauty. I probably could have gone with 105 as this is truly very light and neutral.
It creases like crazy even with primer and setting powder. I tried to bake but it still creased like crazy. I don’t recommend.

This concealer is great. Personally, not a fan of the full coverage look normally, which this does exceptionally well. My go to when I want to step up my makeup game. It is the perfect shade, lasts all day, and is very easy to apply. Definitely recommend if you want full coverage, have dark under eye circles (like me), or spots.
I love this concealer! Gives great coverage and never disappoints.
Love this product, I would definitely recommend. It covers my under eye well and gives FL good coverage.
This product is awesome. The concealer very rich and creamy and easily blend able.

Imagine a full coverage concealer that is actually full coverage but is somehow still quite light and very blendable! Every time I try a Fenty product I kick myself for not trying it sooner. You can totally just get the same shade as the pro filt’r foundation as they match seamlessly. This covers any and all redness/blemishes, and mostly covers dark circles (I say mostly because I usually have to put a thicker layer under my eyes to really cover my dark bags).
this concealer is great for up to 8 hours, I would give it 5 stars if they found a way to make the concealer not crease as fast

I bought it together with gently Beaty foundation. The tone is fine, I wish it was slightly lighter. What i did not like is heavier weigh on my skin which is opposite from fenty Beaty foundation. They work great in combo together though
Thicker formula than I usually like for a concealer, but it definitely covers up blemishes!
Perfect for my 15 urology girl she loves it matches perfect to her skin tone & is very natural & lightweight
great coverage and smooth application. stays for a long time. can be a little drying on very dry skin days. otherwise definitely a staple in my makeup collection along with the fenty foundation!
Do not buy shade 110!!! It literally looks like white paint. Nothing like the picture, the comparison, or the description. Very disappointed as this was a complete waste of money.

I was so excited to get this concealer because I had heard good things about it. I used it the same day it arrived at my house and I put it on and it smells just like paint. At first I didn’t mind too much, but after I had it on it started to give me a headache. Also it doesn’t blend as nice as I expected it to. It’s not my favorite and I wouldn’t buy it again sadly.
I actually love this for no makeup days. Just a few dots blended in with my finger. I don't like it for my full coverage full glam looks
reviews.review_title: I find less is more with this one

reviews.review_text: did not like this product , creased super quick , coverage was alright

i really wanted to love this product, but it fell short of my expectations. good coverage, but it creased a lot and the formula is pretty cakey, which i didn't like because i tend toward natural skin finishes. it dries pretty fast too, so i work with it in patches and blend it out immediately, or it just sets. i still use it for spot concealing and when my other products don't cover up my dark eye circles, though!

This concelear has good coverage, but it wasn´t all that good i felt it that it crumbled up in my under eye. I had big expectations from this product because of all the hype but it fell flat, it did not bring that smoothnes to my undereye. i think there are better products in the market. its good but all the hype its not worth it.
This product gives great coverage and holds for so long!
This is a GREAT concealer! I use it for concealing my brows and it’s amazing! I so far love every gently beauty product that I’ve tried. Not disappointed yet!

I asked an associate for help to get matched with this concealer because I had seen it advertised on Instagram and other places. The associate was really nice and patient and tried on 5-6 shades on me before finding the one that matched my skin best. This one really conceals my undereye circles great as well as dark spots/acne scars. I've found a great new everyday concealer, and I'm really happy!
My all time favorite concealer! Great coverage without being heavy and good for highlighting the face.
Just no! Do yourself a favor and don’t buy it, it’s too thin and even with primer and setting powder it’ll still crease.
love it! very creamy, doesn't crack or create unwanted lines.
I really like this creamy formula. I was new to concealer when I bought this, so I’d say it is easy to blend/use.
Gives good coverage and is the only concealer I have found to match how light my skin is!

It’s a pretty good concealer. It’s not crease less like they advertise, but I think it’s just natural that there’s a little creasing in the under eye area. I just wish they gave more product for the price. I purchased a Too Faced concealer which is also good and you get much more product for almost the same price as Fenty.

i think this concealer is great! i don’t use it on a daily basis, only when i need to touch up some areas on my face but i find that it covers up well without looking cakey. i would definitely buy it again!!

I really loved the coverage of this concealer. However, it would crease and settle into my fine lines under my eyes immediately. It was hard to blend out seamlessly and it would be creasing right after I applied it and started to blend. I really did like the coverage though and I did not thing it was too drying. The formula and consistency is great as well.

I use and love the pro filt'r soft matte foundation (also in 240), and thought I'd go and give this concealer a try. Unfortunately this concealer did not work for my skin type. It creases under my eye like crazy and becomes patchy by midday. I've had girls in  my office tell me to go back to my old concealer because they notice a huge difference in my concealer's performance. I've tried various tips and tricks to help prevent it from creasing/sliding off because I think it would be convenient to have my concealer and foundation both from Fenty, but unfortunately nothing worked. Although this formula didn't work for me personally, this match to the foundation is the perfect shade lighter. It also initially goes on nice and creamy, so it does have a nice texture. If it works for your skin, I envy you!!

I have mixed feelings on this concealer. It's by NO means a holy grail, but I am able to use it as an addition to my favorite concealers. The shade 110 is honestly such a nice, light, pinky tone. the shade is absolutely perfect to brighten my under eyes. now my issue with this though is it is so THICK. not a good thick- you MUST be careful. I typically use tarte shape tape under my eyes and that works really well for me. I can warm a dot of this Fenty one up between my fingers and Pat it overtop my shape tape and it creates a really nice shade and a little additional coverage. I've really just had to make it work because I have it... but don't go out of the way and buy it.
reviews.review_title: I can make it work.... I guess.

reviews.review_text: This product is an amazing concealer!  My only problem is that it’s a little creasy so I have to set it with powder.  But over very good.
It was thick and caked on. Made my under eyes look like I was an old woman with wrinkles under my eyes because it creased! Wanted to love this product but I hated it.

I absolutely love this concealer, I’m already on my second bottle of it! A little bit goes a long way, it’s very full coverage and I think the bad reviews are simply people using too much of the product.

This is the worst concealer ever. This was recommended to me by someone working at Sephora. I have super oily skin but this still somehow manages to crack and make my face look dry and cakey. It does not blend and actually removes foundation. Do not believe the YouTube reviews. This was a nightmare. Like the title says, i threw mine in the trash.
reviews.review_title: I threw mine in the trash.

reviews.review_text: The only thing about this concealer is that it doesn’t crease. I don’t know if it is because I have oily skin, but this concealer is too heavy and creamy. My hand hurts due to blending. I wish I could return it. I will keep using with a very damp sponge or setting spray, but it is just the worse I ever tried.
I love this concealer! I am a forever fan!!!!!!!!!
This concealer has good coverage but small and drying
Love it. I've never been anything more than a good and mascara type girl....Can't get enough of Fenti!!!

My favorite concealer of all time honestly. Just got my 3rd tube, idk what it is but I love it. Not too cakey but great coverage. On my less makeup days I could wear it without even setting my under eyes because because it dries nicely too (I rarely do this though). Just overall a great product
Love it, I use one for under each eye and it’s perfect. It’s very thick and creamy and does a pretty good job covering dark circles and acne.
Very true to color I think this color is my summer color
As a long-time user of MAC cosmetics, I felt like I was cheating on a dear friend when I tried Fenty Beauty, but this product is long lasting and the color is perfection.
In love with this makeup!! Im Happy customer...i say prices could be tad better but in the end its worth it.

This is the creamiest concealer I’ve tried so far! I‘ve tried Nars, Shape Tape, MAC, L’Oreal, the list goes on! This concealer is the best in every area in my opinion. It doesn’t dry, crack, or cake on you! I use it to cut my crease and outline my eyebrows and boy does it do the trick!
Great concealer. It gave me a good glow and helped with spot correction.
Love this concealer! It is an exact match to my skin tone (like the foundation). It gives nice coverage over blemishes and discoloration, and blends seamlessly.
I was super excited to try this product but if you have dry skin it will crease and is like concrete when applied. I only wore it for about an hour if that before it started creasing.
I really like how much product you get with this concealer however it is very dry and doesn't absorb very well into the skin and it leaves patches on the skin..
i absolutely love this product!!;) It covers everything and makes me feel beautiful! definitely worth your money!

When i had gotten shade tested they had said it was my shade. it had been way to light in natural light, and made me look like a ghost. after only 30 minutes, it had started looking like my skin was coming off. i wouldn’t recommend this product, save your $35 for a better one.
Really enjoying this concealer. I use a rich moisturizer before application and my skin looks fresh all day.

I love the color, applicator, and coverage of this product. I don’t think it’s right for my skin type though. 

I have normal to dry skin and my under eyes crease so badly with this formula. I’ve tried it with the fenty hydrating foundation, without foundation and with one of my favorite foundations and it creases every single time. 

Maybe it works  better for someone that’s doesn’t have dry skin?

This concealer successfully covers my acne and imperfections and blends into the skin nicely. This product does not cause any further breakouts and will not leave your skin looking orange. My only wish is that it didn’t smell like paint.

the coverage is good, like very good but i find it to be extremely dry. If you don't immediately start spreading it, it will stay like concrete. When i mixed it with moisturiser i found it that it worked better.
I absolutely hate this concealer makes u look like u have wrinkles and is very dry and cracked just makes you’re makeup look horrible
Nice applicator, the product creases and does not provide good coverage. I unfortunately returned it. I wanted to love it.

I bought this concealer in 185 with the matching 185 fenty hydrating foundation which were recommended by the sephora employee. The colors match but do not work together at all! The concealer looks so thick and cakey over the fenty foundation and its nearly impossible to blend.Why make a product line where the products cannot be used together?! I attempted to make it work with another foundation but I had to return it. The dealbreaker for me was that the product always settled into my fine lines, even with a powder. The only positive I can say is the Fenty color range is awesome.
reviews.review_title: Do not use with Fenty Hydrating Foundation

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product in the earth tones that it gives❣️

I really like the formula. It’s super creamy, soft, and easy to blend out. But it creases really bad under my eyes. Half an hour after applying and setting it looks like I’ve been wearing it all day. But that’s probably just a me problem

Right off the bat I notices this concealer is darker than the “matching” shade. Doesn’t brighten the face, and it’s incredibly thick so you have to blend this almost immediately. Once it’s set though, it does NOT come off. And it does have amazing coverage. Also, creaseless? PFFFFtttt. Let’s be real... our skin moves and stretches, and makeup is going to move with it. I dont recommend this for someone with mature skin, or dry skin. It does cling to dry spots a little bit. Over all, amazing coverage, just wish it wasn’t darker than the foundation. Another plus is there is nooo flashback!!!!

If you have dry under eyes, give this a skip. This product made me realize I had that problem, as it was splitting by the end of the work day. That being said, I was very impressed with the shade range.
Stays on better than the foundation, but does not have as much coverage as other great concealers that I’ve used.
Great concealer. Does the job and brightens the under eye :) must use a setting powder with it though.

I wanted to love this concealer so much, because I love the Fenty matte foundation - but I was disappointed to say the least. I tried different skin care, primers, powders, etc. it just doesn’t work for me. I have normal skin, not oily and not dry.

I wanted to love this concealer. Every tutorial I have watched of this concealer, people glob it on and it looks like it blends flawlessly for them. When I use it, I cannot achieve the same results. I wouldn’t consider myself a makeup novice. I’ve tried every combination of foundation and skincare I have. On me, it seems so matte. I accentuates texture and fine lines. It dries so quickly so you need to blend fast. I just cannot make this stuff work. Under my eyes, I feel it ages me. Over blemishes it tends to make them look worse than just not covering them. The best I can get it to look is when I have a super duper hydrated base. I take product off on the back of my hand. I take the tiniest, and I mean tiniest, amount of product and use the fenty concealer brush and work as fast as I can buffing it in. The one thing I can day is when this stuff is on, it stays on. It’s just a no for me. It has great pigmentation, I just wish they made a more nourishing formula.
reviews.review_title: It’s gonna be a no for me, dawg

reviews.review_text: This was suggested to me by a Sephora rep for my foundation match and I think it looks like I put nude liquid baby powder over my dark circles. Not happy at all, I was to caught in the glam of the compliments they were giving me to truly take in my opinion on how I looked. The foundation made me look caked and dried out my skin making it peel. I have combination skin with oily in my t zone. I wish I would've waited before I bought this because now I have to go back and return it in the evening when its crowded since I went today during my day off so it wouldn't be crowded and my anxiety wouldn't be through the roof. Hopefully I'll find something else that will help my dark circles because this concealer did not.
reviews.review_title: Does NOT help with dark circles. Returning ASAP.

reviews.review_text: Decent coverage but definitely left my under eye with a creased cracked look.
Totally worth the price. It just melts into my skin and isn't too oily. It's so pretty.
I don’t know what it is about this formula but this is the worst concealer I’ve ever tried. Which sucks because I’m a big fan of the foundation. This concealer separates so bad on the skin.

I was so excited to try this concealer because I heard soo many good things about it. Im so glad I decided to buy it because I love it!! It blends out so nicely and looks so good and smooth! The shade I got was literally perfect. Definitely will be buying again!
Creases like crazy. Not long lasting by any means. Not a simple go to full coverage concealer! I’m heart broken.

I've always struggled to find a concealer that was light enough and pink enough to match my undertones, and Fenty has been the ONLY concealer that truly matches my skin. While it says the undertones are neutral, they're definitely on the pinky side. My only problem would be that it does tend to crease a bit, which I have never experienced with other concealers. It's not super noticeable though, and I'm sure this could be fixed with some powder. Also, sometimes the skin on my cheeks gets dry due to my acne medication and it ends up looking really flaky. I don't think this formula would be ideal for someone with super dry skin.
The formula is thick, but can be sheered out if you use a damp beauty blender. I usually apply it with my fingers (like I do for all my makeup!) and it works just fine. I usually only put it around my under eyes, but I have successfully covered acne spots with it before :)
It’s alright but not the best. Doesn’t last all day for me and it’s quite thick.

I have very mixed feelings about this concealer. It’s very pigmented and super thick which is great for concealing on your face, but I found that when I used this under my eyes I got REALLY bad creasing. Like I looked in the mirror and my jaw dropped because of how bad it looked. It’s very tacky once it’s applied so it will settle into lines no matter how much setting powder you use. I really liked the way it looked on my forehead and chin so I think that’s all I will be using it for. In addition to the concealer I also bought the soft matte foundation. I love that the concealer and foundation are matching numbers and they go perfect with each other. Overall I will definitely be using this up, but I probably won’t repurchase. I don’t want to have to ‘think’ when doing my makeup and for me this concealer is a touch to thick and testy for my preference.
the quality is good but it’s so tiny i thought it was a trial size it’s so small and so over priced for the quantity. i wouldn’t get it again i’d just get another concealer

I have really bad dark circles and some creases under my eyes and this product did the best it could. It was a little bit too thick for my liking and even when I set it, it would always crease up. It made my dark circles very grey which was worse since it looked unnatural. For my skin and under eyes this didn’t work but I can see this being a great product for others.
Perfect match to skin color, goes on smooth, feels light, wears all day, great for aging skin, hid all my flaws.
reviews.review_title: Amazingly Perfect Concealer!  My only choice!

reviews.review_text: I loved this product, I had been using a cheaper concealer prior to buying this and I'm happy I switched. This concealer works well for eye/eyebrow makeup and concealing dark circles or blemishes. It's not too heavy and goes on smoothly. It blends perfectly into my foundation and I'll probably continue purchasing this concealer from now on. I honestly thought I might have to go a darker or lighter color when I ordered this, but it matched perfectly with foundation. The container wasn't too large considering the price, I thought there would be more but the formula is very nice so I don't mind this tiny setback. I didn't need to apply a lot of concealer in the first place so you won't waste much of the product.
Great coverage for dark circles. Best I've found. Doesn't settle in fine lines.
The texture is great i really do love this product
This product makes your face look so young And I really love it I would buy it again
Such an amazing product. Im so happy I found a foundation that doesn't irritate my skin.  So in love

I was really excited to try the font products..
 But this was too watery for me.
reviews.review_title: May not be meant for me, but .maybe you...

reviews.review_text: My number one foundation, just melts into skin for a smooth finish
I like this products for my dry skin. However it’s very similar to Morphe in my opinion (which is a bit cheaper)
This product is hard to apply, the formula is very heavy and it creases almost instantly. Would not recommend it
Really great coverage. Love the texture of this concealer as well. Feels moisturizing.
The concealer is okay, doesn’t hide well my blemishes. Not sure if I would buy it again.
It didn't blend well into my skin and it didn't really cover my dark circles at all. It looked patchy and I'm disappointed because I love the Fenty foundation..

i honestly like & dont like this product. at first it was working out for me but after a while i noticed that it oxidizes making my under eye orange and although it does bland well, for me, it is not crease proof at all, you need to blend it quickly with a mist. i wouldn’t say its a must.

Didn’t love this. It dried own too much for my liking and sometimes I like to just wear a little concealer under my eyes so it just wasn’t the best concealer to me. It came out pretty matte when all was said and done and just wasn’t good to me for my everyday purposes.
This product does not cover blemishes well at all. It is also difficult to blend into your skin.

I'm really disappointed in this product. It's my first Fenty product, and it really leaves me with a sour taste for the brand. This concealer claims it is "crease-proof, long-wearing, and can conceal blemishes and redness" - I can confirm that this is untrue. It creases at places I don't even have creases on my face, it doesn't last through an entire day of working in an office, and cannot seem to cover redness or acne, despite being "medium to full coverage". I have tried this a few times, and continue to be disappointed. Would not recommend, and will be returning.
The concealer is difficult to blend, especially on dry skin, it doesn’t interact well with non fenty primers or foundations. It always ends up separating
It got oily throughout the day and the transfer was really bad. I love Riri but I'm sticking with my Nars concealer.

I love the shade range! I didn’t have trouble at all finding the perfect shade! I fell in love with the finish! 

I have tried everything under the sun to try and prevent this. I do not have dry under eyes either. No powder, power with a damp beauty blender, powder with a brush, little powder, a lot of powder, etc. I’m not sure if others came across the same issue. I really want it to work because it’s so beautiful!
Too drying and dries out too soon. I would put over blemishes and they would get all crusty and flakey :(
reviews.review_title: IT RUNS OUT TOO FAST :( too drying.

reviews.review_text:
Pros: Easy to blend, great shade selection, doesn't cake, long lasting.
Cons: Product doesn't really 'conceal' anything. Used under my eyes and for spot coverage x 1 week. Not really effective, reminded me more of CC cream coverage than  true concealer cover up.  I like a lot of Fenty Beauty products but, for me, this concealer really underperformed. Returned.

This concealer is a perfect match in color (hence the 3rd star), but doesn't have good coverage. It still shows dark circles and after about an hour emphasizes my under-eye wrinkles (I'm 23, I don't *really* have under-eye wrinkles). Great for light coverage, but I wouldn't say this "conceals" anything.
Extremely high coverage, very creamy. A little goes a long way, especially under the eyes.

Love this concealer. The matte finish is great for my oily skin. Blends well, is slightly lighter than the foundation of the same shade (which I like), and really does not budge once applied. Works for everything from cystic acne to dark spots and under eye circles. I used to need to reapply concealer a few times a day and with this I don't have to. Not cakey or heavy either. Love!

I prefer to go very natural re coverage(no foundation) on a daily basis but like to have a product that can also work for more glam events that require a full beat look. This is THAT versatile product & my new favourite! I LOVE this concealer! 
The 120 matches my light combination skin perfectly for simple coverage of dark circles & spots for every day while still working really well with at least 3 other brands/types of foundation that are my Go To products. It is buildable, blends out easily(prefer using beauty blenders for concealing) & doesn't have a strong added fragrance. It also stays where I put it, especially when set, only when I wash my makeup off but not before. I also really like to use the lighter shade 110 for brightening & natural face light/lift effect. I would absolutely buy more shades to use as contour since the shade range is so easy to match re undertones & works brilliantly with powder & cream products without compromising coverage either. Fenty scored with this product no question!
reviews.review_title: My #1 Concealer For All The Things!

reviews.review_text: great applicator, distributes product well without having to double-dip into the tube. beautiful color. i set with the fenty cashew setting powder, and it makes my undereye look smooth and even. it’s my favorite concealer for everyday wear. my favorite concealer of all time is ysl all hours!
This product definitely brightens your eye bags! I use the NARS radiant concealer and top it off with the Fenty Beauty to really brighten up the area and it is the best combo!

I would say it does the job but it gets cakey not even more than an hour. I have dry skin around my eyes so it is not good to use for under eye. I have fine lines as well and it defines it even more. Formula is a little bit thick for me and drying. I try to make it work by putting more cream around my eye. This might work better for those with oily skin and those who doesn't have fine lines.
Amazing! Concealer was so smooth and worked great as eye primer too
Settles into creases and Wrinkles. Doesn’t stay on or blend  well
I feel like Fenty Beauty products are overrated in general, this concealer is too caky and it always leaves some type of lines no matter how I apply it
This concealer is the best I’ve used. It blends so easily the formula is just right. The color is the best for me and it just hides everything
I’ve used slot of concealers in my time, this by far is the best I’ve ever used.
I got the wrong color, but even with that being said, this product is great, blends beautifully and covers dark circles. love this product.

I wish I could afford to buy this stuff all the time b/c it’s AWESOME. I have really dry under eyes, so a lot of products collect underneath and in the lines. This stayed put and covered my dark circles. Really lovely formula
Love this concealer from Fenty. Goes on great and long lasting

So are first I didn't like this, but then I realized I haven't really found a better concealer for my eyes. It offers great coverage and pairs best with the Laura Mercier powder. One day I actually forgot to set it with powder and it still looked good. I do think you have to use a lot of concealer,  to get a really full coverage look but I think the advantage is that it's not as drying as other concealers.
reviews.review_title: Pretty good, set with Laura Mercier

reviews.review_text: This is such a light weight product! Before, I would spend money on concealers and they would make my skin oily. This is perfect because it does not even need a top powder. Highly recommend!

Blends well for the most part but starts to dry s tad faster than I would like.. so when I apply it I have to start blending really fast and do under each eye at s time but the tube has lots of product and it always lasts for months! :)

Love this concealer. My favorite used to be NARS radiant but for some reason it began accentuate lines under my eyes and look dry. I love this Fenty concealer, it’s creamy almost feels hydrating under my eyes. I have it in 395, 410 and 420 which I’ve repurchased 3 times. I use the 420 as a foundation sometimes.
I really like this concealer. It's easy to take off and it helps brighten under my eyes.
Seems to make me look oily and very small for price compared to others

My Fenty foundation shade is 385. I use Pro filtr concealer 385 to conceal my under eye and 370 to highlight.

This 400 colour works perfect on my skin tone to colour correct. I use this under my foundation as a spot treatment in areas that need a little more coverage (under eyes & acne scars/dark spots/hyperpigmentation) and this allows my foundation and concealer to work more efficiently at concealing without a lot of product piled on.

This is easily the most full coverage concealer I've tried. Most others are too runny and let the skin underneath show through. Love this one because its thicker, stays put, and effectively hides blemishes underneath without being too dry. It has earned a permanent spot on my travel bag.
Honestly the best concealer I used in a while! Easy blending too!
It's strange that if u blend it out wiz sponge and the concealer will disappear.  Literally disappear from the skin.  It's like a  glue and it will stick on to sponge but not on the skin
The product itself has very nice coverage and stays put once set with powder. Also a huge fan of the applicator and the amount of product. New favorite!
Best concealer I’ve tried! The coverage is a perfect medium!
I generally don't use "higher end" concealers, my go-to is a drugstore brand but mannnnn has this ever changed my life,

I had many problems with this concealer creasing, I found ways to manipulate it. First of all don’t apply foundation under the eyes or around the eyes because adding concealer will mush everything together and crease. Make sure to stay hydrated under your eyes at night and in the morning. Overall I give it a 4.

I really enjoyed this product because of how I barely have to use any powder on top, especially because I have fairly oil skin. The only downsides are that I do find myself going
through a bottle quite fast and that you really have to blend it quickly because it dries almost immediately!

I use this concealer in conjunction with the foundation. In my opinion the foundation does its job perfectly, whereas this needs a bit more work. This concealer is very very VERY creamy and it likes to move around. At the same time though, it dries fast when applying. This concealer also likes to grip onto any dry skin or flaky skin so moisturizer and cleanse before application or it’ll cling to your dry skin. This concealer definitely needs setting powder because otherwise it slides and creases, so I don’t recommend this for a simple apply and out the door look. Truthfully this needs the Fenty Powder to work well, and that powder is the sole reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 3 although it is frustrating it needs something else to be as perfect as it can be.

I have done a comparison of this for a whole day with Nars radiant creamy side by side. This became patchy and dry after a few hours while the nars was clinging on looking as good as when put first. It was a tad harder to blend too although looks great immediately upon application.

I love this product it helps with my undereyes and works better than mostly all concealers  I have had so far I have a lot of acne and it has helped conceal it all and I have scars with it covered up. It’s easy to to blend and sometimes instead of using foundation I just apply this and blend. Also, this is the only concealer that had the R I G H T undertones other made me look darker than I am or too yellow.
Blends really nice, a little bit goes a long way. Packaging is really cute. I love the way it feels on my skin, it’s soft and smooth. The color match is perfect and makes me look less dead

This concealer is perfect. I love that it is a match to my Pro Filt'r Foundation shade so there's no guess work. It's rich and creamy and it is amazing to put on. It makes the circles under my eyes nonexistent. I can't love it anymore!!
This concealer is more on the full coverage side but I LOVE it, it covers my hyperpigmentation amazingly! Also a creamy feeling to it so it’s not drying to the skin

I dont like the wear this concealer everyday as it is a bit heavy.BUT I do like to wear this when i want a full coverage glam look . I love the creamy texture and the coverage is phenomenal . Will repurchase in a lighter shade though . 290 is not bright enough for me

This Fenty concealer is absolutely life changing and amazing with the range of so many shades so you will not have to mix products to find what matches you. I normally can’t find a good concealer for myself since I have a neutral undertone but as soon as I applied this fenty it blended right into my skin as if I wasn’t even wearing makeup. It matched so well I was amazed I’ve heard great things but seeing it on myself was something else. It covered up all my acne scars which was my major issue.
I really wish that I liked this product more than I did. I found that the coverage was not great and that it creased and did not set properly when I used it.
I love this concealer...this is the best one I’ve used and I’ve tried born with way sculpting, shape tape, Maybelline age rewind, and others and this is hands down my favorite
It creased at first, but when used with Laura Mercier’s eye brightening powder, it sets perfectly. Very smooth. Love it.  One of my must haves.

I used this concealer for a long time before finally finding another go-to. Pros: full coverage, hides my dark circles. Cons: CREASES!! I find myself constantly blending my under eye area throughout the day/night when wearing this because It settles into my creases. I also didn't like that I had to do a full face of makeup when wearing this concealer, It couldn't just throw It on and go because It is such high coverage. Which could be good for some, just not me. I currently use Milk's concealer and am much happier.
good concealer, covers my undereyes pretty well.  my only problems are that it creases and dries out.  the oxidizing is insane.  if you use a hydrating primer though it works really well.
This is an amazing medium coverage concealer. It is buildable but doesnt crease easily or rub off.
Goes on smooth but after wearing it you can see CREASES!! I went from looking 25 to 55 and I’m 35...this product has been returned
Personally, I love this concealer! It’s extremely easy to blend out and it lasts all day! I think it’s comparable to Tarte’s shape tape.
reviews.review_title: Easy to blend & Lasts all day

reviews.review_text: Really nice concealer to cover dark circles. Not the greatest with acne coverage. Very nice paired with Fenty line. No flashback. However a little to pricy. Less expensive concealers would probably do the same

This concealer is one of my new favorites! I usually use nars radiant creamy concealer, but I decided to give this one a try as I really like the pro filt'r foundation. I got the same shade as the one I use in the foundation and it's a perfect match! It has a less creamy texture than the nars concealer, but it blends like a dream and has great coverage. A little goes a long way with this one, whereas with the nars concealer I had to build up coverage wherever I needed it. I have combo skin and it looks great on both oilier and drier sides of my face. It has good staying power and does't seem to wear off in strange ways. I would highly recommend trying out this concealer!! :)
Great shade range, but badly creases. Gave it a fair shot and will not be repurchasing.

I really wanted to like this formula but alas, I did not. I found it to be incredibly drying and very heavy. The heavy coverage is something I’ve liked in the past from other brands but this one did not blend well and my under eyes were cakey looking. I slathered in under eye cream beforehand and it still didn’t work. I would not recommend.

I love this 420 concealer. I have acne scars from trying to pop acne bumps. This Fenty covered scars and I couldn't even feel it on my skin. Would recommend using Sephora to everyone. They will find your color and match it with the foundation you need. Thank you Sephora

I wanted to love this concealer and use it as a staple in my make up bag because the range of shades was perfect for my fair and cool complexion. I bought 120 for under the eyes and 140 to concealing problem areas. 

I had a horrible time blending the product during mid-day touch-ups even when I was using Fenty foundation. I found that the concealer clung to every pore and imperfection instead of hiding them.
