I even tried dermaplaning treatments for my skin thinking that would help the formula from settling into my skin, but nope! Overall was not the right formula for me even though the shade match was perfect. I returned both 120 and 140 after about two weeks of trying to make it work.
reviews.review_title: Great shade match, but poor formula

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product. It works well but I could t get over the funky smell. It smelled like expired conveler. Took it in to the store and they all smelled funky too. Returned!

After procrastinating for a couple months, i finally picked up the concealer and i am in love. Goes on so smooth and isn’t thick but provides great coverage. I’m 345 in foundation and 310 in the concealer and it’s perfect. Highlights under my eyes beautifully.  I go back and forth from this concealer and shape tape but for my everyday look, i definitely use Fenty
Love! Love! Great for conceal and hiding blemishes.
Not great for dry skin. it looks cakey and terrible on my face.
Great coverage, matte without feeling dry, covers my gray dull under-eyes with a great natural highlight. No flash back in pictures either.
reviews.review_title: A must have in your makeup collection!

reviews.review_text: This is product is what a girl needs. The Concealer makes me look so young, rich and vibrant. It seems like 5 years was taken off my life. Looking younger and feeling beautiful.

This is a product I purchase for my aunt, a woman of colour who is a musician and often under heavy lights for a long time. This is an amazing product, and she is in love with it. A little goes a long way, and even with her older skin it sits wonderfully and lasts for a long time.
Love this! I have a lot of trouble finding something that matches me perfectly and the shades in the Fenty line are amazing. I have not been disappointed in anything I've purchased.
dis covers pretty good, but like, i kinda feel like it blends a bit meh and can get caked very fast
reviews.review_title: kinda good but a bit over rated doe...

reviews.review_text: This concealer is really really bad. For me anyways. It is soo thin you can see right through it, see my dark circles within half an hour of wearing it. Also creases up like crazy. Overall it's way to thin and slides right off. Would not recommend for someone with tan/olive skin and dark circles.

Fenty concealers are the creamiest and I usually experience minute creasing. FYI  I believe all concealers crease to some degree. I own two of these concealers. I use 330 which is my normal shade and 250 right under the inner corners of my eyes to brighten. The peach undertones helps counteract my natural golden undertones.

To start: I have pretty oily skin, a great and effective skincare routine, and I've used and love the Pro Filtr foundation! With this product: the coverage was light-medium coverage (not what I expected) and works well with my oily skin. My only issue is that when I apply under the eyes, it does emphasize the texture and fine lines more than I'd like. Overall, pretty decent!
reviews.review_title: Lighter coverage but good for oily skin!

reviews.review_text: Its a good concealer with good coverage but I wouldn't buy again. It is too thick and drying. Wouldn't recommend for dry skin. It can go on flakey.
I did end up repurchasing this product. I used it to conceal pimples, dark spots, dark circles, and other blemishes and it stayed put all day. However, it does tend to slick up and get oily on me.
I love the color but this concealer congested my skin. I got painful breakouts when I was using this. If you have acne-prone skin definitely do not use this product.
A little goes a long way, very thick product somewhat hard to blend

Goes on smoothly. I’m 410 and 370 would be better for a highlight. But 410 look great with foundation. Nothing will ever fully eliminate fine lines. 
Side note: shipping took 8 days, instead of 3. I was beyond upset

Okay so I bought this to go with the Fenty hydrating foundation in 145. Went in with no expectations since I’ve only ever used her stunna lips and the original foundation. The formula is very thick and for me it doesn’t spread out very easy no matter what I use to do it. It also removes the foundation from my face during the blending out process along with seeming like nothing was there anymore. For me it just did not work out. Makes me a little sad. Giving it an extra star since it came in a fair shade for olive skin tones. *** Also used the butter setting powder by Fenty with this product.
I love Fenty and wear a lot of Fenty products but this concealer was a huge disappointment, it creases horribly and makes me look old and wrinkly underneath my eyes.

This concealer is peeeerrrrfect. Man i love the formula, the coverage, the finish. It is such a beautiful and creamy product; so satisfyig to blend. By far my favorite concealer and i am taking this to the grave!!!
Nice formula, natural finish. Undertone was off but that was my fault.
If your looking for a matte concealer this is perfect! Blends super well, and feels light. Only problem is I should’ve chosen a shade or two lighter!
I have purchased several Fenti products and love them all.   The Fenti face glow is my favorite.   You can't go wrong with any Fenti products.
This is right up there with Nars concealer. It covers well, light, not caky and lasts all day.
Perfect for traveling and quick touchups! Blends smoothly and comes in the same shade as the full-size foundation. Love love LOVE!

I thought I’d found my holy grail under eye concealer. It went on beautifully and covered really well, but 30 minutes later it had settled into fine lines and creased terribly. I even set it with powder. I’m bummed but this will be going back. I’ll stick with my It Cosmetics Bye Bye Undereye.

Bought this because I love the matching foundation, but unfortunately did not work for me. I used my Beauty Blender to apply and concealer wouldn't stick, kept smearing and rolling off. Gave it 2 stars for the color because it was a perfect match.

Amazing! I used to use concealers from Nars and Tarte's Shape Tape, but this one is far better than both! It's lightweight, pigmented, minimal creasing, works well with all of my other products, and lasts through your sweat and natural oils!
Brought this a while ago and just now getting to use it. I actually really like this concealer as it is just the right shade I was looking for .

First of all, I want to say that this is probably one of the best concealers I’ve ever used. I switched from the Nars radiant to this because as I got older the Nars started to crease into my fine lines. I found this gem and instantly fell in love with the finish. It blends well and stayed on all night without creasing. The reason for my 1 start is that Unfortunately it caused a really bad rash under my eyes, but I do have very sensitive skin. I’m so bummed it didn’t work out for me. I highly recommend it if you’re skin is not sensitive.
reviews.review_title: Amazing concealer, but not for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_text: Finally got my hands on this gem! I’m a makeup enthusiast. Nowhere near a makeup guru. However, this concealer goes perfectly with my Fenty Beauty Pro Filtr Soft Matte Longwear Foundation. I’m Shade 350 in both. I received so many compliments on how beautiful my makeup looked. Very easy to apply and blend. Great for the under eye and to clean up your eyebrows. A little amount of product goes a long way, and the applicator is great!

I can never get this concealer to work. Whether I use a sponge or a brush, it always ends up looking cakey and not concealing anything. It looks okay on my nose, chin, and forehead, but looks cakey and brings out my pores under my eyes. I don’t know if I got a bad batch or what, but I can never get it to work :((

I was so excited when this came out. But unfortunately, this concealer did not work for me at all. I have some very small bumps on my under eyes and when I applied the concealer it would separate near my bumps and creases. I tried it many times and even bought 3 different tubes with different colors and they all showed the same thing. I was so sad and disappointed. I even tried it when my skin became drier and then when it got more oily. I do not recommend this product.
dries down insanely fast making it impossible to work with and blend. also enhances every tiny line and crease on your face. shows texture i didn't even know i had and almost seems splotchy.
reviews.review_title: love you riri but this concealer just wasn't it.

reviews.review_text: I wanted to try this concealer because of the incredible color selection but was SOOO disappointed. By far the worst concealer I’ve ever used- it was thick and caked into every line, crease. It clings onto dry spots and accentuated them. It didn’t last and looked awful after several hours of wear. I would choose a drug store concealer over this any day.
wanted to love this :( it's honestly a great concealer but the color match is waaaaaaaaay too yellow for me. I use it with the same fenty foundation color and it just looks too yellow for me :/

Was looking for a great concealer for my mom and we tried this one day in Sephora. Will continue to buy it for her since she loves it! So glad that there are so many shades. The descriptor is exactly right, for light-med. skin w/ warm undertones.
reviews.review_title: Thank you Fenty for this RANGE

reviews.review_text: As a sleep deprived mom, student and pregnant lady this concealer makes it look like I actually get sleep. It’s a lifesaver! And a little goes a long way! I use it with the pro filt’r foundation and it works like magic.

I've been struggling for so long to find a concealer that doesn't cake under my eyes and make me look old, and this is it. This concealer is amazing, I find it so light and wearable. Rihanna has got me sold!! I find I don't have to use much yet it goes such a long way. I don't have super dark circles under my eyes so i was matched the same number as my foundation in her hydrating foundation and it blends beautifully. I got a sample of this along with the foundation before i decided on buying it for myself. It brightens without looking so obvious that I'm wearing anything. A
Will crease badly and leaves your under eyes feeling so dry and sticky
It’s a great high coverage concealer that doesn’t crease or gets caked up, I love it and comes with a good amount of product

I really wanted to love this concealer, but I don't think it's for me. It works fine and does a great job concealing, but for some reason the finish looks bad on my skin by the middle of the day. I prefer my concealer to have that "no concealer" look and blurs my skin.
reviews.review_title: I really wanted this to be my holy grail

reviews.review_text: Not a fan. I wanted to love this after how well the pro filt'r foundation worked for me, but crease proof it is NOT. I needed something for my dark circles and it creases and goes chunky almost even on clean and moisturized skin. It "kinda" works on my cheeks for blemishes but that's about it. I'm better served by carefully applying the foundation under my eyes than this concealer.
Made my undereyes look so old and wrinkled, I think its just too matte for my undereyes. I do like the coverage but not as hydrating for me, I guess it helped me to learn more about my skin as well.
I wanted to love this concealer but just didn’t. It felt chalky and a bit dry, somehow, even though it’s a liquid. Not horrible, but I won’t repurchase.

Sorry RiRi, but this concealer was the worst concealer I have had ever had. It is creasing terribly and is not covering properly, even right after applying. I bought it together with NARS concealer, and I can't even compare how good NARS is. There are a lot cheaper concealers in the market which are a hundred times better than this.
Extreme creasing and emphasizes dry patches and skin texture.

Great concealer that lasts all days and wears like a dream. It is perfectly wearable and blendable and lasts all day. Unfortunately, I have problematic skin so I have to use more than maybe the average user, and this concealer ran out way faster than others I've used in the past. It lasts about half as long as the Lancome concealer I have been using for years. I will be purchasing again though!

I waited a while before trying this concealer. It pairs perfectly with the foundation and setting powder! I honestly won’t go back to using anything else. It was everything for my skin. I’ve never had one that matched so well with my skin tone. Truly a game changer for those of color. Thank you RiRi!
reviews.review_title: Never going back to anything else!

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love but it's like chalk paint. It's wet, but it doesn't blend. The shades are also extremely yellow or yellow-orange, even the "cool" shades are orange. They don't look like actual skin colors and they definitely don't blend. I tried it with literally every primer and foundation combo but my under eyes don't have dark circles and I don't know how but this concealer created some. It was so weird. My makeup today never took so long to put on and I look like a cake-y mess.
This concealer is amazing! It has great staying power and blends well.
First I thought NARS was the best, then I thought Laura Mercier was the best but now I know that FENTY is concealer KING. The actual best. This product is amazing. Will never stop buying this!
Great unless you have any dry skin patches, then I would definitely avoid.
The first time i used this it was awesome, i had no issues and it had good lasting cover. My second bottle makes my skin burn. I bought it at JC Penny so it may be sitting on the shelf too long.
Very dry, leaves creases, pulls up foundation. Brightening but not worth it.

I am Rouge status but do not typically write reviews. This is an amazing product.  I have pretty good skin for my age so I don’t usually wear foundation, and have thrown away so many concealers because they make me look like a raccoon in reverse. My issue is dark under eyes, exacerbated by working very long hours that take a further toll on my eyes. This concealer is fabulous, melting into my skin to look totally natural. There are so many shades I was able to match perfectly, and it is creamy and moisturizing. Even hours later it is awesome. I highly recommend.
I bought this for a contour for dark skin but I think Huda’s tantour would be more suitable, it would work as a nice highlighter in the appropriate shade though.
Really great everyday concealer, the coverage definitely isn’t full but it has the right amount of coverage to hide any blemishes/red areas/dark circles
This formula is a bit too thick for my taste and it didn’t live up to my expectations based on how much I love the fenty foundation. I don’t like using it except under my eyes.
This concealer applies easily and is so smooth against the skin. It's full coverage without feeling too heavy
reviews.review_title: Full coverage and reasonably priced concealer

reviews.review_text: I try several different concealer this one is simplyy the best and priced great!!
good coverage but looks really cakey on your face. wouldn't recommend if you like to do light make up as I do.
The formula is top tier! Love it! The undertones can be weird do definitely recommend finding shade in person
So happy with this product and that Rihanna decided to create a makeup line that all people of all different shades can wear.
I've been using this product throughout the summer and I simply love it.
Love this concealer, it’s truly the best for my under eye creases. It doesn’t settle in, as long as you set it quickly. And super pigmented! I always get compliments and asked what concealer I use!

Absolutely love this concealer. Love the fact that it can be used for different purposes for many various shades (from light to dark). I use it to cover my dark spots, conceal under my eyes and clean up my eyebrows when I want that flawless look.
reviews.review_title: 1 of the top concealer’s out there.

reviews.review_text: Amazing. covers up everything so well and lasts all day.

I wanted to really, really, really fall in love with this concealer but I couldn't. The shade matched me well and was super high coverage, but as for 'creaseless', naw that isn't true. I tried everything to make this work, but for a product that claims to be creaseless and then settles into all my lines and wrinkles, I just can't give it 5 stars. I'm giving this product an extra star because of the shade range, honestly killing it. If you have wrinkles, even small ones like I have at 21 from late-night study sessions, and deep-set eyes there isn't enough setting powder in the world to make this not crease and non-cakey.
reviews.review_title: Tried to love it, but it creased

reviews.review_text: Concealer is very drying under eyes, creases badly

This concealer covers very well without feeling cakey. It claims that it is creaseproof but it’s definitely not. I didn’t expect this concealer to be creaseproof honestly as I’ve never been able to find a concealer that doesn’t crease in my fine lines under my eyes. Overall this is a great concealer but don’t buy if you’re looking for a concealer that doesn’t crease.

I LOVE this product.  I'm always hesitant to buy the higher end concealers because I have my cheaper brands that work for me.  I love the consistency of this concealer and it lasts me a long time.  I don't have creasing issues with this combined with a primer and powder.  I would definitely purchase again!
I love this concealer, it stays put and is think enough to really conceal my dark circles. Blends well with the beauty blender.
Love this!  It matched my skintone so well.  My new favorite.

I have been through it all when it comes to concealer, (nyx hd focus, urban decay naked, too faced born thia way, Kat Von D lock it, mac pump concealer, maybelline fit me, maybelline agre rewind, tarte shape tape, tarte rainforest of the sea) and I though that I was just going to have to live with concealer that either clung to my dry patches and texture, was a weird undertone, was too dark, or was too high coverage and made me look like a ghost. This concealer is buildable, it does not dry put my skin, their shade range is amazing (i have used 100 for an ultra brightening moment, and 110 for those days i want it to be a little less BAM). This also creases way less than any other concealer I've used (and once you set it it stays crease free all day), I am also super happy qith how long it wears. I have found the one for me, and its name is fenty.
reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life?

reviews.review_text: I recently started using the Fenty line and I love it. However, this concealer is not great. It’s medium coverage at best (IMO). I gave dark spots and it doesn’t do a great job at covering. I’ll stick with my NARS creamy concealer which provides way better coverage, especially for under eye.  But I love the Fenty Pro Filt’r Matte Foundation.

i’m super pale, so it’s hard to find a color light enough. i’ve been using this for about a year and the only problem i have is that it’s slightly drying. using moisturizer before fixes the problem tho
My new favorite concealer! Its full coverage...only one layer needed and I'm goodtttt! I will only buy this and born this way from now on.
I love this concealer, the fact that it actually matches the exact shade of the foundation is amazing.

Got this concealer to hide the few acne scars that I have and I'm never going back. I’ve never worn a concealer that matches my skin tone so well and helps me look quite so smooth. When I wear it people seem to doubt my scars (not that it's bad, but they're there). It's lightweight, and I love that the applicator is a small enough brush that I have a bit more control over the application process. The color blends seamlessly into my skin matching both my skin tone and undertone, which so far has been almost impossible to find.
I love this concealer.  Love the smooth texture and blend so well with my skin.
Gets the job done! Very pigmented but easy to blend. It’s so worth it!!

This concealer has quickly become my favorite go-to concealer! This concealer is very light weight, yet full coverage. I use two to three small dots. No need to cake on this concealer to reach full coverage. I actually find this concealer to be self setting and does not crease. To extend my makeup I will lightly set with powder. Shade 150 is my perfect concealer color! Neutral undertone concealers are so hard to find, most everything is either cool or warm. Very impressed with this concealer. Will be repurchasing in the future.

Color matched my skin very well, however it feels really thick and you have to be very careful when you use a brush underneath the concealer because I feel like the product transfers/moves very easily. I probably will be sticking to my Nars matte concealer.

I bought this after going in the store and asking for help finding a hydrating concealer that wouldn't settle into my lines, like so many of them do.  I tried it in store and it felt fine, and looked great--the shade was just right.  When I put it on this morning it was a different story.  I have what I guess some might call a dry-ish eye area, and a very low-maintenance skincare and make-up routine.  Concealer is something I wear on days when I am too tired for my tinted moisturizer to mask the dark circles.  I don't prime my face with primers, just facial oil.  This concealer is not for those with combination/dry skin and a no-fuss skin and make-up regimen.  I feel like for this to look good, I have to spend a lot of time prepping and moisturizing my skin with masks and other things that I just don't have the time for.  As it stands, this concealer separates, settles into my lines and pores, and is quite drying.  I am thirty and look about 5 years younger without makeup, but this aged my skin by about 10 years.  Not happy with this for my skin.  Going to try something moisturizing.

So I wear 170 for foundation but I thought I’d try two shades lighter for concealer just to see how it would turn out. The formula is thick, but still blendable. The issue I have with this concealer is that it’s not long wear. After a few hours it looks awful. The packaging is nice but I don’t recommend this.

I can’t seem to get a perfect match for my skin tone to my likely and my “matches” numbers jump all over but I really do like this concealer. Dries quickly so I just do spot coverage, but it blends nicely into the skin and does dry a bit matte. Overall I like it a lot!
Great blending and coverage but it creases. Also, it oxidizes after a while.
reviews.review_title: I really wanted to love this

reviews.review_text: Definitley get matched at a store Works really well! I only wish I had gotten it in a lighter shade for highlighting purposes.

I wanted sooo badly to like it but I absolutely hated it. Super drying and difficult to work with, and looks absolutely horrendous under the eyes. I usually set with Laura Mercier powder and it’s never failed me, but with this it just looked super cakey and dry, and creased within less than an hour. Also applying on my forehead caused me to breakout, but I do have slightly sensitive skin and the same happened with NARS creamy radiant
I got this to go with the 420 hydrating foundation and this was perfect for me. I really love the color and coverage that it gives me.

Love it! 
A little go a long way. 
Just make sure you have the right shade.

Great full coverage concealer. I wear this everyday to work with just blush and a little bit of powder highlighter and it's the perfect natural look for my work's low key vibe. Does a great job brightening up my eyes in the morning!
this is a great concealer. I love the coverage. I alternate between the colors because sometimes i need a little darker color depending on how much sun I get

I think I probably try EVERY concealer out their and I love this. Just match the number with the foundation number that matches your skin and you will be amazed. I also put it on and then tap it all over with my pinky then finish with Fenty’s concealer brush.
reviews.review_title: It’s Fenty, nothing more to say...

reviews.review_text: This concealer would oxidize on me. Loved the way it applied but not a good look in the middle of the day. Although there are many tones, none other matched me
My first time using concealer, I was very happy with the coverage and ease of blending it.
This product helped cover up my few blemishes perfectly.
This was suggested to me by an employee and it does brighten my (sleep deprived) under eye area.  It blends in with my skin tone well and doesn’t crease if I use a primer before application.
Very lite and easy to manipulate as you blend into skin! Love love love

Works beautifully with the Pro Filt’r Hydrating Foundation and sets nicely with the Fenty loose powder. Does dry down quite a bit, so it does emphasize my fine lines... I’m hoping Fenty releases a hydrating concealer to go with the foundation. That would be amazing!!! 

Gave it 3 stars since it does have an amazing shade range. Took off 2 stars since it dries down and emphasizes lines under the eyes, but works wonderfully to cover blemishes.
This foundation is wonderful. Gives you a natural smooth finish and feels great on your skin.
I gave it as a birthday gift to my cousin! The foundation and concealer look so good on her! And she really loves it!
Great concealer completely hides my dark under eye circles
Not a fan of this concealer. It creases lots under my eyes on my mature skin and it doesn’t last at all.
I love everything Fenty. My shade is 440 , got this and the 390. Love it. Hold up in the Florida heat
Don’t see much of a difference in coverage/color from the foundation. Maybe I need to go lighter? Will try & find out. I read some reviews saying it helped.
Great not too light feels comfortable on skin nice and matte

I’m only giving 3 stars because I like the concealer in some spots of my face. Anywhere besides my under eyes is fine, but for some reason it gets weird no matter if I use a primer or no primer under my eyes.
Creased and made my under eyes look cakey. Would not recommend.

I tried so hard to love this concealer but I just don't. The consistency is on the thicker side like Shape Tape, but it is so hard to blend so it doesn't have that same coverage effect for me. It always looks like it's just sitting on top of my face. So sad.
None

This is not a concealer I’d recommend for “no makeup makeup days”, but I do like it for contouring when I’m doing a full beat. It’s a very full coverage creamy formula, and as such it settles into fine lines and creases unless it’s set. I use the Lancôme powder to set my whole face and it doesn’t crease on me then. I don’t find it to look particularly drying on my oily skin, so much as it accentuates “crepeyness” on the undereyes and clings to dry spots and blemishes when put on bare skin. Though it’s the best shade match I’ve ever found, I would not spot conceal with this. However, when I’m doing a whole foundation and setting powder routine, I still find myself reaching for this for highlighting my undereyes, nose, and forehead because I really like how this texture blends out, even on top of pretty matte foundations.

I bought this product for my mother because she suffers from fairly dark circles. Though she is on the darker side, I wanted the concealer to be a perfect match to her skin. She doesn't wear foundation so this concealer was strictly for giving a seamless transition. I loveeeeed the shade range because it was easy to find just one concealer instead of purchasing two! FENTY DID IT AGAIN UGH!

i sampled this product and i’m so glad i didn’t buy the full size. after application and applying powder the concealer settled into my creases... applying setting spray helped it a little but after a full day of wearing it, my under eyes looked really cracked and dry, even tho i prepped my under eyes with an eye mask before applying concealer :/

I recently decided to try this concealer, as it has received pretty great reviews. I love the packaging and it seems that this concealer will last me a while! I had been used to the Too Faced Born This Way Multi-Use Sculpting Concealer so I wanted to switch things up. After applying the concealer to areas of need (under eyes and red areas), I used my makeup sponge and it appeared to blend very well. The color I chose is perfect for my skin - no yellow/orange tint to it either which I appreciate. I am giving this a 4 out of 5 because it appears that it does crease a bit toward the end of the day - whereas my old concealer did not. Maybe I need to apply it a different way, or put some more setting powder on it!

My eyes recently became dry and this concealer cakes and doesn't blend with a damp beauty blender. Instead the product lifts and cakes, leaving behind sponge marks. I have never experienced this with other concealers before. This concealer, however, when used with a brush is beautiful, and extremely full coverage for under eyes only. This will not cover up any acne or spot conceal, but the brightening effect is very beautiful. I am disappointed that I cannot use my beauty blender with this product, and my recent dry eyes have made this concealer impossible to use.
Coverage is medium and it creases after a couple minutes of wear. I set it with translucent powder but it still creases.
None
Love love! Blends so nicely. Hides my bags. Doesn’t crease much. By end of day a bit. Awesome.

First off, THANK YOU RIHANNA for all the shades!! I am a Bengali, tan skinned woman with heavy dark under eye circles. After trying HUNDREDS of concealers in the past 15  years, aside from my Nars concealer (shade “caramel”), this is the only concealer which has my shade! No more color correcting nor multiple color mixing needed! HALLELUJAH!!! I mean it almost feels like a dream, like whaaaat, is it actually possible that a makeup company has my shade?? Is this even real life..? That’s how I felt when I first tried this concealer. Nars has my shade too, but the problem with that concealer is that, it is not long lasting on me, even after I set it with powder. But this Fenty concealer (shade 360), OMG GUYS THIS CONCEALER IS EVERYTHING!! Not only does it match me PERFECTLY, but it LASTS ALL DAY. In fact, it looks BETTER throughout the day!!! However, please note that it only lasts when you set the under eye with the Fenty setting powder (shade “Banana”). Not any other other powder, not even the Laura Mercier one, but ONLY this one. And together, they truly become this miracle product! Don’t listen to the bad reviews guys. I feel like the bad reviews I have seen, is cause they don’t set this concealer with the Fenty powder, or they may set it using too much powder. But truly, if set the correct way, with the correct powder, this concealer performs amazingly! You’ll never wanna buy/try another concealer powder combo again!
reviews.review_title: WORKS AMAZINGLY WITH THE FENTY POWDER

reviews.review_text: I just had to write this review, I woke up after being too drunk and tired to remove my makeup and wash my face yesterday (terrible I know!!). But can I say that my undereyes still look smooth and flawless just like when I put this concealer on 14+ hours ago! Not a single crease or crack, literally just like how it looked yesterday after application. Yes my mascara has smeared sideways and my eyeshadow is almost gone but this concealer is ready for another day and almost makes me want to not wash it off now lol also wearing the new hydrating foundation formula and it’s stayed in place as well, no transfer to my pillow at all, and my highlighter still blinging like I just put it on too. Highly recommend anything Fenty, Riri I love you!!!!

Where the fenty foundation disappoints, this concealer definitely makes up for! I’ve been strictly nars for concealer (caramel) but I have to say I do prefer this. It’s a bit cheaper and also thicker so it covers my bags much better with less product, in fact I now use it instead of foundation because it blends so well into my skin. I do want to try the foundation again as I found the shade I bought to be too dark (410) especially since I find concealer shade 380 to be the perfect match for my skin rather than lighter for brightening. I had asked an employee to shade match, but once I told her I wore 410 she swatched it on me and said it matches..so I found that to be a bit useless. Regardless, great product.

I wear the 170 foundation and the Sephora employee told me to go with 190 for under the eye, weird since one is for cool tones while the other warm tones. Either way he was right, great feel, weightless but full coverage. I have oily skin and this didn't budge or cake.

This is my new, go to for concealers. I’ve tried several brands, with nothing really hiding my under eye puffiness or not creasing (because I laugh excessively). But this one did the job! RiRi does it again.

I’ve been using this concealer since February. I keep using it and continue to be slightly disappointed. Reading the rave reviews makes me feel like I’m doing something wrong. I blend it out with a damn beauty blender and set it with the fenty powder in butter. It looks amazing the first 30 mins, then starts to settle and crease under my eyes. And let me tell you I don’t have a lot of under eye wrinkles! As far as coverage it’s ok, not full coverage but definitely a medium coverage. I’ve used the shade in 150 and 120, and there is a noticeable difference in the consistency of the two. I don’t know if it’s a coincidence or a formula change, however I liked the thicker consistency. Is it a HG? No I think it’s time to find something else.
I love this concealer on days I don't want to wear a foundation. I mix 385 and 390 to get my perfect shade. This combo has lasted through concerts and walking around downtown.

So heavy and cakey - I don’t have fine lines or wrinkles around the eyes but this made it look like I did. I swear this aged me like 10+ years and I’m in my 20s. Very dry, thick formula that is opaque/high coverage. Maybe it’s the color molecules in this color (185) but it looked like sunscreen. It sat on top of my skin and was not blendible.

I hate to even write this given how much I respect Fenty Beauty as a brand, however I am for those who have fine lines, creases, or wrinkling under or around their eyes. This concealer in my experience accentuated every fine line under my eyes, and would not set and immediately crease upon application no matter what method I used. At first I thought it was simply the fault of my under eyes. However after trying different concealers (such as Too Faced’s Born This Way which I now love!) I had to accept that it was in fact the Fenty concealer. :( I definitely would not recommend if you have problematic under eyes as this will make them look crepey, but am leaving two stars for if you are using it elsewhere on your face as it IS creamy and on the thicker side which can be great for concealing blemishes, discoloration, etc. And in my opinion using concealer for under your eyes vs your face are two very different kinds of use!
This is a great concealer. No issues.. so blendable
Def for oily skin people- it’s matte but not THAT drying tbh. actually yes, it’s matte. it actually doesn’t crease as quick or bad as others and it’s med to full coverage

Wanted to give this concealer a try since I’ve loved all the fenty products so far. As always I am not dissatisfied this is perfect and you don’t need a lot of product to get the job done. definitely will be purchasing again.

I have been searching for a good concealer for 2 years and I finally landed with this one, by far the best I’ve tried. Granted concealers work different with all sorts of people, for me this is an amazing creamy & creaseless option, if you set it properly it’ll do you wonders.

I have wrinkles and creases on my face around and under my eyes, forehead, and laugh lines. I also have dark circles so I use concealer. At first, when using this concealer in those areas, I saw a lot of caking and creasing happening, which wasn't cute. It aged me! But then I saw a trick online for the laugh lines specifically to apply foundation or concealer first and then wipe away (in the creases specifically) with a Q-tip or something, and then blend with your finger. I've been using this trick every day and it has made a great difference! It is very noticeable when I forget to wipe my laugh lines. So I've applied the same technique to the other crease lines and wrinkles on my face when using this concealer and it works just fine. I also am a fan of natural looks so I find that less is more. The more concealer you use, the bigger the opportunity for caking. So be smart with how you apply this concealer and you'll be fine :)
reviews.review_title: Great concealer, if you know how to use it well :)

reviews.review_text: This concealer gets the job done but it is not anything amazing. For the price I expected more. It gets creasy after a while and sets into your lines under the eyes. Blends fine and the application is good holds a lot of product. Overall gets the job done, but not impressed.

I really like this!  

My experience with makeup has been really hit and miss. However, the staff at Sephora recommended this product after I went to the store looking for something else. In my quest to find the perfect product for me, I said why not. Boy am I glad I did. 

I used this for the first time for a photo shoot of all things. I received soooo many compliments about how flawless my makeup was. I love the fact that I didn’t have to keep touching up my makeup. I bought the matching foundation and setting powder. It’s an awesome combination. If you don’t mind the price and want a quality product, give it a try. 

What may not work for someone else may work for you.
reviews.review_title: I love it, even with the bad reviews.

reviews.review_text: bought this for my little sister and she loved it! she doesn't wear foundation but it still looked great on just her skin!

I love this concealer!  I have combination skin (dry and oily in different parts) and live in a climate with very hot humid weather (southern Texas).  I wear the Fenty Matte foundation in 190 for my summer tanned skin and the concealer is a perfect match (just light enough to brighten).  It is very thick so a little goes a LONG way.  I mix it with the Fenty primer.  Use a brush/finger to apply thene a wet sponge to blend out the edges.  Then set with a very small amount of powder on the sponge.  That combo gives me hydration and staying power all day.  I wear this on days when I don't feel like foundation and it works great.
reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_text:
Making this product work for me has been a little tricky.
Its too thick as an actual undereye concealer, and when to blend it out its sheer. I use this on the outer portion of my under eye and the center points on my face to highlight my foundation(fenty 150) and it works great! 
I still use good ol tarte shape tape directly on my dark eye bags though which is the product i was trying to replace when i bought this one lol. Guess its still my holy grail
reviews.review_title: highlighting concealer, not under eye concealer

reviews.review_text: None

It brightens my under eyes and other spots. It does match my complexion. However, when applying with my brush, sponge, or finger I have to use more of it than my previous product. I feel like it won't last me that long.
Okay. It drys up under my eyes. Not worth it. So many better concealers out there.

I have a pretty oily t zone but this sucked the life out of my skin. My undereyes creased before I even left my vanity. My undereyes looked dry and wrinkled all day. I’m as oily as the next guy but this was a no. Maybe for a totally different skin type?
It runs down my face when it’s hot/humid. Anything touch my face gets makeup on it.
Definitely full coverage. Wear on weekends or when going out! Oxidize as soon as it goes on

Product did not stay in place, despite two primers and a setting spray. I tried to apply this concealer different ways (blender, fingertips, and concealer brush) to see if it was just my method, also bought two new primers, and still could not get a full coverage look, or a non-cakey look. I used this with and without the Fenty foundation, and it was not seamless either way. This concealer also dried my skin out, and was so difficult to blend. Even after using Fenty’s setting powder, this product did not stay on my skin whatsoever. 
I returned it to Sephora and instead purchased Tarte’s creaseless concealer. 
I was disappointed by Fenty’s concealer and foundation and I really tried to make it work but my skin was not living for it.
None
None
None
Love this concealer! Great coverage and color match!

I’ve tried this concealer multiple times and just can’t seem to like it. I’ve tried really hard to like it but I just can’t. It took me forever to find my shade in it and when I found it I still didn’t really like it. I was excited when this concealer first came out but I’m really disappointed now. I feel like you could get a way better concealer from just the drug store. All my friends who have it don’t really like it either. I would just say save your money and buy something else because in my opinion this concealer isn’t worth buying because it’s not good at all.

Dark circles who?! I freaking loveeeeee this concealer. My only complaint is that i didn’t get multiple shades! I follow the majority of Jackie Aina’s concealer routine and this is the perfect base concealer. I have super oily skin and I don’t feel this made me greasy at all! If you haven’t already bought it what are you waiting for?!
It’s a little cakey on my skin and the color is way to light. But all in all it’s very good for the price
Easy application, blends well, and you don't need a lot of product. Using this concealer I find that I no longer need one to brighten first.

This is a beautiful concealer. I wish the foundation was as smooth and flawless as this concealer. I like wearing it as a primer for my eye shadow. I do not like wearing it underneath my eyes. I have dry skin and for me, this concealer magnifies the dry skin under my eye and shows lines that I never knew that I had before. Would I purchase this again? Probably not, I think it applies beautifully, its so smooth and looks great at at first, but this is not the best product for very someone with very dry skin.
It's a pretty good concealer but not for the under-eye area,  imo.

This stuff can cover your dark circles, anxiety, and your past!! Smooth and super easy to blend out. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars, is because it's very thick. I love full coverage, but I have to apply this VERY lightly. Maybe only about 3 small dots under my eyes. I suppose that means it'll last forever...

I have yet to find anything that can keep up with my smile lines and undereye lines (I'm 18 and I've dealt with them since I started wearing makeup). This does hold up the longest though. I'm extremely impressed and I use this along with the rest of the Pro Filt'r collection as a basis of quality for other brands.
if you have even the slightest dry skin type, do not get!! I have dry skin and the formula is made for oily skin. It will be dry your skin out and be flakey
reviews.review_title: Not recommend for dry skin types !!!!

reviews.review_text: I finally found a concealer that I’m in love with. I absolutely love the formula, because it’s not drying and it just looks and feels so natural. I use this as a foundation and even over my acne it’s good. But I love how it looks for my under eyes. Highly recommend!!

I have lines under my eyes and oily skin however, this concealer sunk immediately into my lines and dried up my under eyes. From reviews, I had heard that it was extremely full coverage but I just didn't find that to be the case.
reviews.review_title: Sunk into lines and dried me out!

reviews.review_text: None
The Sephora rep was spot on with suggesting this one and I love it - Great job Fenty

i love this concealer so so so much, it might be my new holy grail. but one thing that i don’t like about this concealer is that when you blend it out in your under-eye area, it settles in your creases on your bottom eyelid and it’s frustrating. but other than that, i love the concealer and it’s definitely full coverage so if you’re not a full coverage fan, i wouldn’t buy it. but if you are, then this is perfect for you!! i love the packaging too:)

This concealer is a game changer. I no longer have to wear foundation and it gives my skin an amazing glow. I tried to go back to some of my other concealers at a lower price point and the end result just wasn't the same. This concealer is a game-changer.
its really good and east to blend I would choose thos over my nars pot concealer

I grew very tired of my NARS’s radiant creamy concealer because of the dryness it left under my eyes (and it defined my bumps and lines). After purchasing this, I don’t think I’ll use any other concealer for under eyes for a long time. It lightens, conceals, and sets well. I wear this for work where it can get hot and sweaty, but I still go home looking nice after a long shift!!! I do set this with the fenty setting powder so that could add extra help (both smell heavenly!!!). Love it and will continue to use.
It's sad because the color is absolutely perfect for me. I've used up the whole bottle, but I just can't seem to make it work for me. It makes my skin look dry
This isn’t a good concealer for dry acne skin. Blends nicely but just not the best concealer for me.

Rihanna really decides to bless us!! This concealer is so amazing has the right amount of coverage for my under eyes! It’s not drying at all and in fact I just let it dry down for a lil bit before I blend it out!

I don’t like this product. There are some pros and cons. I feel like there is definitely false advertising with no-creasing. This concealer creases quite a lot. However the formula does brighten up your face. But it also settles into fine lines, overall I don’t recommend this product.
It covers the dark circles and dark spots on my face. I love this product. Thank you so much Rihanna ❤️

I am really impressed with this concealer.  It is a mix between Nars Radiant and Tarte Shape Tape.  The deal breaker for me between these 3 concealers is that Fenty came is the perfect shade for my skin.  Sometimes I just like to wear concealer down the middle of my face instead of a full face of foundation and the shade 250 matched my skin perfectly.  I couldn't even detect it in daylight; it blended in seamlessly into my skin.  I set this with Charlotte  Tilbury powder.  Like all concealers this did crease around my mouth so I took 1 star off for that.  Shout out to the Sephora make up artist who I was kind of hesitant to listen to because he looked like a punk rocker with multiple piercings and tattoos, but he was amazing and picked out the perfect shade for me.  I have combination, mostly oily skin.
Blends perfectly and looks amazing. I absolutely could not believe my eyes when I first put it on. I absolutely love the applicator. I also love the fact it’s the same number as my foundation!!

the coverage really isn't there. I am by no means a full coverage girl but I wanted to try something new and cheaper but I went back to my NARS creamy. This is better for the days I am having a really good skin day. BUT I will say this it is heat, humidity and sweat proof. I live in Miami and it is HOT. it didn't budge. So good formula but it's a medium coverage.

The product is good, I didn’t see any of the creasing that most people find with this product, but then again I only wore it once. What I didn’t like is that they use talc and fragrance in the product.
None
Absolutely living for it! Covers everything I need covered AND makes my skin look flawless!!
Amazing concealer. It stayed pretty true to color unlike the foundation that oxidizes terribly. I usually use this alone without anything else. This is a staple item for me.
There is nothing bad I could say about this concealer, it applies great, wears nicely, blends nicely, doesn't dry out your skin, and the shade range is incredible. The best of the best, honestly.
reviews.review_title: Never will I not have this with me

reviews.review_text: This product was recommended to me by a worker at Sephora when I went in completely clueless as to what I exactly wanted... The concealer works wonders for my oily skin, and the coverage is great throughout the day.
I love Rihanna and I love her concealer it give u a perfect arch and I just love it

Not enough coverage. I wanted to like this. I loved the foundation and everything else. but this did nothing for my dark eyes. I think people who aren't concerned with eye areas, and have oily skin, will fine this nice. 

I liked the smell and the price point. but it just didn't work for my oily skin.

coverage wasnt as full as promised, made my undereyes really cakey (and on a daily basis i dont tend to set my face i kinda just do everything in 5 mins), if you apply it on a blemish it accentuates it in a rlly weird way, and the worst of all i was with my friends and one of them was recording with flash and when i looked back at the footage the concealer looked WHITE !!! and i didnt set it with powder or wear anything on top of it so i know for a fact it was the actual concealer. i rlly wanted to like this but it just isnt very good.
None

I have never written a review for any product before, but I had to for this one. This is an amazing concealer! I have been using NARS for years, and there was nothing wrong with it, but I just felt like a change. I definitely upgraded! It is super long lasting without looking dry or cakey. I wore this for my best friend's wedding, and as I was doing some last minute touch ups, I dropped it the wand on my dress. It hit it in three spots. There I was five minutes before leaving to the wedding, in the bathroom scrubbing this concealer off my dress. (I was the maid of honor). It would NOT come off. So when they mean long-lasting, it truly is. I was able to minimally wash it off, but now it is a job for dry cleaning. So yes, this is a great product.
Not for me. Too drying and it looks patchy. Great color range though.

I’m officially in love with this concealer. I have extremely pale skin so finding products that match my skin tone is almost impossible. To make matters worse, I have very oily combo skin. Every other concealer that I have ever tried has been not quite the right color, transfers like crazy, creases really badly, accentuates my dry patches, and practically slides off of my face. I had been wanting to try this concealer for a while, because I absolutely love the Pro Filt’r foundation and  I’m so glad that I finally gave it a shot. This concealer almost doesn’t even have to be set. If my skin was slightly less oily I would have no problems with not setting it. Setting powder has become almost like a security blanket instead of a necessity. This concealer doesn’t budge. 

I love that it complements my foundation so well. I wear shade 100 in the Pro Filt’r foundation, and shade 100 compliments it beautifully. The concealer isn’t much lighter (which I love because if it was any lighter I would look like a ghost) but the undertone is slightly more pink in the concealer vs the more yellow undertone in the foundation, which I also love because it balances out my mixed undertones nicely. 

I would 100% recommend this to anyone who has problems (1) finding a concealer that works with their skin tone and (2) won’t budge, crease, transfer, or slide off all day long.

I Love this concealer! I suffer from hormonal acne and have a lot of dark spots on my face and this concealer covers it right up. I always apply it before foundation and the end result is amazing. This concealer is definitely a staple in my makeup routine!
Very cakey. You have to reapply often because it spreads out and gets splotchy. Otherwise, the color is perfect.
This concealer has a really good coverage and looks natural on your skin

Bought this concealer just to give it a try. I loved that the Fenty line had a large shade range to choose from, I was easily able to find the perfect shade for me. This concealer is  really a full coverage concealer which I love because I have hollow under eyes. I ended up returning the concealer only because I have dry skin
After buying so many different concealers this one is the first to apply smooth and provide coverage.

Great formula and great coverage. However not sure I would go with the true IQ color sephora recommended seems a bit too light for supposedly matching with my foundation. Will be going off of the Fenty website for color based off of my foundations color next time. But the product itself is wonderful! No issues with irritation or dryness on my skin.
None
Perfect conelar for the fenty foundation. Creasing is minimal.

I have been using this product for about 3 months now and I love it. I have combo skin with a very oily T zone. This concealer is the best I’ve used thus far. I spot conceal as well when I have a few blemishes. It’s very long lasting and the coverage is a medium to full. It covers my under eye circles and doesn’t cake up after a long day. I live in a very hot and humid environment. It still lasts through all my sweating throughout the day. I do not set it with power because my under eye area is on the dryer side. I use  this concealer on top of the hourglass primer. They’re an amazing combo.
I love that it matched my natural skin color but I found it very drying. At the end of the day my skin would be flakey on the small spots where I used it. I have combination skin.
I love this concealer!  It’s super full coverage.It’s the best for quick touch ups or anything really. It not cakey or anything and blends really well.!

I bought the Fenty concealer in shade 145 and the foundation in 140. They work AMAZING together. The concealer is medium coverage, it feels really light on the skin, as if you weren’t using makeup. The finish is matte but it isn’t dry, it gives you an amazing glow and natural look. No creasing, not cakey. I’ve worn it all the day in really hot and humid days and It stays for hours on my skin even if I sweat!
I have normal skin, but here in Spain the summer is intense and my skin gets super oily. 

I really recommend buying the concealer and the foundation of the line, they look BOMB together. Definitely the best foundation-concealer duo. 

I prefer applying them with a Beauty Blender rather than brushes, fingers or anything.

I also suggest going to a store and ask a Sephora girl to find your perfect shades.

Just BEAUTIFUL!
None

I love the shade range. This perfectly matches my skin tone/ However, I don't know if it's the Fenty concealer or the fact that I set it with the Fenty powder in the shade "Butter", but it makes one of the under-eye crease look even deeper and visible. It also seems to be patchy with the powder as well. Dries super fast. The picture is of my thigh, as you can see it makes creases more visible.
reviews.review_title: Doesn't hide creases for me and dries fast

reviews.review_text: What dark circles? This covers up everything. I love it!

I got caught in the influencer hype but this concealer does nothing that it claims to be.  It is not long-wearing and it is definitely not crease-proof.  Lesson learned is to wait for the unpaid influencer reviews.
Horrible clashed with my foundation so bad made my face look nasty within the hour definitely returning this product
I use this for contour. Dries very well, not too matte
This is the best concealer I’ve ever tried. It blends like a dream and when set with the butter setting powder it seriously looks flawless. I love it and continue to keep it in stock for myself!

This is the best concealer ever. Not too heavy and could cover my eyebags even if I just put a little bit. Sometimes when I don’t use foundation I just use this and it can 
cover all the dark spots basically everything!!!
Good coverage, but it’s very thick and kind of tacky. Sometimes it is hard to blend and it can be drying as it’s matte. Will finish my tube but won’t repurchase.

Color selection is great. I experienced some under eye creasing. I prefer to use it as a spot concealer/foundation but the product wears well at first then separates once my natural oils broke through. Maybe it’s my skin type or compatibility with other products but I wouldn’t repurchase
I am a shade 300 and have dark circle under my eyes and heavy acne scars. I went with a 280 to cover the super darkness of my problems and it works great. Super creamy and smooth to go on.

Fav concealer lately and I was alwayssss a NARS girl. I found that NARS has very peachy undertones whereas I am warm so I wanted a change. This concealer is CHEAPER and has MORE product than most other concealers out there! The wand is a good size and the color matches me perfectly, since it warms up my undereyes. It does dry quickly, so it works best with a wet beauty blender and working quickly. Doesn't break me out either! Will purchase again.

The silicone in this ruined my skin. I realized too late that this product is what caused the freckles on my skin during winter. As a pigmented, fairly dark Indian, I've never got freckles on my face till using this product. The color match? Perfect. Consistency? Extremely thick, to the point where I'm dabbing some with a seperate brush from the applicator. If you have sensitive skin, stay away from this OR only use it max once a week. It's not worth taking the risk for this, as much as I love my girl Rihanna

I am not sure how this got bad reviews. Maybe if you have oily skin or if your powder makes it oxidize? Anyway, I have dry undereyes and fine lines. Let me tell you when I say that my eyes were hydrated, no caking, no dryness, and it was almost no creasing! When I say creasing it was the slightest slightest amount even after 8 hours. I use the cover fx perfect powder with this and it was a dream come true I refuse to use anything else.

Bought this as soon as it released as i was in need of a new concealer and this is beautiful! If you want a buildable natural finish concealer, this is perfect! Blends so amazing and if you already own the foundation, selecting a color is so much easier!
reviews.review_title: Beautiful natural finish and easy color selection!

reviews.review_text: This is a great primer. It goes on nice and doesn’t crease under the eyes even after hours of wear. It is a little thicker than other primers that I have used in the past, so you don’t need to use too much product at once. I gave it 4 stars because I haven’t found an exact match yet. I wish there was a shade between 110 and 120 because I think that would be perfect for my skin tone!

I really enjoy using this concealer. It covers my dark circles and does not crease. I will say there's kind of a learning curve to this product. I usually let my Tarte shape tape dry a little before blending but this one i let dry a little longer, blend then apply a hair more and blend. I get full coverage and it really long lasting.

Easy to use with fingers, brush or sponge. Can use with or without setting powder. Creasing is minimal and you don't need to use a lot. However, it doesn't tend to last that long, so you do need to touch up throughout the day.

I tried to give to give this product the benefit of the doubt and tried it with many different types of foundations. But it makes my makeup look so Chalky and separated ! I love the fenty line and was very disappointed with the concealer . It made all of my imperfections so much more noticeable and made my dry patches 10 times worse . :( 10/10 disappointed
I'm fair skinned Korean and this matches perfectly, not caky, very smooth and covers awesomely.

I was pretty excited to try this concealer. Read the reviews and  watched a video by Rhianna herself applying it. Well, it definitely didnt work for me. It magnified my tired eyes and settled in the creases! After an hour or so after applying it, I looked like I had aged another 5 years!  I I tryed to switch it up, use less, go lighter etc... did not work. Very disappointed because it was pricey as well. I guess it's not for everyone. Will definitely not buy this again.

I really wanted to love this concealer ☹️ I use the fenty primer and wether I use my finger to apply or a beauty blender the results are the same, super caked and creased. I would stay far away if you already have ceases under your eyes, I’m 23 and it creates creases that aren’t even there. Even setting it doesn’t help sadly.
I love this concealer! It has full coverage and the consistency is excellent!
it Came off through out the day so I looked like a Dalmatian. Also when I put it under my eyes it automatically creases even when I set it right after. Highly disappointed. Would not recommend..
Great coverage and lovely soft formula, only reason it’s a 4 star and not 5 is that it creases unless set with powder.

I love this so much! It's super creamy, and blends in so well. It also sits really nicely on my undereye and doesn't dry it out at all like other concealers tend to do. I'd been using the Tarte shape tape, which I loved, but when I ran out I decided to give this a try and I'm not going back. I really appreciate the shade range--the lightest Tarte shade was both too yellow and too dark for me--but I was able to find a Fenty concealer that was an exact match for my super pale skin, and it wasn't even the lightest shade!

I have a hard time finding a concealer with the right undertones but this one is on the money. However the wear is not my favorite. Despite my best attempts it always creases. I have tried using less product, using more product, lightly setting with powder, baking with powder, etc. I’ve never had to try so hard to make a concealer work for me.
I don't want to give it a bad review because I really love Fenty and I am enjoying this concealer. But like the name say, it is mostly for retouch. for 35$ this is not THE one for me but it's nice.
The best concealer I’ve used to date! I put no primer or foundation under it and it still blended really easy and stayed that way all day, even through summer humidity and sweat! It’s so great!
This concealer is a bit better than the Fenty foundation. It blends more easily yet dries too fast. I like it but I don’t think I’ll be buying it again.

Love the product, its well known that it oxidizes, so be careful when color matching in stores. Has good coverage and can be used alone without foundation for light coverage. Doesn't dry fast like the foundation does and a little goes on a long way.
None
Thanks to Rihanna for creating another quality product. This concealer is everything and I can’t stop using it. Once again like all her products, she absolutely killed it with this formula
This foundation is over hyped , it looks so beautiful when you apply it , give it two hours it gets patchy and wears off ...

This is a pretty good concealer. Even without setting powder it doesn’t crease that much. I’d recommend blending it fast since It can dry down a little quickly. Also, I’d recommend prepping the under eyes with some moisturizer/light eye cream if you have dry skin, which is what I do since I am on the dryer side. Give it a try!

This is God sent! It’s feels like butter. The color is spot on! And because a little goes such a long way I’ve used this as all over foundation and it’s such a flawless look. I’m obsessed. I would highly recommend. I have super oily skin and this product doesn’t feel thick or greasy. It works well with my other drug store brand products and my name brand products. Will definitely buy again once this one is finished
Absolutely wonderful!!! I will not buy another  concealer after this! The shades are already light, then a nice setting powder blends everything in so nicely. 10/10 would recommend to anyone.

Literally the only make up I wear on the daily! Covers up my breakouts perfectly! Even some of my worst ones. Doesn't slide off my face during the day when I start to get oily. I literally just tap it onto my spots and apply a powder and I'm ready to run out the door! Only thing that sucks, its not meant for under eyes. It will clump to dry areas and separate leaving a crease. So far, my favourite concealer though

I love love love this concealer! I’m on my second bottle right now and I’d buy it again and again. I tried other concealers and there’s nothing like this one! It gives my oily, acne-prone with textured skin a natural look (better than most concealers I’ve tried). My only con is that it’s a little hard to blend with fingers but I use a brush or a sponge and it’s fine! You also have to work fast with this product. It’s very creamy and blends to a natural, flawless, Demi-matte finish. Just awesome! You did it again, FENTY!
Has a gel like consistency. Its a medium buildable coverage.Not a holy grail.
Amazing coverage. Goes on smoothly and last all day.

I really wish I didn’t love this concealer this much. This is a holy grail product now. It goes on so smooth, it doesn’t dry you out or make you oily. Trust me I care about the oil because I’m an oily gal. This has a medium satin finish. It just looks so natural.

I am giving this a bad review because the component is poorly executed. Mine shattered from a 1.5 foot fall. Glass was a poor choice for material. I am not a fan and wish I could get my money back since this happened 10 days after I purchased it.
As far as the concealer itself, It is pretty good. I feel its too heavy for my taste, but it is full coverage, it does seem to crease unfortunately. The color, however, is perfect. It is very nice that Fenty offers such a wide selection of shades.
reviews.review_title: Just really wish it wasn't glass

reviews.review_text: I accidentally wrote a foundation for the color 340, but that was the wrong shade! When I tell you that this shade is my 2nd skin? This concealer is absolutely amazing. I have to say that it honestly lasts longer than the Nars Radiant Creamy concealer (in Amande). Wow. I use this with tinted moisturizer, and I'm good for the day. I need to get the powder as well. I am so happy with this concealer. It literally matches my skin tone, like my entire face. I may get a different color to highlight underneath my eyes, but this concealer matches my forehead, cheeks, chin, etc. BUY THIS! If you have any doubts, just try it on in the store. Again, it lasts all day! This with either powder or setting spray, it really does stay on! It's light and the wand gives you a ton of concealer (like the Colourpop one)! I love mine forever!
reviews.review_title: This is the one I'm meant to have!

reviews.review_text: Doesn’t oxidize UNLIKE her foundation. It’s creamy and thin and it doesn’t have the best coverage but it’s good enough.

I was so excited to finally buy the fenty beauty line but when I received it I was super disappointed. I have really dry skin and this plus the foundation just clung to my dry parts and separated in different places. The concealer would lift all of the foundation with it and it was just in useable. I had to return. I would not recommend this product.

My go-to everyday concealer! The shade blends well with my very fair skin and does an excellent job of covering blemishes AND my VERY dark eye circles! The formula blends out great and I've never had a problem with creasing. Highly recommend for anyone who wants a buildable full coverage concealer.
Perfect match for my foundation, very smooth finish. I took away one star because it does eventually crease a little.

This is a great concealer! I saw this on an influencer’s post so I decided to try it. I haven’t had any issues with creasing and it lasts me all day. A little goes a long way. I would definitely repurchase.
reviews.review_title: A Little Goes a Long Way

reviews.review_text: None
Loved how product brightenedmy under eyes but creased every single time. I used primer, baking and setting spray. Not all at once but product failed each time.
None
Love it ! Really good product ! Feel good and really cover all !

I bought this in the same shade I own the foundation #310 and that was the right choice! 

I am a minimal makeup type of gal, usually just put on tinted primer   sunscreen, and then some concealer to cover up my dark eyes and spots! This concealer did the trick effortlessly. I applied with my fingers then used a brush to pick up any extra. 

I did notice a bit of cracking under the eye after wearing for a few hours but I was easily able to fix it with my fingers. 

I was wearing the NARS creamy concealer before this but I prefer this fenty shade and coverage more. Yay!

I don’t understand why it always does that, but everytime I use it, I get really cakey under my eyes. I don’t know if it’s because of my foundation that is dry when I put the concealer, but I always get spots with to much product and other with not enough and it’s impossible to correct it because it dries down so quickly.
Love the concealer.  Somewhat disappointed with the container, it fell off a shelf from about 1 and a half feet high and the top broke.

I was skeptical at first but this is honestly the best concealer I've tried. Out performs Nars and cover FX. Easy to blend and stay in place all day, no creasing. No longer tryinh any other concealers!
Love how seamlessly this concealer blends! The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because my foundation color is 250 so I went with the 220 concealer but I think it's still too dark.
Coverage. Application, Shade, Blending...Are PERFECT!

I'm a 290 with the foundation but it's worth trying the concealer before buying, I went a shade up and it's perfect! The 290 concealer is too ashy on me. I love the consistency and using both products together is a dream!
reviews.review_title: You might be a different shade than the foundation

reviews.review_text: I thought I have already write a review for this concealer a few days after I bought the item but I guess I didn't. I bought this concealer since I needed one. I have a bad case of dark circles and bags under my eyes so I apply this concealer underneath my eyes. At first glance, it does cover up well however, I could still see the dark circles around the edges. I am still a newbie to applying makeup and foundation on my face. Although, I am getting better at the eyeliner part as well as the eyeshadow. I thought this product did a good job on covering up the dark circles.
Great product for people with freckles because it’s buildable...and if used with the foundation it still wouldn’t cover freckles unless you wanted it to
Color seemed to be too dark.  It was darker than the foundation.
Super silky and light formula! I love the way it feels on my face and I now use it as an everyday concealer.
It is perfect concealer it made my make up gorgeous
Blends well with my complexion. Very natural and it doesn’t have a red undertone.
Not as much coverage as I was hoping for. I actually have to double up with my NYX concealer to make my dark circles disappear.
Blends in nicely, I mainly use it for the corners of my mouth to hard my dark spots. One stroke is all it takes

I was actually advised by a Sephora employee not to buy this because it was pretty matte and she wanted me to glow. I went against her advice and I am so glad I did. For me, concealer is to cover and to hold, not to highlight. This concealer covers and holds. I use it on any pimples, red marks, and under my eyes. It stays all night with no primer. I am able to often just wear that and no foundation for a light makeup day, and it looks like I have flawless skin. It is the perfect consistency, not too runny but not too sticky. Also, with so many shades, it would be hard to mess up coverage.

This concealer is so great with Fenty and other foundation. I will say you do need to know how to use the foundation to be able to know how to use the concealer. This is the exact same fourmula to the foundation so if you don't like how matte the foundation you might not like this. It's very pigmented and covers my eyelids and my under-eyes. It's a great base for my eyelids and eyeshadow. Overall a 10/10 on this concealer!!!
Best concealer I have ever used! I love the coverage! It’s so smooth and stays in place!
I love this because it last all day without getting too cakey but one thing I don’t like is that it sticks to my dry patches which is not great

this is my ride or die concealer. my skin is oily, and I'm usually fair but with a tan, color 270 is perfect. it has peach undertones that help cancel out my dark circles and uneven skin tone. its a little thick and sets quickly. I still use powder since my skin is so oily throughout the day but it does set well without out powder. I'm on my second bottle and plan on buying another.

Love this concealer!  I was a little worried because I didn't have the best luck with the Fenty Primer or Foundation and ended up returning both.  The concealer was so different for me; it blended effortlessly with my finger as well as a sponge or a brush.  There are so many different shades to choose from too!  Another thing I love about this is that it is so buildable.  Lots of other concealers that have a cult following and that I like to use too like Tarte Shape Tape tend to be a little on the heavy side and I actually enjoy in the consistency of the Fenty because you can use it heavier and lighter depending on what you're trying to conceal or highlight.

I definitely got the wrong shade but it like clumps and sticks and sticks to dry spot ive tried everything and will continue to try more things cause i will use my moneys worth but i will not purchase again. Her lip products slap tho
Not a fan, the coverage isn't terrible and it blends pretty nicely. However it creases a lot!!! even if you set it with an amazing under eye powder it still creases. Some darkness still peaks through

So sad! I love Fenty beauty’s foundation and powder but this concealer was a miss. It dried instantly and was hard to blend. Whenever I tried blending it the formula would ball up and became a gel texture. Im not sure if it’s not meant for dry skin or not but I’ve been testing it for months and nothing has changed.

Meh. Daily, I go for glowy, natural, minimal makeup. This product does not work for that. Impossible to sheer this product out without it getting patchy and clinging to dry spots. If I'm doing a full beat and really packing this on, it works fine. Not for me.
Hides everything! I have deep dark circles and covers them perfectly!
Product is very thick and good for brightening but hard to blend for lighter coverage.
The only drawback is that it makes your skin look very dry if you have even slightly dry skin. Would probably work really well on people with more oily skin!

I have been using this for a month now (after using my holy grail tarte rainforest of the sea) and I must admit I am disappointed. The texture is almost too thick and it creases unlike any other. I will use this up and go back to my HG.
Really good concealor. Very nice highlight to 300 foundation. I usually have very dark circles from afternoon short shifting from 4pm-12am and then back at 8am-4pm.

Amazing coverage! I use this only and pass on the foundations because I don’t like a ton of make up on my face. I have a lot of acne scars and this color blends perfectly with my skin tone. It has a nice matte finish and the powder helps secure that. My face gets oily towards the end of the day but I just dust with a translucent powder. I hope Rihanna never stops making makeup because I don’t see myself finding anything better on the market!
Not sure what the hype is with Fenty products. This concealer didn’t blend at all and moved all of my foundation. It was dry and made my under eyes look crusty.

Okay I have 3 shades of this concealer for my winter and summer color. In the winter I use 430 to highlight and 440 to conceal; In the summer I use 440 to highlight and 445 to conceal. Overall I love these concealers. They don't sit heavy on my skin, they melt in beautifully and the guess work of finding your perfect color is removed. Your dark spot concealer is the same as your foundation! I swear this whole line just make me over the moon happy and all of her products play well for a flawless look. 

I highly recommend and if you don't love these at first application, what her informational videos on how to apply and I think you will be converted to a Fenty lover after.

Nothing special. Is a little cakie when you first put it on. In this case, thankfully I have oily skin so after about an hour it starts looking good. After about 6-8 hours it does start showing your even tiniest wrinkles. There are definitely better concealers out there and I probably won’t be purchasing this again.

I really wanted to love this concealer. It creases so much within minutes after application. I’m a bit drier around my eyes so this gave me an even drier look. I love how there’s many color options though. I was able to find an exact match and a color slightly lighter to brighten my eyes. If you have dry skin I would look into another product.
reviews.review_title: AVOID IF YOU HAVE DRY SKIN

reviews.review_text: I’m pleasantly surprised ! It’s so creamy and blends perfectly with my skin . It’s a little dark so I mix a little colourpop concealer and it works amazing!!!

I ordered a sample with multiple colors. It works amazing when covering the blemish and redness. It’s 100% coverage and it melts into your foundation with no show on skin. Very impressive. 

If you use this under your eye, it might be too quick-drying that it settles before you dab. So always apply one eye and dab it before processing with another eye. Otherwise it dried out in a second. 

Tip: I found this concealer works best when applying using finger tips because the temperature of your skin will melt it a little bit and makes it smoother when covering any imperfection. 

(I have tried many main-stream-brand concealer but no one covers as perfect as this one. Definitely a go-to product if you would like a flawless skin.
reviews.review_title: Amazing Coverage and use your finger tips!

reviews.review_text: Lately I have been in love with Fenty products! I have tried so many concealers, high end, drugstore and in between, from LA girl to Lancome, but I have to say the Fenty is downright amazing and the choice
Cracks at the end of the day mild coverage
Very Creasy. I did apply a setting powder on top so perhaps it was the combination? Not sure. The coverage is Excellent so worth trying on your skin to see if it will crease.
Full coverage but no matter what I did it just creased me. It would also settle in to my pores and just exaggerate them.

This concealer blends really well and it looks really nice, but after about an hour (I have EXTREMELY oily skin) I can see my nose getting shiny and the Fenty setting powder does not help. I love riri and I was expecting so much more from this concealer. I'd say it would work good for normal to dry skin.

I don’t like this concealer. It’s really heavy and really sticky and creases VERY badly. I used it with the Fenty foundation and found that every single time I used it, it moved the foundation. I first noticed that it creased super badly in my eyelids because I always use concealer to prime my eyelids. I couldn’t set it fast enough.
