I’d have to reblend it and look down and immediately set it because it I looked straight it would crease within .2 seconds. I don’t consider it a really “blend able” concealer. It’s not terrible but I don’t like it.

I wanted to love this product soo much from all the raving reviews, but it just didn’t exceed my expectations! 
Pros: 
-There are so many amazing shade to choose from!
-The concealer itself does go on very light weight with a good coverage that doesn’t look caked on like many full coverage concealers do.

Con:
-Within a couple hours of wearing this concealer, you notice it begin to crease immensely, and it starts to almost give you that “my concealer is melting look”. And mind you, I’m not in a sweaty or hot environment when I notice consistently happening.
Sorry RhiRhi! I wanted to love it, but tape shape- my ride or die concealer, I’m coming back to ya!
reviews.review_title: I wish I could’ve loved it!

reviews.review_text: This has become my new favorite concealer. I have dark spots and circles and this concealer coupled with my color corrector gives a naturally radiant look.

It’s not the best concealer I’ve ever used, but it is no where near the worst. It gets the job done, but it still creases quite a bit under my eyes, and I very rarely have that issue with concealers. I’ve found the best way to make it work is to dab a little bit on the back of your hand to warm it up and apply from there.
Ive been looking for a concealer that hides my blemishes/acne and has a nice texture, and this one is it! The price is worth it in my opinon. Will be buying more in the future
Good coverage but very thick and settled in fine lines almost immediately. Not impressed unfortunately.

Really great concealer. I’ve been searching for a while. I’ve tried Nars, Tarte and Milk and the Fenty concealer has the BEST coverage I’ve seen. I have dark circles under my eyes and this product is great for that. Was a little hesitant on how thick it is but the product didn’t get dried out throughout the day. I got a girl working to colour match me and she was able to find me a shade that not only covered up the dark circles but brightened them. Definitely recommend.

So far loving it I’ve had it for 3 months now going on four and wear makeup everyday and it has held up and really stays when you allow it to dry in spots where you wanna hide dark scars on your face then apply foundation, it really hides the scars. I got a shade slightly warmer than my foundation because I noticed if I use lighter concealers with my foundation then I look like a white under-eyes corpse by the end of the day and this really helps if you’re going for a more natural appearance instead of highlighting your under eyes and face.

Love this concealer for brightening under my eyes! The only my problem I had was when I use it to cover my red spots, acne scars and occasional blemish. By the end of the day the areas I would put the concealer would look dry and flaky.
I have very dry skin, especially dry undereyes and this is the only concealer that doesn’t bunch up or look crusty or bad, it blends easily and is a great formula.
Some how made my undereyes gray and MORE noticeable. But anywhere else on my face where I used the concealer it did have a nice finish and felt comfortable.

Loved the product at first - now (about 4 months into owning it) it has started to smell oddly like paint. Container states that it expires after 12 months but I’m hesitant to put something with that smell on my face.
Im not a fan of the concealer and the foundation. will not buy again, its very hard to use and you need time and patiences to make this look flawless

This was the worst concealer I’ve ever tried. After maybe 30 seconds of it being on my face it broke apart and made my skin look like I had dry patches in that area. Yes I moisturize and use primer. Would not recommend!
reviews.review_title: Drug store has way better options

reviews.review_text:
I love Fenty Beauty, and have had this concealer for almost a month now. I enjoyed it very much at first, but I’m now noticing a slight issue. This could be a number of different things, it may not even be the product itself. But I’ve found it makes the areas under my eyes somewhat patchy. I wouldn’t mind it if it wasn’t as noticeable as it is. At first I thought it was my setting powder but that doesn’t seem to be the case. Even without setting powder it applies a little patchy. 
Nothing against Fenty! Again it could be a number of different things like dryness under my eyes. Who knows? But overall slightly disappointed.

I think this is a great concealer. It’s nice and full coverage without being cakey and it has a great shade range. You can match your exact skin or go lighter to brighten. It blends well with many foundations I have used and all and all it does what it says. Bye bye dark spots and circles!

Love this foundation - it goes on seamlessly and makes my skin still look glowy. I always get compliments on my skin when I wear this foundation, and somehow still manages to provide a decent coverage. I think it oxidizes ever so slightly, but it doesn't look bad at all. Overall one of my favorite go-to foundations. I always have to have it in my makeup bag.

The one thing I really loved about this concealer is that it was a perfect match to my skin tone. But, I really struggled to get it to work for me.

First, it didn't really cover much. If you have perfect skin with zero blemishes, it will offer some coverage. Pimples? Nope. Dark circles? Barely. Redness? Kind of...but meh. Sometimes, it almost made the bumpy pimples worse. Not only did it fail to cover the pimple, it clung oddly to any bits of dry skin around the blemish to make it stand out more!

Second, sometimes it appeared to TAKE OFF MY FOUNDATION. I would use the wand to dab a bit on a blemish, use a blending sponge to blend, and there would be this spot that looked like I had taken makeup remover to it. What?! I finally figured I had to spray the blending sponge with setting spray, wipe the concealer on the sponge, and then blend it out, but it still took foundation off and left a makeup-less streak on my face. Is it something with the wand? I have no clue. But if you don't apply it just right, your face is going to look strange.

This strange foundation removing concealer phenomenon occurred so frequently, I had to use an insane amount of product to "fix" the makeup-less splotches. 

The formula is ultra-creamy, smells nice, and does last a long time if you can manage to apply it without making things worse, but I think that's all this concealer has going for it!

I love this brand so I really wanted to love this product. I have pretty dry skin and this patched up and clung to my dry spots like no other. If you have dry skin, I do not recommend this. It also dries extremely quickly so go a little at a time. I had to give this one away :( love you riri, id love to see a fenty concealer aimed toward dry skin
Didn’t work for me at all. Creased like crazy and left my skin looking splotchy and textured. It didn’t matter how I applied it or what else I tried, it just looked completely absurd on me.
this concealer is sooo full coverage BUT so lightweight!!! i can just walk out the door with just this concealer and look so awake and alive haha! the best concealer i’ve ever purchased

This concealer is it! It blends well with the Fenty Foundation and worked well blended with my tarte foundation too! Really do love this concealer and made me feel more confident with just a little bit of concealer and mascara!

Was excited for this since I have the other concealer, however it really dried out my under eyes, works best for people with oily under eyes. Makes me feel more cakey too because of that. But it has great coverage.

I liked this more than Nars Radiant and Creamy concealer. It is more quick-drying than Nars and stays put. It was lighter than I am used to-I don't have the desire for extreme highlighting but was definitely brightening enough (I use fenty 430 foundation).

Got a sample, applied it as contour in the morning and at the end of the day I had 3 small pimples - one on my forehead and one on each cheek. Didn't work for my skin. And I'm not sure if it was just bc I was using the sample size but the texture was quite sticky, I didn't care for that either.

I love this concealer. It is the perfect highlighter. FENTY recommends that you use your foundation shade, so I did. I loved it. I tried to use a slightly lighter one, but I was not a fan of the flash back. Works great with Fenty's nutmeg setting powder.

I had bought this concealer in hopes of it living up to its claims of being crease proof but was sadly disappointed upon seeing my under eyes creasing so much! I have fine lines under my eyes that are usually not as prominent when I conceal and bake but no matter what I did with this concealer it would crease and settle into my fine lines. Maybe the concealer was too emollient for my under eyes 
:(

One of the best concealers I’ve ever tried it’s one of my top 3 I would repurchase until don’t make it anymore totally recommend. If you are new make up it might be a little hard to use at first but don’t give up you’ll end up falling in love.

Love this concealer. My second fav concealer ever. It’s right up there with my holy grail Nars creamy radiant. Great lasting coverage and the perfect color. I wish this was the same color in the foundation. Then I’d have a Fenty foundation shade that works. I plan on getting a subtle highlighting shade in the future.

This is by far the best concealer I have ever used. No creasing and it stays put all day. Fenty has made it so easy to purchase because it is the same number as the foundation. I am very pleased with my purchase and will never buy another brand concealer.

PRODUCT IS EXCELLENT!
It's like Shape Tape? Who?
It's like everything Nars creamy radiance wish it could be and more...
BUT...
I truly think this is more of a concealer for acne and hyperpigmentation than it would be for undereyes. This product is dense and dry, perfect for getting a nice opaque coverage, but I could see how it would make micro wrinkles show up under the eyes.
I will say...this product loses MAJOR points for not even being close to the 130 pro filter foundation. I have to return it on the fact that it's like, bright pink, and I'm a warm.

This concealer is a staple part of of my makeup routine. It’s easy to use blends well, and stays put so I can slay all day!! A little goes a long way and it blends well with the Pro’Filter foundation. This product is a good buy!

I honestly did like this concealer at first, but after a while I felt like this concealer got too sticky for my liking when I was putting it on and blending it. I would also stick on places of my face where I didn't want to get sticky. So I am a little iffy with this concealer. It has the perfect color for me but I have tried better.
This provides full coverage.  It is thick.  Unfortunately, It made me break out in the places I applied it after the first day.  If you are acne prone, just be aware this may happen.

Kudos to Rihanna for creating Fenty. Be careful in chosing the correct color for your skin tone. The product oxidizes so you may want to test it and let it sit for a coupe of minutes as it does become a tab darker.

I can never find a shade light enough and or without a yellow tint to it but this product suits me perfectly. A little goes a long way and I love the formula nice and smooth but not heavy. It’s a bit expensive but definitely a must have.

Now I’m fully aware I don’t have skin (or money) like Rihanna so I know this concealer isn’t going to sit the same on my acne,dry spots,visible pores looking skin. It’s not full coverage so I have to use the setting powder first THEN apply my 430foundation and concealer. I will say to add another primer instead of ONLY using the fenty one. Maybe the one by benefit(the pore less one) 
I even used this by itself under my foundation as a spot corrector. This concealer is a “tour skin but better” product so you must have a really great skin care routine to pull this off. Or be blessed with great skin like Ms.Fenty
Love the foundation, not the concealer. Does not go on smooth, streaky. Great color bad feel. Her cover sticks are much better
reviews.review_title: Love the foundation not the concealer

reviews.review_text: Great coverage. Blends well
Too thick for using it under eye and it is hard to blend well on top of most of my foundations. But it does provide a high coverage. I’ll keep trying it but won’t be my go-to concealer.

I usually have pretty oily skin and other concealers I have tried break down during the day. This one literally stays on all day and looks so good! I use it with the tatcha skin canvas and my has never looked so clear
Great product. Not heavy.
I bought to cover up a dark spot I had. Comes right off, even after giving it time to dry and adding set powder. I feel cheated on price.
Love this concealer!
I am disappointed in this concealer. I does not go on smoothly. It seems like it’s old. I will not purchase this again.
This applies and stays on really well! The colormatch was perfect and I really enjoy this with or without foundation. It is extremely full coverage as well.

This is a pretty good concealer, however, it does get patchy throughout the day— this is mostly because I have pretty dry skin and can easily be fixed with a hydrating primer, but it is still matte. It creases as much as any good concealer would, and the coverage is pretty good as well. I bought a shade that is now way too light for me, so I can only use it in the winter:(
I absolutely love this concealer

rihanna went just as hard with her concealer as she did with her foundation! covers SO well, matches foundation beautifully, blends out well and lasts all day. it's my new favorite concealer! i got the same color as my foundation and would recommend doing the same to others, unless you want something lighter to brighten under your eyes. it's so creamy and good, 10/10
I Would definitely Recommend! It’s so easy to apply and it lasts a while.
Love this concealer. It really goes well with my Fenty foundation. It does a good job to cover my acne scars.

It's a matte finish medium to buildable and last all day. I have combo skin and it's amazing for me but if you have lines or dry skin under your eye this would not be the concealer for you. For the rest of my review go check out my YouTube  channel  Kayla B.
Beautiful love it!  Don’t forget it oxidizes and to get the foundation color of your neck and then a few shades lighter then that for your concealer
Great, creamy concealer for combo/oily skin! Has awesome coverage but you will need to apply two coats for stubborn marks.
Love it like it beautiful  product
I love this concealer! It is the best I have ever used. Full coverage and a little goes a long way!

I love love love this concealer! I don't wear a lot of makeup in my daily routine and this concealer is perfect for underage and hiding a few marks to even my skin tone. I like the creamy texture and delicate application brush. A
reviews.review_title: The best concealer I have ever purchased

reviews.review_text: I was a little weary to try this when I heard it was dry. I have really dry under eyes. But honestly, this has become my favorite concealer over my usual- NARS. It can be a little dry and at first it goes on almost a little ashy but then as you blend it out and it starts to warm to your skin, it starts to appear closer to how its discribed, which is warm. It does oxidize, just a little, which I hear her foundation does too. It gets about a half shade darker than it appears at first, which I actually don't mind, because then the ashiness disappears and its closer to the color I'd really like it to be (like if Pro'Filter came in 330.5 in addition to 330). All in all, would continue to buy. Just make sure if you have a dry under eye area, you really moisturize and prime. (would definitely use with a dewy or non-matte primer if you have dryness issues)
reviews.review_title: Looks unclockable, but does oxidize a little!

reviews.review_text: Such a nice lit-from-within finish. Not cakes at all
Absolutely love this. It has a beautiful natural finish and great coverage. Comparable to Nars but a little bit thicker

I spent so much time trying to find a concealer that worked with my dry and fair skin. After spending SO much time testing other brands' concealer, I finally stumbled upon Fenty's. I thought I would hate this formula but I actually really like it! It works perfectly for spot concealing and blends super well with my finger. The only place I have trouble is under my eyes. I have a hard time blending it and spreading it out. It also tends to emphasize my dry skin there. If it worked better for my under eye area then it would definitely have 5 stars!

I am pretty fair skin, but I was looking for something similar to my skin tone. Personally, I dont have a foundation shade with fenty unless I mix foundation, so I went with 120 at first for the concealer, but 140 is my perfect match for undertone. I love using it without foundation to conceal under my eyes and go about my day with minimal makeup. It is not too dry, or not for me personally, and the finish look really nice.
While this still gives me the brightening benefit of an under-eye concealer, it certainly isn’t crease proof. I love the foundation but this isn’t worth the added cost.

This concealer isn’t my favourite. As someone with dark under eye circles, I’m always on the hunt for the next best concealer. I found that using this on its own did not give great coverage, even if just put on top of blemishes. I now just use it to touch up my main concealer if I need because I have so much of it left over. Good for minimal coverage if you don’t break out much and don’t have dark circles.

I really wanted to love this. It is ok.. but that is it. This color combined with the shadow under my eye turned a weird grey. I could have probably used a color corrector but who want to go through that trouble every morning?

I wanted to like this product because I had tried the foundation and loved it. I have very pale skin so the colour chosen seemed good. However, the application was difficult and uneven. A concealer should slip on easily, without drag but it was not the case here. The product also started to pill up after I patted a bit of foundation over it. Not recommended.
This concealer is so nice! Does a GREAT job at concealing my dark circles!
It is pretty hard to blend very dry. I am going to return it.

I was so excited to try this concealer. Most of the reviews I had seen were raving, and all the claims on this concealer made me think it would be a perfect match. I just got it yesterday, and after trying it once, I am so disappointed. This is honestly the worst concealer I have ever put on my face. It made my under eyes look scaley- and I don’t have particularly dry skin! It barely covered my dark circles, and it made my skin itch from how dry it was. I am returning this. If you have any dryness whatsoever on your face, stay away from this concealer!
This works well as a heavy concealer. I don’t use it under my eyes, but if I have a blemish it covers it up. The color selection is wonderful.
I love fenty products but this concealer is not the one
Another beautiful finish that isn't for my skin type. I am dry, and this dried out my under eyes. Works best for oily skin.

I wore this for the first time and my friends instantly complimented me that my makeup looked so good and fresh but they couldn’t put their finger on it. I used it as concealer on top of my fenty foundation as highlight (under my eyes Cupid’s bow chin and forehead) it did get a Little  cakey at the end of the day but I need a primer and setting sprays I work long hours.
Works well for me used as undereye brightener. I use 150 in foundation. Not Creasy or cakey but must be set. Seems lighter and easier to wear than shape tape.

I have combination oily/dry skin. This concealer works great for me and a little really does go a long way. I don’t have to dip the wand back into the bottle for more. It doesn’t emphasize my dry spots.

This concealer has great coverage and feels great when being applied, but no matter how little I use, it always looks cakey and when it “dries” down, it is still super sticky and heavy feeling. I tried not setting it and tapping it in with my fingers and with her setting powder (which I love) and it just always leaves me with a bad makeup day wherever I apply it and heavily ages me. (I’m 20...)

I’ve been using the Mac prolong wear concealer for as long as I can remember and I decided to branch out and try something new. This concealer is definitely NOT crease proof. Within two hours of wear you could see all the fine lines under my eyes. My eyes also tend to water and the concealer would build up in patches close to my tear ducts. Another thing I didn’t like about it was that it gives crazy flashback in pictures! NOT CUTE.

Only good thing about it was the shade range! The medium neutral was truly neutral and matched my skin perfectly. The colour did not oxidize at all. Sadly had to return!

SHE’S A THICC GIRL. This concealer is hella full coverage without feeling Cakey. I put a little bit of this on and my skin looked FLAWLESS. It was able to cover all of my redness, blemishes and my raccoon like dark circles. She’s a thicc girl but easy to blend. I loveeee this concealer !!!
Would not recommend this to people who struggle with dry skin and acne.
reviews.review_title: Don't purchase this item if you have acne and dry

reviews.review_text: This concealer hides mistakes, insecurities, and lack of sleep! Super light and great bright, natural coverage!

concealer has great coverage! i usually wear a cc cream and concealer and powder for the day but sometimes i just use concealer and this one does the job! it is a little bit drying, especially under the eyes but it’s not awful
Love this so much. Super creamy, does t crease, nice coverage an can be built up if wanted.
Not my favorite, but I bought it to give it a try

This looked good when I tried it on in the store but I found that it settled into fine lines used with the powder and was way too drying for my under eye area. The cracks it left as the day progresses looked really bad.

This concealer has become my holy grail! It's the perfect consistency and feels light on the face, yet is extremely high coverage. I got a slightly lighter color to highlight my face, and it does wonders! I highly recommend this concealer!

This little guy is such a game changer. I first got the same color to match with my summer foundation 210, just for touch ups through the day. However I started wanting to get more dimension for under my eyes and switched to a lighter concealer color 180 - huge improvement! It blends so well and feels very light with long lasting wear. It really gives you a flawless, creamy look.

I absolutely love this concealer. I have a hard time finding one that fits my complexion and feels nice on my skin. Since my skin is considered very fair with cool undertones, a good concealer that has good coverage and is not really yellow toned is hard to find.
Enjoy that it is NOT matte! Blends really nicely, i have two colours—one for correcting my hyper pigmentation and one for highlight and I love them both. I will definitely be repurchasing.
The color is perfect, but the formula is not. It creases almost immediately. Unwearable.

Without a doubt my new go to concealer. Not entirely full coverage. More of a medium. But I usually always double up on my under eyes anyway so not a negative in my book. I set with the Fenty powder and the two together work miracles! Amazingly smooth and creamy! Blends like a dream. Really works great for oily skin! My new go to!

this product makes my 19 year old skin look incredibly aged. I have young looking eyes, no deep lines/wrinkles and what not but wow did it ever enhance what i thought i didn’t have. such an overhyped product but extremely drying and gets patchy no matter what setting powder i use. 
 
on a positive note, the coverage is nice.

I wanted something that was buildable coverage, wouldn't overly dry out my undereye to produce texture, still matte, yet hydrating, but not too hydrating so it wouldn't crease crazy. This is it!!! The color is very good and brightens up enough for me not to look dead at work. I would say the description is spot on. It's on the matte side but still gives you the moisture you need so you don't crease as much or not at all. (I still crease a lil cause I have horrible under eye fine lines but this is the LEAST creasing I've ever experienced!) Plus cause of that Demi matte consistency you don't get the texture! It is buildable coverage a little goes a long way. The matching system for concealer from the foundation helps you get closer to the shade that will match you, highlight you or contour you very easily. Just a lil research from my foundation shade in the Fenty and the color swatch on the photos of the arms for the concealer led me to my perfect match in 235 for the concealer. I currently have 230 in the foundation which was my closest match but not exact I believe the 235 is one of  the newer shades added to the foundation that I think would be pretty spot on for me once I get a new bottle and the matching concealer I think would be awesome!

Concealer was the product I was the most hyped about Fenty Beauty releasing...and I hated this. I color matched online (my mistake) and the color was wayyyy too light. I have combination skin that does become drier in the winter, but no matter my skin prep this concealer looked like it sucked every bit of moisture from my skin. A little goes a long- it’s incredibly pigmented and in my opinion not very forgiving.

I bought this even though I thought it might just be an overhyped concealer but it did not disappoint! It is now my new favorite.  I will definitely be buying again when I run out!  I got a shade lighter than my skin to help brighten my under eyes and I would recommend doing that with this product.  It conceals my dark circles and the shade range is fantastic! I have trouble with foundations being too warm or too pink but this was just right! I also LOVE the applicator, I find the double flat sides great, I use one dip and swipe under each eye with one side of the doe foot.

Very thick or creamy if you want to say. Personally I didn’t like the way it blended. I tried to keep using this product, but every time I have it just doesn’t look great under my eyes. I’ve set it and tried using my fingers, a brush, and a sponge but even blended out. Looked all the same after 20 mins. So it’s a no for me. Maybe it’s too thick for my under eye type. I’ll be using it as a craving out my cheeks concealer.
reviews.review_title: Better for face than under eyes.

reviews.review_text: words cannot describe
Nice lightweight concealer that does exactly what was promised.

i am loving this new concealer. Fenty Ri Ri has done the most awesome thing. you dont have to find a different shade for goes right with you fenty foundation. i wish i could give this more then 5 stars!
I really wanted to love this product! But it’s just waaay to dry and cakey on my dry skin. Might be nice for people with more oily skin

I works well for concealing redness and freckles/moles. But don't even think of applying it on healing skin, acne, or scabs. This concealer latches onto any bit of raised skin and makes it 10x more noticeable. Which honestly defeats the purpose of using concealer in the first place.
reviews.review_title: You'd do better off buying a different concealer.

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the coverage and the colour selection. however, I feel that this is drying on my undereyes.​ It's unfortunate because I love the consistency and the colour payoff and everything else about this concealer. But I noticed it clings to my dry patches on my undereyes ​and accentuates any texture I have on my undereyes.​ I have yet to try it on spots. So far have a love/hate with it. Might return it, don't know yet if I will.
This is a perfect match! My favorite concealer!

this is a good product but when I went into sephora and tried it on it looked like a perfect match for my skin color but it was way to orange and dark for my skin. I am lucky that i wear glasses so you can't really see that it is orange but yes it is good. follow me on ig: Stacy.4347

I would actually rate this 3.5 because the consistency and texture is so good, but after a couple of hours and when I set it with light powder, it gets super cakey!!!! I have tried SO SO SO MANY concealers but my favourites just seem to be Too Faced Multi and Nars creamy.

I wanted to love this concealer. Unfortunately it made me look much more tired than awake. Whenever I would apply this concealer, I would have like some-what of a grey hue under my eyes. Weird. It also is not crease proof in any way. The only thing I like about it was how smooth it is upon application. Too bad!
Nice coverage, easy to blend, but is thick and creases if you don’t set

I hated this. it smelled like paint, it felt like paint and it did nothing. was God awful. I swatched a lipstick and it stayed on my hand for a week. don't waste your money on this crap. the lady in sephora told me that for all the fenty adds they use smashbox makeup so there you go. won't be buying anything fenty again in the future.
Officially my favorite concealer!!! Works well with high end and drug store foundations. Love the consistency and finish!

This is a great concealer but I had a trial and error phase with it. You need so little of this to conceal your under eyes, even using half the amount I used with Nars (which I switched from bc it's no longer cruelty free) I had to send so long blending it out. My advice: use very little at first and add more if needed. Matches my skin beautifully and lasts all day!

This product creases immediately. My fine lines are suddenly bigger than before and makes me look more tired than I did before I put it on. I even put on setting powder which, with other concealers, would keep it from creasing. I wish I could love this, but sadly, this is not worth the money if you have fine lines under your eyes.
Became cakey on skin and trying to even it out made it worse

I have chronic very dark circles under my eyes stemming from some medical issues. You would never know when I'm wearing this concealer. I bought a shade lighter than my foundation, and I don't even need to colour correct. It's gorgeous. It is a little drying, and I have to be careful about blending it out thin enough and then lightly setting, because too much concealer or powder, and I get creasing. I can work with those issues, though. They are common issues for me with full coverage concealer. When I wear this concealer, I don't hear, "Oh man, are you tired? You look tired." It's nice.
reviews.review_title: Excellent concealer for extremely dark circles

reviews.review_text: I love this concealer, I can wear it with or without foundation.  Stays on all day and works great with or without setting powder as well.  A little goes a long way though!
I LOVE this concealer! I was going to buy Tarte Shape Tape or this Fenty Beauty concealer, I didn’t want the full coverage that Shape Tape had, so I settled with this one... and I’m so glad I did!

One of my favourite concealer!! I usually like super full coverage concealers but this one has medium coverage and I love it. It does a pretty good job with coverage because it layers easily. I like to apply my concealer and let it sit for about 3-5 min before I blend it out. I find it get the most coverage that way. I feel like it makes my under eye area look smoother than any other concealers I've used with minimal creasing.
It's a handy product when your on the go
THE CONCEALER WAS FULL COVERAGE BUT IT CREASE REALLY BAD SO I TOOK IT BACK TO THE STORE.
I moisturized and primed and after about 6 hours it looked like the makeup was sitting on top of peeling skin. If you've got dry  skin, I would not recommend this
This is the best concealer I have ever tried. The shade matches my complexion perfectly and provides enough coverage to cover all my acne.

I’m in love with Fenty. I was very leery at first due to I’m a dark skinned lady. Yes Fenty has 50, but most times it’s hard to find a match. When I put this on, it evened my face and looked so natural. It truly does give a matte look. Most people couldn’t tell I had on foundation. They truly thought my skin was that smooth and beautiful. Way to go Fenty, that the look I have always tried to achieve and finally can.  I don’t do a lot of makeup, but just needed a foundation to get hide some of my aging. I’m a true fan now.
reviews.review_title: My new go to!  Love this foundation.

reviews.review_text: This concealer is EVERYTHING!!!!   I love how it goes on and truly hides every blemish and mark!  I have dark circles under my eyes. Once I put the concealer on, It gives me this bright eyes wide open look. I will say, it takes a lot to get it off, even with face wash, but worth the money.

I have never met a more perfect under eye concealer! I generally have clear skin but have experienced some darkness under the eyes. This concealer covers and brightens perfectly!!! My new best friend.

BEST CONCEALER IVE EVER FREAKIN USED. Dark spots?????? Don't know her. Redness?? Not on their watch. Blemishes???? NOT TODAY. Unevenness?? Doesn't even show up in its vocabulary. Oily skin? NO PROBLEMS HERE. Lasts for hours, coverage that lasts, and zero stickiness. It's like a soft hug, for yo face. 12/10 would recommend. Shade 150. For me, can be used as concealer or even a thin layer like foundation. BEAUTIFUL coverage. I literally look like a walking snapchat filter. Once you go Fenty, you NEVER go back. So worth every penny.
reviews.review_title: Don't even get me started on the awesomeness.

reviews.review_text: great coverage and blends very well
Amazing coverage. I have a dark skin tone and am amazed at the skin match, easy application, coverage and moisture. Tip gives a lot of product if you're not careful. Gives me a matte, silky finish
reviews.review_title: Amazing coverage for any skin tone

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this concealer. Nars concealer is in 2nd place.
Loveeee this. My under eyes are sunken in and super dark circles and this covers well! It does crease because I have creases but that is to be expected.
reviews.review_title: Rihanna if you see this I Love You

reviews.review_text: Blends so easily and it’s high coverage!! My new go to
I like This concealer a lot. I cant Find the perfect match like my MAC butttt it is a really good formula. Long lasting. Not too heavy. Blends easily.

Color is great, was a really good match for my skin so I really wanted to love this product. However, I had to return it because it dried out on my skin too much and looked cakey by the middle of the day.
I love the coverage and consistency. It’s great to use alone, blends welll.

This is my daily concealer now and I pair it with the setting powder in shade butter and it looks silky smooth. However, this concealer is definitely not crease proof. I will say I have very prominant creases on my under eye and am yet to find a concealer that doesn't crease so this does a very good job. I also use a little all over the face for those days when I don't want heavy makeup and it looks great over the rest of my face. Overall relatively happy with the product
reviews.review_title: Not crease proof but does the job

reviews.review_text: It is very creamy and covers up everything I don't want anyone to see. Really love using this product.
Good coverage did not crease

This is literally THE BEST concealer that I have ever used! And i used a lot! First of all, it's matte so when I put it on, it doesn't look shiny. Second of all, the number of colors available is so amazing that I didn't have trouble finding the correct color. I am completely done with all my other concealers and only use this now.
reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life?

reviews.review_text: This blends in with my skin just well I don't have no complain about this product
reviews.review_title: Best one for me so far

reviews.review_text: Perfect concealer. Not too heavy and great coverage, a little goes a long way.

I don’t usually use concealer as I have lots of fine lines and extra skin around my eyes and most concealers crease, dry my eyes, or look cakey. This does none of those! I love it! Perfect match, very buildable and doesn’t crease or dry out. It looks and feels amazing and stay on all day! I use it with smashbox eye primer and Fenty primer.
I use a lot, probably my favorite concealer!
Love this product, you don’t have to use a lot just a little, wont dry out fast and doesn’t crease
Love the concealer as much as foundation! Nice smooth coverage

Hated the foundation but love the concealer! So many brands dont have colors light enough for my fair skin tone to actually covet dark under eye circles, not only does this brand actually have my shade but the formula is thick and smooth and wonderful.
Very creamy, nice and blendable esp with the Fenty foundation

i can be very picky with makeup products and i was skeptical at first, but this is by far the best concealer i’ve ever tried. it is smooth and creamy and applies very easily with a beauty blender, and it lasts all day.
Loveeee it, goes on smoothly and doesn’t crease
This product is perfect for someone who doesn't like to wear full coverage make up everyday.  I literally put it under my eyes and cover a few dark spots and blend. It's AMAZING!
I love my Fenty concealer. It's is amazing and works beautifully with my foundation. All of my Fenty are top of the line.

I really like this concealer. It blends so easily and gives a natural skin like finish. It is not heavy like shape tape and it blends really well into my combination skin. My under eyes are on the dryer side, it does not settle into any lines and I do not have any problems with creasing. It also stays put in some of my oilier areas, for example, my forehead. Compared to the new born this way concealer, I find that BTW sits on top of my skin rather that blends in, whereas the fenty blends seamlessly for me. I grab for this every day over the other 2.

Incredibly drying :( If you already have dry skin that you have to ultra moisturize, this will definitely zap that away and leave you looking patchy. Super bummed, but still giving it 2 stars because it was still one of the few close color matches for my skin tone. Buuuuut if you don't struggle with dry skin or troublesome skin, this is prob one of the best options out there for coverage .
reviews.review_title: I had high hopes...I still love you RiRi!

reviews.review_text: Okay, Let me just say that this is product is amazing! I mean, ALL of the Fenty Line is but this concealer is so clutch. It blends beautifully. Plus I really love the fact that you really can't go wrong matching the shade, it's foolproof. Women of Color especially, since we tend to have a harder time matching most of the time. I imagined the bottle being a little bigger, admittedly but it's only $26.00 so you can easily pick up another one if you're the type of person that uses a lot on a daily basis. I can't see how anyone would NOT think this is an excellent formula and product!
great coverage, but really thick and sticky formula
loving it. will continue to by

I think this concealer is overall beautiful. The formula is creamy, lightweight and is radiant (MY JAM) however, if you’re oily I would maybe shy away or make sure you prep and powder in the areas you conceal to ensure it doesn’t break up or crease.
Love love love love! This product is creamy and pretty full coverage. I would recomend this to anyone who is looking for a new concealer, it's a great product and I love Rihanna so it's a win win.
really good concealer! i have super creasy under-eyes but these don't crease on me if i bake. so creamy and radiant!

I’m completely sold on this product. I’ve gotten so many compliments on my skin since I went and bought this. I use this in place of foundation now, that’s how smooth and silky the finish is! It’s like a second skin. It’s great for a no makeup-makeup look. Everyone thinks my skin is so pretty, seriously! Go out not now but right now and get in on this.

I want to love this so bad, if anyone can't help me find a way to please let me know.  Every time I used this concealer it takes off my foundation and looks so patchy and caky.  I set with powder and have changed how I apply it and nothing is helping.

Creased and made my under eye look worse and I am only 22. I even tried to test it by wearing it only under one eye one day and it disappeared. I really wanted to like it and i'm sad it didn't work for me :(
reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it but had to return

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this concealer but it’s too drying under my eyes. The shade matches well (I also use the fenty foundation in 280), but after a couple hours, it looks dry on my skin and really pronounces my fine lines.
I think as a light makeup wearer it is a really good natural option and very easy to blend

Not full coverage, drys quick and flakes later throughout the day. If blended out with Real Techniques wet beauty sponge, will get the job done. Also, with a tip beauty applicator, wont be able to get the rest of the product out when running low.
Average all around. It gets the job done, just doesn't blend as well as I would like.
just trying it out..I'm a MAC girl reg. ....its good for the most part ...produces only skin during the day and I dnt have oily skin but it's fine gives me a glow ...plus I only wear concealer

Coverage is great & buildable. You must work fast as it dries down pretty quickly. I would have given it 5 stars, however it does break me out. 

I’ve used it for 1.5 months hoping my skin just needed to get used to it, but nothing. 

*I have combo sensitive skin

This concealer has its pros and cons. For me, it is the first one I’ve tried that didn’t make my eyes burn, and if I use a brush and don’t bake it, it doesn’t settle into my lines and wrinkles. I don’t know that I really notice it covering my blue under eye patches, but it does brighten and even out my face somewhat. I like it, not sure if I will rebuy once it’s gone. Like that it is thick.
I don’t like it , it took my foundation off!

Wish I could give a 2.5! Let’s start with the positives- shade range is amazing, packaging is simple and sleek and I LOVE this concealer to carve out my brows, it drys very quick and adds the perfect amount of brightening that lasts. With that being said, it is a horror show for my under eyes- very patchy and dry, accentuates every little line and crease even after setting it right away. Ironically I also don’t get the same brightening effect under eyes as I do under my brows. I don’t plan on purchasing this again as their are many other concealers that work well for my both uses.

Usually when brands say “full coverage” I find the product less than full. This concealer, though? Jesus...a little will get you to the moon! I really struggled to learn how much I really needed in the beginning, but when I did, I started to love it! I only gave it 4 stars because I don’t like the idea of waiting for product to dry before I move on in my routine. After I apply, I usually fan it lightly so it dries before I set. If you don’t let it dry you’ll end up with separation and/or a cakey mess. 

But once you learn how to use this product (every product should be used the same, quite frankly) it’s pretty great, and a trusted cover up!

I know it may come as a shock to others but I really did not like this concealer! I wanted to like it but it ends up so scaly and dry on my skin, maybe because I have dry skin already I don't know. I really just don't see the hype, especially for the price.

This. Y’all. I am no longer using shape tape OR NARS, this is my new go-to. It is a bit more full coverage, and sets quickly, but overall I’m super pleased with this product. As someone who is far too lazy for concealer AND foundation, I typically just use this and blend out with a wet beauty blender, ta-da, even skin tone and no need for foundation. No oxidation, stays matte and doesn’t slide off my face. Thank you Rihanna, you da real MVP.
Amazing !!! love it ... lasts all day !

Man, do I love this product! My go-to concealer has always been NARS Creamy Radiant (which I still love obviously), but this product sure is the GOAT a run for its money. This product is so amazingly creamy, I can't get over it. It's blends really smoothly, and offers just a seamless transition with my Fenty foundation. Will continue to use this and recommend it to everyone. I have oily skin and I love it. My best friend has dry skin and loves it as well. Universal.
LOVE THIS PRODUCT! It is very good and it is easy because the foundation and concealer shades match up.

I loooove this concealer!!  The best I’ve ever had. BUT! The top broke after 3 uses not even a week after I bought it.  I didn’t even tighten it or pull on it or anything. I contacted Fenty and didn’t get a response :/ I’m very disappointed

Can’t go wrong with the shade range but the creasing is HORRIBLE!! Doesn’t matter what you do to combat it, I look like a 90 year old woman after an hour and have to buff out my skin. Also horrible if you have dry skin. It clings to it like crazy and so noticeable. Won’t purchase again for myself

-Creases really bad on the under eyes, to the point it was very noticeable (Was at a social gathering and the lady I was talking to interrupted the convo to give me the good ole “Hey, uh, girl to girl, your concealer’s looking a bit...rough”.
Oof.

-Extremely patchy when attempting to blend out on under eyes, almost weirdly blends AWAY, no matter what method I tried

-Yes it’s creamy, but it’s also weirdly dry, and when it dries, IT DRIES (not in a nice flawless airbrush manner...in a Death Valley dehydrated way).

-If used to spot conceal, the product is GONE from the face in a few hours...The best way I can describe this is that it fades, or at least on my skin, it just seemed to be eaten up BY the skin, and I’m barely combination, borderline dry.

-Upside was the color match, definitely a true olive, which has been near impossible for me to find.  

-I love so many of Fenty’s products!! This one just didn’t do it for me tho!

this lovely concealer had a perfect match, was full coverage, excellent at highlighting and blending. and the finish is a perfect matte for my looks!
I recommend letting it dry a little before using any powder or eye primer with it however to prevent cakeing or creasing.

Meh. The positive was the color match- I love that the brand created the perfect yellow/olive color for my lighter skin tone. Negative was the formula. It was SO thick and pasty. And also I felt like it creased really badly. Definitely skip unless you want to look like your makeup is caked on.
Top 5! easy this is a beautiful concealer that blends out effortlessly. love all Fenty packaging this baby will stay in my rotation.
Does not conceal as much as in the photos but definitely an amazing product!

there was a lot of hype about this concealer so i decided to try it out. however i wasn’t very pleased with the results. although the concealer looks very pigmented, and is perfect upon initial application, it does not last long in that state. I found that this concealer clings to my dry areas, and by the end of the day ended up accentuating the dry spots around my blemishes. In addition, it simply melted away and off the oily parts of my skin, and almost seemed to lift off my face. I really wanted to like this concealer, but i faced many issues with it.
Nothing crazy special, makes my under eyes look super smooth. Prefer my two faced concealer.

Decided to give this a try after testing out a few other concealers in store, and after several years of using solely Kat Von D Lock It. I'm really liking it so far EXCEPT for the fact that although the range of colors is impressive, there isn't one that matches my skin well! The shade I purchased is just a bit too orange if i over apply or do touch ups (the other closest shade was too pink) so i have resorted to layering it with my Kat Von D shade. Oddly enough, this has been working wonderfully and is really giving me the coverage and finish i am looking for. :)
reviews.review_title: there isn't a shade that matches my coloring well

reviews.review_text: This is perfect for highlighting and it sets on it's on. I also love the amount of coverage it gives.
Absolutely love this foundation!
Dries fast but once its blended and set it is good for the night! Highly recommend!!!

Man, I wanted to love this but it just wasn't great for me.

Pros: The color was a perfect match, no scent
Cons: Thick AF, challenging to blend, creased and settled into my fine lines SO much, clung weirdly to dry patches

I think if you are 22 with super clear, blemish and line free skin this would be great. For my 37 year old skin it was a big old miss.
Creased so much on me :( its so sad cause I wanted to love this product. I’ve tried everything from different baking powders, setting sprays, primers, etc. it was always the same result.

This is my favorite concealer! I personally do not bake my concealer because I am too messy haha! I feel that this concealer does not crease much while still providing a Demi matte finish. It covers my under eyes beautifully. In comparison, I found shape tape too drying for my under eyes. I also love the too faced super coverage concealer, but this one if more for people who prefer matte finishes. It also helps color correct acne!
This was a bust! I have the primer and foundation which are my holy grail and decided to get the concealer! This shade range is amazing BUT major creasing :( not happy

I have really dry under eyes. It does not matter how much water or what cream i use for them, they are always dry. This concealer makes them my under eyes look crusty and flaky. The only way i can wear it is if i do not set it with powder. This is just not a concealer for me. If you don't have dry under eyes, this might work for you.

I want to love this concealer so bad, but I just can’t. I like the consistency, it’s light and provides a medium to full coverage. It isn’t drying and I really like the applicator. But it creases immediately upon application no matter how much you continue to blend it out. Don’t get me wrong I don’t think any product is creaseless, but I’ve never had an undereye concealer crease on me so badly. I have a review of it up on my YouTube channel: Vanessa Nicole Makeup

I didn’t realize the concealers were meant to be lighter than their corresponding foundations, so I had to return the first one I bought bc I have puffy under-eyes and a lighter concealer just makes them look puffier. I ended up with 185 and it’s perfect. I love that it’s really pigmented so I don’t have to use much. It’s probably the best concealer I’ve found yet.
reviews.review_title: Shades are lighter than corresponding foundations

reviews.review_text: I’m still expanding my make up routine and still don’t have many products for my under eye zone. However, I just was writing a review for the anstastia bronzer I am in love with right now. I had to give a shout out to this concealer. Im not going to say it’s miraculous compared to other things on the market but just checkout the pic. You guys gotta know I am sick as a dog right now.  Have nothing on my face other than body lotion, foundation, this product and that bronzer. I’d say the under eye results are pretty good considering I look like death without make up on right now.

This was an okay concealer, it dries quickly so you have to blend it out right after applying it to in section. I did feel like it creased under my eyes. I’ve had better luck with other concealers (I use the Laura mercier setting powder to set my face). It is full coverage and more on the matte side which I did like but this product did not work for me.
Perfect shade and blends so well into my skin and with my foundation as well. I wear it on its own. My only issue is that it dries really fast.

I have been using this concealer for over a week and I have really been enjoying it. My coworkers have noticed a difference in my skin, and asked if I had changed any of face products. This concealer blends beautifully, covers my dark circles, and gives a glow to my skin. I haven’t found that it creases under the eyes either when I set it with powder.

I have been using the NARS radiant creamy concealer for 4 years now and have loved it, but I have to say..this concealer had me SHOOK. An associate at Sephora mentioned off hand that Fenty's concealer is comparable to that of NARS, so I decided to give it a try. My dark circles are extremely pigmented. They've got a little bit of a hollow and are practically purple/blue-ish. This concealer blends soooo nicely and  I don't need to layer as much as I used to with NARS. It is buildable however and applies so smoothly, and the coverage is incredible! I am so happy that I decided to try this one, I can't believe I'm making the switch over. Another thing that I love about this concealer is the applicator. It's flat on both sides which is ridiculously comfortable when I'm applying and it allows you to make use of the most amount of product each time.
I love it so much. Use it like a foundation for my 12hr shift.  is awesome!

Very drying and settled into the fine lines under my eyes. Seemed to just sit on top of skin and had no concealing effect of dark circles or blemishes. Whereas one swipe of Nars concealer, and all gone. Shade range amazing, but personally seems to be missing some shades in the very fair, cool toned range (seemingly big jump from 110 to 140).
reviews.review_title: Amazing shade range, but product falls short

reviews.review_text: Woah, girl. The shades are awesome but let me tell you, it’s dryyyyyy and ages me by 10 years. I tried it multiple ways and I just can’t use it no matter how hard I try. I wanted to like it so bad too.
I love Rihanna's products. This color is great for me, but it creases like you would not believe. I look like I aged 10 years.

I have the hardest time finding concealers that match my skin perfectly and I was super excited to finally find that in Fenty.  The shade was perfect and the range is amazing.  The formula is pretty thick so it doesn't blend out all that well.  As soon as you apply one spot you have to blend it in otherwise it dries down.  But I was willing to put in the extra time if the shade was going to look good all day.  Upon first application it looked flawless and had medium coverage.  But by the day of the day it looked god awful.  It broke up really bad on my forehead and cheeks which I have never had a problem with before and it looked really greasy, creasy, and just bad.  I really wanted to like this product and tried wearing it several times but it just didn't work for me:(

Teenage boys fear many things; an unzipped fly, rooting for the losing team, their female counterparts. But for me, it is the “are you.. *dramatic inhale* wEaRInG MaKEuP?” scenario. Rihanna’s Fenty Beauty released the new Pro Filt’r Instant Retouch Concealer and I have nothing to fear.

This stuff is magical. The price point is very well placed for 8 ml as a luxury makeup brand. What’s better? The results. I do not wear any foundation and use this concealer to lighten up the highpoints of my face. This makes my skin look p e r f e c t. I prep with a water-based moisturizer and go right in. This is a dryer, matte, and a fast-drying formula, so I recommend doing one eye at a time. This formula is also extremely very high coverage, so I use a dot on either side of my eyes and blend in, as I have some fine lines under my eyes I don’t want a party in. Afterward, I highly recommend setting this with a powder, as it will not crease or budge for the, wait for it, e n t i r e day. 

I do not recommend this concealer for anyone with dry skin (this is why this concealer only gets a four out of five shining stars from me), as it is very dry, but would recommend the NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer (but remember, this brand does test on animals as required by law). 

Wrapping things up, I must say that I do not look like I am wearing makeup at all. My skin looks flawless and like every teenager's dream. It almost beckons me to say “Worship me, peasants!”.
amazing coverage, love it

this concealer is perfect, i went a little lighter than my foundation because i do have a little darkness under my eyes and i wanted to have the fresh faced look. the color matched perfectly and it covers everything i need to hide
Absolutely love this product. A little goes a long way.
I received this as a sample in 110.  I’m very pale

I really wanted to love this because of the reviews but it wasn’t for me. At 36, I think my skin was not who it was directed for. It was beautiful on my hand; smooth and very nice finish, but when I tried it on my ski , it highlighted my pores and exaggerated my very fine lines. And I’m all about skin care and take very good care of mine. I think it works much better on younger skin. I ended up giving it to my 20 year old niece. Too bad. :(

This is the best concealer I've used to date. The coverage is SO good, but it's lightweight. I'm more on the dry side, and it was totally fine on me (with a primer). It is more on the dry side, but blends well if you use a primer. I ordered online and the shade was lighter than it looked on the web, so next time I'll probably go with a deeper shade.

When I got this I really liked the way the texture of it felt high quality, but the color was way too light for me (and I'm ivory skinned) for some reason even though I thought I got the right one, and no matter how much I moisturized or blended it just sat on top of my face and looked super patchy and dry. No idea how other people are getting it to look so flawless on them but if you have combo skin especially if it gets dry in the winter it would probably be a gamble to see if it works or not.
reviews.review_title: Too dry and looked patchy on me

reviews.review_text: I can't believe I found a concealer that's lighter than my skin. I grabbed the same color I used as my foundation and this brightens even my face! I usually have to settle for concealers that are a shade darker or get a yellow based one that makes me look sickly if I want to hide my dark circles. Color me impressed. I also love the formula. It's nice and creamy and blends out easy. I don't know about the "crease proof" claim because if I've got a crease on my under eye my makeup is going to fall into it. However, it blends back out and looks good when I set it with powder.

I rarely use a concealer since i find that it always creases and looks cakey at the end of the day but Fenty Beauty Concealer has changed by make up life. I would have days where I would want my skin to breathe so I just conceal my dark circles at my under eye area, set it, and I'm good to go. This is the best match for me as well as they have a range of shades with different undertones.
reviews.review_title: Perfect Concealer for my DRYYY under eyes

reviews.review_text: As much as I love fenty products it’s a big NO for me ... I don’t have lots of fine lines but it seems that this product makes it look like I do plus it creases ans looks cakey ... I wanted to love it after reading positive reviews but it just doesn’t work for me. Sorry

HIGH coverage, SUPER creamy, & sleek efficient packaging BUT i noticed when I wear it for a long time I wake up the next day with breakouts that take me a week to purge & clear up :( not sure what’s in the ingredients that’s doing this, but I’ll finish up the tube I have on days when I know I won’t be out for long, but I’ll continue to repurchase my usual concealer, not this one

the concealer was great and creamy, however do not use it with the too faced hangover spray! the concealer looked flawless until i used my setting spray which made it crease endlessly and start to run beyong repair. I had a full beat face and it was a true tragedy when i had to wash off all my makeup since it was beyond repair and I stayed home.
reviews.review_title: Great consistency, but do not mix with Too Faced!

reviews.review_text: Um... this is in my top 5! And closer to #1 this is a great concealer it blends out beautifully and like all Fenty products a little goes a long way!

The color matched perfectly for concealer, I love the applicator, it applies plenty of product with one swipe and I'm not one who likes to cover my whole eyes so the product has been lasting for around 2 months now.
I have oily skin on my forehead and nose, it does exceptional on my nose but for some reason it makes my forehead have some weird patchy dry skin. It just doesn't set in perfectly like I wish it would. I guess the formula works different for everyone, but because of this I'm afraid to try the foundation. It may be too matte for me.
Love how the packaging looks and how much product you get though!

Not sure if I would recommend it from my experience, I think I might try the NARS concealer.
This has truly changed my makeup routine. This concealer is creamy and dries down matte nicely. I honestly love this so much.
reviews.review_title: Where have you been all my life!

reviews.review_text: This concealer is absolutely amazing. I have to say that it honestly lasts longer than the Nars Radiant Creamy concealer (in Amande). Wow. I use this with tinted moisturizer, and I'm good for the day. I need to get the powder as well. I am so happy with this concealer. It literally matches my skin tone, like my entire face. I may get a different color to highlight underneath my eyes, but this concealer matches my forehead, cheeks, chin, etc. BUY THIS! If you have any doubts, just try it on in the store. Again, it lasts all day! This with either powder or setting spray, it really does stay on! It's light and the wand gives you a ton of concealer (like the Colourpop one)! I love mine forever!
sets into fine lines and wrinkles
Great coverage and a natural looking highlight
Easy to blend. I finally found a concealer my exact shade. I usually mix my concealers to get the shade I want but not this one! This is my go to now :)

I like the consistency and overall coverage on dark spots/blemishes. However, I don't like the creasing I get under my eyes. Maybe I'm not setting it properly. It's not a horrible amount of creasing, but my previous concealer left me looking better. I don't believe I'll buy this particular product again, but I'm still a fan of Fenty!

Definitely check your color match in store! My concealer isn’t the same as my foundation. This concealer is so creamy and feels really good! Doesn’t really crease, you just have to set it quickly. I think it really covers up dark circles and acne really well. Long lasting!!! It can be drying so people with dry skin really moisturize!
This concealer really does the job. It’s not thick or greasy. It’s so light feeling you can barely tell it’s there.

This did not work for me. I use it for under my eyes as a highlight and the Fenti setting powder but it cakes under my eyes and creases as well. Now I didn’t use the primer, maybe that could be a factor, but I’ve never had a concealer that caked and set into the pores like this did and that’s with the setting powder. I found it too heavy. I’m thinking is product is better for drag queens who need that heavy coverage. Although I wanted a full coverage, it was too much. Did blend well and the shade was wonderful. However I cannot give it last 1 star due to its effects.
Great product. Doesn't look cakey and covers all those sleepless nights!

I love the Pro Filt'r Foundation, so I tried the concealer. I ordered a shade down (I'm a 120 in the foundation which matches perfectly so I got a 100 in the concealer) and it's way too light. Maybe that's my bad. The texture seems good and it's thick, but it does seem to accentuate my eye creases. I'll keep trying to use it but I'll probably go back to my old stuff.
How about a round of applause! Ri love this concealer it blends out great and covers dark circles well!  Will tell my friends about and will re purchase!
reviews.review_title: How about a round of applause!!

reviews.review_text: This concealer is a tricky one, as it is typically unkind to dry skinned folks like myself, as it definitely can crease and show your lines. HOWEVER, after watching a tutorial from Riri, I think it is all in the application. When first using this concealer, I was applying it straight to my face using the wand, but Rihanna demonstrates that putting it onto the back of your hand to initially warm up the product, apply with fingers and then blend it out with a damp beauty blender or brush. That technique today made ALL the difference! Instead of a creasy mess, it was a flawless finish and I am absolutely willing to give this product a second chance.
At first I loved this concealer. Super pigmented, easy to blend, great coverage. After a month of wear, this made my undereye and eyelid SO dry. It actually looked gross. And I do not have dry skin.

I LOVE the texture of this, the Tarte Shape Tape is a little too thick for me. This lasts all day for me, and isn’t drying at all. The only downside I’ve found is that it takes a bit of building up to cover any under eye darkness. I sometimes find myself thinking I should have used a little more. BUT this also looks great on days I don’t use foundation. Will repurchase for sure.
I thought it would replace shape tape but nope. It’s going back to Sephora. Just doesn’t have the pigment that I need

I have plenty of concealers but this by far is my favorite I love the way it melts right into my foundation and completely hides all of my blemishes and dark spots will definitely be buying a contour shade

this was too thick with not enough coverage for me. Also since the shades are lighter than the foundation it’s difficult to find one that would match your normal skin if you wanted to cover acne or blemishes. I don’t recommend this. Too thick, not enough coverage, didn’t blend out. That’s how it was for me though, you might like it! I love fenty powder & foundation, this one just happened to be a miss. Hopefully it works for you though!

I had really big hopes for this product, it just didn't work for me. Even after few minutes of setting with powder( and I tried a lot of them hoping it would work) it started creasing. Tried switching  from a beauty blender to brush, but it still was one dry and patchy mess. Wouldn't recommend..
reviews.review_title: A big NO for dry skin

reviews.review_text: i am totally in love with this concealer! i have veeery fair skin with pink undertones and i've never found a perfect match for my skin considering i dont wear foundation, i only use concealer for my undereye and pimples. plus, it is very creamy and a little goes a long way
This is my go to concealer! I love playing around with my makeup and I finally found a great product for small/big touch ups. The formula is smooth and creamy, and it’s a really good long wear.

This is hands down the best concealer I’ve ever used and I’ve used MANY of “the best”, “creaseless” or “illuminating” concealers out there. It matches my skintone perfectly, a little product goes a long way and it really doesn’t crease.
ALL I USE NOW! If you want that natural look, “glow from within” this is the concealer for you! Literally all I wear now, super creamy and light weight. 100% fantastic!!!
This product brightens my face up with minimum amount of a single use! Its very dignifying!

This is my all-time favorite concealer because it really does do it all. It conceals my undereyes without drying them out AND covers my blemishes beautifully without wearing off during the day. Before, I used to have to buy two different concealers for each purpose, but this one is now my ultimate favorite for both. A few tips, this does crease on me if I don't immediately bake with a non-drying setting powder (as an aside, I did not like Fenty's powder at all because it was so drying), so I think "crease-proof" is not an accurate way to describe this concealer. If I do set it though, it does stay creaseless all day. Also, the colors are purposely different than the corresponding foundations, so be sure to take the time to find a color that suits you. (I am 180 in the foundation, but 180 in the concealer is way too yellow for me. I use 210 for general concealing and 270 to color correct under my eyes.)
reviews.review_title: My favorite concealer of all time!

reviews.review_text: Pretty amazing! I like a fuller coverage so i have to use a bit more but once its set its so smooth. Very matte

I wanted to love this product because I’ve never not liked any Fenty product I’ve tried... until now.. this concealer has amazing cover yes but it creased on me BAD. I wore it 4 days in a row to really give it a chance but it creased badly every time. Sad day.
Perfect coverage, you have to moisturize before applying for the perfect look..

I bought this concealer just cause honestly lol I wasn’t really excited for this concealer but I seen so many good review from nicol concillio & thomas halbert that I had to buy it, I will say this is a very pretty concealer. No creasing and it’s matte but not drying.

Really unimpressed. I LOVE the Fenty foundation and was really excited for this concealer. But it dries extremely fast and is really thick. It doesn't spread well either which makes me have to use more product. The shade is really nice and the finish is alright but I'm overall underwhelmed. If this product was less thick and dried slower, I think it would be worth 5 stars.
i love this blah blah

I was saving up extra cash to purchase this concealer, as I already own many other products form Fenty Beauty so I was so excited to try out their concealer!! The good thing I found about this concealer is the coverage and it’s also easy to blend, but that’s where the good things stop unfortunately. I have very oily skin, but when i use this concealer my skin looks dry dry dry!! I used this concealer and tried different blending methods, a sponge, my fingers, a brush, but every attempt the same result. The days I wore this concealer my friends commented on how cakey my face looked, and every time when I would get home and look in the mirror, my skin looked so horrible, it was cracking and looked super dry, even though my face was still greasy?? Yeah, I wouldn’t recommend this concealer. Maybe you need to use a super super hydrating primer or moisturizer underneath it, but it’s just not working for me. Unfortunately this one is going back :(
I bought it with the Pro filter foundation in shade 260, in it matches me perfectly. I love that its natural medium-full coverage.Only thing I don't like is how drying it is.
thick texture, however did not match my under eyes.

All hype, I bought it the first week it came out. I’m sorry there are thousands of better products out there. It’s an okay price point, and does look good in pictures. However I prefer to look good in person, I can’t show up to business meetings looking cakey and over worked! I tried it with every make up combination, I tried less, more. Trust I wanted to love this, and just can’t.
AMAZING!!! I absolutely adore this concealer it works well with every foundation I have drugstore AND high end and it doesn’t crease at all. AN ABSOLUTE MUST HAVE
I love fenty products but this one wasn’t for me. I found it a tad bit to thick and very hard to blend. I would use a beauty blender and it would just kinda smudge around and never blend out nicely.
Dried my under eye area out. The Mojave desert is less dehydrated than my eye.

I did not like this concealer at all. I was so disappointed, I didn't like the color. or the coverage at all. It creased on me even when I would use an eye cream or didn't use one. It was very dry as well.

I love this concealer alot, it blends well as it covers well blemishes - this is perfect when you don't have time to do foundation or you want to look natual. I even love the whole product itself, the applicator. Just everything in beyond is amazing!

I spent nearly an hour in my local Sephora testing this concealer and another one. If I had bought based on online swatches, I would have been way off compared with what I ended up with. For maybe the second time in my life (I am 47), I actually asked a salesperson for help, and she did help me choose a shade. Having now worn it for the first time for 8  hours today, I have to say it has held up much better in places where I only needed a tiny bit. Trying to cover the entire undereye area was tragic. I moisturized well but still by the time I left for work 30 mins later, it was already creasing and settling into fine lines. So I definitely won't use it that way again. The tiny places where I dotted it on to cover a red mark, etc. still look good. All in all, 4 out of 5 stars, and don't choose a shade based on online swatches. If possible find a way to sample it in person.
reviews.review_title: Best for spot concealing, not large areas

reviews.review_text: I'm on the fence with this product. I have combo skin and i'm not sure this product is right for me. I like the coverage but i feel this product makes me look dry and is lightly patchy around my nose.

First time to purchase and it covers dark circles and gives a flawless look for the under eye areas. Dries fast which means blend quickly. Great color contrast to the foundation. Gives good light to eyes and doesn’t crease.
This concealer is super creamy and easily blendable and a little goes a long way.

This product is perfect. I went through a period of acne. All my acne is gone, but it has left its dark spots. This concealer covers every single one and matches SO well you can not tell that I have makeup on. It melts right into my skin and doesn't wipe off. I LOVE this product and I will buy it forever (until my dark spots are gone). The only thing that would make this better is if it was water proof.
Honestly this is one of the best concealer that i have used for my really dark circles im in love
goes on well but doesn't last all day.

I was not pleased with the product. I can say that there was no creasing but the coverage was just not there. I would have to apply several coates and still would see dark circles under my eyes. It's just a no for me.
I love this concealer! It’s super creamy, and blends well. This is my perfect shade for a subtle highlight. No problems with creasing either!
This matches my skin PERFECTLY. I don't like to wear foundations and I use this just to cover my acne/hyperpigmentation.

Colour match was spot on , lasted all day but even with a hydrating primer it was dry , cakey and settled into every little crease . I wanted to love this but had to return . :(  if you have combination skin like me you may want to reconsider .

Combined with the foundation this concealer melts on and blends perfectly. you can't tell where it starts or finishes. this is the color that is recommended with the foundation i bought (410) and though i can probably go a little lighter for under eye, the finish and combo together looks amazing.
It’s not heavy at all and is pretty hydrating so you don’t have to worry about your undereyes being too matte after setting them!
Finally a concealer pale enough for me. It’s great and doesn’t crease on me.

As someone with olive undertones I am SO HAPPY to finally have a concealer that doesn't make me look orange or pink. The colour match is perfect and the coverage is full but not cakey. It has good wear time even without setting. The formula is matte and my undereye area can get dry, so I always moisturize before applying and that seems to solve any texture problems. I really really love this concealer.
Smoothly blends to a velvety finish. Couldn't ask for a better concealer! It's pretty amazing.
This didn't work for me :(.. it dried way to quickly for my skin type.  Likely works better with oilier skin.
One of my favorite concealers by far. Conceals perfectly and buildable without caking up
People who say this doesn’t cover clearly haven’t tried every other concealer. Best I’ve tried.  I’m a Sephora vib and have tried legit every brand. This covers and lasts. Silky af.

So good. Light and creamy. great coverage but easy to blend out lightly as well. I can't even tell i'm wearing it. It does catch into some of the lines under my eyes, but I don't like to set daily and its very minimal and easy to dab in with your finger.

Liked the color and coverage. Very easy to blend. But I feel like it was over hyped and made my under eyes look dry. I still see my dark circles somewhat when I use this. I like using it for now - especially for a more natural look - but I probably won't repurchase. I combine it with my Huda Beauty concealer and the coverage reaches what I want. I can use this alone if I'm not going to a party or something, but I don't find it particularly special.

This is the best concealer out there. I have hair bumps that turn dark and I use this to cover them. It does a great job at covering up my blemishes without using a lot. I tend to go for a natural make-up look, so I only need a small bit of this and the matte make-up and I am good to go. This is the first concealer that has completely hidden my blemishes. I love FENTY!
A little goes a long way! Blends good over top of my Nars Luminous foundation.

So I've been playing with this product for a month or so and I'm conflicted. I use it with the corresponding foundation from Fenty and it's been very finicky to use on my skin (mid-30s, combo skin). The foundation has been great, it is the only one I know of that doesn't fully breakdown on my nose by the end of the day. I've used other concealers and it's been fine. This one there it literally ONE way that it works on me. Moderate amount of moisturizer, NO primer, and then the concealer works fine. Not super high coverage but it looks nice. If I use too much moisturizer, or my normally awesome Tatcha primer, or if I mix in a bit of oil with the foundation, or anything to make it just a little less matt and drying on my *getting older* skin, when I apply the concealer it strips the foundation off as soon as I try to blend it in. Doesn't matter if I use a beauty blender or my finders. Doesn't matter if I wait for the foundation to dry, doesn't matter if I let the concealer sit for a few minutes, it will strip off the foundation fully. And you can't fix it. There's no putting more foundation or concealer on to try to get the coverage back, you'll just make it worse. I can go in and use Tarte concealer after to fix it, but then why use this at all? 

But if I'm having a light makeup day and I just put a bit of the concealer on to spot conceal it works well and lasts a long time. It just this with the Fenty foundation will not tolerate any added moisture or oil to the situation. I've even used it with Becca full coverage foundation and my wet and wild and not had this problem. I really wanted to like this more and I'll keep it around for those light days, but it's definitely not going to be my go-to.
reviews.review_title: What it does well, it does well, but problematic
