reviews.review_text: It’s just okay. It doesn’t really give me huge coverage for my undereyes. I don’t have crazy dark bags but even so, I feel like it doesn’t really provide much coverage. It creases like crazy but does go on quite smooth. I find myself having to pat under my eyes throughout the day.
another amazing fenty product- ri ri is killing the game
Love it on my face. Blends in well with my skin color
Creamy, full coverage but feels light weight at the same time. I have to say, I like it better than the Nars creamy concealer and tarte’s shapetape!
Love it! Amazing coverage
It’s great and really smooth. One of the few products that helps me not look dead inside in the mornings!!
love this.. texture is very creamy and there are so many colors.. I am in my 40's and this does not crack or define my lines.. covers under eye circles very well
This give great coverage
Covers beautifully!!
Amazing  my skin is combination skin, This product works Miracles

I’m giving this 5 stars because of the color diversity. There’s just not a better line for that, which also offers great quality. About the product: it is nice and creamy, but you really need to blend or pat it in quickly. It sort of dries down. I understand this would be perfect for oily skin, so I accepted that, even though I’m a dry person. But the coverage is superb. Even tho it does dry down, it doesn’t get all crepey, and settle into my wrinkles. Maybe I’m just getting used to the texture. I used one of Fenty matchsticks before, and liked it a lot, but this really has staying power. It’s reasonably priced, too, for the tiny amount I use. I’m a fan!
Best concealer I have used, hands down. Gives a great "skin-like" finish. Did not crease around my eyes as others have.
This is a great concealer. It does not have the highest coverage, but it does give a beautiful look to the under-eye.
Amazing product ❤️❤️❤️

His is the first concealer I have found that matches my skin tone. The coverage is amazing.. but I have noticed that when it dries on my skin. It leaves a DRY look on my face. I have tried mixing it with lotions to help. But haven’t been able to find a fix to that. I want a good finish.. but this looks really dry no matter what.

No difference or specialness with under-eye concealing, found it better to be a spot concealer or foundation before your foundation but you're going to have to wait for it to dry down to get full coverage before blending
I love the way it goes on, love the color range. It does get wrinkly after a few hours.
I bought this off recommendation from the sephora employee. I needed something thick and matte. My undereye circles are dark purple.
reviews.review_title: Really conceals my dark underye circles

reviews.review_text: Love this product.  Easy to blend.  So many shades.

This concealer is my new best friend!! I live for products that don’t need to be overly worked to get the maximum benefit. I definitely thought it was a joke when they said 3 dots then add more if need be. Clearly RiRi did not come to play with us she delivered greatness. I appreciate that I can wear this with other foundations especially since the foundation isn’t my go to. I alternate matchstix and the concealer for my contour and it works just as well! The pigmentation is so rich in the tan to deep and deep dark shades. The best part is that it lasts all day! This product is unmatched on the market. Point blank period.
reviews.review_title: RiRi DID NOT Come To Play With Us

reviews.review_text: Very light on the skin and blends well
Love it help wake up my skin
Great coverage and easy to blend. Not as drying as Shape Tape, but fades slightly faster. It's my new go to.
My current favorite concealer, right up there with Tarte Shape Tape. Can settle into lines, be sure to really pat it in until it dries. Lasts and lasts, great color selection. Primo coverage. Love.
Great texture!!! But think nars is better
Love it now one of my favorite concealers

This product is great if you don’t want a lot of coverage. If you are a full coverage queen this might not be the product for you. It’s more of a medium coverage. I had to use 3 coats to get my desired coverage. It’s a nice product though and gives you a beautiful finish. It blends out so easily and it’s very thick and creamy. 

To recap- if you like a FULL coverage concealer, this is probably not the concealer for you. If you like more of a medium coverage, I believe you will love this. Whether you love a lot of coverage or not, the formula is very nice.
My favorite lip gloss. I love the sweet smell and the beautiful shine and hint of color. This is my go to lipgloss
Great foundation but if you have dry skin it will dry your skin. i wouldn't recommend in that case. If oily/combination skin you will love.
I returned this. It didn't blend well (very thick/sticky), and settled into fine lines in a second.
It worked perfectly with my 420 foundation.
I LOVE IT SO MUCH . THIS COLOR BLEND PERFECT I JUST LOVE IT

The color is spot on and it blends seamlessly into your skin. The only thing I don't like is that this concealer 'cracks' in places where your skin tends to move a lot (like laugh lines and the crinkles under your eye.) This formula isn't great if you have dry skin as it makes it look flaky, but I haven't had any issues in the oily parts of my face. I do love this concealer though!

So this is my very first time trying out the Fenty Beauty products, which I must say are perfection. I have not found a fault in any of them. This has become my favorite concealer, in fact I use it as if it were foundation, it has the best coverage, is definitely no crease, blends so well, matches my color perfectly, smells amazing and has a perfect consistency! I couldn’t say anything negative about this product!
I got this the other day just to test it out and loved it.
most fullcoverage concealer EVER. I bought it for a friend and she looks flawless and crease free everytime she uses it.

I love this concealer, it blends so perfectly that I forget about my dark marks on my face. 

I recommend this product.
My under eyes creased within seconds of applying. This drys too fast and is way too Matte. It does have ok coverage.
Made my skin look dry and flakey. Had to wash it off immediately
Very thick concealer but it gets the job done a little really does go a long way. It’s even better when you use the Fenty foundation and setting powder! Amazing trio
Very creamy concealer and easily to blend.
The best I've used so far
Not good for dry, combination skin types. Very drying formula that sinks into crease lines. Disappointed :-/
Bleh- Clings to every wrinkle and/or slides around on my face/chin. Returning. Wish I liked it though.

Love the formula of this product, as it is build able, lasts long, and doesn't seem to crease easily! When setting this concealer, it tends to do a great job of looking good on the skin, but I find that a little goes a long way! I first tried 110, and I found it too brightening but I was able to work with the shade darker and it worked out really well!
reviews.review_title: Love this concealer! Rih did an awesome job again!

reviews.review_text: Coverage wise, this concealer was able to cover up my dark spots I have from acne scarring. Though after two days of wearing this, my skin started to react to the formula which unfortunately led me to return the product (hence the minus one star)

I love Rihanna and her makeup collection seems great this is the first product I've tried and I found it quite drying under the eyes looks beautiful for the first little while but dries out quite fast and emphasizes fine lines

I think I have tried every concealer to ever hit the market. never really fell in love with any, and none ever really seemed to match my skin tone. I would always have too much yellow, or peach and it wouldn't blend properly. thankfully, I decided to try the Fenty concealer on a whim. FINALLY! it matches my skin tone completely! I do get some creasing towards the end of the day, but nothing too crazy or out of the ordinary for the undereye area. I have very purple undereyes (thanks to pale skin) but this concealer works wonders! it's not totally full coverage, but I'm thrilled regardless. I did read that the morphe sponge helps give fuller coverage (vs the beauty blender) so I will try that once it's time to replace mine.

A concealer pale enough for my skin tone and crease-less under my 30-something eyes? Shock! Fenty's rocking it. 
For most of my regular days, all I do is put this under my dark circles, and forget the foundation. It matches my skin so well, I live and breathe with this concealer. Blends amazingly well with my foundation brush, and sets beautifully with powder. 

I do have to set it right away, to avoid a crease, but it's worth it. My new fave by far.
reviews.review_title: No crease! Long wear! Perfect tone!

reviews.review_text: First of all, I am a complete concealer snob. No concealer has ever really worked for me besides shape tape concealer. The only thing about that concealer is while there is full coverage, something about the undertone and the way that my powder stuck to it made it dry and cracky. Honestly I didn’t expect much from this concealer because I read it was light-medium coverage. If it can cover my dark circles better than other concealers that claim to be full coverage, it will for sure cover yours. Powder goes on top of this extremely nicely and it doesn’t crease all day long. I definitely found my new favorite concealer that I don’t think I’ll stop using! Def get it, if you’re looking for a new concealer :)
I first bought the wrong shade, returned and got the right one. I'm in love with this concealer... great coverage. lasts for many hours.
reviews.review_title: Best concealer that I've ever tried

reviews.review_text: Excellent coverage. Blends very well , never Cakey
It is truly amazing. A little goes a long way. Use only two dots under your eye and pat it with your fingers and it will cover anything. My new holy grail concealer.

I love the creamy texture and it blends beautifully! Definitely buildable courage. Doesn’t look cakey.
I use 370 for a slight highlight for the 385 foundation.
Literally PERFECTION. The most perfect shade for my face! Thanks Rih!

disappointed with this, it pulls with foundation, and even just on bare skin in doesn't lay nicely and creases so much, to the point that I can't wear it to work or to class if I'm going to be out for a few hours.

I bought the concealer with the corresponding foundation (290). I didn't know what to expect. I don't really wear a lot of concealer but I needed something that offered a little more coverage than the maybelline age rewind concealer. It did not disappoint! A little does go a long way. I can use this by itself without the foundation and looks flawless! I do wish that I would have gotten a couple shades lighter to go with the foundation. It still looks nice with the foundation but if you want to look brighter I would go a couple shades down. The formula is very creamy and blends well but does crease a little even when I do put powder on. I didn't use the Fenty powder so maybe that will help with the creasing? Overall, I will continue using this and go back to get a lighter shade.
reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_text: I have dark under eye circles, and so I tend to hoard concealer. After deciding the 6 I had weren't cutting it, I went and got color matched and gave this a shot. It's my new favorite for a no-makeup makeup look, and pairs beautifully with pretty much everything I've thrown at it. I slap on 3-5 dots and blend with my finger, and haven't had to set it yet this winter. During the day, I tend to get a little oily under the eyes, but even without setting, this doesn't move much, crease, or smudge my mascara. Someone with drier undereyes might need a little face oil, or maybe skip setting altogether, since it sorta self sets. I got my exact (foundation) shade, because 320 is a little pinkish, which brightens my dark circles/spots, and keeps my routine simple.
reviews.review_title: Tl;dr: if you're oily/combo, you'll love this

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it because I love the brand and Rihanna but it was awful! Thick consistency that makes it really dry and hard to blend.

It is definitely worth the hype. I was skeptical in actually investing in Fenty Beauty because it was overly hyped and I did hear it wasn't great for dry skin. Once the concealer dropped, I figured I'd buy the foundation and concealer together and see what it do and DOES it do! Currently my go-to concealer.
I first tried this at a recent Fenty makeover and I absolutely adore it! I got 420 which is my foundation color. the conveleaer lasted all day and gave me a perfect no makeup look.

This is amazing it’s thick so the coverage is great!!! I highly recommend this if you love a flawless matte finish I have combination skin so it’s. It too drying at all I paired it with the new setting powders by Fenty and it looks absolutely stunning!!!

I was so excited about this concealer because I hadn’t tried any Fenty complexion products. Unfortunately, I was disappointed. One pro is that the shade I picked, 140, is a perfect shade match for my fair/light cool-toned skin. However, the concealer itself was not all that impressive. It didn’t cover redness/blemishes/imperfections. It actually gave me a bit of a breakout under the eyes. I have better concealers for way cheaper.

To be honest, I thought I was going to love this concealer. WELL NOT TODAY! It creases in less than 30 seconds, It doesn't settle on the skin well, and it just doesn't look or feel good. I DO NOT recommend this to anyone.
reviews.review_title: THIS WAS A MISS IN THE BEAUTY COMMUNITY

reviews.review_text: Great coverage! My go to concealer
Great for covering dark circles!

I bought this product in store and the worker helped me find my shade and I think it matches well. The concealer hid a lot of my blemishes and it helped make my face pretty even. I didn't notice much cracking or anything but the longest I've worn it was 4 hours so I'm not sure about the long-term. Overall, it's pretty nice and I would recommend it.

Unfortunately, this concealer didn't work for me. I wanted to love it just like I love the foundation.  However, the concealer is drying and settles in under eye lines almost immediately. Also, I noticed that my under eye skin broke out and I initially chalked it up to my skin adjusting to a new product but I used it as a highlight on my forehead and the next day I had broken out in that same area. There must be an ingredient that doesn't agree with my skin.
My perfect color. Great coverage, doesn’t crease.

I use this as my highlighting shade and i have to say that this concealer is so beautiful! I use it unset and its totally self-setting! When i dont use any powder with it it lasts much longer and looks so much better than with it set. Its totally a great natural makeup day concealer as its more of a medium coverage concealer with a nice satin finish. The only time i don’t enjoy this concealer is when i set it with powder; something about that combo on my skin doesn’t last long, cracks throughout the day and transfers like crazy and end up looking patchy at the end of a work shift. But like i said, this concealer unset is so glorious.

Has great coverage but made my skin feel chalky and dry, making it hard to blend. Unfortunately I developed an allergy to it within a week, which appeared as small bumps under my eyes that went away when I stopped using it. I might recommend this to someone with less sensitive skin than mine, and it matched my skin tone better than any other concealer I’ve found.

I use this to brighten up my highlight on top of a color closer to my skin (fenty) If you’re using it this way, apply the powder with a sponge or powder puff. It will snatch your under eye completely! 

I use this on top of FB concealer shade 340 and set with the FB powder in Banana.
Too heavy for me. I didn’t like it :-/

It’s hard for me to find things that match my skin tone and this did so I was so happy. It also keeps my makeup in place ALL DAY. Like when I wipe it off with the wipe, it is as if I just put my foundation on. My only problem is that whenever I wear it, I have a blemish the next day (usually just one somewhere I don’t usually get them). I do have acne prone skin so that is probably why but it was so close to being perfect for me!

I was originally drawn to this concealer due to the shade range, and because I had never tried anything from Fenty before. I like the finish of the concealer when you don’t set it, but you’re forced to because of creasing. It got patchy and dry looking after I set it and I tried three different powers in attempt to make it work. It did not cover my dark circles well, either. It also left a slight white cast under my eyes. I am giving it two stars due to the shade range. Overall, I would not recommend this concealer.
I have very light skin and hyperpigmentation under my eyes this shade helped sooooo much! it took care of the darkness and all and all had gorgeous coverage!

I wanted to love this product so much. Don’t get me wrong, I still use it. I mix it with another concealer to give me that full coverage.  
If you use this concealer, you would agree with me that is buildable coverage.  Also, it can be a bit drying under the eyes. Avoid any other dry spots, this will cling to it, making it look drier and cracky. 
So my advice to you is.. make sure to have a nice moisturized face.  Do not wear a matte foundation, this concealer will help to mattify your foundation, especially if you use this concealer to highlight.

Honestly, I was so excited to try out the fenty concealer but it wasn't as great as everyone online made it out to be. My main problem was that it was drying under my under eyes and settled horribly into places I didn't know we're problems. When I returned it, the Sephora employee attending me was like "you didn't like it?" and I said nuh-uh it was way too dryng and the employee next to her was like YESSSSSS. With that being said, I returned it for the too faced sculpting conceal which is amazing.
Beautiful! Absolutely gorgeous!
reviews.review_title: Go for it, you won't regret it!

reviews.review_text: Perfect for my oily skin does not look oily after wearing it for more than 7hrs!!! I do notice a slight creasing but other than that it’s so good!!!!

This matches perfectly with the 440 foundation I already have! It covers the dark circles under my eyes and leaves me looking refreshed and not sleepy/hungover lol
I also like the fact it’s very light weight and doesn’t leave a greasy feeling.
I actually really like this. It has a dewy finish. Its not too drying, and i have combo-dry skin so this is perfect for me. Way better than the foundation!

The formula was nice and long wearing. No problems with drying down too quickly. Blends well and start off with less otherwise it will be too much. You can easily apply too much and look like cake face. Downside is I had difficulty matching an exact shade. This is the same problem with the foundation. 420 was too orange than I was rematched to 370. Later it looked too cool. This product is excellent for exact shade matches. It just doesn't work for me.

So the formula itself is full coverage, easy to blend. I find it looks best with foundation and not alone but that depends on your skin and what you want covered !  I was expecting a little more inside but usually it is less quantity when its a great quality like this so i was fine with it ! One downside i ordered the wrong shade and need one shade darker next time !

Wanted to love this product because I love everything else by Fenty. I have the foundation, setting powder, gloss bomb and highlighter. I love all of them but unfortunately the concealer does not cover my dark circles. It will cover any redness or pimples but I still get a grey tone under my eyes. It also creases right away even though I put setting powder right after applying.

I wanted to love this concealer so much! I was so excited when Riri released it, but man was it a let down. It’s the only concealer I have ever tried that matched my skin tone but it creases on me like crazy  and emphasizes texture.

Such an amazing concealer. It truly covers everything and it super buildable. On days where I'm covering healing acne spots, I can get away with one layer and I'll usually build up a lot more product for active acne. I haven't tried using this under the eyes because mine are so dry. I always blend this in with a damp beauty blender. I've tried blending it out with various concealer brushes and the product is just too thick to blend in all the way (for me at least). This shade is super true to my skin (fair-skinned asian, neutral-ish undertones) and blends in so nicely. It doesn't leave behind any orange (my pet peeve with concealer). I set this with my holy grail Glossier powder and it lasts all day.

First things first- the shade range is amazing. I had heard great things about this + it being compared to tarte shape tape which is my favorite concealer so I decided to give this a shot. I don't know why but on me this concealer just doesn't work on my skin. I use it for highlighting my undereyes, forehead and nose. It is too creamy where it slides off my faces and creases in 2 seconds as well as generally not looking amazing. I know friends who love this, but for me personally I am going to return.
Best Ive use so far.
Very dry and settled into my fine lines to be honest
I love this concealer! It's totally replaced all my other concealers. It has a very creamy consistency and blends really well. Last all day and gives you avery natural look! Would highly recommend :)

I really love this. I use the setting powder it’s such a good combination. It’s really creamy, pigmentations and blends seamlessly. The only problem I have is it does crease buy the end of the day. Not horrible, so I don’t mind . I love it tho I feel so highlighted and lifted. It makes me what the foundation because I love the powder and concealer so much.
I love this concealer! It is quite thick but it is very blendable. I have tried NARS radiant creamy concealer but I prefer the Fenty one. My under eye area never looked so smooth!
reviews.review_title: I want to try more Fenty products

reviews.review_text: The coverage provided is fantastic, however the product is incredibly drying and makes the skin under my eyes feel tight and uncomfortable. Because it is so drying, it does flake and crease a bit. Even if you have oily skin, no one wants a drying product on their under eye. If you need a spot concealer and have oily skin, I am sure this product is great, but it is not for under eyes, which is my main reason for purchasing concealer.
reviews.review_title: Not Good for Under Eye Area

reviews.review_text: this is the most amazing thing I have ever tried. Full coverage, stays on all day, looks beautiful. Amazing

I have a lot of difficulty finding a concealer that hides my dark circles and doesn't crease but this concealer does the trick better than any other concealer I've used. A little goes a longgggg way too!!! If you want a matte concealer this is your best bet

I have both of the shades 130, and 150. I don’t have super dry skin but this concealer is made for EXTREMELY oily skin I guess.. I really tried to like it because I didn’t want $50 worth of concealer in my makeup bag to go to waste- but I just can’t do it anymore. Creasing, dry patches, I can’t even get away with using it to carve out my brows. Lasts a while for long days/nights, but not as flattering as promised. :( I would have to use my laneige sleeping mask on my beauty blender just to try to make it look smoother.
reviews.review_title: Too too dry, even for oily skin :/

reviews.review_text: I looove Rihanna and the Fenty brand. All the inclusive shades are right up my alley being a brown girl. I wanted to love this concealer so much but after weeks of use and matching it with the Fenty primer, this concealer just creases way too much. I love that it matches well with the foundation which is why I gave it at least 3 stars. However he creasi-ness of it makes it look terrible after a few hours.
Very creamy and has a nice finish. My only real complaint is it does seem to exaggerate my pores

I wanted to love it so bad but it turned to be just OK. Had to play with it to finally find the right way for it to work. It only works for me on under eye area and I really have to put just a little bit since its very rich and creamy, otherwise by the middle of the day it turns into really bad patches. Also if I have it right on outside of the eye corner it dries out so bad. I also use setting powder in Butter, which I LOVE, but it doesn't go with it at all! Patches again, so I have to avoid the area. 
Overall it's a great shade and coverage but I really had to learn it first. Wouldn't be buying again though.

I am in love. I could not for the life of me find an under eye concealer that matched my skin well enough and finally did with this line! I don't wear foundation so I needed something that matched my skin perfect and this concealer blends in perfect with my skin. It doesn't crease and isn't shiny. Thank you Rihanna!!

This concealer by itself is quite nice, creamy with a good amount of coverage. I love how you can get the perfect match to your Fenty foundation. As someone with dry skin I was actually surprised to find this concealer did not crease to bad- until powder was applied. By itself on the skin it was good but used with the Fenty powder/foundation it became way too much- under eyes became a flaky nightmare. If you have dry skin I don't think this concealer is the best or worst but be cautious using it with a powder-turns into a disaster!
Not bad not amazing. I have pretty intense under eye circles and this just didn't cut it, also creased pretty badly. It was comfortable and the color range was nice.

I love Rihanna and so far my experiences with Fenty Beauty have been positive. But this concealer left me extremely disappointed, and please believe I wanted to love this product. This concealer has a weird texture that creases under eyes BAD (even when set with powder).

I've tried it at work and by lunch time, the concealer has broken down and smeared. Not staying put, and not giving me coverage (the whole reason I wear concealer)

Anyways, huge disappointment - back to NARS creamy concealer I go!!!
reviews.review_title: ILY Rihanna, but this concealer is a NO

reviews.review_text:
I'm disappointed..
Caky and dry ..
reviews.review_title: Dry and oxidizing on my skin

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this concealer so much but my skin looks SO bad!!! I have oily skin & this concealer made my under eyes look SO DRY & CREPEY! it also did not sit well on my skin and broke up very fast throughout the day.
Does not matter how or what tool I use to apply it creases INSTANTLY and dries out my under eyes like crazy. No other concealer has ever been as creasing as this one.

This is amazing. I have super dark undereye circles since forever and this covers them without making my undereyes look super cakey. Stays on at the gym and during work, it's the bomb. Paired with the primer foundation and powder it's so fantastic.

Im sorry I don’t see the hype in this product. I wanted to love it so badly but I returned it. I used shade 170 as suggested, and the color was right, but it immediately creased under my eyes, even after powder was applied. The tenth foundation was also a no go for me.

I was so excited to finally be able to get this product and I wanted to love it, but I really don't. it oxidizes so much that it's a completely different colour when it dries. it makes me look dark and orange. it's also streaky af. I tried applying it a few different ways (dry brush, damp sponge, fingers, etc.) but every trial was bad. I'm extremely disappointed, since I had high hopes for this foundation. I will be returning it and going back to my usual foundation.
reviews.review_title: I look like an oompa loompa

reviews.review_text: Love all Fenty products I really love this concealer it works great with my skin even though I have dry skin it’s great I got one shade lighter than my foundation and it’s awesome! Only problem is that I wish the size of it was bigger!
Creamy and radiant with great coverage

When Fenty first launched I bought the foundation straight away because I was so excited about the broad shade range. However, I don't typically like wearing foundation so I don't pick it up often. So when I heard about the concealer launching I couldn't WAIT to buy because typically I just go with a concealer and a loose powder a la Violettefr. :) The shade range is EVERYTHING, it stays put without looking textured or cakey...seems like it will work so well in the summer months as well due to it being humidity resistant. I've been using it with the Fenty loose powder in Butter over top and it's looking great!
reviews.review_title: best concealer I've tried. and i've tried em all

reviews.review_text:
It's amazing 
I love it
LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS CONCEALER. MY NEW HOLY GRAIL!!!

Had my eye on this every since it came out because I have the foundation and diamond bomb and liquid lip and i just NEEDED the fenty face

Works LIKE MAGIC with the Fenty Foundation and is SO hydrating and natural, i LOVE it

Love love love
It blended like butter looks great on the skin not too Matt or not too  dewy
Made my skin oily I returned it. I tried it for one week with different powders comparing drug store one and this got oily every single time. My skin is not even super oily just combination.

This concealer is really great! I got it to replace my NARS one because I wanted to try something different and Fenty has a shade that’s more of my skin color. Pale with peach undertone is the perfect explanation for it. It’s lightweight, airy, and easy to move my face around. I love it!!
I love this concealer. The applicator covers a lot of space. This product does not crease, change color or moves. It stays on for a long time and looks flawless. I love.
Perfect concealer, use this for under my eyes super creamy and soft

I use the 310 in Pro Filt'r Foundation and 330 in the concealer. I use this before my foundation to cover the hyperpigmentation around my mouth and chin and ZOMG...its great! I don't even have to use orange color corrector! The foundation sits well on top of the concealer, it is full coverage, and wonderfully covers all that I need it to. It sets once it dries down and does not budge when layering products. Great product!

I mean the color match was a m a z i n g but I find that it really settles into my brand new undereye lines. My beauty blender was also not a fan, I have to pat the product in with my fingertips before going in with a brush. Baking helps but I'm not a fan of looking so matte and dry. I was expecting this concealer to cover up my literal SOUL but I'm not really living for it.

I would’ve given it less stars. This concealer does not work well on its own. I like to use concealer on days I don’t have time to go full glam, like early mornings at school but this does not work well alone. Even with primer, it separates and cakes up. The only time it works almost perfectly is if you put it with the matching foundation or put a different concealer underneath which defeats the purpose of wearing less makeup....it does crease like a mfer. I’m 26 and I already have lots of under-eye wrinkles and it only makes them worse. I have to shove and pack setting powder just barely below my eyeballs to get it even a little less creased. Oh well.
This seemed to be a lot lighter than the coordinating foundation and the coverage was like a medium coverage but overall it’s ok
Perfect for everyday, doesn't crease as much as shape tape and it feels super light.

I dislike this concealer so much and I hate saying that. I have very dry skin and this just didn’t work. The first time I wore it I noticed the creasing under my eyes to be quite exaggerated. I refused to use it again but gave it another shot. After just a couple minutes the creasing was so bad. It was as if it dried to powder and there were weird chunks. I love Fenty so much but this is a hard pass. Perhaps might not work for people with dry under eyes. The Cover FX concealer is my go-to.
I bought this hoping it would be as lovely as the Fenty Beauty foundation - sadly, it wasn’t. This concealer did not blend well at all for me and it creased a lot. Had to return ):
This is the creamiest concealer on the market. It works so perfect on eyebrows

Pretty good concealer. Gel texture. I still prefer my shape tape but it is a good one too. Crease a little bit on me. You can see my photo for comparing colors. 180 is darker than 185! Both yellow undertones. If you like yellow undertone with light skin, I recommand you 185. If you have light-medium skin, choose 180. Hope this will be helpfull to pick the good color. (180 is very close to vanilla multi use concealer by too faced).

it’s a HOLYGRAIL! This is just perfect. Hats off to Rihanna for coming up with Fenty Beauty. It lasts long, and the long shade range makes it even better for me to choose my shade and not have to mix with other shades when my skin tone changes each season. It blends in with the skin really well and makes my face look flawless.
Amazing ! Not quite full coverage but still amazing , especially with the setting powder

This concealer is soooo creamy and amazing. A little goes a long way and it can definitely be brought up to full coverage. The colour is perfectly matched with the foundation and is the perfect shade for concealer. I would be weary to buy a different shade though since it is fairy bright. It bakes very well, sits on the skin well and just melts into your makeup perfectly.
This concealer doesn't crease, hides under eye darkness, and adds so much brightness to the under eye area. It looks flawless and a little goes a long way.
AMAZING! Formula and coverage is unreal! Color is perfect for me, and when blended, looks like my skin is flawless! Comparable to Tarte Shape Tape, or dare I say... EVEN BETTER! Highly recommend!
Loved this concealer!!! applied very smooth, no creases at all

I’ve tried this concealer SEVERAL times and I can’t get it to look nice at all,On my under eye it’s dry and patchy,clings
to ANY dry patches and emphasizes any imperfections. I have oily skin so I figured a matte concealer like this would work perfectly but I just can’t get it to work
My foundation is 450 so I needed a little brighter highlight. It blends BEAUTIFULLY! Very creamy and gives you time to blend.
Absolutely wonderful! The consistency is light and creamy. However, the coverage is FULL. It conceals everything from my little freckles to my bad attitude. Highly recommend!

I bought this product in hopes that it would live up to how good the setting powder is, but unfortunately it did not. This product would be more for people with oily skin. I have combo and it looked powdery and dry. It also did not conceal under my eye, but left a green tone in certain lighting. it had a good amount of coverage...just wasn't the right formula for me ):
Absolutely love how smooth it is
Works well, does not crease and covers everything. This product blends right in looking like I have no makeup on

I use to use shape tape and Urban decay concealer and then Rihanna came out with her Pro' Filt'r concealer and I had to get it to go with my Pro' Filt'r foundation that I love so much as well! It is a great product and so is the foundation and setting powder, I love Fenty Beauty! Definitely worth your money!

This concealer is just okay. It definitely isn't full coverage, more of a medium coverage, and blends pretty poorly. It is nice and creamy but it dries down SO FAST, like faster than Shape Tape, so if you wait too long then it won't blend properly :( If you can blend it in immediately then it does look nice and gives a satin finish, but I found that it did crease quite a bit and looked somewhat dry by the end of the day. Overall, there are much better concealers out there than this. I think it's overhyped
This is AMAZING! My undereyes are so insanely purple that nothing will cover them-until this! Beautiful finish and product!
It’s just okay. It settles in under eye creases. Lots of cheaper brands that are just as good.

First concealer that has 100% work on me. Does not make me feel oily even tho the formula is thick and has good coverage. I don’t even have the biggest dark circles, however, most concealers I tried before didn’t gave me enough coverage.

I love it, it’s suuuper creamy and the only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because a little goes a long way, so there was a slight learning curve for me, but other than that I love the way it looks on my skin- it’s like a matte/satin and it’s definitely not drying for me(btw I have combo to dry skin) but of course it will work differently for everyone!

I love this, but it does cling to my under eye creases. I think this is great for normal skin but if u have over oily skin u may have a problem with it slipping...but it works with all my setting powders very well and blends into my skin very nicely I recommend!

I really wanted to love it as it has a very light weight finish but unfortunately it turned out to be very drying and very tricky to blend. First of all, although there are 50 shades, the light to medium with warm skin tone seemed like mustard color when applied on my skin. sonI had to go with nuteral undertone and hope for a miracle. 
Then when I tried it for the first time like I would normally do with my Holly Grail (Nars)- I would leave it on a bit before blending so it gives a better coverage with little product on and doesn't look thick or creasy. So I tried the same with this one but it just dried too fast and became very difficult to blend leaving a harsh line under my eye if you know what I'm saying. so I had to try again blending it faster but it just got patchy with not enough coverage and my dark circles were peeking through that I had to add a tiny dot and here it really turned into a hot mess.. to get it to look decent, I had to use extra under eye moisturizer then I needed to color correct with a warmer shade from my Nars first then go with this one to get it to properly cover but again, the texture was not flattering at all and too drying.. Maybe I was doing it wrong or maybe it's meant for oily under eyes? guess I'll never know
reviews.review_title: Too drying and not enough coverage

reviews.review_text:
Such a pretty concealer! Full coverage but not too heavy, makes my pores look smaller.
This concealer matches me better than the foundation does, wore it by itself today all over my face and it looked super pretty.
Coverage is BOMB! Had been using Nars radiant creamy and I don’t think I’ll go back to that.
Really nice . Blends out great ! A little goes a long way . Doesn’t crease . Color match was awesome!
I must say that this concealer is EVERYTHING. I'm very pleased with the results after application. I love the glow it leaves.
Should’ve probably gone with the 250 (match my foundation) but I love the coverage.
amazing concealer, the best I have ever used
reviews.review_title: life saver- best of the best

reviews.review_text: Shockingly not impressed... I usually love Fenty Beauty products but this one was a miss for me. It was nice
it is a nice concealer but you have to set it very fast and I also still have some creasing but all in all it's a pretty good concealer.

With all the positives reviews on this concealer decided to test it out and asked for a sample at the store and it was a fail. It is smooth and hydrating and creamy and is buildable. When first applied to the face it is very workable and doesn't dry fast and it looks good for about 2 hours and thats it. It fades and oxides.
I love the concealer but the shade I picked up was too light/golden for me so I returned 410 and I plan to get 420.

I tried to apply this a couple different ways because I really wanted to love it but it just didn’t work.  It ruined my foundation application when I put it on top of that and I tried it without foundation and it didn’t even show up. It was thick, patchy and basically disappeared on my skin when I put it on.

I love this concealer so much! I will forever use this and I cannot wait to try out all her other products. It matches my skin perfectly and covers everything without being too heavy or feeling sticky. The finish is amazing, and when paired with the foundation it's even better!

I really like this concealer since it pairs well with the foundation. It’s nice for any dark spots or acne. The pigment hides the discoloration really well. I just don’t care for it for my under eye. It creases really bad and I’ve given it multiple chances (with different primers, setting powder/no setting powder, and with/without foundation under it) it creases pretty bad either way.
reviews.review_title: good for face//bad for under eye creases

reviews.review_text: She creases!!! She creases!!! Why do you crease????? So annoying. Blends beautifully, yes, nice coverage. This is the coverage the foundation should have had. A little goes a long way but boooyyyyy does it crease. Not a little crease but an ugly here I am crease! Never again.

Thick and creamy when first applied but at the end of the day I had dry patches and creases everywhere. I couldn't really build the product all that well. I would not recommend for people who struggle with dry skin and this dried it out even more.
AMAZING FOR DARK CIRCLES! Even looks great without a full face of makeup
Tried this after religiously using Nars radiant creamy concealer. I found this formula emphasized my dry eyes and settled into fine lines.
Lovely coverage and lasts all day. Definitely will repurchase for a everyday look.

I started off great, I was actually not oily for once! But as I kept using it I started noticing it was breaking up around my mouth area, my smile lines, and make my under eyes look ridiculously dry. When I tried just swiping it away to blend it back in, it wouldn't budge so I had patches of concealer all over that would'nt move. Was disappointed tbh, I'm just trying to use it a little on my forehead only until I finish it but I don't think I'll repurchase.
reviews.review_title: Its breaks down and is drying...

reviews.review_text: Color was spot on but it's too drying on the skin and I have oily skin. Sucks I had to return it but if Fenty releases a Dewy version in this color I'm going to buy that for sure.

I’ve always had trouble finding concealers that match my skin tone and this the first one I’ve used that matches so perfectly. I will say that it’s a tad bit oily and makes my acne a little worse though so be careful how much you use one spot.
Didn’t realize how light this product actually was until I got it. Super SUPER brighting which is nice for wearing a full face but if you’re wearing just concealer would not recommend this product
Fenty foundation is bomb so I thought the concealer would be too. However it makes my eye bags pop out more, and gives it a dark shadowy look. So definitely sticking with my Born This Way concealer.

The coverage on this is good but it creases on me especially when using the Fenty setting powder. I've also noticed that it patches up on me as the day goes by, but maybe because my skin can get oily around my t-zone. Over
all not a fan of this one.
love the quality and shade matches me well. 240
BEST CONCEALER EVER! It literally looks like you’re not wearing anything!

Let me just say that this product is a life saver. I bought one in my foundation shade that I use to cover dark spots and breakouts and one lighter for highlight. I keep it in my purse and when I need to, I put a few swipes in problematic areas and tap with my fingertips and I feel like a new person. Love this. Best item I’ve bought in a while.
Made my under eye creases 1000x more exaggerated! The coverage was there but it was much tooo dry for me.

This is all I use for full coverage of my face. I consider myself a makeup minimalist so I only use this to cover blemishes. I follow with Dewy setting spray from Cover FX then I apply Laura Mercier translucent powder tan. I spray again with setting powder for a flawless look. This product is creamy, spreadable, cover my blemishes and I get a ton of compliments on my skin.

I wanted to love this as much as I love the Pro Filt’r primer and foundation which were my summer go to products, but this just did not work for me no matter how I tried applying it. I tried not baking and I tried baking. I tried the Fenty setting powder which I purchased at the same time that I purchased the concealer so I thought maybe that the powder was the issue but even when I tried using my tried and true Laura Mercier setting powder which has been my holy grail powder for years now, it still creased!
I do have oily skin so maybe that is the reason why this did not work for me. I’ve had trouble with many concealers that most people have no problems with and I think this is one of those products that is a great product but just didn’t work for me. I ended up returning this and got another tube of Tarte Shape Tape which has been one of the only concealers that has worked for me other than the NARS Creamy Radiant concealer. 
I still believe this is a decent product so I’m giving it 3 stars because even though it didn’t work for me, it has an awesome shade range and the formula applies beautifully and looked lovely for the first hour or so before it started creasing.
reviews.review_title: Creased badly on my oily skin

reviews.review_text: I know it’s probably really nice for oily skin but I found it to be horrible for dry skin. This concealer cracked upon first application and seemed to break up within the first 15 minutes. Setting it with powder did not help at all. It just made my undereyes look super dry and a little cakey. Like I said it probably works well for Oily or Normal skin but just. If you have dry skin, stay away from this.

Perfect for covering blemishes. I wear 420 in the foundation and this is pretty complementary to my skin tone. Too dark for my under eye area. Go down a shade for the under eye area. No creasing and stayed put all day. Love it

Okay. I am not going to be negative about this concealer because it has great coverage and the finish is more of the natural side, which I love. However, I bought this and the powder that goes with it and it has not worked wonders for me yet. I have dark circles under my eyes and I have pretty dry skin, but even if I dont have primer on or any eye cream under my eyes, this combo just doesn't work well for me. If I use my Laura mercier powder it works so much better! The concealer though is awesome and I will continue to buy it!! just not the powder unfortunately..

Love the shade range. That’s about it. Maybe it’d work for oily skin, idk? But Definitely not for dry, winter skin. 
I’m picky, so to each his/her own.

I really love this concealer. It has a matte finish, but it isn't drying. Light weight, but full coverage. With this product a little goes a long way. There has even been times I forgot to set my concealer because it has little to no creasing depending on how you apply it.
The concealer is not the best has a very sticky consistency when apply it remove products.
What a great product!! Blends easily. This is the kind of concealer I've been looking for.

Even though I thoroughly moisturized with a generous amount of Drunk Elephant Protini and Merula oil this Concealer was very hard to blend. I used 1 little dot from the very tip of the applicator and it caked on my skin and wouldn’t blend out. It took my skin from nourished and dewey to dried out. It removed all the moisture from my skin and caked in any little lines I have.
I have used every "crease proof" concealer under the sun and this one truly does not settle into my fine lines and does not budge once set. I think I have found my holy grail.
OMG!! This concealer is BOMB! Just perfection and it's a permanent staple in my makeup bag.
reviews.review_title: Where have you been my entire life??

reviews.review_text: this concealer makes me look a lot older than i am, it just sits in the lines i have under my eyes. it's really difficult to blend out, i've tried a sponge, a brush and even my fingers. it dries so fast it's hard to work with. believe me, i wanted to love it, i used to use and e.l.f concealer that was super light and almost watery but it had almost no coverage at all. maybe i'm doing something wrong, i'm not sure but i don't think i would buy this again. even after setting it with a powder my lines are just so defined it makes me sad, i'm only 20 i shouldnt be worried about looking old yet ):
Full coverage and surprisingly does not feel dry for my dry under eye area. On the contrast, the Too Faced Born This Way concealer drys me out crazy.
Save your money. I tried it every day since receiving it, and doesn’t cover well, it doesn’t last and there are so many better products out there. Move on.

Its a creamy and decently full coverage concealer. Additionally, the shade 145 is a very good undertone match as I have strong yellow undertones. Two main issues with it. Firstly it does oxidize. When first applied it has a white cast that faded once set (in my case it worked heavily in my favor but if you're very fair...). Secondly, I feel like it doesn't like being blended with a brush. So use a sponge or tap it in because it can get streaky and patchy
I love everything about this concealer
So glad that I bought this concealer. It covers well. I have other concealers however, this by far is my favorite one.
reviews.review_title: Buy it. You’ll be glad you did!

reviews.review_text: A great color with a neutral undertone. Use a thick primer if you have under eye creases

The color was a little lighter than expected.  I've had my color match done so that was surprising, but remembered that my skin is darker than it was when I had it done.  The coverage is a bit streaky, but I do like it as a contour color.  Will probably get my colors matched in-store and reorder in a color closer to my base so that I can see how it works with other fenty products.  After it was blended down and set, it was still a little lighter than I wanted but it worked.  Overall, I love this brand and will continue to support cause the pigments are great and I love the branding.
This is the only concealor I choose when I want to brighten up my under eye. It just melts. MY FAVORITE!!! Only con is that it will settle in those under eye creases. Must use good primer.
100% worth trying if you loved the foundation like I did! Super nice, and a little goes a LONG way. I recommend using your foundation shade in the concealer, anything else might look off.
Best thing that ever happened in the makeup world

This is what you need if you have eternal dark circles like I do! Fenty's concealer is creamy when applied, but dries more on the matte side. I still apply setting powder in oily areas and under my eyes, which gets this product to last all day long with no issues. I matched the concealer shade to my foundation shade (the same number) and find that they go perfectly together. I have also purchased the "brightening" corresponding shade for my tone (as provided on Fenty's chart which was super helpful) and it goes perfectly. The applicator and packaging are both stunning and feel very luxurious to use! This concealer goes a long way: build up in layers instead of applying a lot at first! It goes on heavy if you do. 

The only thing that people may have a problem with is that I have found that this creases easily, however I don't mind a few creases. But if you are weary of that, test it out first!
Love it... the coverage is amazing!
Product has good coverage if it doesn’t separate on my skin.

Great product. Before using this, I used the Kat Von D Lock It Concealer. I liked the high coverage, but do not want to support the Von D brand anymore, so this was a great alternative!! The formula is creamy and high coverage, and the vast color options meant I found the perfect shade for me. It lasts all day! Love this concealer, will stick with it!

This may be the unpopular opinion, but if you don't like the fenty foundation I doubt you'll like this. I found the foundation too drying and matte for my skin, and I found the same issue with the concealer.
I bought this concealer with foundation 140 and it works perfectly together and makes my skin so smooth and porcelain doll like. Perfect coverage and definitely worth the money!
This is my new fav concelear. It provides the coverage I need for my dark circles. I picked the same color as my foundation 360 and it was perfect. It makes my makeup look natural
This concealer has the perfect texture and stays forever, through tough days, workouts, and sleep. NARS was my goto concealer before but not anymore.
Love this concealer! Definitely my new go to , my makeup looks smoother

very thick and creamy, definitely full coverage, i prefer a light consistency but the yellowy golden undertones in this concealer makes it my favorite especially since alot of foundations tend to make me very orange

the color was good but it did not work with my very oily skin, i was super excited about this product but it just wasn’t for me, after about 30 mins i was already looking very oily and within the hour it looked very nasty:(
I returned this concealer. It creased to much and did not have enough coverage.
I love this concealer! When I put it on, it goes on smoothly with the applicator
I feel this works best with the foundation vs alone on bare skin...it offers light to full coverage on blemishes and touchup spots

This concealer is amazing! It replaced my shape tape which I never thought could happen. It’s very creamy and blends out so easily. Leaves the under eyes smooth and isn’t drying at all. Highly recommend :)
Love how this concealer makes my under eye bright and looking smooth. Only thing is that you have to work with it quickly since it is a thicker concealer that drys pretty fast.
Nothing bad to say about this product. Does it’s job. Is not cakey. Doesn’t require a lot.
Lightweight yet the coverage is flawless

420 is my foundation shade so I went for this shade.  It’s good but not brightening enough.  I like the formulation, but it does crease for me, so I use it to correct and then use my Born this way over it to brighten.  I did try the lighter shade 385 but it’s just not for my aging under eyes by itself.
reviews.review_title: Great coverage but challenged with fine lines

reviews.review_text: Hardly any coverage,I tried it 5 times and it’s patchy and clings to any dry patches,I tested it with the matching setting powder and still no luck,I’ve had it since it’s release date and haven’t reached for it since.

OMG! I've always hated concealer! They always tend to look grey or too light and weird on me. I watched all the hype about this Fenty one and boy am I glad I got it! The color match is perfect, blends beautifully, and instantly brightens my under eye without looking like I packed on concealer!!!! I have 2 kids (2

So disappointed I never write review for Sephora but this concealer made my under eye crease so badly I was so disappointed will def be returning worst concealer I have every tried def not worth the hype
It’s a lil thick for my liking but it’s really good with coverage. I purchased to try it out and not bad.

Nooottttt great - no better then your average drug store concealer. Plus I know having the wide range of shades is great but there has to be a better way at helping ppl actually determine their own shades and undertones - it happens to be different with different brands.

I like this concealer. I wouldn’t say it’s my holy grail. But it’s a nice concealer. Very creamy, it almost reminds me of Nars Radiant Creamy concealer. It creased a bit for me, but I have lots of fine lines under my eyes so it was to be expected.

I love the product because it is not too thick and is a great consistency. I just wish I didn’t have to use as much product to make it full coverage. Overall though I love the finish of the product and the shade range!
Great product! I went a few shades lighter than my foundation.
It’s like I don’t even have bags under my eyes, love how quick it dries too
It's a perfect match to my skin tone. I'm able to cover my dark spots and achieve that even tone look.

I am 300 in the foundation. I thought that buying the 300 in concealer would be perfect for me for purposes such as: 1) no foundation days or no make up make days. 

300 concealer is definitely too light to do that if you'e a 300 foundation. 

I didn't do much research so my bad. Just wish they had been simple about the shade numbers. Like, if you're 300 in foundation the concealer must be the exact shade hence its 300 concealer label (not one or two shades up or down). know what i mean? lol 

anyone know what concealer is the exact shade match to 300?? lol 

Its an amazing formula, its dewy and glow-y!
reviews.review_title: True to foundation shade? for no make up make up

reviews.review_text: This concealer is amazing. Covers my dark circles but doesn't need several layers to get the job done.
Medium coverage- Can be buildable

I live on an Island so I need a concealer with staying power for those hot humid days, so I went out and bought two colours because I was so excited. 
Unfortunately they did not live up to the hype for me. Super creamy, but I noticed even with the powder my acne scars were peeking through hours later.  Maybe its just my skin, but the colours online are also more lighter in person. Love FENTY so this won't discourage me one bit!
reviews.review_title: wanted to love this sooo bad!

reviews.review_text: I had higher Hope's for this concealer. It was a little too drying and creased on me really fast even if I set it.
I love using Fenty makeup, but I hardly use the concealer cause I don’t see a difference between the concealer and the foundation.
A little definitely goes a long way but this stuff is amazing I would invest in a good brush so the application looks flawless

I've found this concealer to be ultra long-lasting (basically all day without touch-ups) for spot coverage. Because it's so long-lasting and opaque, it's also one of the first concealers I've occasionally felt comfortable wearing on its own without foundation. I'm extremely happy with this purchase and expect that this will be my go-to concealer from now on.

Like others have said, the concealer shades are lighter than the equivalent foundation shades. Because I was mostly looking to use this to conceal imperfections, not under my eyes, I ended up going up several shades -- right now, I wear the foundation in shade 150, but the concealer in shade 190.
reviews.review_title: Fantastic (but shade does not match foundation)

reviews.review_text: This concealer wasn't a win for me. The Coverage was nice, but the creasing really bothered me. Also, I didn't get a great color match. Not a winner in my book.
I loved this product. Absolutely wonderful!

I have been with Fenty since the beginning and I was so excited when I heard she was putting out the concealer. Naturally i bought it and in a word, it's perfection. I do use the Fenty foundation, and i LOVE how she has numbered the concealers the same as your foundation. She made it so easy to just walk in and get the one I wanted. The doe foot also makes for quick swipes. I'd consider this medium coverage, but i think you can build if you need to. IT IS NOT STREAKY, NOR DOES IT SIT!!! Tbh, this concealer is life.
Warm, super buildable, blends flawlessly

Great concealer! Very full coverage and super brightening. My new go to. But because it  is very light and brightening, be sure to test out and find your shade before purchasing. What I thought would be my color was extremely too light for my face. Will purchase again!
I love this foundation , I just started wearing foundation and I’m obsessed . Its so light weight it feels like you have nothing on !

Really wanted to love this, I had finally found a concealer that actually matched my skin color. Unfortunately, this caused my skin to break out and a little bit of milia under my eyes. I almost never break out so I was really surprised based on the ingredients that this caused acne.

This concealer is perfect for an everyday look. I wear on days when I don't want to wear foundation, and use it to color correct for full-glam days. If you are shade 240 like me, this has a peachy undertone rather than yellow, hence the color correcting function for full glam because you can notice the slight change in undertones. Make sure to layer for more full coverage because one layer will not be enough to cover dark circles completely.

While I wanted to LOVE the product, i don't.  It's alright.  I have Fenty foundation and primer and LOVE LOVE LOVE it.  The problem i have is #1 the shade to match my foundation (370) was way too dark so I got 350 which is lighter but the coverage isn't as full as I'd like for it to be. #2 I notice it starting to crease within a few hours of application even after I've set it with powder.  I will finish using it as I do like that it blends well but I won't repurchase.
reviews.review_title: It's just alright...Shape Tape it is NOT.

reviews.review_text: No matter what I do I have creases under my eyes, I've tried setting it with powder or even using less of it underneath my eye and it didn't help. I also got the color to match my foundation and it is just so much lighter and I know I got the one that supposed to match my Foundation or be the one that compliments my Foundation which it really doesn't to me and I really wanted it to work for me especially for the price and I really love a lot of the other Fenty products.
It’s super smooth, super flawless, and you don’t need too much.

A lot of the reviewers on YouTube, social media, have been trying the colors of concealer that are higher than their foundation number.  I use 360 in the foundation, so I wanted to follow Rihanna's instruction and get the concealer that is also 360.  This makes it soooo much easier than trying to swatch through the other 49 colors.  Initially I was concerned that the color was too close to my foundation color, but honestly I think there haven't been enough concealers on the market that match close enough to a foundation that actually matches my complexion. For years, I've been using concealers that are way too light because that's all that's been available.  This concealer has a great formula and blends in well with the foundation.  I would recommend that you get the shade that is paired with your foundation.  It's not drying (so far) and I have not experienced creasing, though I didn't wear it for long (just long enough to try it on with the foundation).  The applicator is nice and the coverage is good.  Highly recommend.

Definitely not what I expected this  concealer didn’t conceal well at all and I’m definitely a fan and buyer of Fenty products. This didn’t cover my under eye darkness or conceal other imperfections well at all very disappointed with this product going to definitely return.
reviews.review_title: Did not conceal well at all!!!!

reviews.review_text: I am a middle aged woman with under eye wrinkles. This concealer is too matte for under my eyes and only served to draw attention to my wrinkles. It showed lines that I didn't even know I had! During the day, my under eye area looked worse and worse. This concealer was definitely a no-no when used under the eye with the Fenty setting powder. Matte upon matte = aging under eyes. This concealer will do well with someone with normal skin who doesn't need to set with powder and would work for people without wrinkles. Not for me. It went back to the store.
reviews.review_title: Not a bad concealer, just not for me.

reviews.review_text: Very drying made me look older
Great coverage and super creamy.  I brought the same number as my foundation and it was enough highlight for me since i don't like a super highlighted look .

There's a lot of hype around this concealer right now, but its not that great in my opinion. It wasn't full coverage on me as it claims (but I also have very intense dark circles). the matte finish heavily emphasized by fine lines, making them look very crepey, even when I used a moisturizing eye cream and a light hand with the setting powder. It does last through the day well, but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone with normal, dry, or aging skin because of the finish.

GIRL!!! when i say no creasing i mean NO CREASING!! i wore this concealer for 12 hours and i don’t use any primer on my face ever. I set with the huda beauty powder and there was not a fine line in sight!!! this was such a thick and creamy concealer i was worried it’d cake up like nothing but i assumed WRONG. and the shade range is OUT OF THE WORLD!!! like i said rih rih did that!!!!

I love this concealer, it lasts all day since I work in an office and don’t touch up my makeup all day for about 10 hours and it doesn’t crease at least for me. I wore it all night a couple weekends ago to go clubbing with some girls and it looked incredible all night with my Fenty beauty foundation as well. Definitely would recommend to my fellow oily/combo makeup wearers!
reviews.review_title: Rihanna helping me hide my sins

reviews.review_text: The fenty line probably has the best shade range. But I was unenthused with the concealer. It’s expensive for the amount you get and it creases.
I looooooove this concealer. Doesn't crease on me. Flawfless finish. My favorite concealer now!!
The product is ok, definitely crease . I like it it’s not the best concealer I’ve used . Is medium to build able full coverage
This conceal is true to it's description. The crease-free and smoothing formula is amazing for any type of skin.
Coverage was ok but it creases like crazy and doesn’t play well with my other makeup products. I returned it. Hard pass.

This concealer is AMAZING! It really looks like a filter and it doesn’t even need the setting powder, because it doesn’t crease. The powder is a plus, because it warms the face as well. The concealer super blendable and long lasting.
It  was one of the best purchases so far !! The coverage is undeniable.
reviews.review_title: A must for your makeup collection

reviews.review_text: It creases after a few hours. other than that the coverage is amazing.

This is my new favorite concealer! It does not feel heavy on the skin, a little goes a long way, and it blends beautifully. I recommend putting it on in sections because it harder to blend the longer it sits. The coverage is medium to full coverage. I’d definitely repurchase. I would also recommend going a few shades lighter than the foundation if you are looking for a more brightening effect. I am shade 430 in the foundation and I used shade 390 for a highlight
I absolutely love this line! They knocked it out of the park with this concealer. It doesn’t move, it wears for 16 hours, it looks natural and very matte. I love it.
I love Fenty. Her shades are so inclusive!
I do love this concealer!! It has really pretty coverage and did not crease. I only took one star away because I like my shape tape better!

I've never been a concealer or foundation type of girl, because most concealers and foundations either: clog my pore, look mad cakey/disintegrated after a while, or they just look too different from my skin tone. BUT FENTY! Fenty did THAT! Fenty created a product that not only MATCHES MY SKIN AND DOESN'T CAKE UP BUT ALSO, ALSO IT CREATED A PRODUCT THAT DOESN'T CLOG MY PORES OR MY ACNE AND INSTEAD JUST COVERS IT UP AND OHMMMYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY I AM IN LOVE!!! Shout-out to Rihanna #NavyGang #CaribbeanGals I am so happy that this lives up to all the hype AND THEN SOME! 

I AM NOT BEING EXTRA WITH THIS REVIEW, I'M JUST SAYINNNNNNN DA TRUFFFFF!!

Creamy, non-drying, and full coverage.
Only downside is it takes some of my foundation off if I use it on my nose.
But easily one of my favorite concealers!

I’m in love with this concealer!  I believe it’s better than the Nars.  There’s a lot of shades and it covers acne very well!!  I use this product everyday and it lasts without primer.  It’s my go to!

Medium coverage concealer, does not dry down (has shiny, sticky texture), DEFINITELY creases so you need to set with powder right away. Have to do two layers to get a more full coverage, and wears pretty well for about 6 hours! Shade range is amazing, love all the undertones, was easy to find my perfect shade. It’s not great, I probably won’t buy it again once mine is gone.
Excellent  coverage and perfect matching

I love how it matches my skin tone perfectly. It's easy to blend. I am having an issue with creasing, but I am sure it has more to do with my application methods than the product. (I am not a make up pro. I only use concealer.)
Love how creamy this product is and not drying , it matched my complexion perfect . And it does conceal as it should

Wow, this conclear blends in flawlessly. Small amount of product goes a long way. Also easy to build up coverage but not necessary since it already does a great job with the first layer. I set it with Laura Mercier and the conclear lasts me through a 10 hour work day without having to touch up. I use a precision brush to blend it, have yet to try it with a beauty blender.

i love that this product is buildable because you can adjust based on what coverage you need. Keep in mind a little bit goes a long way so don't over apply. This might be a new staple in my makeup routine.
reviews.review_title: the perfect concealer for every skin tone

reviews.review_text:
Really great coverage. A little goes a long way. I can take it right out the tube and use it for both eyes. 

The only downfall is that it dries really quick so have that beauty blender ready to go.
creamy, doesn't dry too quickly, good coverage, last all day. Love it
The color was right. The creasing was wrong. Had to return. The creasing under my eye was just bad. I was so wanting it to work but it just didn’t

Shade range is excellent. Love the coverage, love the doefoot applicator. HOWEVER this is way more matte than I wanted. It’s what I should have expected, knowing her foundation. But it was way dry and way matte. My undereyes aged 10 years.
Shade spot on  but Creased horribly even with setting powder.  After several tries, returned.
Great coverage and value. I like the concealer better than the foundation

This is my new favorite concealer! I have been using this concealer everyday for about a month now and I am in love. I previously used the Nars Creamy Concealer and Tarte Shape Tape but this Fenty one is even better. I use it under my eyes, on my nose to brighten, and for blemishes. I tried the same color as my Fenty foundation and it matches perfectly. The consistency is creamy and it stays on pretty well. It still creases a little, but I have yet to find a concealer that doesn't crease at all!

I bought this because the brand I was using prior (which I loved) did not make a lighter shade that I liked for when I lost my tan. So, I was scared to change brands because I was very happy prior to trying this. BUT I will say, obviously the shade range is awesome with Fenty. I was able to find the lighter shade I wanted with the right undertone. So far I am in love and do not know if I will switch back! Highly recommend. Goes on smooth and doesn't dry too fast, which makes for perfect blending!!!!
I love this stuff! Coming from a person that doesn't wear a lot of make-up..this is a go to for small blemishes...
In love with Fenty foundation. It matches my skin tone perfectly! I will be a forever customer! Thank you!
Super dry looking under my eyes. I didn’t use it in any other part of my face so I can’t remark on that. As the color was too light for my face I returned.

This concealer is extremely dry, chalky and creases a ton. I really wanted to like this and I tried it with different eye creams and setting powders and it still does the same thing. Very disappointed. I wish I didn’t throw out my receipt.
I really like this for under eye concealer.  It doesn't crease or look cakey.
Wanted a under and between eyes concealer that did not seep into the superficial lines under my eyes. This does the trick

So. Bad. Drying and creased. This was so matte and made me look much older. I tried it with a brush, a sponge, and my finger. Even attempted to use the trick of dampening my sponge with Tatcha spray and it didn’t help. I’m fairly normal when it comes to skin and this was the worst complexion I’ve ever tried.
I love this concealer!! Its creamy and full coverage.

Even as a very matte product, this goes on creamy and blends like a dream. I dont bake long with it because then it will crease a bit. I wear a 300 in foundation and the 300 in concealer workers well to highlight. I can't really use it to conceal blemishes though as it is a bit lighter then my foundation. It's great. I love it.
By far this concealer is the best. My mornings are easier shaping my eye brow my time is cut in half. I love Fenty products. I will definitely recommend it

Great concealer. I love Fenty products so of course I had to purchase the concealer. I wear Fenty foundation shade 370. I purchased 370 concealer for a very natural look. 360 for a brighter look and 350 for the bomb highlight . All three shades work well and goes on smooth. A little product goes a long way use sparingly

Rihanna did it again. Love how I found a shade that fit my undertones as WELL as my pale-ness. When you're basically see through, it's hard to find products with the right tint that won't stand out on your skin. Blends well, good coverage.
I don’t like a super bright undereye so I like this for my foundation shade 430. It lasts so good.
This concealer is the bomb, definitely one of my favorites.

I LOVE THIS CONCEALER!!! I'm always looking to do a fresh face look for work. Baby!!! This is ALL I use!!! I dab this concealer over my problem spots and under my eyes. Folks act like I did the whole face. RHI!!!!! I need the Pro Filt'r Foundation to add a 425 b/c these products are simply AMAZING! Definietly will purchase in a different shade this summer. Y'all know what I'm talking about. We got range now.
reviews.review_title: ONE CONCEALER! AND ONE CONCEALER ONLY!

reviews.review_text: One of my favorite concealers ... I literally have nothing wrong to say about it.
Very happy with coverage and the vast color options.

it’s really full coverage, personallyI only use one or 2 dots around my eyes or on a blemish and i’m ready to go. It’s really to yellow for me (that’s why I gave it 4 stars) There’s so many shades, and this one said it has pink undertones... but I’m mostly finding it to look very yellow on me if I use too much.
The concealer is amazing. I also have the foundation. I have combination skin, oily on my t zone and dry in certain areas.
I love Fenty Beauty! I like how it smells and the texture of it. How it applies to the skin.

I use this concealer shade 345  to brighten. I wear 420 foundation shade 440 in the summer. This foumula is very creamy and does not crease much. A little goes a long way. So be mindful. I’m very satisfied with my purchase I got 345 (for brightening) and 390 (to compliment) my 420 shade for foundation

I really like this concealer. My under eyes tend to be more on the dry side so some concealers make the area actually look worse but not this one. My under eye area doesn’t crease and still feels hydrated after hours of wear. It’s also buildable!
Matched perfectly with good coverage
This is by far my favorite concealer! The creamy texture it has, it’s gives an awesome coverage for your under eyes, and and it’s blendable. 10/10 would highly recommend
I love this concealer! It is easy to blend and matches the fenty foundations perfectly! It is much less thick than tarte shape tape which makes it easier to blend and makes it crease less.
I LOVE THIS PRODUCT !!!

AMAZING dream product - great coverage without the tackiness/stickiness. Doesn't crease or get oily throughout the day. I use a small beauty blender to apply and I couldn't be happier. I have very dark circles under my eyes so this has been a lifesaver!
Love this concealer! Easy to apply and lasts all day (even without setting powder/spray). I have the foundation in the same shade and it still has a natural brightening effect
Super creamy! Really wanted to love it but it accentuated my pores and fine lines under my eyes. Dried out my skin overall.

This product has come in handy. I love how smooth it is and the color match is beautiful! However, it wipes off easily and I can feel that I have it on! Over all I’m gonna keep using it, it’s an amazing match
Love this product. Brightens skin instantly. I highly recommend it.

Love, love, love! This product is the best. It’s been a long time since I have had the confidence to wear my hair away from my face, and this product has definitely changed that! It covers every little dark spot perfectly. If you don’t have this product yet, and you use Fenty products... you need this in your life!
Got this as a gift. I like the shade and the covering power but sometimes it creases under my eyes. But over all I think it's one of my favorite at the moment!

Sooo sooo disappointed in this concealer!! Im a huge fenty beauty fan as well as rihanna fan. However, this concealer is a total let down!! I rushed to get it for norhing! The whole your shade is the same as your foundation shade thing is definitely not the case!! Infact it actually matched my foundation shade to the tee which was awkward... honestly it’s like foundation in a bottle! I applied it and almost instantly i had under eye creases! My nars never does that to me! With or without powder at that! I was very upset and will be returning this for a newer nars concealer. Love fentys foundation it works amazing as well as the primers! But this concealer was a big miss....

Have had dark circles and watery eyes as long as I can remember, was hoping I finally found my holy Grail, but it wasn't.

Gets cakey and accentuates my creases. I've used it before and after foundation, with and without setting powder, moisturizer, and primer, and with varying degrees of coverage. All I know is within an hour the product has shifted and is in the creases of my undereye. Guess I'm still on the hunt for a concealer!

this product is too sticky even hours later and stays on way too well i couldn't even wash it off with my go-to cleanser which takes off all my other make up so i tried my new cleanser from korea which worked like a charm but this stuff looked horrible it creases a lot so it's going back to the store. i love rihanna but i can live without concealer this was also the first concealer that i tried #newbie2makeup
reviews.review_title: Super tacky and sticky, creases for days.

reviews.review_text: Sadly its a no for me. It’s very drying and emphasizes fine lines like crazy. I tried setting with Laura Mercier powder and it did not help. Am I suppose to use this only with the Fenty powder? I got the same color as my foundation, but the concealer still looked a tad bit lighter -not the worst though.
