It says it’s supposed to be creaseless but I have never had issues with concealer creasing until this one! It creases so bad on me even with powder! It also gets cakey if u set it while it’s too wet. Also doesn’t have enough coverage as I would like.
Purchased the wrong shade. Went to the mall to get assistance and the woman was wonderful. She found the right shade and put it on me and I fell in love!!!
Not what expected but does cover up somewhat
This concealer feels so light I forget I’m wearing it. It doesn’t end up looking chalky or cakey on my dry skin and even my under eyes look smooth and not crepey!

I have genetically dark under-eye circles, I'm a med student, and I have light olive skin which makeup NEVER matches... my face is like Mount Everest for concealers, and this is the best one I've found. It lasts all day. Coverage is medium-full which you can build up to full. A little goes a long way. The finish is a soft satin-ey matte that looks like natural skin. It covers my mild redness and acne scars perfectly. I have the fenty 180 foundation as well and the concealer is a seamless match. It does crease little bit under the eyes, but I have found that you can fix this by waiting ten or fifteen minutes after application and then just blending out the creases. Setting spray helps as well.
reviews.review_title: amazing for dark circles and olive complexion

reviews.review_text: Great concealer, very creamy and beautiful finisg
I cannot live without it...her make-up will never die

This is a very good product but this is a little drying under my eyes. If you have dry skin, make sure you moisturize well. 

In the foundation. I’m 350
Concealer: 340 350 360
nice finish. good coverage

Okay, so I wanted to love this concealer but no matter how I apply it, it just makes my undereyes look aged and dry. It creases really badly and feels really thick and sticky. The only thing I like is the colour match.
reviews.review_title: worst concealer I’ve ever used for under eye area.

reviews.review_text: Amazing coverage and no creases! Probably going to stick with this concealer for a while, absolutely love it!
New fav. Creamy and doesn't dry as quickly as the fenty foundation.  Blends so well with skin I sometimes dont even bother with foundation
Great coverage and colour match. Drying if used with a setting powder but holds well without one so eh! Probably won't repurchase because of my dry flaky skin but overall a good product!
If you a student and never sleep cause teachers be giving you mad work to do and expect it you to have it done the next day get this you’ll look like you got 24 of sleep
reviews.review_title: looks like you got 24hrs of sleep

reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of Fenty products and use the 150 Pro Filtr Foundation so was excited to try this. I used it for a week and I think it just aged me. It creased very easily and I think it has to do with the creaminess of the formula. I ended up with a lot of visible lines around my eyes and under. Disappointed but will definitely keep using the foundation.

I’ve very drying in my opinion. It has great coverage but seems to excentuate the texture of your under eye skin, making it look dry. It also seems hard to blend out sometimes - as if it’s too rich and dries quickly on the skin.  I set it with a few different powders and it seemed to turn out the same no matter what I used. 

Not for me.
Love it ! It looks flawless on the skin . One of my favorites concealers now.

Love it. I’ve used Nars for years in the color Amanda. I may still use it from time to time in the winter. However, this is perfect for warmer weather because it is like a demi matte and creates a soft look that doesn’t come off too dewy or oily. 420 matches my skin tone perfectly.
reviews.review_title: Best Color Options for Women of All Shades

reviews.review_text: I use two layers, covers great with min. creasing! Have been using Tarte Shape Tape for a long time, this one is lighter, easier on the under eye skin.
This is a very good concealer, not as full coverage as I would have liked but does a great job! It builds well just dries fast so do one eye at a time.
I like this product because of the extensive color shade, it is not full coverage on me, but great for brightening! Didn’t crease or do anything weird under my eyes.
Great match, doesn't not feel heavy or clogging. Very happy with this purchase!

Amazing concealer. I honestly just wear it without a foundation and it evens out my skin. It stays on all day and doesn't make me oily. The only weird thing is though that when I use the Fenty primer under, it really make it dry and flaky. So overall, I recommend this foundation, but maybe use a more hydrating primer underneath!
Luv it. Easy to blend, olive undertones. Does not turn yellow after few hours. Best concealer ever.
I use it over my Fenty Foundation. I love how I use the same number as the foundation and it’s a perfect match. I only have to use two small dots and it has great coverage for my dark circles.
Amazing coverage, completely covers up my under eye bags which is so great! Amazing skin tone match. I’m so happy with Fenty and love their products!
Love the way this looks on my skin! The finish is really pretty. Definitely medium coverage, but buildable.

This concealer is really amazing. I love that Fenty has created corresponding shades to the foundation because it makes it easier to shop and adjust the colour without too much work. I know a lot of people want a brighter highlight, but I am so over that and does Rihanna really doesn't have an overly highlighted face, nope. Rihanna is all about a natural fresh look and she did that with her concealer. The concealer gives a nice subtle highlight to the face. It blends out easier and doesn't dry too quickly. The applicator gets a lot of product so you don't need to dip back into the tube. The formula is creamy and a little thick but it makes the skin look perfect. It also stays in places and does not move at all. I have combination to oily skin and my tzone is the oiliest so the concealer does break down on my nose but does not move.

Concealer that does the trick with loads of shades to match your skin tone to perfection.  That said, didn’t think it lived up to its “no crease” promise.  Since the shade is so perfect I would recommend.

PROS:
- Moderate coverage. 
- Smooth blendability. 
- Small and narrow applicator allows for detailed placement on areas of the face.

CONS:
- Poor longevity. I have combination dry skin and it did not last well on my face. 
- Price for performance is not great.
I really enjoyed this product although I still love my Mac Pro longwear comcealer better this is a strong second contender. Also it’s best to do one eye at a time because it dries down very quickly.
I love it! On the days I don’t want to wear foundation I’ll just spot conceal & it stays on all day without making it look like I’m actually wearing makeup!
Crease city...and looks grainy when applied not smoothing at all

I picked this up because I love the foundation. I picked it up in the same colour # as the foundation.  I usually use Nars creamy concealer or Tarte Shape Tape.   The colour match was way too light for the foundation despite me normally liking a lighter concealer than my foundation.   So I would keep that in mind if you think to just get the same #, I wear #150 and I would say I should have gotten #170.   I have dry skin so I use a very hydrating eye cream but even with that I found it made my undereyes looked older and excentuated any dryness.   I went back to my Shape Tape and definately saw an improvement.   I will be returning this for a bottle of the foundation.
reviews.review_title: Love the foundation, not the concealer

reviews.review_text: This concealer lasts longer than my foundation lol. It stays on my face all day and covers very well. I probably got a shade too light but I still love this concealer. Definitely will repurchase!!
Love it!!! Makes me look beautiful!!
a little disappoint. This is my first fenty product. Quite dry on under eye area. Im a comb skin.

Honeslty I love Riri but this really was bad for my skin. I have pretty normal if not slightly oily skin/ eye lids. I used this for a few days and my entire eye area dried out and became red and crusty. It's been two weeks since I've used it and I'm still recovering from it. It could totally be a personal thing so don't take any one opinion too seriously but this royally ruined my skin.
Perfect. Consistency is thicker than the foundation.

Amazing!! Got this in my normal shade (420) and a lighter one to add under eye brightness (380) and this stuff is the best! The 420 matches perfectly and I can literally just wear that if I want! I love how creamy it is and how smooth it applies. RIRI IS THE QUEEN. Buy this!! You need it.
Didn’t really cover my under eyes very well. It covered up acne alright, but barely any under eye coverage.

Love this concealer! It’s rich, creamy, and no under eye-creases. It goes on smooth during application and provides excellent coverage. It’s also easy to blend out on your skin. Love love this! Best purchase yet.

I swear by other fenty products but this concealer really did not like me... I separated, creased, and made my skin feel disgusting. I spent a week trying to make it work with different application and setting techniques but I had to return it just because it was not doing anything for me. Still love the brand, this just was not for me.
reviews.review_title: I wanted so badly for this to be great

reviews.review_text:
I was sooooo excited to try this concealer but unfortunately, it looked horrible on my skin. 

I have combo skin (oily t zone, normal cheeks, mostly normal forehead and chin) so I was excited to use this since it claims to be matte and creaseless; however, it would break up around my nose and chin, usually within 2-3 hours and would crease pretty badly under my eyes while still looking matte, so I felt pretty crusted and busted. 

Another MAJOR downside was that anytime I would put concealer anywhere near the apples of my cheeks or on the bridge of my nose, after blending it would lift the foundation off my skin. I tried plenty of different ways to try to prevent it from happening (e.g., Beaty blender, RT sponge, concealer brush, foundation brush, lightly powdering, baking, reapplying concealer to lifted areas, different foundation/primer combos) but to no avail. 

The only reason I gave it 2 stars was because of the shade range. But even tho it’s worked for other people, it’s gonna be a no for me dawg☠️
reviews.review_title: YEAH, IT’S GONNA BE A NO FOR ME DAWG

reviews.review_text: Love ittttttt and would totally recommend
Not happy at all. worse concealer ever. i have dry skin after applying this i got patches and looked horrible.

I am in LOVE with this product. I have dark circles that are so bad due to genetics and I am always looking for a concealer that will cover and last all day. This is beyond anything I have ever used... its so so good. Full coverage, great forumula... makes you look flawlessly air brushed. Yes Riri coming through with all the best stuff! Highly recommend and will buy again and again.

I was extremely disappointed with this product. When I first applied it , it was beautiful. Nothing has matched my skin better. As the day progresses, it’s drying ...very dry. I’ve tried setting it with several different powders and none at all but with the same outcome. I’ve never had a problem with creasing...until now. Idk a miss for me .

Its an ok concealer , Ive been wearing it with the fenty powder & foundation. It lasts all day. It blends beautiful with a sponge but I wish it was thicker and more coverage as I find myself applying two layers & I dnt even have dark circles.

Best concealer I have ever used! Got it for my birthday a few days ago and I am obsessed with it. Doesn’t crease or look caked! I wore it to work in a restaurant and it lasted my whole closing shift! So many shades to choose from even my boyfriend was impressed.
Everyone always forgets us lighter olive shade girls! Thank god for Riri. This is excellent and NOT drying. Love LOVE LoVe.

not bad!! it’s pretty long wearing and looked really smooth under my eyes. it doesn’t stick to dry patches, which is super nice. my only complaint is that it isn’t quite as full coverage as i’d like it to be. it works best for me on areas where my skin isn’t quite so oily (i have extremely oily skin). bottom line, it’s a good product and a good price!

I'm never buying another concealer. I have dry skin and I thought this would be too drying but it's lovely and lasts for so long. Plus as someone with VERY pale skin with pink undertones I find it hard to the right shade, but omg that shade range has one for everyone

Hands down the best concealer on the market. My mom and I both use this. So I have super dark circles under my eyes, and this erases them. My mum has wrinkles under her eyes and this is totally crease-proof. A total win by Fenty.

obsessed with this concealer!! lasts all day under my eyes and is 100% crease proof. it blends out really nicely and leaves a nice smooth natural finish. i’d totally recommend to anyone with oily skin.

I sadly cannot find my shade. The shade also blends weirdly and doesn't blend smoothly into the skin. This concealer emphasizes texture also! I wish I could love it but even with all the shades there isn't one for me! The look of it is pretty bad too

The concealer is good and easy to work with. However it creases! I first thought it was my primer but I’ve tried different primer and I put the setting powder, even still it creases. That’s my only problem with it. Other than that it’s great!

I wanted to like this but I could not find a colour that matched me well. I tried applying it many ways and I found it did not look good under my eyes and emphasized dry skin I didn't even know that I had. If you can find a good colour and don't have super dry skin I still think it's worth a try.

This concealer is the best. An amazing soft matte finish, and it brightens up under my eyes so well! I'm a 150 in foundation, and this pairs so beautifully with it, yet does not look identical to the foundation. This is much easier to use than the matchstix, in my opinion, yet using the matchstix to contour might work better than using this. Anyways, would 13/10 recommend! (Knowing your foundation shade makes getting the concealer much easier!)

Meh, 
This product is not for dry skin! I found it looked dry and flakey under my eyes, no matter how little product I used. I wouldn’t even say this is full coverage maybe a medium? And if I was to build it up to make it more full coverage it would be like wall paper glue under my eyes!
Hate this concealer. It is SO dry. Doesn't cover my dark circles like shape tape. I wish I could return it.

In the Foundation I wear 210 normally and 240 when I'm tan so I went with the 210 in the concealer and I love it. I do not like a drastic concealer and its perfect. A little goes a long way and is not cakey or drying on my oily skin.
reviews.review_title: Bought 210 as a 210 in the Foundation

reviews.review_text:
i usually don’t write reviews but oh god... this concealer really doesn’t do anything for me. i’ve been late for school multiple times this week due to my makeup acting up and having to redo it 
and i haven’t understood what’s been happening. my foundation has been lifting off of my face in patches when i blend out my concealer, and i assumed it was my dry skin. but today after redoing my makeup i tried using one of my other concealers (born this way) and my makeup was flawless as ever. this concealer made my makeup look cakey and patchy and gross in so many ways. and it was also pretty drying. i usually love fenty products but idk about this one
Love this concealer! It's my new favorite, replacing shape tape! Looks amazing alone and with the setting powder (:

It’s actually okay. I will continue to use it but just a bit cakey for my skin type. It did not crease as bad as other concealers even with creasy under eye lids. I set it with power and lasted. I will use it after moisturizing since I think it will work better. Hopefully it does.
Really good concealer
I really like this formula. It works really well with all of the foundations I’ve used with it.

This may be my new all time favourite concealer! (sorry shape tape)... although this concealer does not seem to be as full coverage as shape tape, it blends out so nicely and builds up beautifully, so it is possible to achieve full coverage with this. I use 150 in the foundation as well and the concealer seems to be a slight bit brighter than the foundation, which I LOVE because makes your skin look naturally highlighted in the right places. The formula has a hydrating whipped texture, while still drying down matte. 
I do not currently use this concealer with the fenty powder but it is something I am wanting to try! With my other powder, I do see slight creasing at the end of the day, but its nothing that bothers me.

The product applied smoothly and settled amazing throughout the day, however, it creased a little on me after about 6 hours. I would recommend people dry skin avoid it though, on my drier days, I noticed it clung to some patches.
Goes on creamy and settles into a beautiful matte finish. This item has become one of my staples, absolutely love it!
love. it was creamy and covered dark circles. definitely buy this product gently did it again.

Whatever concealer you're using now, throw it away, kick it out the window and get yourself some Pro Filt'r baby! Not ONLY does this barely crease on the eyes but it goes on as this creamy, thick-ish, soft matte texture that dries MATTE! And stays matte all freaking day. I bought this shade because I love a highlighted under eye and I have not put it down since I got it!
reviews.review_title: Idk who in the Fenty Lab is getting a raise but...

reviews.review_text: It’s a great everyday concealer. Has a medium converage. Glides and blends beautiful on the skin. Lasts all day and does not oxides. Worth every penny

This product is NOT for dry skin. The lady at Sephora told me it is. You can see every pore and they market it as not creasing but it does. Every single dry patch on my face could be seen. This may look ok in pics but if someone is standing near they can see everything.
reviews.review_title: NOT FOR DRY SKIN. AND NOT FOR WINTER

reviews.review_text: The formula of this product is like no other I have come across before on a concealer, however there is no coverage for dark circles as I have use small amounts at a time to layer. However this is amazing as an eyeshadow primer it doesn't crease. The major draw back for me is the shade choice i will have to disagree with Fenty aka RIRI sorry boo but the shade 235 does not compliment the foundation 235. This shade is describe as for medium skin with warm undertones. When I swatched the foundation next to the concealer i notice it is way darker than the foundation. That is a big no no for me plus the undertone of the concealer is not warm at all it is more of a neutral shade. Even the picture on the box displays the undertone. I purchase this online and I will be returning tomorrow for another color just because this does not crease. This is a good base to add another concealer. I tested this out by adding the two faced multi sculpting concealer on top just a dap and it didnt crease all day. Overall the formula is great we just need more coverage and accurate undertones for the matching foundation number. I know this was a lot to read but I really hope this helps someone think twice before purchasing online.
reviews.review_title: This does not compliment the same shade number

reviews.review_text: I wanted to love it, but my probably with Fenty products is that it pulls every bit of moisture out of my skin and showcases every fine line on my face. If you have dry or somewhat dehydrated skin (or like me you drink a lot of coffee and not enough water), it’s pretty rough to use.

Okay, I love Rihanna and she can do us no wrong with her shade range. I am a perfect 300 match for her foundation and at first got the concealer in 260, (I love a highlighted look). 260 blended right into the foundation as if i had gotten the perfect match, so I exchanged it for 280, which was actually lighter because of the undertone when compared to 260. It was a tiny bit, the smallest amount of brighter but after drying down and setting it, it seemed exactly like 260 and the foundation. I finally went back and exchanged it for the concealer in 160 and thank god this one worked. I was scared that it was going to be too white/ light because it's in the 100 range and I am 300 in the foundation, but actually, it was more than perfect. 
Moving on to the consistency, when I first tried this concealer out I did not like it. I am only 20 years old but at the time I was using an eye serum that gave me visible lines ad this concealer sank right into it and setting it made it worst. I removed the eye serum from my routine and my under eyes returned to normal (specifically that one very visible wrinkle disappeared) and the concealer applied perfectly. It blends in like a dream. That being said this concealer might not work for mature under eyes or you can make it work but you definitely have to be more careful with it. I am used to using the Shape tape but wanted something just as pigmented but more hydrating. I use the colors light-medium (for a highlighted look) and medium (for a perfect match or no foundation day) in the shape tape for reference.
reviews.review_title: Pigmented and hydrating-not for mature under eyes

reviews.review_text: I have had the most difficult time trying to find a concealer that actually CONCEALS and Rih has knocked it out of the park AGAIN!! I love that I don't have to guess which one I need because the formula corresponds to the foundation. It's so perfect!!
It is so easy to blend, and this is perfect for brightening the under eye. I have the Nars radiant one too but that one doesn't brighten.
Hands down my new favorite concealer. I have not picked up any of my oldie but goodies since I bought this.

The color match is great for me but it just doesn’t seem to DO anything. Under my eyes I can’t tell much difference at first, but throughout the day it seemed my eyes actually looked worse than normal. Tried it to conceal a blemish and it just doesn’t have any coverage.
Very natural slightly dewy finish
reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way

reviews.review_text:
This concealer is the best color match I've ever found. I'm white, so you'd think since I have way more options than most that I'd be able to find a good match, no problem. My skin tone is actually surprisingly tricky to pin down. I'm light/medium and fairly neutral but with some yellow tones, and everything I've ever found has been the right tone but not the right shade or level or whatever. Too pink or too gray or too ashy or too dark, you get it. Not this one. Shade 185 disappears into my skin without foundation. It also does an amazing job concealing my super intense dark circles. It's full coverage, so I can dab it where I want and then buff it out, meaning that I can do the "no makeup" thing but still cover a zit or redness if I want to. 

I've tried a million concealers, including two of the $80 Cle de Peau ones, and Rihanna's got them all beat.
Nice but not the best... medium coverage and I love me a full coverage so I think I’m going to return it

my favorite concealor i’ve ever used! it blends so easily into my skin and covers any imperfection. whenever i where it, i always get compliments on my makeup. it’s so affordable for great results. i will definitely be buying it again!

I really wanted to like this because I heard so much about it. But just be warned that this product is not for you if you have dry skin or signs of aging. It had good coverage but it dried so quickly and really accentuated my fine lines and skin texture.
This product is great for no makeup makeup days. Best to bounce on with wet sponge

I got this concealer to match my foundation and It’s super creamy and beautiful on the skin, on most days I don’t even set the concealer because it doesn’t crease excessively, it is a little lighter than I had thought but like the foundation it oxidizes decently. I currently mix it with my shape tape to brighten the under-eye more and might purchase a darker one for the summer.
LOVE. it’s medium to full coverage but is buildable forsure. I have dry combo skin and I loved It.

I love FENTY Beauty products, this concealer is nice and does a decent job in covering breakout areas. But for dark circles under the eyes I find I need to apply two coats. It is not crease proof as they clam. I would recommend it as just an everyday concealer.

I was soooo excited to try out this concealer, but it ended up making my under eyes look worse! I applied this concealer like I did any other, and it ended up accentuating my fine lines, even with setting powder. The Sephora employee told me to let the concealer sit for a bit before blending it out, which did help a bit, but I still wasn’t able to get a creaseless finish. The consistency was a bit thicker than I had imagined, but it’s very blend-able!

The color was lighter than pictured.  I use it on my under eyes before I put on foundation.  I find it works best that way to conceal my dark circles.  It has a peachy tone which I prefer for that area.  Very moisturizing.  Not bad.  I also got a lighter for the under eye and it was too light
reviews.review_title: Not as dark I thought it was going to be.

reviews.review_text: I love Rihanna let me say that first I am apart of the Fenty hive. I have the Fenty slides, Fenty foundation highlight and lipgloss. I stayed up until 3am waiting on this product to release! When I finally got it I noted three things I didn’t like 1. It dried down quickly making it super hard to blend. 2. CREASY I didn’t even notice I had creases until I purchased this. 3. DRY I’m oily so nothing every looks dry on me but this did. Apart of me still wants to love it but I had to be real and return it :(
reviews.review_title: Fenty Hive For Life.. but this didn’t make the cut

reviews.review_text: It looked really pretty in the beginning, but it kind of got darker on me and it dried out over the day making my skin look VERY CREEPY!
It creased on me fairly quickly which was disappointing and not the highest level of coverage. Overall it was an okay concealer not the best in the bunch.

I got my concealer matched with my foundation which was really good and fun both products I love didnt crease on me at all.I would have to say the foundation and the concealer are my all time fav FOREVER
too drying and the color made my under eyes look grayish.

They didnt have the shade I needed, so I opted for this super light shade. I don't have a shade in the foundation, but this is pretty amazing. 

Texture: creamy, semi-thick
Application: less is more, start light then build up
Blendability: I recommend letting it dry down slightly before blending, as it tends to father slightly in fine lines when too wet; doesn't dry down super fast
Wear: Set this well and you'll be fine ALL DAY

IF YOU SET WITH A COLORED POWDER... the concealer will change color. This shade works for me bc I use the Fenty powder in Honey, which makes it more yellow/neutral and a little darker. The more you let it dry, the less the color changes.
lasts all day, looks beautiful. coverage of shape tape with finish/blendability of nars radiant creamy.
Such a beautiful finish and is not drying at all. Love using this for when I want to do what I call a “mommy beat” (spot conceal, brows, light brush, and dew wet highlight). I look so fresh faced.

I love this! I have oily skin with very dry under eyes. This doesn’t crease or dry out my eyes! It’s the perfect concealer, it lasts all day and I mean from 6am to 11pm. There’s lots of people mentioning that it creases but I put it on before my foundation, put my Male Up Forever WaterBlend foundation on, and I set my under eyes with MAC pressed powder, then set my whole face with MUF pressed invisible powder. No creasing, smudging or budging. My dark circles are medium-bad, not extremely terrible and the concealer covers it perfectly
It’s not full coverage. At all. You’re getting medium at best. It also creases like a mofo, even with the Fenty powder.

I love this concealer! I have been searching for many years for a good concealer that does not cake or dry out my under eye area. This is a concentrated formula, but not so much that it goes on thick and dries out my skin. It blends easily and has a light feeling on the skin. I am very happy with this concealer and have tried a lot of different ones.

LOVE it. I wish one layer concealed a bit more, but it's buildable so it's fine. I originally ordered 210, the same shade as my foundation, but bought 145 to brighten under my eyes. I should have tried it in the store instead of going online - 145 is a lil too light, but that's fine, I'll mix it with a dash of my 210 and it works. It's smooth, not too heavy, not too watery, it really is buildable, and it doesn't pull on my undereye area when I'm applying or blending. I've used the applicator, a concealer brush, and a mini beauty blender with it and they're all great. I do have to be careful with the thin skin under my eyes - I'm 43 and things can get real cakey real easily but this does NOT. I've set it using the new Fenty setting powder and most recently I baked it with the Too Faced Peach setting powder for a different effect and I love it either way! Love the color range. Basically this concealer is getting me back into concealers when I'd kind of given up on them for the last 20 years, no lie. Bless you Rihanna! You have changed my makeup GAME.

There are much better concealers out there. It has a matte finish that is very drying under the eyes and it creases like crazy even with powder. I’d say it’s about a medium coverage. You can definitely still see dark circles through it. I love the Fenty foundation and was super excited for this concealer, but it just doesn’t do the things I usually look for in a high quality concealer.

I've actually never tried the foundation (guess i should!) but I love fenty and rihanna so I wanted to check this concealer out. I went with 150 since I'm pretty neutral, and at first I thought this would be too light, but it's really nice and brightening under the eyes. It DOES take some work to blend into your skin because it is thicker than your average concealer. But once it's on, it stay solid for the whole day! I've tried it as an eye primer as well, and it does a good job, just give it enough time to dry first. You also need the TINIEST amount, so a little goes a long way. I definitely recommend this concealer to anyone

I tried so hard to like this. I support Rhianna in every way and there are so many of her products that I love. The shade I chose (385) was a beautiful neutral shade, and after my makeup was complete everything sat nicely. Unfortunately as the day went on my undereyes turned into a creasy disaster and it's worse than any other concealer I own. I tried it with her setting powder and foundation and also with my favorite combinations and it creased like crazy every time. I hate it didn't work out.

I really like this concealer it's VERY creamy to me. But let me tell you something I personally let my concealer sit a little before I blend it out and since this concealer is so creamy it takes a minute to dry down. its like medium to full coverage so its kinda time-consuming. So i would personally get a new color to spot conceal and stick with my drug store under eye but PSA YOU NEED TO COLOR MATCH IN STORE I NORMALLY GO OFF SWATCH PICTURES AND BUY ONLINE BUT WITH FENTY YOU HAVE TO GO INTO THE STORE SWATCH AND THEN LEAVE THE STORE TO SEE THE COLOR IN REAL LIGHT I NEVER WANTED TO BUT YOU WILL REGRET IT IF YOU DONT!!  I love Rihanna and have N E V E R wrote a review but this needs to be said because we all dont have the coin to throw around!!

I always struggled with concealers, I have SUPER dry under eyes and also a few wrinkles. I often feel like dark circles looked better than concealer did as they all creased / looked too dry or the more hydrating ones simply didn’t have enough coverage.UNTIL this one! I bought the same shade as my foundation (which BTW is my favorite foundation ever) , and I got so many compliments. It has the coverage I need and also didn’t crease or make my eyes look dried out. Also after a long day of work. Also my husband noticed the difference (I buy new makeup all the time and he never notices) soooo happy with this concealer!

This concealer is definitely the best out there.  It covers do well and looks so natural. I'm shocked by the negative reviews bc this is the only  concealer that doesn't look dry. Definitely a must have!!!!!
I switched over to this from Tape Shape and was very disappointed. The coverage is good but it sat awkwardly under my eyes and separated within a few hours.

The concealer is beautiful, creamy, it blends amazing, the color is just right BUT if you have dry under eyes I would not recommend this concealer within 2 hours my concealer looked DRY and CREASED (mind you I do use a good hydrating under eye cream)

This concealer is the best one day I had an event to go to but my allergies was acting up I used this concealer and wen I say this concealer did not budge with my watery eyes alllllllday long it was a miracle love it soo much I use 240 for brightening my under eyes i use 310 foundation
reviews.review_title: looooovvveee it not to matte not to dewy

reviews.review_text: I purchased this concealer with the matching foundation from Sephora. I love the applicator, the packaging, and the consistency of the product., but I do not love the the concealer overall. The color match is a hit, but the wear was not. It settles into my fine lines and creases horrendously under my eyes and in my smile lines with or without setting with powder or spray. Because it settles, it also enhances any texture on my skin which is NOT cute. Finally, it transfers SO badly, which defeats the purpose of wearing a transfer resistant foundation. I’ll be returning mine.

When this product first came out, I was so excited to see all the reviews on youtube. However, what I heard and watched was not what came through for me.
Pros: the concealer matched my skin tone beautifully and sat underneath the eyes well. Doesn't budge much either. 
Cons: this product sunk SO DEEPLY into my smile lines around my lips I was SHOOK. I've never had a product do that before, so I was very disappointed after noticing them a few hours into the wear. It's also not a longwear concealer. 
Overall, don't expect much from this product. Good for in the moment, but just not for people like me who don't like reapplying makeup throughout the day.

This concealer is definitely not full coverage. I would say it’s a medium. I liked the hydrated look it gave my under eyes and it does spread a long way and blend out easily. But it does crease. It’s nice for a light makeup day but I will be sticking to my shape tape and born this way.

I was really excited when this product came out. The color was perfect for me and I loved the creamy formula- but immediately it started creasing on me horribly. I tried to blend out the creasing with my beauty blender- 1 second later the creasing was back. I tried to also build up the covered like the description said I could, and it looked cakey and dry. Disappointing. I'm sticking to my shape tape!
reviews.review_title: I really wanted to like it!

reviews.review_text: TEST THE COLOURS IN STORE. I wear the shade 260 in the foundation. The concealer is marked as already being lighter than the foundation of you but the corresponding shade. I like a bright under eye so I bought shade 235. It was a full shade DARKER than my foundation. Thankfully, I use it (mixed with a lighter one) to correct acne spots. I had to buy shade 135 to have a brighter under eye and it's still not even that bright. HOWEVER, it's amazing. The coverage is next level and it's so smooth and easy to work with. I definitely recommend this product but pleassseee colour match in store.
reviews.review_title: AMAZING BUT test thd colours in store

reviews.review_text: Comparable coverage to NARS, works well with too faced concealer as well.
reviews.review_title: Looks good alone as well as with foundation

reviews.review_text: This concealer is so creamy and blendable that it knocked out the tarte shape tape for sure it’s medium to full coverage which I love and it doesn’t set super fast like shape tape would: you have time to blend it out and it’s something you don’t nessacarily have to set. It covers all my imperfections and more. I use foundation 140, so I got this in 140 thinking it would be the same shade but luckily it was a perfect fit to lighten and brighten.

This concealer is a success in my book. The formula is soooo creamy, yet NOT cakey at all!  It blends like a dream (I used a damp Beauty Blender) and matches my undertone to perfection. It doesn't have a nasty "makeup" smell which is really nice. I even used it to highlight under my eyebrows and it looked so natural!  I wear shade 440 In Fenty Foundation and took the concealer a shade lighter for a more popping highlight and this shade is perfect for that. 

You can't go wrong with this concealer, trust me!
SO DRYING. I’m young and I take really good care of my skin, this Concealer made my under eyes look dry and crusty. It was horrible.
reviews.review_title: STAY AWAY IF YOU HAVE DRY SKIN

reviews.review_text: So this concealer brightened and covered my dark circles better than anything i've used recently.  However, it creased so badly on me, even though I did set with the butter powder.  Made my fine lines under my eyes so much more prominent.  I have tried it with different primers, no primer and different eye products and same result everytime. Maybe would be great for someone with no lines.
reviews.review_title: Not creaseless for me, but did cover dark circles.

reviews.review_text: I’m sorry but this concealer is not my favorite by far. It creases sooooo badly.

Unfortunately, this concealer did not work for me. As soon as I attempted to blend it in, it literally blended AWAY and left patches under the eye. I tried with a brush and a beauty blender and the same thing happened. I had to save it with my tarte shape tape and luckily it ended up looking okay. I am returning it today, sadly, because I really wanted to love it. I was excited because I finally have my shade in the foundation with Fenty’s new released shades, so I was hoping I would have the concealer to go along with it but.. no luck :(

I am pretty disappointed with this concealer, the color matched beautifully and I was really excited to try but it creases so badly, and lifts the foundation around it. I feel like I have to keep reapplying throughout the day. Never mind trying to bake with it, that seems like asking to much

I finally have a while using this product enough to review & to answer any doubts : yes it’s creamy, yes it’s full coverage but .... I’m giving it 4 starts because it’s not crease proof. Usually I know we all naturally crease but for some reason this concealer no matter if I bake/lightly set/or not set at all it gives me this deep one line crease after about 4-6hrs of using it. Usually other of my favorites will last about a full day before creasing ugly. 

FYI: my under-eye area is neither on the oily or dry.

This concealer is nice. It makes my under eye look smooth. It’s a medium coverage for me I would still need to add a corrector if I want my dark circles to completely disappear. I still prefer my too faced multi use sculpting concealer
I am so sad. this was horrible. it's to heavy. it doesn't melt In to the skin. it aged my under eyes 10 years.

I feel like I have to say that I LOVE the pro filt'r foundation. 
 Love love love.  The release of the concealer had me hyped.  THEN I tried it.  It bums me out on how bad this formula creases!  Because it comes out so creamy, like the foundation, but ugh, it settles!  I don't have dry under eyes, but this concealer would crease like CRAZY and settle into my skin and just make any imperfection so much more noticeable.  I tried applying it several different ways (precision sponge, brush, finger, letting it set then blend, blending right away) and the result was always the same.

I gave it two stars because I find it did cover up my dark spots, but I prefer the coverage of Nars Radiant over this product.  The applicator is fantastic, you really can apply as little or as much as you want.  The other thing I liked is that your Fenty foundation number does correlate with the concealer.  You can adjust if you need, but I like that it's just set up this way.

This concealer definitely deserves 100 stars. It is the only concealer that has ever worked for me because not only that it covers well, it also doesn't look dry at all. All the other concealers I've tried looked dried on me, but not this one. I'll forever be using this concealer and I highly suggest everyone to use it. And for better result use setting spray after using this and you will love it!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This concealer is perfect. It is very creamy and smooth and it blends like a dream and just melts into the skin. My new fave right here. LOOOOVE IT.

I really love this concealer. Although it's creamy it doesn't immediately set into my fine lines. it is the perfect highlight shade for the foundation (I wear 445). It gives me the brightening without looking overly highlighted and so I use it most days when I'm wearing a full face. For spot concealing I use shade 445 under the foundation and it covers beautifully. Similar to the foundation this concealer will give you medium buildable coverage.
Great shade options and blends really well but creases quite a bit on me other than that good concealer
This concealer with the banana setting powder is magical. I love love love it.

I absolutely loved this concealer. it glided on smoothly and has good coverage. it does dry pretty quick. im a 310 in the foundation range. I picked the 310 in the concealer. it was about 2 shades lighter than the foundation. I loved that we don't have to go to the store in order to pick a concealer shade.

As a die hard shape tape user for the past 2 years, I was hesitant to stray away. But when I ran out on a business trip and only had access to a Sephora (who does not vary shape tape) one of the girls working recommended me this. HOLY GOODNESS this is amazing!!! I have dry skin and sometimes shape tape felt a tad drying under my eyes especially in the winter. This feels hydrating without creasing or clumping up. New all time favorite. Also - that shade range though!!! Other brands, take note.
reviews.review_title: THE BEST concealer of all time!!!!

reviews.review_text: Awesome concealer! I am a die hard NARS creamy fan and this is up for #1. I purchased in shade 110 because my foundation shade in this line is 120 and I usually use this for under eyes- although this shade is extremely!!!!! Light, it is also good because I only need a little bit to brighten my under eye. Very great coverage, creased a little but I always have this problem because I have an under eye wrinkle. My main issue is my undereye bags and this helped great! 9/10, just because the shade was deceiving.
really good concealer, however it does separate a bit on my forehead. coverage and finish is nice and I will continue to use
reviews.review_title: pretty good for the most part

reviews.review_text: I got Shade 105 and it Creased and Separated soooo bad!!!! I'm sad because I actually do like the foundation and I really wanted to love this...
reviews.review_title: I'm actually more disappointed than ever

reviews.review_text: Don’t like it what so ever...it creases really bad on me and I thought it was waterproof but that’s not true either. Very disappointed in the product to be honest.

This is the most amazing concealer I’ve ever used! I have tried SO many over the years & most make my under eyes look dry, cakey, or creased. This one is absolutely perfect! It is way more hydrating than the foundation. I like that the concealer shades are a little lighter than the corresponding foundation shade, but I still went down a few more shades to really brighten up under my eyes.
This concealer is AMAZING. Stayed on all day and still feels silkily. Medium coverage and super brightening. Highly recommend!!

I really wanted to like this product unfortunately I didn’t on my skin it wasn’t full coverage whatsoever, it did creased and was really dry underneath my eyes also broke me out so I’m returning it idk who would like it honestly it’s kinda chalky

This concealer is amazing. I naturally have creases under my eyes so the concealer with crease but with other concealers I have tried the concealer creased in spots were I don't have crease and with this concealer it doesn't do that. It wears beautifully all day but isn't drying and very creamy. It is medium to full coverage but buildable which I prefer. This concealer in my opinion is better then the Taste Shape Tape concealer and the Nars Radiant Creamy Concealer. I also tried to insert a video but it would not work so to see how my concealer looked like go to muavictoriam on Instagram.
reviews.review_title: Better than any concealer I have ever tried

reviews.review_text: The concealer is great, first off the packaging is so cute but the formula is great, a little goes a long way! I rate it a 4/5 because it’s not my favorite concealer because it does crease a bit quickly but I find it to hold on longer when I set it with the pro filt’r powder in butter.
This product right here is everythinggggg!!!! People were not lying this product is truly amazing. I like it better than my NARS radiant concealor. Yall better get on it and buy this concealor

Great counselor, I feel like it covers my blemishes and sun spots better than under my eyes. Was hoping this would be my 5 star concealer but just isn’t quite there. Will def. continue to use, probably won’t re-order

I love the finish and brightness this concealer adds to your undereye. It complements the Fenty foundation very well--I went one shade lighter than the foundation. The only con I would say is that it does crease a little.

I tried so hard not to buy this but just couldn’t help myself. I’m glad I did tho, it’s lightweight yet gives me the coverage I was looking for. I can wear it for hours without it making my face feel heavy with makeup.

This product just isn't for me.. I wanted to try this concealer so bad after seeing Desi, Nikkietutorial, Jeffree Star, all the youtubers raving over it. So i had to try it. Bought two colors; 230 (which was ideal for highlighting my face)

So sad that this was a miss for me. I’m a huge fan of the foundation so I had high hopes for the concealer. The coverage is definitely more of a medium coverage than full. The concealer feels thick so I thought it would cover more. Since it is thicker/tackier it takes some working with a damp beauty blender to get it blended in. I first tried it set with my Tarte shape tape setting powder. This didn’t work out. My concealer looked shadowed, like my circles were showing through. And it was cracking apart under my eyes, which I had prepped like usual with eye cream prior to makeup application. Day 2 I tried it prepped with eye cream and then set with my Laura Mercier translucent. The concealer didn’t crack this time but my under eyes looked so dry and cakey and textured I’m not sure that was an improvement. This unfortunately is going back :(

Heard lots of good reviews on this product so I wanted to try it out. I was soo disappointed with this product as it creases under my eyes and was too dark for a concealer. The product applies like butter but left crease lines under my eyes even after setting it with the fenty setting powder. I love my nars pot concealer a lot better than this ...

I bought this in two different shades and as much as I wanted to love it, I did not like it at all. The coverage is not great, the formula is really creamy but dries really patchy and when i set it with powder, it looked cracked and separated under my eyes. Also when i used it to highlight in other areas it picked up my foundation. Was very disappointed and had to return.

I dont think I have ever had a product with such horrible results. I only got it cause I am a fan of Fenty foundation but for anyone reading this, don’t waste buying this product which doesn’t blend well and makes your skin dry after an hour or so.

I wanted to love it. I have loved all of the other Fenty products I have tried, especially the foundation. I loved it when it went on, and I love the user friendliness of matching the shades. 

I loved it up until it started creasing halfway through the day. Not just tiny creases, but I looked like I was 20 years older than I am (and I am only in my mid-thirties). 

I REALLY hope they fix this, I still want to love it.

I wanted to love it so bad but it was horrible acree so bad under my eye and it made me look a lot older the way it dry on my face it was so weird between the foundation and just concealer my face has broken out so bad I wanted to love it but I'm so disappointed and I wish that more people would be honest
reviews.review_title: wish I could love it but NOTTTTT

reviews.review_text: Love this product! Will be the only concealer I use from now on.

I bought this and the powder together to give a try the powder was a bit drying but still decent the concealer has great coverage but it seems a bit drying also it might just be my eyes put the two of this together caused my under eyes to look super dry I still kept the product because I want to give it another try to see if prepping was the problem I would recommend to people that are oily . And don’t put too much all at once it can cake up a bit do it title by tittle .
Blends perfectly! Long lasting. No faking.

concealer creases and will appear dry as you start blending. Really does not blend smoothly. Appears patchy during blending. So if youre rushing, it’ll waste your time to really blend the product. Tried the product around 10 times, but does not work how shape tape works(which ive been using for 2 years now) 
Coverage is good though. I only needed 1 layer to cover my dark circles. Brush tip is good size and is stable. It lasts the whole day (12 hrs +). No problem with the shade (lighter than my foundation).
reviews.review_title: I had high hopes for this concealer but...

reviews.review_text: Nice coverage and doesn’t cake up, used it in many different foundation. It worked with every single one from my matte coverfx to my more dewy beauty blender foundation
Worked good for my under eye but didn’t cover my blemishes at all. I prefer the NARS concealer.

Amazing ! I’m pretty new with makeup and have try a couple of concealers and they are always a bit 
difficult to blend but this was amazing !

True to it’s words, a little goes a long way. I would pass the applicator 3 times only under each eye and that is enough. Leaves skin feeling lightweight not cakey like Kat Von D’s. I also apply one pass on the center of my nose and blend with a sponge for contour and it works amazing. I have tried this concealer with Rihana’s foundation, Kat Von D, Dior 24 hr and Natasha Denona’s foundation. Worked and looked good with all expect Kat Von D. I looked cakes after a whole day of work. I have oily skin and it didn’t caked nor rubbed off.

i really like this! i wasn’t a fan of the foundation so i was uneasy, but this is amazing. it’s not drying at all & it blends like a dream. it’s definitely full coverage & it will not budge! quickly becoming my new favorite concealer..

This concealer is a"dry formula" or at least I thought so. I found it hard to blend and it settled into fine lines - it is not creaseproof. I tried using more moisturizer and a primer to solve the problem, it didn't work. Might be better suited to someone who has oilier skin? I'm on the drier side. Nice shade selection.

Best concealer I've ever used. Not cakey at all and looks supernatural throughout the day! Perfect amount of coverage and the colour is a perfect match. Unlike the foundation, it doesn't  oxidize at all and the colour stays true. I have oily combo skin and it doesn't stick to my dry patches as much as my other concealers.

THIS IS THE BEST CONCEALER I HAVE EVER USED! I have very oily skin and I use very little and it lasts throughout the entire day. From school, to work, to exercise, to even napping this concealer is literally the best one our there. Worth every single penny.

I stopped going for high end concealers when my LA girl concealer was just fine but I really wanted a matte full coverage concealer for performances that would stay put. I tried this concealer because I figured it should work well with the fenty foundation, and it does. I have normal/combination skin. This is not something I would wear when people are going to be close up just because it really is super matte and can easily look very dry. It does crease and creates lines I’ve never seen before when using any other foundation and concealer. However, with that being said, the creasing was not that bad for me. The creasing is minimal and noticeable only when really close. A little goes a long way with this concealer. It is thick but it’s also creamy of a consistency. There are pros and cons - it more so depends what you are looking for. I would not recommend for dry skin at all unless you really moisturize and prep beforehand
reviews.review_title: was what I was looking for

reviews.review_text: Settled in fine lines and wasn’t much coverage. Tarte shape tape is by far better and you only need a dab.

Honestly... this is the best concealer I've ever used.
 I've been really unsatisfied recently with my concealers; I've tried the NARS soft matte and creamy concealers, the RMS uncoverup, the laura mercier, tarte shape tape, the newer Too Faced born this way, and while they were all really good ( some better than others in terms of long wear time, creasing and overall look) this concealer does everything I need.
It stays on all DAY, it looks beautiful, the colour range is amazing, and I have incredibly creasy eyes, all I have to do is smooth a brush over the (MINIMAL) creases half way through the day and It's good to go until I makeup remove it at night. 
I will probably be buying this until I die. HIGHLY recommend at least trying a sample. 
*Disclaimer: I have combo oily skin
reviews.review_title: Holy Grail: I'm taking this one to the grave

reviews.review_text: I experienced pet loss after 7 years with her, the morning we put her down I was a crying WRECK, I splashed my face with water and cried even more. All the way home my face was messy with snot and my tears, when I had the chance to calm down and wipe my face, I noticed my concealer was still covering my cheek pimples. I was trying my best to find light into any situation after losing my pet, and the concealer gave me a small smile.

How could anyone write anything terrible about this product! I went down one shade from the foundation I use as I like my concealer to be a bit brighter. LOVE IT. I've used soooooo many different types of professional brand concealers and I never can find the perfect one. A little goes on long way. This formula is so smooth and soft, blends beautifully and is long lasting, I go to the gym and it is still so smooth!  lives up to the hype :)

Holy shiii. This is one of the best concealers ive tried so far (for the winter at least, when my skin is more normal than combination)
This concealer DOES crease a tiny bit (and what concealer doesn’t crease at least a little bit?), but it is fantastic and doesn’t oxidize like the foundation does! For me, this is my new HG concealer and I plan on repurchasing

This concealer is definitely a soft matte. I have really oily skin and set it with macs cc powder and UD's all nighter powder and this stuff didn't budge. It does crease a little bit under the eye though. This color is a contender with nars caramel and too faced butterscotch. It has a greenish mustard hue until it sets. maybe good for an olive undertone. i may exchange this for 385, but so far nars caramel is the best color and formula for me right now as i have wrinkles and texture under my eye. My foundation colors are macao in nars, nc45-47 in mac, pecan in laura mercier, 450/60 suede N in lancome stick, 340 cappicino in maybelline, sienna in becca.
reviews.review_title: 360 similar to nars caramel or 2faced butterscotch

reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this, but not for me. It is VERY matte. I have combo skin and it is still to matte for me. Does not work for dry under eyes, so I use it as a spot concealer on my blemishes, and it is still too dry. Sad because I wanted to love it. Packaging is 100, shade range is on point, and the wand is great. Would work for someone who loves very matte concealer.

This concealer is pretty great, it is not too thick or too watery. It sticks to the skin but it is also very easy to blend. I use it with the fenty primer, foundation and pressed powder and it works really great! It has a matte finish like the foundation and it lasts forever! Great coverage, a LOT of shades available, totally recommend it!

I REALLY wanted to love this. I loveeeee the foundation and setting powder but the concealer is a flop. It’s definitely full coverage but it’s hard to blend and creases wicked bad. I tried blending with the fenty concealer brush and a sponge. I love a matte face because I have VERY oily skin. However, this extremely drying, TOO drying and made my pores look awful. I gave it multiple chances but I had to return it.

Concealer doesn’t really provide full coverage. I had to add fenty concealer with urban decay naked concealer. Really disappointed with this item. Didn’t brighten my under eyes and noticed a crease after applying. Will be returning.
reviews.review_title: Really wanted to love this product

reviews.review_text: Smooth, thick and creamy easy to blend and keeps you matte all day.
Best concealer I’ve used! Stays on all day and doesn’t make me look dry

I can’t be the only one who swatched the fair shades and thought it was a joke. I am very fair but I have very neutral, almost sallow undertones in my skin. I bought 100 as I usually buy the lightest shade in any makeup line but it was WAYYY too bright, and gave that reverse problem (white raccoon eye effect). I went into the store to swatch the next lightest shades and one was straight yellow, and the other straight peach. The next “normal” skin tone colour (120?) was unfortunately too dark. For all us gals who wear “regular” makeup and aren’t trying to shape/contour/correct/etc. I found this pretty disappointing. I understand this brand tries to be inclusive for all skin tones but they really missed the mark with this one.
reviews.review_title: Awful shade range for fair skin

reviews.review_text: Not for dry skin types at all!  I played with applying a small amount and adding more eye cream but this was a big no no.  Keep in mind I don’t have textured under eyes or major issues to begin with.
The concealer is slightly darker compared to the foundation. It glides on very smooth however, after an hour or so it creases and gets patchy.

Hella wanted to love this since all my fav Youtubers were promoting this and saying amazing things but after a week of using this it's not working out that well. I have really creasy under eyes and it accentuates EVERYTHING and it only gets worse once I set it, I've tried doing my makeup routine differently just to see if it would work better but it has not been a success. I love my Fenty Foundation but this was a flop :(

I have very oily skin so my main problem with concealer is it wearing off completely or going cakey once my skin gets oily. This concealer blends out really nicely and doesn’t dry too quickly, has a natural matte finish, and stays put through the day without breaking down or getting cakey. It looks smooth, and I would say it has a medium-full coverage (it doesn’t look like stark full coverage paint upon first application, but you can layer it a little for more coverage). For reference, I don’t like shape tape (too full coverage and dries too quickly for me) but I do really like the Too Faced Born This Way concealer.

The shades do dry down darker than they look while wet, but I don’t find that they continue getting darker through the day, the color reaches its darkest after a few mins. I really like this concealer even though I didn’t like the foundation at all, so if you’re worried about that, give it a try!
reviews.review_title: Holds up great on oily skin, natural looking

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this concealer! I bought it as soon as it released, and it's got amazing coverage and doesn't melt on my oily skin! I don't recommend it if you have really dry skin or if you have any fine lines, since it does settle in them a bit.

this is definitely in no way a bad concealer, and the shade range is amazing, however It simply did not have the amount of pigment I personally look for. It did not at all feel heavy and it lasted pretty long I just usually go for something with some more coverage, if ur looking for something light weight with medium coverage I definitely recommend. If ur looking for something with high coverage I would go with the too faced concealer.

I was really wanting to love this but it just didn’t do it for me. I have smile lines under my eyes so I usually bake with the Nars Radiant Creamy Concealer. When I baked this it literally crakes vertically under my eyes. When I simply set it (with any powder I tried) it was completely creased within 2 hours. I did like it on my face though. It covered blemishes really well and blended seamlessly with the foundation. I’ll definitely purchase again simply because I like the look of it covering blemishes but I won’t use it under my eyes again. If you don’t have Creasy eyes it’s the perfect product for you.
This is amazing!!! Like me new fave but the only thing is it’s very small compared to my foundation of this but it’s amazing

Favorite concealer so far! I've tried many concealers (the coveted NARS creamy concealer, the highly rated Amazing Cosmetics concealer, etc.), and this has got to be the one I love most. I don't need much to cover spots and it's very pigmented and lasts throughout the day! Fenty doesn't disappoint!

I feel like I'm pretty on board for this concealer! My usual foundation shade in Fenty is 150, but they were out of stock of 150. I went with 140 because it was the closest neutral shade and honestly swatched next to each other they were basically the same. I really don't like this concealer until it's set (I use MAC Patrick Starrr Patrick's powder). I don't have an issue with creasing at all. My one tip is to use a beauty blender or sponge of some sort for the easiest blend. I'm not like super blown away by it but I also don't have anything bad to say about it either.
I really wanted to love this concealer... :( I swear by the Fenty Foundation

I so badly want to love this, but I just can't. Absolutely love the shade range and the corresponding numbers with the foundation (the packaging is also adorable), but this is a nightmare on me. I have combination skin that is leaning towards dry at the moment because of acne medication and no matter what I do, this concealer looks awful. I have watched countless youtube videos on different methods to get this to work. Today I tried the Hourglass Primer Serum and applying the concealer from the back of my hand, but it still looks patchy and is creasing and settling into fine lines. Likely going to return. :(

The finish of this concealer is beautiful. I have skin that is on the more dry side, but I counteract this with moisturizer. I can tell you it is more like medium coverage. It's buildable but not into a HIGH full coverage. More like low full coverage, if you know what I mean? Crease proof? Absolutely not. This concealer creases pretty bad. I've tried different application techniques. I've tried letting it sit under my eyes after blending it out, and then coming back to blend out the creases and then set. Nada. I've paired it with the setting powder (BOMBBBBBB.com). My next plan is to try it with another setting powder, and also try the powder with different concealers to get a better understanding of what the products are like. I'm not kidding.... if Fenty stepped it up a notch in coverage and were able to make this truly crease proof - it would be a game changer for us dry skin girls! If you can handle the creasing, please please please try it. I plan to experiment more to find out if I can make this the concealer of my dreams.
reviews.review_title: Medium coverage, crease-y dry skin dream

reviews.review_text: Love the concealer ! I’m shade 390 in the foundation and I got 360 to highlight and 480 to contour. Check out my channel on YouTube LABELLAJAZMINE for a detailed review :) come join the #BELLASQUAD
reviews.review_title: I meannnn does it get any better !?

reviews.review_text: i really wanted to love this but my undereyes have never looked drier or cakier (i don’t even have dry undereyes), and i can’t imagine how anyone gets this not to crease “all day”...i can barely get out the door to work in the morning before it’s a creasy mess. i would expect more coverage based on the consistency and it begins to wear off within a few hours. i guess the fact that it was nearly impossible to find a not-sponsored review of this product should’ve been telling. i threw out my receipt so i can’t return it but i can’t imagine ever using it again.
very creasy and dry, and not the shade does not match the foundation its way too light

Not creamy at all very dry I applied this on my lids and I was tugging on my skin because it was almost already dry I then put it under my eyes again still dry not creamy I then set it with the setting powder butter it creased literally 30 minutes later I do not recommend save ur money sis

Anyone who knows me knows I LOVE fenty beauty and I really wanted to love this product but it doesn’t work for me. I have normal to dry skin and I noticed that this concealer is super drying and also breaks apart throughout the day(it starts to look patchy later on in the day). When I first applied it the color match was perfect and the finish was beautiful (even with powder) I checked my makeup about 6hours later and it looked super cakey, dry, and my fine lines looked even worse than they do without makeup. I typically use either LA girl or nars creamy radiant concealer so maybe matte concealers just aren’t for me.
Update: I tried the concealer again without setting it and with glossier’s skin tint. it looked better without setting it but it still accentuated my fine lines. For my skin type this is a definite pass. I uploaded a picture of me wearing the concealer and my skin without makeup for comparison.

This stuff has no staying power. Tried it two days in a row, one day with Smashbox primer, another day with Fenty primer. After 5 hours of wearing, it looks like I didn't even put concealer on at all.

ok. so. coverage is amazing but THE DRYING IS REAL. I did a little test. So I wore it for a week & it was dry, but I thought it was just my skin. I made sure my skin was completely moisturized, and I specifically applied it to certain spots to see, and my skin was only dry in those spots!!! PLEASE FIX THIS. Otherwise it would be perfect :/

So i was super eager to tried out this concealer. I have trouble finding a concealer that doesn’t separate and cause creasing. So i used this concealer today  and i have to say it’s really great! I made it a point not to put any setting powder because 1 the formula is already a bit matte(but not drying) and 2 I wanted to see how it lasts throughout the day. It held on strong!! A few little touch ups throughout the day with my finger but it wasn’t melting off at all unlike other concealers that i have tried. I would recommend it for ppl who have dark circles like me. It’s buildable and blends really well with the skin. I attached my morning photo and evening photo so you can see that after a long day at work it only came off slightly. Hope this helps! Enjoy

I was excited to try this concealer w all the hype surrounding the release, and I have to say after using it for about 2 weeks, I really enjoy it. Not as FULL coverage as shape tape, but I would still consider it a full coverage concealer. It blends out really seamlessly, whether using a beauty blender or brush. I've been setting it w my Huda baking powder and it looks very smooth under the eye. It is not drying at all and has kind of like a "skin like" finish (not too matte/not too sticky) What impresses me most is how little this concealer creases by the end of the day! My favorite concealers are Tarte Shape Tape and the Too Faced Born this Way multi use sculpting concealer. However, since purchasing this, I have been reaching for this one the most!
I have a sinus infection and my undereyes are dark and puffy but I used one drop of this and I look like a healthy angel. 10/10 recommend.

Over foundation this concealer is pretty good, as good as any other high end concealer out right now. But where I LOVE LOVE this concealer and I was not expecting is with a no makeup look. Just moisturizer and alittle of this under the eye- WOW it just melted into the skin giving the no makeup beautiful look. It looked like I was wearing nothing, u couldn’t see where the concealer ended and my skin started. Perfect if you don’t do a lot of makeup or something quick to run errands. I’m a huge makeup person but on my days off I’ll just throw on alittle of this to go out shopping. I will say the online swatches are deceiving. I went to the store and played around to find the perfect color. Would definitely purchase again especially when those hot summer months come around
Absolutely love this product! The coverage is perfect and the consistency is so creamy! I'm in love with how little goes a long way! Definitely will buy again!
Okurrr this is amazing! Feels great in my skin and love the new top!
This is by far... the MOST cakey and crease inducing item I have EVER bought. It accentuates acne and makes under eyes cakey and old looking. Not for dry skin at all.

OMG. So, I am a huge fan of the pro-filt’r foundation. And I had been wishing and hoping since I found it that Fenty would release a concealer and when I heard about it I freaked out! I wear 150 in the foundation so I ordered 150 in the concealer but wasn’t sure if it would be the exact same shade or what. Well, this shade compliments the foundation PERFECTLY. Not the exact same color, but a little lighter to highlight. I absolutely love this concealer. I love the formula, it blends in so smoothly and a little goes a long way. The applicator is awesome. Again, Fenty Beauty can do no wrong by me. Adding this to my list of faves!

This concealer didn’t stay on to my skin. I couldn’t even blend it in. It did well as an under eye concealer with heavier application and a setting powder but it did nothing for acne and acne scars. I tried to layer it on but by the time I blended it out, the concealer was gone. I tried brush, sponge, and finger tips and the concealer just slips off! So disappointed ):
No creasing, and I set it with the new Fenty powder. In love already! I can’t wait to see it hold up in the warmer weather.
feels like they tweaked the foundation and called it concealer. heavy oil base and thick.
reviews.review_title: it's the foundation in a concealer bottle

reviews.review_text: I tried this on in the store over some preexisting (Fenty lol) makeup and only on the lower part of my face (my lip area and jaw). the colour match was the same as my foundation (290) which i liked. super full coverage and a little goes a hella long way. it stayed in place all day, which is awesome. the only thing I dont like about it is that it looks powdery and kinda cakey even though I didn't set it with powder, compared to the Matte Matchstix (which i love) . I like my face makeup to look very minimal and almost invisible, and at the end of the day, I could tell I was wearing this concealer.
reviews.review_title: probably a good concealer, just not for me

reviews.review_text: Love the texture, and the coverage

I actually really like this concealer. I usually never use concealer, but I use mine to cover discoloration prior to applying my foundation. I wear 330 in the foundation and 330 in the concealer is perfect. I apply it over my dark spots, use my beauty blender to blend it. Then I add my foundation over it. This combination gives me flawless looking skin. It lasts all day without fading. My skin looks amazing at the end of the day. This is my winning combination for flawless looking skin. It doesn’t look caked at all and seems smudge proof once I set it with powder.
I'm not a big fan it dry my under eye and gave it a lot of texture

I wanted to love this and I tried, but I cannot make this work. This is not creamy and goes on awfully and then creases instantly. Coupled with the powder, its truly terrible. It makes me look like I have texture under my eyes and makes me look older. I tried using this for a full week with different setting powders and foundations but I will definitely be returning this.
reviews.review_title: its a no for me dawg

reviews.review_text: Not the best concealer Ive tried. It creases a lot and it can look pretty cakey with not so full coverage. Its easy to blend out but then the coverage disappears. It breaks up easily and needs to be very lightly set or it looks too dry. problem is if its not set good it creases a lot. Also the shades seem off to me. Online they appear darker than they are.

I'm in love with this concealer! The Nars radiant creamy concealer and their soft matte were my go-to's but this has much better coverage. The first time I tested it out, I wore for 12 hours and a little goes such a long way. It does NOT budge at all. No creasing or cracking!
didnt give me any coverage.  when blended out it basically disappeared.

Okay so originally I had gone in the store to get the tarte shape tape concealer but they were out of stock for my shade so instead I got this and to be honest I am pleasantly surprised. In the past I’ve tried Fenty’s foundation and lipstick and both were very different experiences. The lipstick was horrible (very streaky and liquidy) the foundation I LOVE so I wasn’t sure what to expect but this was great! My ONLY issue is I think it’s a bit too full coverage I’m used to using too faced born this way which is medium coverage but with this a little goes a LONNGGGG way!

The formula is smooth and creamy, and it applies and blends really nicely and evenly. The only issue I found is that it creased a bit under my eyes and on my eyelids after only wearing it on for a couple minutes, even after using setting powder. However, it is not super noticeable and is definitely not a rule breaker for me. Overall, I'm really happy with this product!

This concealer goes on so smooth and has great coverage! Maybe 30 minutes into wearing it, it was creasing horribly under my eye and was flaky and dry on my forehead. I tried using it with a primer the next day and it just sat on top of the primer and still looked so bad.I wanted to really like this

really disappointed because i really wanted to love this product! It almost instantly creased on my, and i even set it with the fenty setting powder, i will sadly be returning both of them. The texture is to die for though!!

I love this concealer so much. It really does live up to the hype. It’s so creamy, it reminds me of the Nars Radiant Creamy concealer but with much better coverage. It blends out like a dream and my favorite thing is that it literally does not crease. I have hooded lids and naturally puffy under eyes so I have these little folds that pretty much collect product but I didn’t have to worry about that at all with this concealer. I bought the 310 shade to wear with 345 in the foundation and it’s a really nice bright highlight. I’m definitely going to get another shade for hyperpigmentation and spot concealing.

I was so looking forward for this product but it kinda missed the mark for me. First off, I don’t agree with the marketing that the concealer shade corresponds with your foundation shade. I’m 240 in the foundation and I bought 240 in the concealer and it was way too bright for my under eyes. I know some people prefer that highlighted look but it’s def not something I like on an everyday basis. Secondly, the product’s consistency is a bit thick, which I thought would result in super full coverage such as Tarte Shape Tape concealer but like... the coverage wasn’t there so that was confusing. I tried it with both brush and beauty blender and I found myself having to apply more and more product to get the coverage I like and then by that point, it made my undereyes and other areas so dry and creasy. Also: Dry skin people beware, it most definitely clings to dry patches if you have any.

so crazy to see such bad reviews because i’ve fallen in love with this concealer! first of all since it is such a full coverage matte formula i always hydrate my skin right before putting it on. i moisturize and use an eye cream like the belif or the ole henrikson banana eye cream and then use a little bit of a hydrating primer. then depending on the day i’ll use glossier skin tint or if i’m going to work all day i use the fenty foundation. the concealer blends out super easily with a damp beauty blender! and then i set it lightly (key word) with the fenty banana powder. i find it unnecessary to bake it heavily bc it is already a formula that’s dries down itself quite quickly. anyway, i’ve been LOVING this combo. and if i use an illuminator like the mac or charlotte tilbury wonderglow under the foundation there’s even more glow. i also love that they made it easy to find your shade according to whatever foundation shade you use. i found out i’m the same foundation shade as priscilla so i used the 235 concealer like her and it is PERFECT. the consistency isn’t as thick as nars radiant concealer and isn’t as fullll coverage but perfect for every day medium coverage and brightening!

This worked GREAT for my skin!  I am 49 and do have fine lines so I have to be really careful with concealer.  I currently use Fenty foundation so perhaps that is why it worked so beautifully for me.  This provided the extra coverage that I needed under eye area without being cakey and getting into the fine lines around my eyes.  It lasted for a long long time and is now one of my all-time favorites along with shape tape.
reviews.review_title: GREAT when used with Fenty foundation!

reviews.review_text: Love, love, LOVE the shade range, but this concealer creases horribly. I will be returning.

When I first tried this product, I loved it so much. It comes on so nicely and covers any discoloration/spots immediately. However, throughout the day, it starts to look a bit cakey which I really don't like. It's also very drying, so it's important to moisturize (I like to use Ole Henriksen Nurture Me). Obviously, love the shade range as it is hard for me to find my exact shade.
