I really really love this concealer. I am a concealer junkie, I have tried every brand out there. This is definitely in my top three. The color is perfect, stays in place all day, no creasing and very good coverage. Very easy to blend. I do not need to set this with anything. I wear fairly light in bareMinerals and the color 120 is a perfect match. If that helps anyone.
reviews.review_title: One of the best, and I’ve tried them all

reviews.review_text: RIRI DID THAT!! This concealer is what I’ve been waiting and looking for. The coverage is beautiful and the finish is a little more naturally glowy (rather than life-sucking matte like the foundation - which I can’t wear). I will say, the shades are lighter than the foundation, sometimes by more than a shade. So proceed with caution and go to a store if you can to swatch!
reviews.review_title: I’ve been waiting for a concealer like this!

reviews.review_text: This concealer is amazing! It made my undereyes look bright and young, it covered my dark circles flawlessly, it lasted all day and IT DIDN'T CREASED! I love the formula and the consistency and it was a brilliant idea to par the concealer with the foundation cause it makes it more easy to pick the right shade. I love it all around and I would for sure use it all the time.

creamy, blendable and full coverage. personally I loved it, and matching my colour 120 with the setting powder in butter also added such a soft velvety finish. less is definitely more and I prefer to blend it in with a brush and my fingers to build up how much I want to cover up those sleepless nights. lasts all day for me

I had really high hopes for this concealer since I absolutely love the foundation. The things I like about it is it last along time and I have extremely oily skin. I suffer from rosacea and it covers my redness really well. This things I don't like about it are it creases into the lines under my eyes too much and I also found that it just sits on top of my skin. It doesn't really blend well. I will continue using it to cover my redness but will use a different product for under my eyes.

I am not in love with this, and I am so sad about it! I saw her do a video of herself using is and she looked like a goddess, I use it and look like I need to wash my face haha I will try all of her other products because so far the rest are great... this just doesn’t cut it for me. Very pasty and sticky.

I really do like this concealer! I’m not a big fan of the foundation, I have combo skin and find that it doesn’t sit well on me at all. But this concealer is way better. I had originally bought 120 but found it almost way too neutral which was odd but this one is a great match; for reference I’m 1.1 in studio skin foundation. This does crease pretty quick but as long as you use powder it shouldn’t be an issue, I use Kat Von D powder and it doesn’t make me too dry under there at all.

I’ll try to make this review simple and short.. I tried using it and wanted to love it because of all the good reviews on YouTube .. and how to claimed to hide the eye bags and fine lines... well sadly it didn’t work for me. It creased right way , I did my normal makeup routine , and even with the fenty translucent powder it looked really bad...  it made my fine lines and eye bags appear bigger then what they usually look like. I  give it a two star because I THINK this will work for someone with dry skin and for someone who doesn’t want “too much under the eye”

I love this stuff. It goes on super creamy and blends well. I make sure my skin is well hydrated before applying. I also use a beauty blender to blend it out, which I wet first with rose water. Then I set it with powder and blend again using my wet beauty blender if needed. I don't wear foundation, just concealer and sometimes a primer. I use a serum, moisturizer, sunscreen and occasionally a primer before applying the concealer. works great and hides my dark as night undereye circles, will definitely be buying again.
This concealer is amazing!! Blends out beautifully, and a little goes a long way.
So far i love it other than if you drink something and get it on your face it will take the foundation away. I think it does good with my skin but it will stick to dry patches

I wanted to love this concealer so bad but unfortunately it Just didn’t work for me. The first few times I tried it I set it with the fenty loose powder and within the hour I had terrible creasing under my eyes. I tried using it with the hourglass powder and it still creased under my eyes. I ended up mixing it with my shape tape concealer and that seemed to help the creasing but for the price I shouldn’t have to use another concealer to make it work. However, I did like it for highlighting other parts of my face just not
For my under eyes.
I love this product, it’s brightening and buildable and does not crease easy. i’m for sure a fan and it’s for sure on of my fav concealers

I wear foundation shade 410 and purchased the concealer in the shade 385 for more of a highlight. So far, I love the coverage. It's very creamy and brightening under the eyes. I haven't experienced any creasing yet (I set/baked with a different setting powder). Overall, I love this concealer although it was challenging finding the best shade given how many there are!  Not complaining though :) Initially, I went with 390 but the undertone was too yellow for me so I opted for 385 instead.
So I was superrrrrrr excited to try out this new concealer, and not going to lie im disappointed in it. It creases, a big no no

I tried to like this product. I was very excited for it but when I first tried it, I used it with the Fenty loose powder and it started to instantly cling and separate. It looked so dry and creased so so so bad. Next time I tried it, I used my regular powder and it was still creasing but not as dry as when I used it with the fenty powder. I’ve used it time and time after, doing everything I can to make it work but it still creases and fades so distinctively. I HATE my under eyes with this product.

I’ll start with the positive it is brightening, and minimal creasing. It def is closer to medium coverage then full even with multiple applications. Color is excellent and runs true to what you see on online.  Now the negatives for me is it looks drier then I’d like and the coverage isn’t able to be full. Package nice it is same as the foundation just smaller. Application is slightly flatter then other concealers which helps get in all the smaller areas more easy. Overall if u don’t need a full coverage concealer and you skin is combo to oily (mine is more dry) you will love this.

I was so excited to try this, turns out it was a huge let down. Blends like a dream, but creases almost instantly with or without setting powder. I tried this for almost a week many different ways, they all ended with the same caked on look. Would not recommend.

so the color 320 was my match, so i got it without swatching. that may be a mistake, i'm still not sure yet. when i put it on it is very PINK. but somehow when it blends out it matches my foundation perfectly. and i don't use fenty foundation. (for reference i use kat von d lock it in  medium 64 neutral). so i guess the concealer is nice but i don't like that it's not true to color when you put it on VS after you blend it. and it does crease a little bit before i blend it. at this point i am using it as a base and i put shape tape over it. very pretty effect.

I wanted so, so bad to love this product but it was horrible for me. The coverage was ok but it was too thick and not blendable at all. Also, within minutes (not exaggerating) it had settled noticeably into the creases under my eyes. I tried it a few times, with and without an eye cream, with a brush vs my fingers vs a blender, and every time same result. Super disappointed.
reviews.review_title: Wanted to love it but not possible

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this concealer, but it was a no for me. When it comes to concealers I do expect creasing, but with this one it creased right away. I’ve never had that happen with any other concealer and I am really disappointed. I really didn’t cared for the overall formula and had to return both of the ones I bought. The foundation is still bomb tho.

I absolutely love Rihanna and all of her Fenty products but this concealer really let me down. I have really bad ceasing under my eyes and this concealer made them look worse. I moisturized and primed under my eye and the concealer still settled into my fine lines. I didn’t even bother setting it. I originally bought the shade 300 and it made me look horrible. I do like the coverage but I really had high hopes 
for this concealer.
I used this concealer under my eyes and i didn’t need to set it at all! it never creased and it was the perfect shade match for me
reviews.review_title: think is this my new go to

reviews.review_text: I purchased 400 for concealing and highlighting and 498 for contouring. I enjoyed both of these! I found that blending out my concealer with a dry sponge works best for me and these performed like an absolute dream paired with the Fenty foundation. I experience frequent breakouts unfortunately, but this looked flawless on top of my challenged skin.
too over hyped, worse product I've tried. left my under eyes looking old and im only 24. separated my foundation.

Positives:
Great shade range
Blended beautifully
Creamy consistency

Negatives:
Creases horribly
Settles in
Creates lines
Seemed to disappear

I love Fenty; however, after wearing this for a week, I'm pretty disappointed. It went on beautifully and looked amazing upon application. However, about an hour later, I looked like I'd aged in dog years. I changed up how much I applied and how I applied it. Each application rendered the same results. Currently, I wear the Sephora brand concealer which is comparable to the NARS concealer. I don't crease as much with those. This one had me questioning whether or not I had changed something up. It, also, seemed to disappear in certain areas. It made me look tired. I was super excited to get this product. I purchased it when it released. I had to take it back. For the price, I expected much better. 

I'm giving it a 2/5 because of the listed positives.

I’m sold on this concealer because I cried while wearing this and my undereyes are still flawless! I bought shade 190. My foundation shade is 210 but I’m pretty pale in winter so I went down to be safe. Feels and looks like skin and isn’t drying, though I would recommend exfoliating dry patches before if you want a totally smooth finish. Not cakey, but has good medium coverage. I would 100% recommend this if you’re looking for a basic everyday concealer that will hide undereye circles. I love it so far and it’s definitely going to be one of my beauty staples!
The colors are fantastic. Perfect shade but creases like crazy so I will be returning it
This is a creamy sheer to medium coverage concealer. I’m giving 4 stars instead of 3, because it does not crease, and it’s hydraring. For very dark under eyes, this will not be sufficient.

I love how creamy this is! Applying it with a damp beauty blender makes it perfect. Also, I cried quite hard for a good hour and it still look great. Make sure to moisturize before applying. It is a bit dry but that doesn’t affect the look of it. The color is really good too. Not orange at all which is an issue I have had before.

I was nervous to buy this because I know sometimes Fenty beauty stuff is hyped up. But I'm so glad I did! I have yet to find my perfect foundation match for Fenty beauty so I went with the description of the colours instead. First of all I love the doe foot applicator, it's nice and flat which allows it to carry more product and spread more nicely. I actually don't have to dip several times into the concealer when I'm applying it. The formula is very creamy but not too creamy. it blends into the skin so easily! I actually look forward to applying my concealer. I have no creasing at the end of the day and it stays put all day! Hopefully I can find my foundation match soon. I definately recommend this concealer. The price is also decent. I've been using it everyday since I bought it!

this formula is absolutely amazing!!!! it has such great coverage and still feels light as air. I have oily skin and I wore this out to a party so I was a little worried but I had no reason to be!!! fantastic product

i’m not sure what the hype was about. this concealer is HORRIBLE. it separated within seconds and made my under eyes look sooooo BAD & old. i don’t recommend this product. there are so many better concealers on the market. do not buy!
Between this and the powder my facs has NEVER looked this good. No creasing. Amazing.

In the foundation I use shade 140 but when I picked up the concealer, shade 140 was kinda pink! I have yellow undertones so I went with 145 and it was perfect. At least for me, I don’t think the matching concealer complimented the foundation. It’s a nice concealer though. I really like it.

I really like this concealer. I tried Tape Shape from Tarte before, and it was too dry to use under my eyes. I hear a lot that many brands do not offer full spectrum of foundation/concealer for darker skin, and not too many mention that most of the lighter offerings are mostly for yellow based tones. Unless one is extremely pale, pink based light shades are also difficult to find. This brand is definitely covering variety of skin tones. I am also happy that I didn’t have any allergic reaction the way I often do. It didn’t completely cover my dark circles, but nothing really does unless it’s stage makeup. It made my dark circles significantly less noticeable and didn’t look like I was wearing makeup. It’s another huge plus in my books.
reviews.review_title: great offerings for lighter skin tones

reviews.review_text: I’m a minimal makeup girl, I don’t use this slathered under the eyes & set. But on moisturized skin, spot concealing with this has replaced my holy grail IT cosmetics CC cream as my daily go-to. The profiltr foundation was a huge no for me so I’m happy I can now partake in Fentys legendary complexion line. So creamy, natural finish lasts all day.

I heard raving reviews about this product, so I just had to try it out and I and absolutely in love. The coverage is just enough to conceal any imperfections and perfectly covers up and instantly brightens my under eyes. I tried just doing one eye and saw what a huge difference it makes, and how tired I was ;). Love the natural and radiant glow. I would recommend this with more of a natural foundation like the bare minerals bare pro. (my favorite foundation)

Best concealer I’ve ever used! I’ve tried the Nars Radiant concealer, Becca Aqua Luminous concealer, and most recently the Milk makeup Flex concealer which were all nice but they didn’t wow me. I wore this for the first time yesterday and was getting compliments left and right about how good my makeup looked. This is also slightly cheaper than most other concealers at Sephora so for it to be this good is definitely well worth a try.
reviews.review_title: Best concealer I’ve tried in the last year

reviews.review_text: This concealer creases so bad worse that too faced concealer. I’m not a hype beast I will try and tell the truth. It’s Garbage. My opinion

Am going to be honest. This concealer is OK! That’s it! It’s not very full cover so if you have dark circles you maybe need to color correct before apply this or pick a different product. It’s not drying and it doesn’t oxidizes like the foundation does. I am 310 in the foundation and I decided to pick the same color in this product. Am glad I did because 310 in this concealer is much lighter then the actually foundation!!! I would recommend for you to STICK WITH THE SAME FOUNDATION NUMBER FOR THIS PRODUCT! So NOT follow these crazy youtubers by picking a shade that 10 shades down from your actually skin color! It’s 2019 people let’s embrace our natural skin color and stop trying to be a color you are NOT naturally.
reviews.review_title: it’s ok! Stick to the SAME number as foundation!

reviews.review_text: This was the absolute worst concealer or just makeup in general I’ve ever used. It transfers horribly but yet it’s so dry my skin is peeling now and spots won’t even wash off

Omg I am truly so sad to be writing this review because I absolutely love Rihanna and I think she has some amazing products but this concealer!! Is horrendous this is one of the worst concealers I own and let me just say I have a ton... I am 29 I deff have some wrinkles with makeup and let me just tell you this concealer made lines come out that I’ve never even seen before.. and with time it only got worse by the end of the 8 hour west test. This concealer made me look like I was 10 years older then I am. Now I do have dry skin maybe this concealer is better with oily skin but for dry skin I would never recommend this over all the other ones that will work better! I’m sad to not like it something with this concealer just isn’t working! The packaging is adorable the shade range is amazing but it just wasn’t for me
This concealer is so smooth and creamy. Has a matte finish but feels lightweight and natural. I love this stuff!

Not for my dry “mature” skin. My skin was well hydrated and prepped but the concealer settled into my lines under my eyes and looked crepey which isn’t cute. Also I did have to apply two layers to cover my dark inner corners which might have been part of the problem.
love it! best concealer for my dry and light skin so far (compared to tarte shape tape, nars radiant creamy, Mac Pro longwear...)

I wear the Fenty foundation in 360 and decided to get the concealer in the shade 350. I love the creamy consistency of the concealer and how effortless it is to blend it. 350 is such a nice compliment to 360 for brightening!
Fenty does it again!  This is now my holy grail concealer.  So creamy and blends so easily. I haven't used any of my other concealers since I purchased it.

I was looking for a concealer for everyday wear, with good coverage, and matched me skin perfectly...THIS IS IT. I love the applicator, it blends so seamlessly, and has the perfect coverage. Thank you, Rih!
A little bit dark than foundation, you can go 1 shade down! Use less product than more, you will build up if you need more coverage! Doesn’t crease and light weight!

I ordered the concealer and powder online. I had to return it for a lighter shade. I know some have said its not for mature skin, I'm turning 36 in a month, under my eyes are definitely not smooth or without wrinkles anymore. I found with this concealer use a tiny bit and build up and I've used the banana shade to set my whole face. The cashew powder was too dark for me and the butter was too light but surprisingly the banana was good for my whole face. It's very creamy almost reminds of the shape tape but not drying or cakey. I think the shades oxidizes, i think even the powders too. Also it's not too heavy to wear alone without foundation. I don't have time somedays after getting my daughter on the bus and than to get to work i just use concealer set it and it doesn't look weird
reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way...

reviews.review_text: Matches my skin perfectly and blends In seamlessly. So far it has lasted on my skin all day. It just takes a small amount to cover my dark circles.
Ultra Creamy Concealer with a soft matte finish that does not move!
I’ve always had a really tough time covering my dark circles but this concealer is magic!

I was super excited to try this because of the current reviews. I have pale skin with dark purple undereyes that require full coverage. I found that the pale shades are lacking in undertones. I chose 120, the color is a bit translucent which happens alot with pale shades which means this is not a concealer that works without a corrector. I'm 28 and have very faint fine lines and this concealer exaggerates them. I moisturized before hand and even tried the tatcha primer but no bueno. Perhaps the darker shades are more opaque?
This concealer emphasized Every line that I have on my face. It’s also splotchy. I have returned mine. Don’t believe everything you see and hear on YouTube.

I REALLY wanted to like the concealer and setting powder because I LOVE everything else especially the foundation. But the concealer made my under eyes look dry and wrinkled and the powder made me so shiny! I’m so sad but they’re not working out for me
LET ME TELLLL YOU.. ive tried many concealers but tgey have all budged and creased , put this one stayed put all day!!! definitely amazing

Great flawless concealer and it’s easy to find the right shade. It really does look like a filter! It didn’t dry out or crease after application. For me personally I’m using it as my every day concealer but it still doesn’t make the cut for long wear and evenings out.

Unfortunately unimpressed :(For reference I’m usually the shade vanilla in nars radiant creamy concealer, i picked this shade hoping it would be a close match but came to realize the light shades look a lot darker online compared to in person. I usually don’t have any problems with my concealer creasing but with this one it literally sank into every little line under my eyes. My skin is not dry in the slightest but this concealer made my under eyes look so dry and cakey
Love it! It has a creamy texture and goes well on my skin. This is the best concealer I have had since my NARS ran out. The tip of the brush is very smooth. I would recommend!

This is the best concealer I have used so far!!!! It’s so amazing doesn’t crease, feels lightweight and it’s full coverage. Doesn’t settle into my fine lines, the after finish is just stunning. Fenty has done it again.

First of all the fact that there are 50 shades is beyond amazing. I found my perfect concealer shade and the undertone looks good on my skin.. and there were a few other shades that could have also worked for me as well depending on what I was going for. HOWEVER... this concealer creased on me really badly. I set it the same way I normally do with my kat von D setting powder, but it started creasing within an hour of wearing and by the end of the day looked terrible. I have to return it, sorry RiRi. 5 stars for shade range and quality of colors, 1 star for the formula
reviews.review_title: It creases, but great shade range

reviews.review_text: Very natural, blends seamlessly, and about medium coverage which is pre great for building up on. This compared to other concealers does dry up a bit throughout me wearing it but it’s worth is cause of the consistency of it. Not recommended for very dry skin. Y’all need to breathe more. Will be re purchasing this product when it comes back;)

I love this! It blends like a dream! I was in need of a full coverage concealer for my black holes and this is it. This is perfect. Usually when I try other concealers they tend to start to fade towards the end or the day and I look tired as ever. BUT THIS. WOW. A little goes a long way as well. It’s beautiful and creamy. I found my true love.

I bought the concealer the first Saturday after it's released. On one side of my face I swiped the Fenty concealer under my eyes and the other side I swiped my beloved Nars. I decided to do a wear test, worked out, and by the time I came back to Sephora that same day I asked the employees to pick the side that looks better and every Sephora employee picked the side that had Nars because the Fenty side looked so greasy and oily. Fenty was literally sitting on top of my skin. Mind you I did not set either concealer but Nars performed better than Fenty did. Needless to say I returned it. It creased under my eyes, and it definitely was not sweat proof. I wanted to love it but I could not support that especially if I already have a Nars concealer that does better than Fenty.
reviews.review_title: Why Fenty...I wanted to love you!

reviews.review_text: Not even close to full coverage and super patchy. May work on oily skin that doesn’t need/want a lot of coverage. Over hyped to the max

Initial application look great but started creasing after a few minutes. This has a more hydrating formula than the foundation but still too matte for my dry skin. The coverage is great but like I said if you have dry skin, it will immediately crease. I used my best products primer, foundation, and setting powder none of them were able to save me from the creases!

Hands down my new favorite concealer , the coverage is amazing it makes my skin look very flawless and covers up my dark spots very well. I wear it a lot the days I’m  not looking for a full beat face.

I bought the powder in Butter and matched the concealer with the Fenty foundation, figuring they’d match perfectly. They do very nicely, but when I tried blending the concealer it lifted the foundation from my upper cheek area and left almost no trace of the concealer under my eyes! I gave it multiple tries and I think the trick is to play with it to see how it works for you!

When I set my under eyes with Butter, they creased like CRAZY, but the powder set the rest of my face BEAUTIFULLY. Maybe if I bake the powder will set better? 

Overall, when I finally got the concealer to work, it was beautiful and long lasting when set with my Pretty Vulgar translucent powder. I’m mixed with this stuff:(

Yes the colors are wonderful but omg it creases so so so bad.   I have found better concealers in drug stores. I wore it for a week straight and it fell apart, separated, and creased like never before. I returned it to the store today.
Doesn't crease at all! Works better with the Laura Mercier setting powder then her powder though =(
I love this concealer. I’ve used NARS radiant creamy and shape tape and this beats them both. I have oily skin, but it gives me a radiant but set finish. A new favorite.
BEST CONCEALER! I was kind of scared of the color but it blended perfectly & was a perfect match for a highlighted under eye.

I thought I’d love this but I actually hated it. I got a shade lighter than the Fenty foundation (which I also hated because it oxidized) and the color was perfect on me. This was really the only positive thing. This concealer was so hard to blend out and I used a beauty blender as well as the Fenty concealer brush. It looked okay under my eyes but quickly settled into my fine lines. When I applied the concealer to other parts of my face, it was impossible to blend out and the concealer was totally visible. Once I blended it the best that I could, I used the Fenty setting powder and finished my makeup. I wore my makeup for 8 hours at work I felt like there was frosting on my face from how thick it was. This made my skin oily and I haven’t had oily skin in at least a year. None of my other concealers do any of this, so I’ll be sending this one back.
reviews.review_title: This was so thick and hard to blend!

reviews.review_text: I have always loved NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer; it is my holy grail. I have always tried different concealers but none of them work as well as the NARS concealer. So, recently I decided to try this concealer since I heard so many positive things about this. This concealer is AMAZING. Its creamy, full coverage, easy to blend and stays on all day. It's very similar to  the NARS but only difference is this has more coverage and contains more product for a lower price.
colors were off. either too warm or too light on me. terrible

I wanted to really like this concealer since everyone was raving about it, i have fine lines under my eyes and have always had slight creasing with any concealer i use but this concealer after wearing it for a full day it looked like it separated inbetween my fine lines and you could see the lines BIG TIME i was soooo disappointed to see how badly it had creased at the end of the day mind you none of my other concealers do it THIS bad i def would not recommend if you have fine lines under your eyes stay clear from this concealer!
Perfect! I was able to find a shade that conceals my dark circles AND brightens under the Pro Filt’r Foundation. This is exactly what I’ve been looking for.
Not super full coverage, you can still see blue from under the concealer after I blend it out with my finger. Not as fast drying as foundation so you have time to blend.

Fenty never ceases to amaze me!  I normally use Tarte Shape Tape concealer, but this concealer is even better. It’s light feeling and blends incredibly well.  With the Tarte concealer that I use I noticed some lines and wrinkles under my eyes.  However, with this Fenty concealer I have no more lines or wrinkles that show.
LOVE!!! So convenient that you can just match up with your foundation. I was a little skeptical about that at first, but the concealer is lighter and a perfect match!

I had my hopes up for this product just when it was announced, I loved that there was 50 shades! However, I didn'tenjoy the formula. It seperated, creased, and looked cakey. It has great coverage, but it seems too creamy, which makes it crease. I have tested it with fenty foundation, NARS, and even by itself (how I usually like my concealer). It sunk into my undereye lines very quickly and it makes it look like I have more than I do, I'm 14. Everybody’s skin is different, and this didn’t work for me.
reviews.review_title: Creases, and makes u look older.

reviews.review_text: This has taken shape tapes place! It is full coverage without it looking cakey!

This concealer is great. It has a very creamy formula and a little goes a long way. Its good for under eye and spot concealing. Though it did layer better on top of my foundation than it did my bare skin with moisturizer (even then it was still very good) It has great medium-full coverage.

I absolutely LOVE this product!!!!! I use it with my Pro-Filter Foundation and they look super great together along with the powder (leaving a review on that suckah after) I have oily skin and am happy with the final look it gives me. Fenty Face Fierce!!!!!

This is hands down the best concealer I've ever tried. It's just the right consistency not heavy not thin yet spot conceals and conceals dark circles SO WELL. I purchased 110 and 120 and 120 is almost a perfect skin match that i can just wear this and no foundation on days I'm not feeling the want to wear heavy makeup. I thought that tarte shape tape was a game changer but this stuff is 100% better and a step up from shape tape. The biggest thing is the feel of this stuff, goes on so creamy and almost comfortably hydrating yet still gives coverage without any heaviness. This is my new HG concealer, I for some reason knew fenty would make this great!

I have the foundation and I'm obsessed with it so I figured the concealer would be great too. I gave it a few chances but unfortunately everytime it creased really bad and completely disappeared under my lower lash line after an hour or two, even with setting spray

i was recently looking for a new concealer because i have been getting a few zits here and there.  i have dry skin and was looking for something that doesn’t clog my pores too much. this concealer absolutely shocked me. i really wanted to try it because many influencers were raving about it and i am a huge fan of fenty products.  the only reason why i am giving this a 4/5 is because it definitely creases. but if that doesn’t bother you i would definitely go for it. i don’t feel like this concealer is directly meant for dry or oily skin, because it is matte but doesn’t dry your skin out. i love this concealer because it doesn’t break me out and it has a beautiful natural finish. one of my favorite purchases from fenty yet!
I'm a fenty fan but this is a very basic concealer. Not worth the hype.  There are definitely other concealers that performs and covers much better.
Love everything about this concealer!! This is the first Fenty product ever purchased and now I’m hooked! The creamy consistency is easy to blend and love the look of the finished look.

This concealer isn't too bad! I really like how you can use each side of the doe foot wand to get the intended coverage you would like. I have creasing under my eyes, so the concealer does settle into those creases, but every concealer and I have does that. The staying power is awesome.

I love the Pro Filt’r foundation so I was really hoping to love this concealer too. I would compare this concealer to the NARS radiant creamy concealer. It has similar coverage and consistency however not a HG for me personally. I found this concealer broke up even after I set it with powder and the coverage was not what I need
Great texture, medium coverage and vast shade range, but it doesn't last at all regardless of whether you set it with powder or not. Disappointed.

New holy grail concealer! As someone with very dark under eye circles who needs concealer to look human, I didn't think the perfect concealer existed...until now! Not exaggerating, I love this stuff. Nice full coverage that lasts all day with almost no creasing whatsoever. The girl at Sephora recommended working on one eye at a time because the formula dries quickly, which u found to be true. TL;DR so happy that I found this and will never use anything else!
Not only did this product break down on my skin, didn't last, made me oily, but it gave me acne as well. My face felt itchy and sure enough I had new whiteheads. I will be returning this.

I do like this concealer, however the formula doesn’t cover as well as I thought it would...it does provide coverage, but honestly reminds me more of a bb cream instead of a concealer. I’ve used an bought almost all of the high end/raved about concealers, to me this is good but not better than others. I’d definitely recommend this if you have dry skin, this is pretty moist- but because of that I feel like it sits on the skin differently; sets in my lines more noticeably. It feels good on the face, but I feel like I had to blot my face more and set it with more powder because it was too moist (I didn’t even use much) it looks pretty pigmented when it’s first applied, but even after a little blending the pigment just isn’t there.
reviews.review_title: I like it, but don’t love it

reviews.review_text: Here she goes taking my money again but sooo worth it!!! I’m a 360 in foundation and this was a perfect match for me. Really good for the “no makeup” makeup look, covered dark spots beautifully and didn’t crease. Also got 330 to brighten under eyes, works perfectly.
This product has such a soft and natural looking finish, I really like! Just a bit goes a long way.

Okay, so this is my first time every trying out the fenty products. I decided that this time around that I was going to order. I got the foundation in 420 and the matching concealer. The concealer in 420 is my exact shade if it were a foundation if that makes sense. Its not too thick and not runny. I would say the consistency is just right. I applied  my foundation first and let the concealer sit and blended it with a damp  sonia kashuk sponge instead of my beauty blender and it blended perfectly. I set it with the banana powder and it was good.   I have two more shades but  I am going to exchange those and get a darker shade to contour with and a lighter shade to highlight more with. Over all it pretty good.
My under eyes are so smooth. No cake but good coverage. I’m loving it!

I’m shade 210 in the foundation and decided to get the 150 for under eyes because I wanted neutral undertones, and it was a perfect fit! Also got 210 for covering blemishes and such and they literally disappeared in seconds. Highly recommend! The consistency is so nice and soft, so yes it will crease over time but nothing a little beauty sponge/retouch powder will fix in seconds.

I was so so so excited for these products seeing as I love the foundation ( I wear 370 ) but these concealers are just awful :( I wanted to love them soooo bad but I just cant! They show creases I didnt even know I had which my other concealers dont show. They are so so dry (yes I know they are matte) but I have super oily skin, so for these to make my under eyes crusty & Dusty I am just so sad :( The setting powder doesn’t help with the dryness and creasing other, makes it worse

I really love the product so much but the problem it’s not well for sensitive skin because one ingredient “alcohol” don’t use this product if your a sensitive skin. If your not, this is a wonderful product.
reviews.review_title: Does not work for sensitive skin

reviews.review_text: this is AMAZING i have dry skin and i was completely against Fenty because it had a matte finish but thank God i've seen the light. love love love and i will probably buy 12 more.
Amazing concealer! Full coverage but super light weight it feels like skin. My skin is dry but this product still works really well! Just moisturize before putting on you makeup

The concealer is very creamy and I love the shade range. I’ve never been able to use 6 shades in one product before. I like the concealer but it doesn’t give me anything special that my other concealers don’t already do for me
I have no regrets. Love the applicator. Simple to use and it works. It’s easy to find your match, but if you need assistance the staff at Sephora never let me down.

The initial look of the foundation and the concealer with the powder all together is GORGEOUS. After about 20 minutes, terrible creasing begins to happen underneath the eyes, leaving all the product settling into your fine lines, I even tried to use different blending methods and even went and got the powder just to make sure it wasn’t the way I was setting it. Unfortunately, this concealer is a big miss for me and I wanted to love it so much!
reviews.review_title: Gorgeous at first, creasing terribly later

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this concealer!  It goes well with my Fenty foundation which is also 420. You won't regret buying this container!
Thick and creamy. Easy to blendbinand it feels weightless.

I really wanted to like the concealer since the foundation is so good, but I don’t. It gives a gray-cast on my face. My skin tone is neutral, and the foundation matches perfectly, so I was really confused about the color of the concealer that is meant to be paired with said foundation. It sits on the skin nicely and isn’t tacky, but the color just doesn’t do it for me.

I love the consistency and the shade is gorgeous. But the creasing... I set it with the new fenty loose powder and within minutes it made my undereyes look horrible. I wore it to work one day, set it and all, and about five hours in it had broken apart on my eyelids.

Really beautiful concealer.  I would say this provides medium coverage and sets in place all day (I set this with the Fenty loose powder). This along with the Fenty Powder are the perfect combination!

I love this concealer! It is buildable, I had to put 2 coats to really cover up my under eyes, I have pretty bad under eyes but it did it’s job and looked very nice!! My only complaint is that when I set it with powder, (not fenty, but just one I already had) I feel like it reacted weird. It creased, it does feel dry but overall I really liked the coverage. I believe this is the kind of concealer you leave alone or idk maybe it still works with some powders but not all,

I love the fenty foundation in 370. It's so matte and makes me look flawless. My only foundation that I wear everyday. I had high hopes for the concealer but ehhhhhhh fenty let me down. The concealer has a creamy consistency and the color is perfect to compliment the 370 foundation. However, I do not like the applicator as it seems very flimsy. I was expecting this concealer to live up to too faced but unfortunately it does not. Also, I'm not sure if it is the formula but I get much more oiler throughout the day.
Love it for highlighting my brows

This concealer is really nice. The formula is creamy, almost gel-like, and dries to a matte, but not drying, finish (very different from the foundation, which unfortunately didn't work for me). What I like most about it is how smoothing it is -- although no concealer can fully erase creases under the eyes, this one does a great job at minimizing them. The colour is a perfect shade for highlighting and colour correcting dark circles. It could probably use a tad more coverage, especially if you're using it to spot conceal, but I you could mitigate that by just using more.
reviews.review_title: Smoothest my under eyes have ever looked

reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this product because of the great reviews but it just didn't work for me. First, I was surprised to see that it was actually really dry and hard to blend so I didn't get to experience that "creamy" consistency that people were raving about (Maybe my bottle was dried out for some reason?). Also maybe because it was dry it looked terrible under my eyes and made lines stand out that I didn't know I had. I had a hard time trying to match my skin tone as well; either too light or too dark. I have a very yellow undertone and despite the many shades available this line didn't have a shade that worked well for me. I use Bareminerals Pro foundation so I thought I would try their concealer and it was amazing! Blended really well with my skin tone; can't tell that I'm wearing makeup, is creamy and provides good coverage without being heavy. I love their foundation as well.
Coverage and tone is gorgeous and this concealer blends beautifully. Can’t wait to try more from the Fenty line.
To me it's just another concealer. Its not bad nor good!! A little goes a long way! For dry under eyes moisturize well and don't over powder (bake)
I have tried Clinique, Becca, Lancôme by far the best for oil combo skin. Stays on matte fawless. Love love this.

This foundation is wonderful. I bought 170 (to match my foundation) and 150 (to highlight). It’s creamy, it covers, and it’s a perfect match to the foundation. However, I have fine lines under my eyes. It looks wonderful but settles quickly into those little wrinkles. I have tried it several different ways under the eye and nothing seems to stop the creasing. With that being said I will still keep it because it works for concealing everything else just not the under eye area. 

It really is a beautiful concealer.
reviews.review_title: I wanted it to work but...

reviews.review_text: So! I must say this is hands down one of the best concealers I’ve used, very comparable to the tarte shape tape but much lighter and creamier in texture but still allowing it to be a nice medium to full coverage, while looking a lot less drying under the eyes! Now shade range is absolutely amazing! It’s the first time I’ve ever been able to match myself perfectly to a concealer that I actually like and works for me! I went with the shade 145 originally planning to go with 130 but the undertone didn’t correspond to the description in my option! Also I didn’t see many olive warm undertones in the medium shades, I found they all ran abit pink and peachy! Besides that I must say give this a shot!

I am totally new to using concealer and I was completely skeptical about it because I wanted to use it as a brighten tool and I didn't want to look ghostly but MAN when I say I was surprised! I really love the product. I also purchased the setting powder in the shade Banana and it worked great!
Girl she is THICC! I mean that in all the good ways. Super covering and blends flawlessly. My acne scars and blue under eye tone is GONE

Ok, I love this concealer! My under eye area is normal to dry but this applies beautifully and lasts without it turning cakey or my undereye darkness peaking through badly after a few hours like other concealers do. I did set this with the new fenty powder (which I also love!) I prefer applying a full upside down triangle under my eyes with this concealer as opposed to dots or lines which I usually do, idk just made a big difference with this concealer ( I blend with my beauty blender) Don’t hesitate to purchase this! I’ve tried a bunch of concealers and I usually return them because they don’t deliver, but this one does! I’m including a pic excuse my oily nose. This is after 7 hours of wear
reviews.review_title: you need this in your life!

reviews.review_text: It was creamy and blended like a dream but not full coverage like I wanted to be. I had to use a lot to get thr coverage I wanted but wasn't enough... And it is very expensive! It is a comparison to NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer only Creamier.. But NARS has better complexion selection and easier to choose from. I am sticking to my Huda Beauty that has the most coverage.
reviews.review_title: Creamy and blended like a dream BUT

reviews.review_text: Honestly... my new favorite concealer! Super lightweight with the coverage I need! I actually got both 340 and 320. 340 is my foundation shade and the concealer compliments amazingly. I add 320 to the inner part under my eyes closest to my nose to brighten a bit more. It wore so well without creasing or looking patchy. I also have watery sensitive eyes that water sometimes and usually concealers come right off as I blot away damp spots under my eyes... but not this concealer! Thank you Fenty for coming out with an amazing formulated concealer. Love it so much!
Great! Wouldn’t recommend if you have very very dry skin!

I LOVE this concealer. I used to live for the foundation but have become a Samantha Ravndahl follower so it's too matte for me now but the concealer is that perfect amount of dewy and lasts all day. And I'm not gentle. 13 hours of trains, walking, and working. I'm only dropping 1 star because I'm a little confused how this is my shade. I'm closer to 130-150 foundation wise so I'm a little confused if the numbers are supposed to match and compliment each other

I love this concealer!! Its blends so well with the Pro Filt’r foundation and looks so natural. Its cery full coverage which is great for me because i get break outs and have very red skin some days and this covered it right up. Im so happy with this concealer.
This concealer is the best! It covers well, blends easily, it really is just perfect skin in a tube. I’ve tried so many concealers and this one is the best I’ve tried!

Love the coverage, love how it sets, love it basically covers my life if I need it too, love how I can make it work if I’m wearing a light coverage foundation, love it all! This is hands down the best concealer I own!

This product is definitely the cure. I must say that as a night nurse the bags under my eyes are not a mistake or a drunken nights result. they are long term issues that I have been piling product on to correct. Not today. I applied Fenty Foundation 420. Concealer 390. powder in Butter. And Fenty gloss.

It’s everything I dreamt it would be and more. It’s perfectly covering, concealing, in a way that is skin but better x 10. It covers everything - undereyes, blemishes, dark spots and redness in a way that’s so smooth and light. It doesn’t at all look cakey. If shape tape is your holy grail try this- I’m completely sold.

the combination of the foundation is AMAZING. I used the concealer alone just to carve my eyebrows and control my oils on the nose and T-zone. IT DID NOT MOVE OR CREASE!!!! I never experienced such an amazing concealer with such COVERAGE and OIL CONTROL!!! I wouldn't suggest people with really dry skin, it can be a bit drying especially if you wanna use the power as well, which I didn't bu. But overall, a great concealer on the go if you wanna cover some impurities, dark circles and control those oils :D i love it

I would LOVE this concealer if I only needed to wear it for a few hours. Unfortunately for me, it's too matte and my under eyes look dry. After a day at work my under eyes looked so dry they looked cracked not just creasing.

I was sad because the fenty foundation didn't work well for my skin type, i was a little worried this wouldn't either but i was so wrong. I have never seen my under eyes look so amazing before! I've learned that this product looks best blended with a brush which was surprising to me and then I lightly dust powder on top. It looks so natural and lasts me through a workout so it's definitely sweat proof!
Love this formula. Only have a Sacha banana powder

So I like that they stay true to most of what they advertised. It’s super creamy, a little goes a long way, and for this matched color to my foundation, it surprisingly wasn’t that much lighter, which I kind of liked, but i might go a shade lighter on my next purchase. My only complaint (and it’s not that big of one for me) is that it did instantly sink into my creases, however almost every single concealer I have ever tried has done that with these tiny fine lines under my eyes. I did enjoy the medium coverage over my dark circles under my eye and the way it blended on my t-zone and chin. I will also say my concern is that for dry skin, it does still get a little flaky, but again for me personally it doesn’t bother me too much because I think I need to up my moisturizer more. All in all, worth it.

Rihanna is amazing, Fenty is amazing! I got both 190 and 230, my foundation shade is 230. The concealer is a few shades lighter than your foundation, which I love for brightening under the eyes. The formula is very creamy, similar to Nars Radiant Creamy concealer. The applicator is a flat one, so it's easy to swipe on where you need it and get in small spaces. It is a more wet concealer, so if you want it to be fuller coverage, let it dry for a couple minutes before blending it out with a sponge. I do not bake, it looks too heavy under my eyes, but I set with just the smallest amount of translucent powder (I use Lancome and it is incredible!), And I am good all day.  It does crease a tiny bit but what concealer doesn't? Just pat out the tiny line and go on with your day. The coverage is pretty good, I have very dark circles under my eyes so I need a second coat in some areas, but as long as you don't have crypt keeper under eyes like me then you will be fine and covered up with one layer. So happy Fenty always comes out with SO. MANY. SHADES. Every single time! So everyone can enjoy her products. Love this concealer and would recommend it to anyone.
It felt really nice on the skin and a little does go a long ways but once i set it holy cow did it break up. Super bummed since i loved the foundation
I love how creamy this concealer is. It's not exactly crease proof, but it makes my under eye look flawless with the setting powder.

It reminds me a lot of the NARS concealer because it's so creamy. it blends well into bare skin, which is great because i don't normally wear any foundation. It also works great on brows and cut creases because it's very creamy and not too thin. I wish that it was more long-wearing though, because it doesn't keep me matte for more than a few hours and it settles into lines by the end of the day.
reviews.review_title: great texture   coverage, not very long-lasting

reviews.review_text: Robyn came through again yall. I'm not a foundation everyday kinda shorty so I bought both my regular shade in the Fenty Pro-Filter (370) to wear on the day to day and a shade lighter(360) for when ya girl puts her whole Fenty Face one. She did not come to play. She came to slay. Ms. Fenty is going to leave us bald if she keeps snatching our wigs an edges. This is creamy and sets down well. Not drying but not too emollient either.. If you like Nars Radiant Creamy, think that, but a little thicker. Because ya girl is thicc, but not super creasy like a lot of her competitors. Just go buy it. If your here in the reviews you're probably looking for a reason to get it. Well here it is, I'm telling you. BUY IT SIS!
reviews.review_title: Its a must, even for dry skin

reviews.review_text: Let me start of by saying Rihanna can do no wrong. This concealer is everything it says to be without hesitation. I would say if shape tape
reviews.review_title: BAD GYAL RIRI DID IT AGAIN!

reviews.review_text: This foundation is EVERYTHING. I bought it without the Fenty primer and realized the primer really does mix with this to create such a perfect layout. I have gotten so many compliments on how smooth my face is since I purchased this. It’s my new go-to foundation.

Finally found a concealer that lives up to its name. Easy to blend and nice creamy thick consistency. I have fine lines and normally with la girl pro, tarte, & makeup revolution creasing happened immediately. It took almost 8 hours for this one. Now I need a contour shade.

This is a good concealer. I find that the corresponding concealer to the foundation is more of a color corrector and used for the true purpose for concealing than the most modern use for highlighting. If you primarily use concealer  to highlight than I would suggest going down a couple light shades. Also, the consistency is somewhat tacky as it dries, almost in a gel-like form. When I apply and blend out with the sponge it’s somewhat sticky, not a lot but enough for me to notice a difference. The coverage is good tho. I bought the 420 concealer to match my foundation and will use to color correct. I’ll pop by later to get a lighter shade for highlighting.

This is amazing!! I have deep creases, and it sets nicely (minimal fuss, no touch ups). I didn’t use setting powder and I wear alone with tinted moisturizer for a natural look. Last all day. BUY IT - there’s a shade for everyone :)

Creased within a couple of hours and made my undereyes look like  I had aged 10 years because it looked so dry under my eyes. I also broke out in acne where it was applied by the end of the day. It is probably one of the worse concealers I have used.
I’m so glad I bought it! I’ve been looking for a good concealer & this one actually looks good on my face. I really like it!
Overall did what was described, definitely creased in no time, even with slightest bit of product. The shade range is super versatile but overall the creasing just set the bar low for me

I bought in shade in 150 and am really impressed. It's lighter than the 150 foundation, so the two go together really well. I have severe dark circles and have been struggling to find something that gives coverage and doesnt look cakey or too dry. This covers well (though definitely medium not full coverage). It's creamy to apply but what has really impressed me is how long lasting it is. Everything else that has that level of coverage or creaminess doesnt last on my skin for more then a couple hours. It does crease a bit but I've yet to fond something that looks this good and doesn't somewhat crease.
I wear Shade 420 in Foundation and Shade 385 in concealer is what i went with. Great coverage and it gives me a slight brightening effect.
Last aaalll day! Blends wonderfully!!! I wear smashbox studio skin 15 hour wear foundation in 4.15

YES! I Have been looking for a new concealer that I can wear WITHOUT foundation and this is IT! Super creamy but not sticky, last pretty long. I would say it’s recommended to put a setting powder which is why I think she released them at the same time. But this will be my go to! Even though the colors are supposed to match I would also recommend to go in to Sephora and get a color match.
I normally don't write reviews, but this is the best concealer for my under eye area. A little really does go a long way.

This concealer is so good! I love how the color that is my foundation shade is a tinge lighter for under eye brightening!! The formula is so creamy and not drying under my very dry under eyes. I have a lot of acne scars so I’m going to find a darker color to conceal those next.

Of all the concealers I have tried, this is by far THE BEST concealer I have ever come across. The formula is amazing and the coverage is unmatched. The dark circles under my eyes were literally non-existent and it blends beautifully with the skin. I love that keeps my skin looking like skin. YOU NEED THIS CONCEALER IN YOUR LIFE SIS!!
reviews.review_title: MISS ROBYN FENTY DID NOT COME TO PLAY

reviews.review_text:
i just bought this yesterday, i was super excited to try it out this morning for work, as i have broken calipers and i can never find a concealer to mass cover it all up with a great finish ( ALSO not leaving me looking like i have a pound of makeup on )  
i use both the concealer and foundation in the same color and i honestly couldn't be happier. let me add in also that ive had it on for 6 hours  and still looking flawlesssss  :)

I so wanted to like this product, but it unfortunately missed the mark for me. 

I will start off with the positives: The shade range is phenomenal - I found a shade that worked perfectly to cover up imperfections, and another one to highlight my under eye. Color wise, they both served their purpose. 

As for the negatives: I was not a fan of the applicator, I found it to be too flimsy (for reference, I currently use Too Faced Born this Way Concealer, which has a sturdy applicator). I found it difficult to work with. 

The product itself I found to be patchy, and difficult to blend out (using a beauty blender). After I managed to blend it out, I found it to crease quite significantly after setting. This was even more confusing, as I used this with the Fenty Beauty Foundation. 

I was hoping that throughout the course of the day, it would look better, but unfortunately it looked worse at the day went on. I decided to return the product. 

I gave this 2 stars, because the color selection was quite great, and it didn't break me out, which signifies that it could work well with sensitive skin. Otherwise, I would say this product is a miss.
reviews.review_title: This was a miss for me

reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this concealer but unfortunately I’ll be returning it.  I have oily combination skin and this concealer despite being matte is way too drying.  Also it dries way too fast.  I tried using a concealer brush and beauty blender but this stuff doesn’t blend seamlessly.
I bought this when it launched in sephora stores in two shades 250 and 300 and i love them both! Takes a lot for a student who's poor to spend money on not one but TWO concealers!

This might be the worst concealer I’ve ever used. It made my undereyes look SO dry (without powder), and got even worse when I tried to set it with my hourglass powder. Also, it creased within minutes of wearing it. 
Now, I take VERY good care of my skin. I use night cream every night, moisturizer every day, I exfoliate 2-3 times a week, and mask just as often. My skin feels like butter, but can get dry in the cheek area often. My undereye is NOT dry but this made them feel that way.

I have horrible dark circles and uneven skin tone, so I love a full coverage foundation and concealer. But I have a two year old and work a full time job so I can’t do a full face every morning, this I’ve been using under my eyes and on the areas i want to correct and OMG! This is the perfect everyday buildable concealer not too cakey and very blendable. And I love how I can throw it my purse with her new small beauty blenders and take it on the go. So far it’s lasted all day and I have had to retouch after setting. Highly recommend. Riri has done it again!

I love it! When I felt the concealer at the store, it seemed kind of thin.. but I still decided to buy it and try it at home. I honestly thought I’d end up returning it when I was at the store purchasing.. but once I tried it, I loved it!

I wore her foundation, concealer and powder the WHOLE day and my skin looked flawless, concealer didn’t crease on me at all and it was so nice and creamy! I have dry skin especially in the winter time, I can look like I have alligator skin but Fenty’s products worked amazing for me! If you have dry skin like me I just recommend prepping your skin and using a hydrating primer underneath. 10/10 recommend.

I love this concealer!! I love the consistency and the coverage it gives. I will say I was a little nervous because my skin is very dry and so far Fenty products on my skin just don’t work and I’ve tried multiple times and then finally gave up. But this concealer girl!!!!!! Also my eyes started to water and it ran down my face, the product did not move, it did not separate; overall this product is a must have!
OMG I love supper full coverage and a little goes a long way... can’t wait to keep playing with it

Love! I used Nars concealer prior and did not like the emphasis on my fine lines under my eyes. I’ve been using Fenty foundation for months now and it was a given to try the concealer. It’s amazing! No lines, no cake look. It’s smooth and sets great! I used a 210 foundation and a 210 concealer and have no complaints. Rihanna did an amazing job!
reviews.review_title: Better than Nars!!! No fine lines!

reviews.review_text: Makes your under eyes look flawless.

Fenty...I love you so much. I really do. But I’m gonna be honest...I had such high hopes for this concealer. I wanted this to snatch my life and my wig. It just ain’t it, sis. Within 2 minutes I aged 10 years. I didn’t even use that much (less is more with this one is what I heard). It settled into all the lines I do have, and I’m 28. It did not want to blend properly. I used the same primer and foundation I usually use. Then I used it by itself without primer, same deal. My makeup revolution concealer does a way better job of covering and spreading and not creasing. I was so dang disappointed. I spent my hard earned money on this product - I’m not new to makeup, I have at tried at least 20 different concealers in the last 6 months. I can not recommend this product. Sorry Rihanna (you’re still a queen tho and I appreciate the shade range, which is why it’s a 2 and not a 1).
reviews.review_title: I may be the exception to all good reviews...

reviews.review_text: OMG this is the BEST concealer ever!!! It's super creamy, very easy to blend, full coverage yet never cakey. It feels like a second, better skin. I don't wear foundation so my concealer has to melt into my skin and this one does a perfect job! It doesn't crease, it's lightweight and has huge staying power. My undereye area still looks flawless even 10 hours later!

Beautiful concealer! Super creamy, very pigmented so a little goes a long way, blends so easily. Only complaint is it does not look great when set with a powder. I’d suggest skipping the power all together, but the formula is very creamy so creasing does happen. Also not the most long lasting, wore this for a 9 hour shift and faded around 5-6 hour mark

Absolutely blown away at how beautiful the finish is! Since the foundation is so matte I guess I was expecting the same thing but on my skin it almost gives a luminous finish next to the foundation. The coverage was great. The shade range makes a huge statement & I wore it for at least 8 hours without having to touch up or a SINGLE crease! 

Prior to this I was wearing Tarte Shape Tape which is thick, drying & would crease here & there. I’ll be saying goodbye to it. 

I also set the Fenty concealer with the new setting powder in the shade Banana. Also a hit!
Finally found that perfect concealer to highlight my under eyes with with a great formula!

Medium to full coverage YES!  Doesn’t crease!  Highlights and covers.  No scent.  I’m loving this.  A little goes a long way.  
Note:  This is a matte finish so it could be a little drying if you are normal to dry skin.  I say moisturize accordingly before applying!  This is a great product.

This is the first and only fair shade with olive undertones I’ve everr seen (have never had a true match before) and this shade has saved my life!! THANK YOU Rihanna for this amazing range and true inclusivity for all unique skin tones out here! So grateful and excited ! :-)

I love this concealer. I’ve been using Born This Way In Mocha in which I also love but at times I hate wearing it when I just want to have a basic makeup day without doing the most. I decided to get the Fenty concealer that matches it, which was in my opinion 385. I wear 420 foundation and didn’t get the concealer in 420 because I love for my concealer to highlight and pop vs being very subtle. But if you want just a really natural not so much of a highlight look then the concealer that is matched with your foundation should be fine. First and foremost a little goes a long way. It is very smooth and creamy so it spreads easily. The coverage is light and gave really good coverage. I wore a full face of Fenty products with inclusion of the newest products and the concealer lasted the entire day to night( I did use the setting powder in Cashew for my under eye and t zone as well). I had no creases and really no issue at all. I’ve come to realize that with Fenty foundation, concealer, and etc combined the brand is putting emphasis on achieving a natural flawless look that looks like you have no makeup on at all. Which is perfect for someone that wants to wear makeup everyday and doesn’t want to look over done and just absolutely NATURAL. I suggest having someone color match you perfectly so when the products are applied your face will look flawless and feel like it’s your skin.
reviews.review_title: The No Makeup, Makeup Look....I love it.

reviews.review_text: My under eyes are unforgiving to EVERY concealer I’ve tried, they’re dry and my dark circles are no help either. When I swatched it in store I liked how it felt and decided to buy it since I get a better idea of how concealers work once they’re on my face and set. The way it glides on I can’t even explain! Definitely different when you swatch on your hand vs on the face. It’s like a gel/mousse whipped kind of consistency and I believe that’s what makes it crease proof or resistant (if you have natural creases/lines they’ll most likely always come through sad reality). It didn’t dry my under eyes and set so beautifully. Instant holy grail! Side note: I bought the shade that correlates with my foundation shade. I don’t like too much brightness under my eyes, just a bit so I got the recommended color (240).

I exchanged NARS Creamy Radiant concealer for this one as the NARS one wasn't doing it for me, despite all the hype. Definitely made the right choice. Not only is this slightly less expensive, but the coverage is amazing. The coverage is somewhat the same as NARS but it blended much better for me and truly is crease proof. FB might be a bit overhyped but they are truly delivering on the quality of their products.

Really like this concealer! I have combo skin and it looks amazing on me!! It love the wet cool feeling it gives. It does brighten up my eyes but it’s more of a light to med coverage. But I don’t like full coverage under my eyes anyway. I do like how it has 50 shades but a lot are yellow and I am pink. I got 100 the lightest but still good enough ❤️

Life changing! I’ve been looking for a good “no makeup” concealer and I used this today to just throw on under my eyes and on spots and didn’t even set it and it’s not creasing or caked at all!  Little goes a long way but seriously amazing.

Fenty never disappoints. I'm shade 200 in profiltr foundation and was advised to stick to the same for concealer. I was skeptical at first because I thought i'd have to go lighter to get the right shade, but it's absolutely PERFECT! It brightens without being too light and blends flawlessly into my foundation. Like her foundation, it's VERY fast drying, especially once you start blending it in, so i recommend doing one eye at a time. Also, a little goes a long way! Paired it with her new setting powder in banana, flawless soft matte finish and only slightly (and I mean SLIGHTLY) creases if you have fine lines under your eyes (duh). HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

Love the shade range! As a side note, I emailed Fenty Beauty after the initial launch of their foundations regarding not having enough olive-undertones shades, and it looks like they listened with both the foundation and the concealer! Anyway, this matches well, blends wonderfully, and doesn’t emphasize my under-eye texture. Yes, please! Oh, 
and the no-crease claim is actually for real!

I tried the Fenty concealer shade 150 with my fenty foundation also in 150! Love how the shades are the same name to compliment each other, makes finding your shade 100x easier. I applied with a damp morphe beauty sponge for foundation and concealer, then used the Laura mercier translucent loose setting powder also applied with a sponge. Didn’t find it patchy at all! Really enjoyed this concealer.

LOVE this concealer! I use the exact same shade in Fenty’s foundation and let me tell you, the concealer formula is EVERYTHING! It doesn’t crease and it blends out so well! No harsh edges and it doesn’t dry immediately when you put it on the skin. You have the time to blend it and play with it a bit before it dries. Love Fenty and can’t wait to see what’s next!
I wanted to love this so bad. It’s beautiful, easy to blend, and a great color match for me. However, I found that it indeed creased a little bit and quite quickly.
This product wasn’t set and still manage to look matte and flawless! The longevity is amazing, a days worth of wear and still looks as good as the moment you first put it on.

Love love love! Asked one of the Sephora ladies to help me with my raccoon eyes. She quickly knew my color shade. I normally use Urban Decay coverage concealer and Nars concealer. With Fenty all I need is one. I have lines underneath my eyes so it does crease. However, I can manage. It’s very long lasting and I don’t have to reapply. In love
I LOVE THIS! It just made me love Fenty beauty even more! Creamy and super blendable!

My fondation is 420 and I use the shade 385 for the concealer. I love it !! It stay all day and blend perfectly with my fondation. Also, I don’t need to do it again during the day. I bought the brush too (: Fenty Beauty is the best as always!

Fantastic concealer The color matches me just right it does increase up after her long hours.. The texture of it is just so creamy and smooth but not too watery just the perfect consistency... it covers up the blemishes pretty well. Overall I am really satisfied!

I wore this for 11 hours without baking it and had very minimal creasing! I wear shade 150 foundation and got shade 120 to highlight my under eyes. The only down side was that in my city the shipping got messed up and only the 25 lightest shades were in store. I was told that the rest of the shades would be in soon and it was just a shipping error.

I was under the impression that she worked on these concealers to complement your shade. Meaning, I didn’t have to buy a different shade than my foundation shade when it came to concealer. I’m 370 and bought the 370 concealer and find that they’re pretty much the same color. Needless to say, she did a very good Job. I wore all Fenty Beauty make up yesterday and everyone loved it. There is something about her line. I’m originally African, and for some reason even the smell of her products kind of brings me back home, makes me think of hot weather. I enjoy using her products. I definitely feel like she gets it❤️
I tried it and I love it! Now I no longer need to use l.a girl pro. It wears very nicely and give coverage.

The idea to match the concealer with the foundation is genius!!! it is a beautiful creamy full coverage concealer. The color is Brown girl friendly. It's better than any concealer that I have ever tried.
GREAT concealer!! Good coverage. Little creasing.  Lasted throughout the day.
Wow I love it!! Finally I found the best concealer for me

MY NEW FAVORITE CONCEALER!! Goodbye dark circles!! What I like to do is fist conceal with my two faced concealed, blend then put the Fenty Beauty on which is a lot lighter then blend! Looks amazing !!

I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS CONCEALER!!!! Definitely the best concealer on the market now. I do have normal skin and am just as in love with the foundation my shade is 420. And this shade (360) gives me the perfect brightness. I do notice that if I don’t bake underneath my eyes it will crease easier but I bake everyday and have no issues with it not creasing. Worn it for 13 hours and no creases!!!!!

I desperately wanted to love this. I bought this concealer with the Fenty Setting powder in Lavender. The first time I used it, the powder clung in all the wrong places and the concealer started to separate close to my eye. The second time I applied it, I spent more time blending out the concealer (and used way less powder to avoid patchiness). The concealer looks really nice at first, but it creases very quickly. Once I blended out the creases,  I used the setting powder and it just made it look dull and dried out/ textured. 

Not even 4 hours later, the concealer has completely separated from the foundation. I have never seen my under eye look so bad before. Normally I’d assume it was maybe the concealer and setting powder not working well together.. but shouldn’t these products be made for each other? If a product doesn’t work for me the first time, I usually try it out a few more times to be sure. This one only needed to be used twice to realize this just doesn’t work for me. Really bummed I have to return.

I am very sad to say that this concealer is a huge flop! Its thin and is not full coverage at all! I was so excited to try it! I have it 2 chances and both failed. I used a damp and dry beauty blender and has the same result! I will be sticking to shape tape or born this way concealers!

Blends surprisingly well. My biggest problem with under eye concealers is that after a few hours, it noticeably settles in my fine lines. Not this one! Looked perfect even after hours. Nothing really compares.

Love the coverage of this concealer! I absolutely hated the foundation (it oxidized on me). This is by far one of my favorites. It’s comparable to Nars, Too Faced, and KVD. Amazing shade range. I will definitely buy again.

Love this concealer. It lasted all night when I went out with my girls!!....my face was full of Fenty, I added this concealer to my collection along with the setting powder & it was complete!!! I’m in the shade 420 in both foundation & concealer. I’m one happy customer!

If you are looking for a brighter affect, you need to try your foundation shade, let it oxidize, and THEN compare it to the concealer shade. Otherwise, you need to get the corresponding concealer to your foundation. It is formulated to compliment the shade! I took a close look at 450 foundation and concealer, they are 2 very different shades... and they go together so beautifully. Bravo Rihanna!
reviews.review_title: Fenty HEAD FAKE Part I - 450 Concealer

reviews.review_text: Flawless!! I’m completely in love with this concealer and matched with the Fenty foundation genius!!!!!
I would give this 10 stars if I could. Honestly a game changer for sure!! I love this and the shades are for everyone
Holy macaroni! This is DEFINATELY a new holy grail! It's super creamy and high coverage!!!!! Highly recommend!

I love a dramatic under eye brightness! I wasn't sure which shade to select but the tones of the shades made it super easy to pick the best shade. this is a BANGER for 450 shade foundation. I dab a little in the very inner corner of my eye and blend it into the 450 shade. It is seamless and looks natural despite being a much lighter shade. bravo Rihanna! This system is genius.
reviews.review_title: Fenty HEAD FAKE Part II - 420 Concealer

reviews.review_text: This concealer is truly beautiful. The color match is perfect for me. I use Nars radiant creamy concealer in ginger but it doesn’t last as long and the color is a little off. Fenty Beauty really nailed it with the longevity and the color match is perfection 235. My only complaint is that after 6 hours it look a little dry. I will continue to use this product. I really like it.
Super bomb! The coverage is nice, the product has a nice texture to it very creamy, it’s buildable and it sets so nice with her new powder she launched!

perfect for EVERYONE and i mean EVERYONE. i bought this as SOON as it came out and i was very excited. even with all 50 shades i had no trouble finding my match. i have very textured skin and i found that even without a primer it didn’t cling to my pores or any acne spots. it’s very creamy and light. it is also VERY long lasting. i had a 45 minutes sob fest and it did. not. budge!!! i know this is bad but i also slept in it... IT DIDNT MOVE!!!!! one other thing to mention- a lot of products break me out VERY easily but even after sleeping in this concealer my skin feels amazing. i would 10/10 recommend. i even bought one for my best friend.

The first time I wore this I knew that this was my new favorite concealer! So creamy, effortless to blend, and it has the perfect amount of coverage. It doesn’t dry down quickly so you have a lot of time to work with it. Riri did that!!!
Just got this yesterday, wore it all today and it lasted the whole day. doesn’t crease and looks great on foundation or bare skin. strongly recommend :))
This does not crease or cause your under eyes to look dry or cakey. I have so far only loved the Too faced sculpt concealer but now this will also be a staple in my collection.
this concealer is a must it has such good coverage and it doesn't crease it's a new fave of mine!

I’ve never found such a close shade match in a concealer! Highly bendable - but I find it does go on better with a blender than it does with a brush. It definitely oxidizes so be sure to shade match with that in mind.

The shade range is huge , but it’s either to yellow or to orange . I got shade matched but still wasn’t right . I wore it still , even though it was to orange and it just made my skin look horrible and within hours I was oily but cakey. My skin isn’t bad but with this, it just made my skin look bad.. I tried primers and doing different techniques. No luck will be returning ...
this concealer is definently full coverage. you only need to dip your applicator into the concealer ONCE. it's very smooth on the skin and blends beautifully!!! definently a MUST HAVE!!!

Very blendable, medium-full coverage and it really is creaseproof on me. The wand applicator also makes it easy to highlight your face with- also this product reminds me of Tarte Shape Tape but slightly more creamy and has more of a natural finish. Love this concealer! 50 shades for all too!!!
this product is good I like the finish of it the only thing is that it oxidized on me so make sure you go a shade lighter

While I really liked how well this blended out and the texture of the concealer, the end result was disappointing. I was color matched in store and I feel that the shade I was given really is the best match shade wise I have ever found in a concealer. However... this is patchy and wants to move around. I also feel like it actually exaggerated my barely there dark circles. I am super bummed because I love the shade range and the finish of the concealer :( I wish RiRi would release some more hydrating products!!!
reviews.review_title: Not what I was hoping for...

reviews.review_text: I use the foundation shade 110 and this shade of concealer is really good for me. Definitley light, but once the makeup is on and complete, it looks perfect.... color wise... I am use to using Shape Tape and this concealer is a tad drying under the eyes. Very smooth though!
Thank you Rihanna for adding an inbetween color, this 385 is my perfect match. Coverage is amazing, super blendable and cheaper than my first love NARS creamy. Amazing!!
