Formula is awesome. Just as bomb as my Too Faced concealer. Play around with the colors a little! I first purchased 360 (the compliment to my foundation shade) and it was way too identical. So I went up one (350) for a nice under eye brightener. Honestly, I find blending it out with my finger works better than a brush or sponge.
Love this it has great coverage

I wasn’t sure how I’d feel about the matte concealer given that the matte foundation didn’t work for me.  But I was pleasantly surprised.  I wanted something that was closer to my skintone (as opposed to lighter/brightening) for a more natural look.  I easily found a shade that worked, applied it in the store using my fingers, set it with my go-to powder and headed off to work.  Nine hours later, it was still in place and doing its job. I haven’t tried it for blemishes, but as an under-eye concealer, I would definitely recommend. For those who have naturally dry under eyes like mine, don’t be scared off.  If you’re moisturizing the area nightly, you should be fine.

Crease resistant, smooth like butter and will make you look FLAWLESS. Fenty Beauty has produced another WONDERFUL PRODUCT. This concealer covers your worst nightmares and blends to perfection. I have slightly sunken eyes and creasing and dark spots are a concern of mine. With this product I no longer have that worry! Not to mention the packaging is the cutest! I love it’s size and slick design. 
Shape Tape who?

Love this concealer! I wear shade 420 in the foundation and I like a nice highlight, so I used shade 380 in the concealer. Absolutely amazing! Creamy and blend out beautifully. Definitely will buy more

Small amount goes a long way. Don’t over do it. This is real life, we’re not walking Instagram makeup photos ;) .. great finish. Wore it alone with no foundation. Got compliments on my skin and not my makeup so that lets me know it’s money well spent!! Purchased 430 and 440
AMAZING! Creamy and is longwearing! Would recommend to anyone!
so creamy i love it. will repurchase

It’s been 2 days and I’m already obsessed. The colour match is perfect. I’ve worn it with the fenty foundation and be fenty powder and my face was snatched. My oily skin looked amazing after 10 hrs. I know it is early but first impression: bomb.

This concealer lives up to the hype. I’m between 370 and 390 in the foundation depending on the season. I went in thinking I would get 385, but the 370 was a perfect match to give a slight highlight under the eye. Applicator is long and makes it easy to apply. I have oily skin so love that it dries matte!
The BEST concealer I’ve ever used. It is so creamy and glides on like a dream. The color is absolutely perfect. Never using shape tape again

Rih did it once again. This concealer was created for oily girls around. One layer goes a long way. I rushed in the morning to get my color and the setting powder. I do recommend going down a shade from your foundation color. I’m a 440 in her foundation. I did 430 for the concealer and the Nutmeg setting I powder.  The Packaging is amazing
Used this concealer on many clients and even on myself today and I love it ! The coverage and formula is bomb!

Rihanna, you did it again. Really nice concealer. Creamy but doesn’t crease. I am really into makeup - specifically luxury lines. I look for lines that are natural and  flawless - this is it. I would definitely consider this a luxury makeup brand.
reviews.review_title: This is a Luxury Brand - Hands Down

reviews.review_text: Loveeee this! I have the Fenty Pro Filt’r foundation in 310, so I went to swatch all the colors, and 310 matched me the best! I love how the foundation and concealer colors are matched (obviously the concealer is going to be lighter). I bought this the same day it came out. It’s creamy and full coverage; it sets well with Kat Von D Lock It. It doesn’t really crease either and just overall brightens the undereye area. This is my new favorite concealer and her foundation is also one of my favorite foundations.
I love love love this concealer I just bought it and I’m obsessed and I’ve tried a lot of concealers and this is is up there with tarte and Huda it’s also medium coverage but it buildable

Love love love this concealer. I wasn’t sure at first because the texture was gel-ish but it blended so beautifully. A little goes a long way and it’s one of the few concealers that hasn’t looked cakey on my undereye. I was also really pleased with the shade options. I’ve had trouble finding a good formula with the right undertones and this is perfect.

first time I have ever had a matching concealer in my life. 
so glad it doesnt smell like  shape tape does. don't know about wear time as I havent been able to fully test it but I'll reapply if I have to. the shade is too perfect
I’m in love great buy!! Blends out perfectly. I wear shade 330 with or without foundation which is a must for me as I don’t like always wearing foundation.
This concealer is so beautiful. It sets amazingly and it is not drying like the foundation. It is so creamy and buttery and it looks perfect on the skin! Highly recommend!

I hate concealer. I have tried many brands (tarte shape tape, Kay von d, urban decay, cover girl, etc.) both drug store and high end and this is the only one I truly love on the first wear.
It’s very creamy and glides on easily, blends seamlessly and stays put with setting powder (I also purchased her new translucent powder the same day I bought this).
It’s so pigmented and a little goes a very long way. I dotted it on the places needed (I have cystic acne and deep brown and red scars on my T-zones) and they vanished.
The formula is amazing, it smells beautiful, but not fragranced too much, for I also have sensitive skin. The applicator itself is long and is drenched in product so you have no need to repeatedly dunk it back in the bottle to obtain more.
I wore my makeup for almost 9 hours and it didn’t crease under my eyes or fade from where I put it. 
The packaging is exactly like her foundation, glass bottle, plastic white cap, easy-to-use pump. It’s luxurious and sturdy, which I appreciate so much for the price.
It doesn’t cake, which is a problem I repeatedly had with other concealers from different brands. It’s not oily feeling, just light weight and feathery. 
10/10 would recommend to any and everyone, amazing product!

Look here, this concealer is amazing!

I am beyond impressed with the quality of Fenty products- they have yet to fail me and I will keep buying them!
reviews.review_title: Robyn, she’s really outdone herself. BOMB CONCEAL!

reviews.review_text: One of the best concealers ever!!!!!! Thick, creamy formula that offers PERFECT coverage

It looked very pink in the bottle so I was a little worried it wouldn’t match, but it turned out to be perfect! I’ve never found a concealer with that perfect peachy undertone. I’ll actually be able to use it without foundation on days that I’m too lazy. I wouldn’t say I have dark circles but I get that sallow look, especially around my eyes, and this brightened it just the right amount without looking too bright. A touch of the butter loose powder was the perfect finishing touch to set. I also like the texture more than shape tape, it’s somehow thicker/creamier and yet less drying.
It’s quite yellow but it’s really nice and doesn’t crease. Super easy to blend and it gives you medium to full coverage if you build it!

Finally a concealer that gives me that natural look. Im a 450 in foundation so I got my corresponding concealer shade... it’s creamy yet still a little matte. It’s quite beautiful, got complimented on my skin while wearing only the concealer under my eyes with the nutmeg powder to set it. I couldn’t believe I got complimented, I told the stranger I was wearing concealer lool. Im looking to get 440 for a brighter highlight

Concealer is amazing. It is so creamy and blends out beautifully. I always had problems with dark under eyes and this worked like a charm. The applicator helps to be more precise in the corners. I also got the same shade as my foundation which is 310 and it is amazing how well it compliments my foundation. It's a bit lighter than my foundation so it gives me that natural beautiful under eye. Also, this can be used without any foundation. I tried it under my eyes and then set it with the fenty setting powder in Cashew, and you couldn't even tell if I had make up on!

This concealer is my new favorite. I have dry skin and I am especially dry in the area where most people highlight under their eyes, therefore I am very picky with concealers. I have tried a lot of concealers and many different methods of applying them, and I only have a handful that I love and I can say, this concealer does everything I want a concealer to do. I don’t need a ton of coverage, so I can’t speak on that. However, I usually layer my maybelline fit me or nars radiant creamy to get a desired coverage in certain areas and I didn’t really have to do that with this one. One thing I’m also picky about is blendability. The shape tape from Tarte failed for me because it was drying and wouldn’t blend, but this one blends seamlessly and doesn’t look dry and cakey like Tarte shape tape and many others do. The shade range is also very impressive with this since there are 50 shades. You can guarantee you will find a match for you. I love the packaging, the applicator, and that it doesn’t burn my eyes like my maybelline fit me has started to do, even though I loved its formula. I can’t recommend this concealer enough. I also recommend getting one of the setting powders as well because it also worked well for me!
reviews.review_title: I’m very picky and loved this concealer

reviews.review_text: I love this concealer! As soon as I purchased it this morning I rushed home to apply with along with the new banana setting powder, and foundation shade 345! I’m in love! Finally a concealer, setting powder, and foundation that looks great together on my oily skin!

I wear 410 in the foundation and paired the concealer with the powder and primer this morning after I picked it up before work. I love the finish and how well its held up after a day of work. A little goes a long way, though!
reviews.review_title: 10 hours in and super in love

reviews.review_text: WOW... so I truly didn’t think this would be good. I was watching all the reviews on YouTube but they were all sponsored so I felt like I wasn’t getting an honest opinion so I decided to try it for myself. I went to Sephora today and got matched for shade 230 and the concealer and of the shade butter in the powder. My normal foundation shade and her line is 260 so I had to go three shades down. I’ve been wearing it ever since I got it today for about 8  hours and it has not creased and it looks absolutely so flawless. The powder is amazing and smells very light and fresh but also really locks in your make up without looking cakey and powdery this is my new favorite duo I can’t wait to wear it more. The powder also does not have flashback. I definitely gave into the hype of buying yet and I do not regret it because it deserves all the hype so absolutely amazing I hope everyone finds a shade and loves it.

Lightweight yet long lasting and an amazing array of colors available.  Being in my 40s present a challenge for lines and dark circles, however the concealer does wonders.  Also you can build up. Not drying therefore it won’t settle into lines and lightweight that you can wear it on its own.  Great job RiRi
I LOVE LOVE LOVE this concealer and this is coming from a person that has tried soooo many concealers (my bags are hard to hide) but rih came thru & the fact that it corresponds to my shade yaaaas

I went into my local Sephora and saw that these were finally out and I couldn't resist. I tried it when I got home and it was so good! I really love the foundation and together they apply beautifully and make your skin look flawless! For sure a new go to concealer! RIHANNA DID THAT YALL!

Got this today and was very excited about it. I love the derby foundation and use it as concealer at the moment because I do not put foundation all over my face. Applied very creamy, but used wet beauty blender to blend out and became very patchy. Not sure if concealer needs to be used on top of foundation. Maybe a wet beauty blender is not the way to go. Would love to know what I am doing wrong but came out extremely patchy.

melts into your skin and so creamy! usually concealers are super dry but this one is so creamy and feels so good on the skin! fragrance isnt overbearing either. i was scared because the foundation is too matte for me, but this concealer is a completely different formula! girl if you don’t have this concealer what are you doing?
it gives good coverage but is hard to blend out and work with and creases and settles in to lines horribly

Yassss!! RiRi has done it again. Love this concealer!! It blends nicely, doesn't crease under the eyes as well as conceals my dark circles, and matches according to my Fenty foundation. Definitely will buy again!
Had it applied in the store and so far I love it. It’s pretty matte so I definitely recommend an eye cream before you apply it
I really love this foundation, it does dry quick and I feel like I have to use a lot but it looks amazing on the skin.

I can finally throw out my shape tape! This concealer is creamy but not heavy underneath the eyes. The shade that coresponds are okay but I personally love a highlight under my eye. My foundation shade is 255 and the concealer shade 210 was perfect! There is no creasing but  I did set it with powder.
LOVE. I use 370 in the foundation, this is perfect for highlighting and concealing. No creasing and blends perfectly.

I've always had to buy 2 concealers to make my shade of concealer. This is the FIRST that matches me perfectly. Now, my HG is NARS RCC..I've seen some compare them and they are not the same at all. It dries down fast but you can still blend. The coverage seems sheer to medium (i have dark circles). However it looks like skin! These shades seem to aim to be the kind of concealers that aim to look more natural than brightening or highlighting. So keep that in mind when picking. For my oily girls, it's matte matte matte! Reminds me of a higher quality version of Colourpop (As far as finish and dry time). I want to buy one for contouring, now that i know what the finish is like. With 50 shades, no wonder i was able to find a match with one go.
reviews.review_title: Finally, a concealer that matches my skin tone!!

reviews.review_text: Extremely creamy, and really easy to work with!!! The shade is really complementing with your foundation shade, and it looks so beautiful!!

Absolutely love this concelear! Tried it out versus the Nars and I must say that they are exactly the same type of creamy texture, except the Fenty one is way smoother and easier to blend. A little definitely goes a long way for this product, so make sure you are blending it out if you use a full dip and swipe. It does not feel heavy and it doesn’t easily crease, even after wearing it for 2 hours. It is a bit pricey but you do get plenty of product in the package and how much the applicator picks up.

I've been on the hunt for a concealer that rivals Shape Tape as I want to support more inclusive brands (especially after their foundation launch ... yikes), but unfortunately nothing has come close. Until this. 

I'm normally 140 in the Pro Filt'r foundation, and I was a bit skeptical of how this shade in the concealer would work for me. It's marketed as a shade with "cool pink undertones", and I was worried this would pull too cool/pink on my neutral skin. However, this is almost an exact shade match to my Shape Tape shade, fair neutral (albeit a slight bit darker, but it's barely noticeable). It doesn't pull pink on application, and is light enough for me to use both as an undereye concealer and to carve out my brows. 

As for the formula, I don't have anything like this in my collection right now. I'd say it's a cross between Shape Tape and FAB's avocado concealer. It has a medium to full-coverage finish, depending on how much you use. For me, I can cover my undereyes with about 3-4 swipes and the redness around my nose with a dot on each side. It gives me about the same coverage under my eyes as Shape Tape does, but is noticeably less dry. This didn't emphasize my fine lines at all, and it also didn't crease under my eyes. It blends seamlessly, and it doesn't dry down too fast so you have some time to blend it out. The only issue I had was a bit of creasing on my eyelids, so if you're planning to use this as a shadow primer, I'd say set it fast to prevent creasing.

This is also a thiccc formula. I wasn't expecting that at all, since the Pro Filt'r foundation is so liquidy. I also find that it's easy to overuse because it's so thick - today, I ended up using way too much around my nose. So keep that in mind.

All in all, I'm super happy with how this is performing so far. I do want to note that I have pretty clear skin, and can't comment on how this would work for someone with acne or dark spots. For me, this works beautifully. Highly recommend.

Honey let me tell you how good this product is. When I was testing it in store it even blended out beautifully using my fingers. It's so smooth and creamy, I love it. I have not found any other concealer that is this good. Rhianna has done it again she is the Queen of make up.

doesnt dry up fast, blends out really nicely with a beauty blender, dewy and creamy formula, 100% efficient and covers up all kinds of skin imperfections, i used it with my fenty foundation and its the perfect combo. deff worth the money cuz of its benefits, and the shade range,... i mean im speechless, Rihanna really does it every time!! every single product i own from the fenty beauty line gives flawless results and works perfectly on my skin. she never seemes to disappoint me!! will deff repurchase the concealer
reviews.review_title: LIVE FOR THE SHADE RANGE, WE STAN A QUEEN

reviews.review_text: wow i was so amazed by this concealer yall, it worked great on my skin and makes the perfect cut crease. i love the lightweight and creamy formula and the fact that it covers blemishes, red spots, dark circles, black heads, white heads, large pores, birthmarks etc so its definitely multifunctional!! get this before it sells out, trust me u wont regret it! i think the price is reasonable and 100% worth the money and hype

questions.question: If I use foundation #385, which concealer can I use and what is best to cover blemishes.

answers.answer: Hi there:) Typically you match to the same shade you wear for foundation, but since you are looking to cover blemishes, check out shade 390 or 400 depending on the blemish.

questions.question: Hey dolls I use PRO FILT'R SOFT MATTE LONGWEAR FOUNDATION in shade 235 which concealer would be best suited for me ? :)

answers.answer: Fenty says to get the same shade in foundation and concealer

questions.question: I use 210 Pro Filtr foundation Fenty beauty by Rihanna. Which concealer shade should I use? I want to conceal my dark circles under eyes and dark area under my lower lip. Please reply. Thanks.

answers.answer: For under eyes I recommend you used the 190 shade and for covering blemishes you can used 200.

questions.question: I’m shade 385 what would be a good concealer for my highlight ?

answers.answer: I think if you want an intense bright highlight, 350 or 360 would be great, since these concealers are lighter than their corresponding foundation shades. If you don?t want an intense bright under-eyes, then 380 or 385 would work perfectly. (I am in shade 300 and I use 300 for my brightening concealer)

questions.question: Hi I wear a 450 in the fenty foundation but I am unsure what color I should get for the concealer.. I want to highlight my face so what color would be best? thanks!

answers.answer: I wear a 450. If you?re looking for a subtle highlight get 445, if not 380 is the super bright.

questions.question: I use fenty foundation number #440 what number should I get in concealer???? Someone please get back with me ASAP so I can order please ???

questions.question:
Im a 420 in the foundation.
What shade concealer should I get?

answers.answer: Hello! For a natural look, I recommend shade 420 as well. If you want it to brighten, I recommend going one or two shades lighter (410 or 400).

answers.answer: If you are asking about Fenty, no it does not oxidize. Stays true to color. I?m in love with Fenty.

questions.question: I’m 400, which concealer should I use?

questions.question: what concealer  mach with me if used 260 neutral pro matte

answers.answer: I use the same color concealer as foundation-I use 190 pro filter foundation & 190 concealer. Depends if you want a little lighter/darker for contour
I always do one shade down. If it’s meant to be a highlight like under your brow, I’ll do like 2/3 shades down but if it’s for everyday concealer use one shade down is safe.
If you want to just conceal and it highlight I would go with the same number. If you?re trying to highlight I would recommend 230, which is the next neutral shade lighter. Hope this helps.

questions.question: what shade concealer should I buy to match my 330 foundation?

answers.answer: For covering imperfections like blemishes, I would probably go with the 330 concealer. I use 150 foundation and concealer in summer (120 in winter) and it's a pretty perfect match. If you are using it for undereye circles, you might go lighter.

questions.question: What concealer is best for foundation 230?

answers.answer: Hi there:) Shade  230 - for light to medium skin w/ neutral undertones:)

questions.question: What concealer is best for foundation 430?

answers.answer: Hi there! I would choose 430! This founation was designed to match 1:1 with each concealer shade. If you prefer you can go lighter or deeper depending on your preference but 430 would be your suggested match:)

questions.question: Looking for a light peach color . What color do you recommend? I have dark circles underneath my eyes. Thanks x

answers.answer: Hi Nena! I would actullay take a look at the current foundation you are using and match to that as close as you can. The next step would be to choose a shade that has peach undertone in the description. Shade #250 is very peach and can work as a corrector under any existing concealer shade. Shade #160 is a light shade with peach undertones.

questions.question: If i wear shade 120 in fenty foundation what shade should i use for the concealer?

answers.answer: i looked back and you can also use 100 since 120 also had neutral undertones, so either 100, 110 or 120:)
either 120 or 110. 110 if you want super brightening. hope this helps!

questions.question: Is this concealer good for oily acne prone skin?

answers.answer: Yes

questions.question: Does it covers bag under eyes

answers.answer: Yes, this was my main reason for trying this brand. Between my lack of sleep and low iron dark circles and bags have been in my life since I could remember. This does an amazing job of hiding it without having to apply a lot of product.

questions.question: What setting powder should I use with this concealer?

answers.answer: A lightweight translucent setting powder will work well with this concealer.

questions.question: Should I apply this concealer over or under my foundation?

answers.answer: Concealer is usually applied before powder foundations and after liquid foundations. We recommend playing with the products to see which order of application works best for you!

questions.question: How do I find my concealer shade?

answers.answer:
We recommend trying your foundation shade number, then adjusting as needed depending on what you want to conceal.

If you're unsure of your Fenty foundation shade, we recommend using the Shadefinder to determine your best match!

questions.question: Does this concealer oxidize?

answers.answer: We recommend swatching the concealer and allowing it to dry down for a few minutes to see its true shade.

questions.question: Can I use this concealer as a highlight?

answers.answer: Yes you can
Yes, you can! It's a multi-use product that can be used to conceal, highlight or brighten.

questions.question: Does this concealer work on mature skin?

answers.answer: Yes, this concealer is suitable for mature skin. We recommend moisturizing and prepping the skin well before applying the concealer.
